1a1(dkon brtsegs): @#/ /dkon brtsegs kha pa bzhugs so/ /
1b1(dkon brtsegs): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya ak+Sho b+h+ya ta thA ga ta s+ya byU ha nA ma
1b2(dkon brtsegs): ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi
1b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa'i bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/
1b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
2a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab
2a2(dkon brtsegs): n a bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs
2a3(dkon brtsegs): cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang
2a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang
2a5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa| gleng po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su
2b1(dkon brtsegs): thob pa| srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/
2b2(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di ltar
2b3(dkon brtsegs): slob pa rgyun du zhugs pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po
2b4(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / de dag
2b5(dkon brtsegs): las gzhan pa gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
2b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis yongs su
3a1(dkon brtsegs): bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
3a2(dkon brtsegs): t i'i bu stan las langs te chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan
3a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom
3a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
3a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi 'jug pa dang / spyod pa dang / spro ba dang / sems bskyed pa gang gis sngon gyi byang chub
3a6(dkon brtsegs): s ems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur
3b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / go cha dang / yon tan yongs su brjod pa legs par bshad du gsol/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'
3b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po de dag gi las dang / sems bskyed pa dang / go cha dang / yon tan yongs su rdzogs pa dag kyang bshad du gsol/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
3b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du brtson pa'i byang chub sems
3b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu de dag gi spyod pa dang / yon tan yongs su dag pa yongs su brjod pa dag kyang bshad du gsol/ de ni/ skye bo mang po la sman pa
3b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur la/ da ltar dang /
3b6(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la yang 'di ltar chos kyi sgron ma'i snang ba dang / 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi snang bas snang bar bgyis par
3b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing spro pa stsal bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de lta lags pas byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyis sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
4a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi 'jug pa dang / spyod pa dang / spro ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / go cha dang / yon tan yongs su brjod pa dag thos na/ de bzhin du
4a2(dkon brtsegs): slob cing de bzhin du sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /de dag de ltar bslabs shing de ltar bsgrubs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur
4a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing / yon tan de lta bu dag dang ldan par gyur nas kyang slar zhing gong nas gong du yon tan shin tu khyad par can dag kyang thob par 'gyur ba lags so/ /de skad ces
4a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ khyod
4a5(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir zhugs te/ 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
4a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi 'jug pa dang / spyod pa dang / spro ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / go cha dang / yon tan yongs su brjod pa dag 'dri bar sems pa ni/ yang khyod legs
4a7(dkon brtsegs): so| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la tshul bzhin du yid la zungs shig dang | 'di lta ste/ 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
4b1(dkon brtsegs): las brtsams te bshad par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin no/ /zhes gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
4b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
4b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhes te/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug las
4b4(dkon brtsegs): brtsams te chos ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bgyi ba de na de
4b5(dkon brtsegs): b zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po zhes bgyi ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin
4b6(dkon brtsegs): p a drug las brtsams te chos ston pa de phyogs gang na bzhugs zhes don de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la nges par zhu'o snyam
4b7(dkon brtsegs): m o| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
5a1(dkon brtsegs): to| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong tham pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga'
5a2(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes
5a3(dkon brtsegs): te| de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug las brtsams te chos ston to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ yang de'i tshe de'i dus na dge
5a4(dkon brtsegs): s long zhig stan las langs te chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
5a5(dkon brtsegs): y ang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
5a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa 'di la slob par 'tshal
5a7(dkon brtsegs): lo| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des dge slong
5b1(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dge slong / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa la deng sang bslab par shin tu dka'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong / 'di ltar
5b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la mi 'khrugs par bya ba dang / gnod sems kyi sems mi bskyed par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de la de skad ces bka' stsal
5b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spyan chen po de la dge slong des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag dang slan chad 'di ltar g.yo ma
5b4(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang / sgyu ma mchis pa dang / mad pa'i tshig dang / gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i tshig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi/ bla med pa
5b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems 'dud par bgyi/ yongs su bsngo bar yang bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed
5b6(dkon brtsegs): pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la 'di nas bzung ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
5b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te sems can 'ga' tsam la khro ba'am/ gnod sems sam/ 'khrugs pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur
6a1(dkon brtsegs): na| bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams
6a2(dkon brtsegs): cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig / btsun pa bcom
6a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos
6a4(dkon brtsegs): l a 'di nas bzung ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te gom pa 'dor ba re re la thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems
6a5(dkon brtsegs): dang bral bar gyur na/ de bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams
6a6(dkon brtsegs): cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig / btsun
6a7(dkon brtsegs): pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs
6b1(dkon brtsegs): su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed par gyur
6b2(dkon brtsegs): na| bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
6b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de ltar
6b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par
6b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig
6b6(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag de ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
6b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di
7a1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
7a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te 'dod chags dang ldan pa'am/ zhe sdang dang ldan pa'am/ gti mug dang ldan pa'am/ rnam par 'tshe ba dang ldan pa'am/ gnyid
7a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'am/ rmugs pa dang ldan pa'am/ 'gyod pa dang ldan pa'am/ rgod pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag
7a4(dkon brtsegs): tu ma mchis/ grangs mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
7a5(dkon brtsegs): ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/
7a6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas
7a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bar du gal te the tshom dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi
7b1(dkon brtsegs): k hyab| gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
7b2(dkon brtsegs): bslus par gyur cig / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
7b3(dkon brtsegs): t u bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te srog gcod pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed
7b4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas
7b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
7b6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang
7b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te ma byin par len pa dang ldan pa'am/ mi tshangs par spyod pa dang ldan pa'am/ brdzun du smra ba dang
8a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'am/ phra ma dang ldan pa'am/ ngag rtsub po dang ldan pa'am/ tshig kyal bar smra ba dang ldan pa'am/ brnab sems dang ldan pa'am/ gnod sems dang
8a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'am/ log par lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi
8a3(dkon brtsegs): k hyab| gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
8a4(dkon brtsegs): bslus par gyur cig ces byas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de nas dge slong zhig 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dang po sems bskyed
8a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa nyid nas sems can thams cad la sems mi 'khrugs shing kun du mi 'khrugs pa ni/ shin tu ngo mtshar che'o/ /kye ma dge slong 'di ni/ mi 'khrugs
8a6(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ legs so/ /snyam mo/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar dge slong de'i ming mi 'khrugs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya bar gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
8a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des dge slong / legs so/ /legs so/ /dge slong / khyod byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe na yang ming de nyid du 'gyur la/
8b1(dkon brtsegs): dge slong / khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na yang mtshan 'di lta ste/ mi 'khrugs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba de nyid du 'gyur ro/ /
8b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes de'i ming de la rjes su yi rang bar mdzad do/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas kyang dge slong / legs so/ /legs so/ /dge
8b3(dkon brtsegs): slong / khyod byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe na yang ming de nyid du 'gyur la/ dge slong / khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
8b4(dkon brtsegs): pa na yang mtshan 'di lta ste/ mi 'khrugs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba de nyid du 'gyur ro/ /zhes de'i ming de la rjes su yi rang bar byas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs
8b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa mngon du gyur pa des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun
8b6(dkon brtsegs): pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su
8b7(dkon brtsegs): bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te ji skad smras pa de bzhin du ma bgyis na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi
9a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
9a2(dkon brtsegs): gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de ltar thams
9a3(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
9a4(dkon brtsegs): p a'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te tha na gom pa 'dor ba re re tsam dag la'ang sangs rgyas yid la bgyid pa dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems
9a5(dkon brtsegs): ma bskyed na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs
9a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig / btsun pa bcom
9a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos
9b1(dkon brtsegs): l a bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te tshe rabs tshe rabs su khyim nas khyim ma mchis par yang dag par rab tu
9b2(dkon brtsegs): ma byung na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas
9b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
9b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na
9b5(dkon brtsegs): m ed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te tshe rabs tshe rabs su mngon par rab tu byung nas kyang dgon pa par ma gyur
9b6(dkon brtsegs): tam| bsod snyoms par ma gyur tam/ phyag dar khrod par ma gyur tam/ stan gcig par ma gyur tam/ zas phyis mi len par ma gyur tam/ zas rnyed rnyed len par ma gyur
9b7(dkon brtsegs): tam| dur khrod par ma gyur tam/ bla gab med par ma gyur tam/ shing drung par ma gyur tam/ tsog pu par ma gyur tam/ gzhi ji bzhin par ma gyur tam/ chos gos gsum pa
10a1(dkon brtsegs): par ma gyur tam/ phying pa bar ma gyur tam/ 'dod pa chung bar ma gyur tam/ chog shes par ma gyur tam/ chos 'dod par ma gyur tam/ chos la
10a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar ma gyur tam/ chos la gus par ma gyur tam/ chos la brten par ma gyur tam/ chos ston par ma gyur pa nas bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad
10a3(dkon brtsegs): bsnyungs pa'i yi dam yang dag par blang ba dag blangs te gnas par ma gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/
10a4(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas
10a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa
10a6(dkon brtsegs): y ang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te
10a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe rabs tshe rabs su rab tu byung nas kyang chos ston par ma gyur tam/ spobs pa chags pa med pa dang ldan par ma gyur tam/ spobs pa tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan par ma gyur
10b1(dkon brtsegs): na| bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
10b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de
10b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag
10b4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du 'di ltar 'greng ba dang / mchis pa dang / 'chag pa'i spyod lam gsum ma gtogs par gal te nyal
10b5(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas
10b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
10b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med
11a1(dkon brtsegs): y ang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te sems can 'ga' tsam la rtsa ba'i ltung ba 'byung ba dang
11a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'am/ rtsa ba'i ltung ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed dam/ bud med dang ldan pa'am/ brdzun du smra ba dang ldan pa'am/ de las gzhan smra ba brjod pa dang ldan pa'am/ gzhan
11a3(dkon brtsegs): la gnod cing spa kong pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis
11a4(dkon brtsegs): m i khyab| gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
11a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag bslus par gyur cig / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par
11a6(dkon brtsegs): r dzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te bud med
11a7(dkon brtsegs): la 'di ltar mi rtag pa'i rnam pa'am/ sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa'am/ rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis chos ston pa na yan lag las skyes pa'i
11b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan dag la bzang ba'i mtshan mar bzung nas so'i phreng ba ston tam/ rgod par bgyid dam/ lag pa g.yob par bgyid na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi
11b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te

11b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du chos ston pa na gal te lag pa bsgyur zhing chos ston par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma
11b6(dkon brtsegs): mchis| bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas
11b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa
12a1(dkon brtsegs): y ang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du
12a2(dkon brtsegs): gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skra dang kha spu bregs pa snod du gyur pa'am/ snod du ma gyur pa'ang mi mnga' ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal mtshan chos gos ngur
12a3(dkon brtsegs): smrig 'tshal ba dag mthong na/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du shes sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi 'du shes ma bskyed na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu
12a4(dkon brtsegs): kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang

12a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang
12a7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag mthong na/ de dag la ston pa'i 'du shes ma bskyed
12b1(dkon brtsegs): na| bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom

12b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du chos 'chad pa na chos ston pa dag la gal te mchis te chos nyan par ma gyur na/ bdag gis
12b5(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

13a1(dkon brtsegs): r dzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
13a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par 'di las phyi rol tu gyur pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / lha gzhan dag la phyag bgyis par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi
13a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da

13a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na
13a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te 'di la ni/ sbyin pa stsal bar bgyi'o/ /'di la ni/ stsal bar ma
13a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o| |zhes sems can la tha dad du bgyi ba'i 'du shes bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma
13b1(dkon brtsegs): mchis| bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs
13b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med
13b3(dkon brtsegs): p a yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te
13b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di la ni/ yon dbul bar bgyi'o/ /'di la ni/ yon dbul bar mi bgyi'o/ /zhes de lta bu'i 'du shes bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams
13b5(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la
13b6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po
13b7(dkon brtsegs): che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
14a1(dkon brtsegs): par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te 'di la ni/ dam pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa stsal bar bgyi'o/ /'di la stsal bar mi bgyi'o/ /zhes de lta bu'i
14a2(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams
14a3(dkon brtsegs): cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig / btsun
14a4(dkon brtsegs): pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos
14a5(dkon brtsegs): s hing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te dgum par 'os pa'i sems can la
14a6(dkon brtsegs): la zhig khrid de mchis pa mthong na/ de yongs su thar par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis lus yongs su btang ba ma bgyis na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi
14a7(dkon brtsegs): khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
14b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig / shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems
14b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' des gal te dgum par 'os pa'i sems can la la zhig khrid de mchis pa mthong na/ de yongs su thar par ma bgyis kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
14b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /zhes smras so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de nas yang dge slong zhig 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
14b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po mi 'khrugs pa 'dis gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag dpang du gyur pa dang / tshad mar gyur par 'jog pa
14b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpang du gyur ba dang / tshad mar gyur par 'jog pa de ni/ lha dang / mi dang /
14b6(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi dpang du gyur pa dang / tshad mar gyur bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam mo/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
14b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des dge slong de'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas dge slong de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dge slong /
15a1(dkon brtsegs): de de bzhin no/ /ji ltar khyod rnam par rtog pa de bzhin du dge slong / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
15a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas dag dpang du gyur ba dang / tshad mar gyur bar 'jog pa de yang ring por mi thogs par lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi dpang
15a3(dkon brtsegs): du gyur pa dang / tshad mar gyur par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag go cha chen po de lta bus bla na med pa yang dag
15a4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /shA
15a5(dkon brtsegs): ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
15a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrugs pa des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar
15a7(dkon brtsegs): b la na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma
15b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi bar du gal te dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma ltung ba'i nongs pa byung ba dag mthong na/ khyod la ltung ba'i nyes pa 'di byung ngo / /zhes
15b2(dkon brtsegs): ltung ba gleng bar gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams
15b3(dkon brtsegs): cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig / btsun pa
15b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ ci nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na thams cad kyi thams cad rnam
15b5(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad kyi thams cad du nyan thos rnams kyi ltung ba'i sgra tsam yang mi grag cing mi 'byung ba de ltar bdag gis brtsal zhing bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /ci nas bdag bla na med
15b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa'i yon tan yongs su rdzogs
15b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ji snyed pa dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba de ltar brtsal bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che
16a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
16a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te tha na g.yar lam tsam du khu ba byung bar gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi
16a3(dkon brtsegs): khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs
16a4(dkon brtsegs): te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ci nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag
16a5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rig kyi bu'am/
16a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo gang dag khyim gyi gnas nas nges par byung zhing rab tu byung bar gyur ba dag tha na g.yar lam na yang khu ba mi 'byin pa de ltar bdag gis brtsal zhing bsgrub
16a7(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
16b1(dkon brtsegs): c hub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par
16b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du da ltar gyi bud med dang / bud med kyi skyon gang lags pa'i bud med dang / bud med kyi skyon de lta bu
16b3(dkon brtsegs): dag 'byung bar 'gyur na/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur zhing / bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig
16b4(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs
16b5(dkon brtsegs): te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems
16b6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
16b7(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te ji skad smras pa de bzhin du ma bgyis na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma
17a1(dkon brtsegs): mchis| bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la
17a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig / sa bon gyi chos 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag ji lta ji ltar sems mngon par
17a3(dkon brtsegs): sgrub par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mngon par 'grub cing / de lta de ltar chos ston par yang 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsol to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de nas
17a4(dkon brtsegs): dge slong zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /skyes bu dam pa/ khyod kyis dam bcas pa 'di gal te yang
17a5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i smon lam yin zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i yang dag pa yin na/ bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig
17a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dis rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa chen po 'di g.yo ba dang / rab tu g.yo ba dang / kun tu rab tu g.yo ba dang /
17a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gul ba dang / rab tu 'gul ba dang / kun tu rab tu 'gul ba dang / ldeg pa dang / rab tu ldeg pa dang / kun tu rab tu ldeg par byos shig /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de nas byang
17b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi bden pa'i dam bcas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa des rkang pa
17b2(dkon brtsegs): g.yas pa'i mthe bos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par byas te/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/
17b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gul| rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg / rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg par byas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
17b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed par gyur ba yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa
17b5(dkon brtsegs): y ang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i spyod pa'i rjes su
17b6(dkon brtsegs): bslab par bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa'i rjes su slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ de 'dra
17b7(dkon brtsegs): ba kho na'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe
18a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de
18a2(dkon brtsegs): dang po sems bskyed pa la yang dag par zhugs pa na lha'i ris ji snyed cig 'dus par gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
18a3(dkon brtsegs): bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de/ dang po sems bskyed pa la yang dag par zhugs
18a4(dkon brtsegs): pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / bdud sdig can dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa
18a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'dus nas thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad ces kye ma sngon ma thos
18a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i seng+ge'i sgra chen po 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pas 'dis bsgrags pa las thos so/ /zhes smras so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de nas
18a7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu de dag dga' ba dang / yid bde ba bskyed nas kha mthun par 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gang dag byang chub sems
18b1(dkon brtsegs): d pa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ba de dag
18b2(dkon brtsegs): ni| dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags so/ /sems can gang dag gis seng+ge'i sgra chen po dang / khyu mchog gi mi 'jigs pa chen po dang / smon lam chen po'i chos kyi rnam
18b3(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di thos pa de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags so/ /zhes gsol to/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA
18b4(dkon brtsegs): ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i go cha chen po ci 'dra ba gang de bzhin
18b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas yongs su brjod pa'i go cha chen po de lta bu ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la mchis par bdag gis sngon chad ma thos lags so//
18b6(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras
18b7(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des go cha chen po gang bgos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
19a1(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag par zhugs pa'i smon lam chen po dang / go cha chen po de bgos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag
19a2(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu ni/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
19a3(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong phrag mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag gi nang na yang nyung ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
19a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po mi 'khrugs pa de/ yon tan gang dag dang ldan pa'i yon tan de dag ni/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yang med do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i
19a5(dkon brtsegs): b u| de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de
19a6(dkon brtsegs): la rigs kyi bu/ khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/
19a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /
19b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes lung bstan te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis nga da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur bar lung bstan
19b2(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi
19b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos
19b4(dkon brtsegs): khyab par gyur cing / sa chen po de yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ 'di ltar g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu
19b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gul| ldeg / rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg par gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dper na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te
19b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur cing / sa chen po 'di yang rnam pa drug
19b7(dkon brtsegs): tu g.yos par gyur te/ 'di ltar g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg par gyur pa
20a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des byang chub
20a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
20a3(dkon brtsegs): khams de na shing ljon pa dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
20a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po mi 'khrugs pa lung bstan pa ga la ba de logs su btud/ rab tu btud/ mngon par rab tu btud par gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dper na/ ngas bla na med pa yang
20a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ta thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
20a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di na shing ljon pa dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyis nga ga la ba de logs sa btud/ rab tu btud
20a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rab tu btud par gyur pa bzhin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des
20b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
20b2(dkon brtsegs): khams de na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gang dag
20b3(dkon brtsegs): ' khod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa lung bstan pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas phyag 'tshal zhing
20b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dug par gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dper na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
20b5(dkon brtsegs): brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang /
20b6(dkon brtsegs): lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis nga ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug par
20b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa bzhin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des byang chub sems dpa' sems
21a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
21a2(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams de na bud med sbrum mar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang de'i tshe bde zhing bkra shis par btsas par gyur to/ /sems can gang dag long bar gyur pa
21a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to/ /sems can 'on pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur to/ /sems can smyos pa rnams kyang dran pa rnyed par gyur
21a4(dkon brtsegs): to| |sems can dbang po thams cad ma tshang ba rnams kyi dbang po thams cad dang ldan par gyur to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dper na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par
21a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
21a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di na bud med sbrum par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang de'i tshe bde zhing bkra shis par btsas par gyur/ sems can long ba rnams kyang mig gis gzugs
21a7(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar gyur/ sems can 'on pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur/ sems can smyos pa rnams kyang dran pa rnyed par gyur/ sems can dbang po thams cad ma tshang ba
21b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang dbang po thams cad dang ldan par gyur pa bzhin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen
21b2(dkon brtsegs): po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
21b3(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams de na de'i tshe sems can 'ga' tsam yang gshis ngan du 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur pa med de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dper na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
21b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na de'i tshe sems
21b5(dkon brtsegs): can 'ga' tsam yang gshis ngan du 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur pa med pa bzhin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
21b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas spyan chen po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong
21b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der lha'i dri bsung yid du 'ong ba dag kyang byung bar gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dper na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
22a1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir lha'i dri
22a2(dkon brtsegs): bsung yid du 'ong ba dag byung bar gyur pa bzhin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
22a3(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni/ de ltar lung bstan pa nyid na yon tan de lta bu dag dang ldan par gyur ba
22a4(dkon brtsegs): las na| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni/ yon tan gyi chos chen po dang ldan pa lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
22a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
22a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de lung bstan pa na/ yon tan brjod pa de dag nyi tsher yang ma zad de/ shA ra dwa
22a7(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni/ yon tan mtha' yas pa gzhan dag gi pha rol tu phyin par gyur pa yang yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i
22b1(dkon brtsegs): b u| gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na
22b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa gang dag 'khod
22b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag thams cad sems dga' ba dang / sems nyams bde bar gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dper na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
22b4(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas te thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa gang dag
22b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khod pa de dag thams cad sems dga' ba dang / sems kyi nyams bde bar gyur pa bzhin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
22b6(dkon brtsegs): d ag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
22b7(dkon brtsegs): b stan pa de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnod sbyin gyi bdag po lag na rdo rje gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar
23a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur te| shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dper na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te thams cad
23a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnod sbyin gyi bdag po lag na rdo rje gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad
23a3(dkon brtsegs): nga'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur pa bzhin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des
23a4(dkon brtsegs): b yang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
23a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag
23a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa dag gis byang chub
23a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa ga la bde logs su gtor/ rab tu gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor bar gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dper na /
23b1(dkon brtsegs): ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
23b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams 'di na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams
23b3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa dag gis nga ga la ba de logs su gtor/ rab tu gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor bar gyur pa
23b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
23b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na mi bye ba phrag nyi shu
23b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / lha bye ba phrag sum cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
23b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang de bzhin
24a1(dkon brtsegs): g shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa
24a2(dkon brtsegs): de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da
24a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gis kun tu khebs par gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dper na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
24a4(dkon brtsegs): te thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gis byang chub kyi snying po kun tu khebs par gyur pa
24a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
24a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas
24a7(dkon brtsegs): b yang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i gos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
24b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po mi 'khrugs pa lung bstan pa ga la ba de logs su bor nas tshig 'di skad ces/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa 'di myur du bla na med pa
24b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cig ces smras so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dper na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
24b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas nga la mchod pa bya
24b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir lha'i gos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag nga ga la ba de logs su bor ba bzhin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
24b5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong
24b6(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dga' bar gyur pa tsam du pha ma dag bu la dga' ba ma yin te/ shA
24b7(dkon brtsegs): ra dwa ti'i bu/ dper na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi
25a1(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dga' bar gyur pa tsam du pha ma dag bu la
25a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba ma yin pa bzhin no/ /bam po gnyis pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
25a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas spyan chen po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang / 'di ltar sangs
25a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na lha dang / mi gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
25a5(dkon brtsegs): po mi 'khrugs pa de lung bstan pa thos par gyur to/ /de la lung bstan pa thos nas kyang 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can gang yin pa de dag sbyin zhing bsod nams
25a6(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang byed de/ 'di lta ste/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba rnam pa sna tshogs ngag sbyin pa byin par gyur to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba bzhi
25a7(dkon brtsegs): po ston zla tha chung gi zla ba nya ba la ku mu da'i dus ston gyi tshe na 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can rnams sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed de/ bza' ba dang /
25b1(dkon brtsegs): bca' ba dang / myang ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag gi sbyin pa gtong bar byed do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen
25b2(dkon brtsegs): po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
25b3(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams de'i 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can rnams kyang sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed de/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba rnam pa sna tshogs
25b4(dkon brtsegs): dag gi sbyin ba byed par gyur to/ /lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnams kyis kyang lha'i sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag mngon par rab tu dkrol nas a la la zhes ca co
25b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / ga zha'i sgra dag kyang phyung par gyur to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de lung bstan pa na/ de lta bu'i yon tan
25b6(dkon brtsegs): dag dang ldan par gyur to/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
25b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa zhib mos 'di ltar legs par gsungs pa de dag
26a1(dkon brtsegs): ni| ngo mtshar te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab lags
26a2(dkon brtsegs): so| |bsam gtan pa rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab/ klu rnams kyi klu'i yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab/ las rnams kyi las kyi rnam par
26a3(dkon brtsegs): smin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des dang po sems
26a4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa nyid nas yon tan gyi khyad par de lta bu dag yongs su zin cing / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa
26a5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa de'i lung bstan pa de yang bsam gyis mi khyab lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
26a6(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
26a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i lung bstan pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
26b1(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i dbang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa de dag ni / de
26b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas phyogs tsam zhig mdor bsdus te gsungs par zad kyi/ rgya cher bstan pa ni/ ma yin no/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus
26b3(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po mi
26b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa de'i dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas phyogs tsam zhig bstan pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe
26b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni/ dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang
26b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ de'i phyir rna ba lhogs te nyon cig dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya cher stan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe
26b7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i dang po
27a1(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan dang / phan yon mdor bsdus te bka' stsal lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ da ltar dang / ma 'ongs
27a2(dkon brtsegs): p a'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rjes su gzung ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang
27a3(dkon brtsegs): c hub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa dag shin tu legs par bstan cing rgya cher
27a4(dkon brtsegs): bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
27a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab mod kyi/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'on kyang
27a6(dkon brtsegs): phyogs tsam zhig bstan par bya'i/ de legs par rab tu nyon la tshul bzhin du yid la zungs/ shig dang bshad par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ btsun pa
27a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin no/ /zhes gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
27b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des 'di snyam du nam mkha'i khams ni/ gzhan du 'gyur yang srid kyi/ bdag gis dam bcas pa ni/ gzhan du
27b2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur bar bya'o/ /zhes sems bskyed de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni/ go cha chen po de lta bu'i go cha chen po bgos
27b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pas go cha chen po bgos par gyur pa de lta bu'i go cha chen po dag bgos pa'i byang
27b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' ni/ ngas bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nang na gcig kyang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
27b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rin po che'i tog gi spyod pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa'i spyod pa'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ shA ra dwa
27b6(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des go cha chen po gang bgos par gyur pa'i go cha chen po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag mang
27b7(dkon brtsegs): po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag
28a1(dkon brtsegs): la yang med do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des de ltar brtan pa'i brtson 'grus chen po yang
28a2(dkon brtsegs): d ag bar blangs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
28a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba na da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i
28a4(dkon brtsegs): bu| ngas mngon par shes te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems
28a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na gang gis lag pa'am/ rkang pa'am/ mgo'am/ mig gam/ yan lag dang nying lag gang yang rung ba dag bslangs pa na ma byin pa gang yang
28a6(dkon brtsegs): med do| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa des dang po sems bskyed
28a7(dkon brtsegs): pa nas bzung ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang klad pa na bar ma gyur/ rlung las gyur pa'am/ mkhris
28b1(dkon brtsegs): pa las gyur pa'am/ bad kan las gyur pa'am/ 'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad kyis thebs par ma gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
28b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ngo mtshar dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos 'di yang byung ngo / /shA ra dwa
28b3(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu/ yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa
28b4(dkon brtsegs): na des tshe rabs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byas so/ /thams cad du yang tshangs par spyod pa spyad cing thams cad
28b5(dkon brtsegs): du yang 'di lta ste/ mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i ming de nyid du gyur nas de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
28b6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag mngon sum du bzhugs pa de dang der skyes par gyur to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang
28b7(dkon brtsegs): bskur ba/ khang bzang gi steng nas khang bzang gi steng du 'gro yang rkang mthil gyis sa chen po la 'gro bar mi byed do/ /de khang bzang mchog de dag gi steng du 'dug nas 'dod
29a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod cing tshe zad par 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du bcom ldan
29a2(dkon brtsegs): ' das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang des tshe rabs
29a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byas so/ /thams cad du yang tshangs par spyod pa spyad cing thams cad du yang 'di
29a4(dkon brtsegs): lta ste| mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i ming de nyid du gyur nas de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mngon
29a5(dkon brtsegs): sum du bzhugs pa de dang der skyes par gyur kyang rkang mthil gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar mi byed do/ /de chos gang dang gang ston pa de thams cad kyang pha rol
29a6(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa nyid las brtsams te chos ston gyi/ nyan thos kyi sa las brtsams te chos ston pa ni/ nyung ngo / /gal te nyan thos kyi sa las brtsams te chos ston na yang /
29a7(dkon brtsegs): de thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ /gal te rang sangs rgyas kyis las brtsams te chos ston na yang / de thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa
29b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ /des pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te chos bstan pas sems can rnams byang chub la btul cing btsud de rab tu bkod cing bla na med
29b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las brtsams nas de dag la yang dag par ston/ yang dag bar 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par
29b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' bar byed de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang
29b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha chen po de lta bu dang ldan par gyur to/ /de chos kyi sbyin pa de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bla na med pa yang dag
29b5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos te/ kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te
29b6(dkon brtsegs): chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / de dag thams cad sangs rgyas
29b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi mthus chos bstan pa 'di nyan par gyur cig / thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed par 'gyur zhing / gzhan dag la yang rgya
30a1(dkon brtsegs): cher yang dag par rab tu ston par gyur cig / tshe rabs brjes nas kyang chos de dag mi brjed bar gyur cig /ji ltar bdag da ltar sangs rgyas kyi
30a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba bzhin du der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral/ sangs
30a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du smon par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
30a4(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig / gang dag dga' ldan gyi gnas su skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
30a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams ni/ ma gtogs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni/ chos nyid de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
30a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po srid pa tha ma pa rnams ni/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas lus tha mas ma'i glo g.yas pa nas mngal du skye bar 'gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i
30a7(dkon brtsegs): bu| gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srid pa tha ma ba dag skye ba nas chen po yang g.yo bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
30b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po srid pa tha ma pa'i rnam pa ni/ 'di dag yin/ rtags ni/ 'di dag yin/ mtshan ma ni/ 'di dag yin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
30b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po srid pa tha ma pa ni/ ma'i mngal du zhugs pa na mi gtsang ba dri nga bas gos par mi 'gyur/ der yid du mi 'thad pa'i dri dag kyang tshor bar mi 'gyur
30b3(dkon brtsegs): ro| |byang chub sems dpa' mngal na 'dug pa na yang nam mkha' la gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dge slong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan
30b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni| khang pa brtsegs pa'am/ khang pa brtsegs pa brgyud mar zhugs nas bar snang gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags shing spyod lam gyis gnas par byed kyang khang pa
30b5(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa de la reg pa med do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa ma'i mngal na gnas pa nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas
30b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas te/ mngal gyi dri ma dang / mi gtsang ba dri nga bas mi gos par gnas shing / der yid la mi 'thad pa'i dri dag kyang tshor bar mi 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ yang
30b7(dkon brtsegs): b com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'di snyam du
31a1(dkon brtsegs): sems te/ ji ltar bdag da ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bdud thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag
31a2(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'am/ nyan thos kya theg pa'i
31a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang dag byung ba de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa nas nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon bar
