63b4(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu| bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gang dag skyes sam/ skye'am/ skye
63b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur pa de dag thams cad ni/ 'di lta ste/ sems can dag pa zhes bya ba de lta bu'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /de dag thams cad ni/ 'di lta ste/ phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya ba de lta bu'i
63b6(dkon brtsegs): grangs su 'gro'o/ /de dag thams cad ni/ 'di lta ste/ rten gcig ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la brten pa zhes bya ba de lta bu'i grangs su 'gro ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ji ltar na/ byang
63b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rten gcig pa yin zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de bzhin gshegs pa la brten par gyur pa de ni/
64a1(dkon brtsegs): rten gcig pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang rten gcig pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa zhes bya
64a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rten gcig pa de bzhin gshegs pa la brten pa rjes su 'thob par 'dod pas/
64a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
64a4(dkon brtsegs): d pa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag ngas phyir mi ldog par lung bstan pa de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
64a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i drung du skye bar bya ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
64a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i drung du btang ba de dag ni/ ngas yongs su spangs pa ma yin no/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang
64a7(dkon brtsegs): bskur ba/ mthu dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus thob pa zhig rgyal srid 'dod pa dang / nor 'dod pa dang / yul 'dod pa'i phyir 'thab zla'i rgyal po'i gan du 'gyed cing 'thar tu song ba dang /
64b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas 'thab zla'i rgyal po des rgyal po de rgyal srid 'dod pa dang / nor 'dod pa dang / yul 'dod pa'i phyir 'gyed cing 'thab tu 'ong ngo zhes thos so/ /de skad thos nas rgyal po des 'di snyam du/
64b2(dkon brtsegs): gang dag rin po che rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang / bu dang / bu mo rnams dang / gang dag 'thab par mi nus pa'i gzhon nu de dag thams cad gang na rgyal po'i dpung yod pa dang / thul
64b3(dkon brtsegs): par dka' ba der bkye na/ bde bar gnas par 'gyur gyi/ 'di na ni/ sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas grong khyer gzhan dag tu bskungs so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du ngas
64b4(dkon brtsegs): b yang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i drung du
64b5(dkon brtsegs): btang ba de dag kyang ngas yongs su spangs pa ma yin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ji ltar rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de'i rin po che rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang /
64b6(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / bu mo rnams dang / gang dag 'thab par mi nus pa'i gzhon nu bskungs pa de ltar ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams blta'o/ /shA ra dwa
64b7(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu/ ji ltar gang du rgyal po'i rin po che rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang / bu dang / bu mo rnams dang / gang dag 'thab par mi nus pa'i gzhon nu rnams bskungs pa'i
65a1(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer de ltar ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs
65a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing blta'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ji ltar 'thab tu 'ong ba'i rgyal po de ltar ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu
65a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams la bar chad byed pa'i las la gnas pa/ mtho 'tsham pa la zhugs pa'i bdud rnams blta'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ji ltar rgyal po mthu
65a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan zhing thul bar dka' ba de ltar ni/ bdud dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad kyis mi thul ba'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
65a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa blta'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bu lon pas 'jigs shing skrag pa'i mi ni/ gang du song na bu lon
65a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'am| bu lon pa'i mi dag gis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba'i mtha' 'khob kyi grong khyer du 'bros par byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ der bu lon pa'am/ bu lon pa'i
65a7(dkon brtsegs): mi de rnams 'ong ba'i lam chad pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
65b1(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa de dag la bdud sdig can dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyi lam chad pa
65b2(dkon brtsegs): yin no| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bdud sdig can dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha gang dag 'khod pa de dag stong gsum gyi stong
65b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gang dag 'khod pa de dag la bar chad bya ba'i
65b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir nye bar gnas pa dang / mtho 'tshams pa'i phyir zhugs pa ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs
65b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bdud dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams bdud kyi las kyi phyir nye bar gnas pa med do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
65b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes bsam/ skye'am/ skye bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni/ brgya lam na yang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i
65b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i
66a1(dkon brtsegs): s pyad pa spyod pa na ji ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der
66a2(dkon brtsegs): bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams par chad bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa med pa de lta de lta dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta
66a3(dkon brtsegs): ste| dper na/ zag pa zad pa'i dgra bcom pa ni/ bde ba thob cing mi 'jigs pa thob par gnas so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
66a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes sam/ skye'am/
66a5(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bde ba thob cing mi 'jigs pa thob par gnas te/ de dag ni/ kun tu bsrungs pa dang / bskyabs pa dang / spas pa yin
66a6(dkon brtsegs): par shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar kha lo sgyur ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi
66a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa de nyid sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ de bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas
66b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing der bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams bdud kyi las la nye bar mi gnas shing mtho 'tsham pa'i phyir 'jug pa med pa de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa'i
66b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi zhig gis dug sman zos te dug 'thungs na/ des dug de kha zas kyi bya bar byas kyang gdug pa med cing legs par 'ju'o/ /
66b3(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems
66b4(dkon brtsegs): dpar gyur cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams bdud kyi las la nye bar mi gnas shing
66b5(dkon brtsegs): mtho 'tsham pa'i phyir 'jug pa med pa de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngos pas na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de de lta bu'i yon tan thams
66b6(dkon brtsegs): cad dang ldan pa yin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdag cag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang / bcom ldan
66b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
67a1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dpag tu med cing grangs med pa de dag blta bar bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems
67a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi yongs su rtogs pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad de/ ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba
67a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par mdzad pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
67a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang
67a5(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa de mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas
67a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun de dang /
67a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dpag tu med cing grangs med pa de dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs
67b1(dkon brtsegs): pa| mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ khyod kyis 'di ltar lha de dag dang / mi de dag nye bar spyod pa dang / yongs su spyod pa dang /
67b2(dkon brtsegs): rtse ba dang / dga' bas bye brag gam tha dad du bya ba ci yang mthong ngam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces
67b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis 'di ltar lha de dag dang / mi de dag nye bar spyod pa dang / yongs su spyod pa dang / rtse ba dang / dga' bas bye brag gam tha
67b4(dkon brtsegs): dad du bgyi ba ci yang ma mthong lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nye bar spyod pa dang / yongs su spyod pa thams cad lha
67b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzas nyid lags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de yang phyogs bcu kun tu snang ba mdzad
67b6(dkon brtsegs): cing / gser gyi mchod sdong ltar gzi brjid gsal zhing shis pa dang / dpal 'bar la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan cing dpe byad
67b7(dkon brtsegs): bzang po brgyad cus gzugs legs par spras la/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi dbus na chos ston cing bzhugs par gda' ba'i slad du'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di
68a1(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ mi la la zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du mchis pa na shar phyogs su zhugs shing ngam/ ri yang mi mthong zhing lho phyogs su ma
68a2(dkon brtsegs): lags| nub phyogs su ma lags te/ byang phyogs su zhugs shing ngam/ ri yang mi mthong ba de bzhin du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
68a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi nang du mchis na/ nyan thos kyi mtha' ma shar phyogs na mi gda'/ nyan
68a4(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi mtha' ma lho phyogs na yang mi gda'/ nub phyogs na yang mi gda'/ byang phyogs na yang mi gda' lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ yang de dag ji
68a5(dkon brtsegs): ltar snyoms par zhugs pa de ltar lus mi g.yo mi 'gul bar chos nyan to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di na dgra bcom pa bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs
68a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lus ni/ g.yo bar yang 'gyur lags kyi/ nyan thos de dag ni/ chos nyan pa na lus g.yo ba ma mchis te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de dag ni/ ji ltar
68a7(dkon brtsegs): snyoms par zhugs pa de ltar mi g.yo mi 'gul bar chos nyan par bgyid pa lags so/ /bam po bzhi pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ rigs
68b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis
68b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa stsal cing yongs su btang la/ yongs su btang bas gal te sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye ba lta na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ legs par stsal
68b3(dkon brtsegs): cing legs par btang la legs par skyes pa lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der legs par ma chis pa lags so/ /de
68b4(dkon brtsegs): ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos nyid rjes su thob par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin
68b5(dkon brtsegs): te| ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal po bka' khrims btsan po'i 'phar ma pa'i mi zhig rgyal po'i rgyas btab pa'i spring yig thogs
68b6(dkon brtsegs): te grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul phyogs gang yang rung ba zhig tu song ste/ 'gro ba na de la la gcan pa rnams sam/ sho gam pa rnams sam/ gru ba
68b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams sam/ grong ba rnams sam/ grong khyer ba rnams sam/ lam pa rnams sam/ rgyal po'i mi'am/ lam du zhugs pa'am/ mgron po'am/ de las gzhan ba yang
69a1(dkon brtsegs): rung ste| sems can 'ga' yang de la 'gro ba'i bar chad mi byed cing mtho mi 'tsham ste/ de 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i lam la gegs med pa
69a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid du 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de rgyal po'i rgyas btab pa'i phyir de 'gro ba la gegs med par 'gro bar blta'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub
69a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas shi 'phos kyang rung ste/ bcom ldan
69a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes sam/ skye'am/ skye bar 'gyur ba de
69a5(dkon brtsegs): d ag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
69a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
69a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par byed par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tshol bar 'gyur ba dang / thams cad du yang sangs rgyas bcom
69b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
69b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa bus 'di skad ces
69b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang 'di na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas pa'i rgyun du zhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub
69b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ mtshungs pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang 'di na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas pa'i rgyun du zhugs pa
69b5(dkon brtsegs): des log par ltung ba rgyun bcad pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes
69b6(dkon brtsegs): sam| skye'am/ skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang log par ltung ba rgyun bcad pa lags par blta ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad rgyun
69b7(dkon brtsegs): chad pa lags par blta ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas bar ma gyur gyi bar du thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
70a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ba dang / thams cad du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
70a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di
70a3(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dag
70a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas shi 'phos kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes sam/ skye'am/ skye bar 'gyur
70a5(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag thams cad ni/ log par ltung ba rgyun chad pa yin par blta ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad rgyun chad pa yin par blta ba dang / bla na
70a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tshol bar 'gyur ba dang /
70a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon du
70b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa dag mnyes par byed par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos
70b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyun du zhugs pa ni/ log par ltung ba'i chos su mi 'gyur zhing rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges par
70b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhol lo/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan
70b4(dkon brtsegs): dag nas shi 'phos kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes sam/ skye'am/ skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa
70b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /
70b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par byed par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byang
70b7(dkon brtsegs): chub tshol bar 'gyur ba dang / thams cad du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams dang mi
71a1(dkon brtsegs): 'bral bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces
71a2(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang 'di na lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas pa'i lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes
71a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ mtshungs pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang 'di na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas pa'i
71a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi 'ong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang mtshungs pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
71a5(dkon brtsegs): gang 'di na dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa'i dgra bcom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang
71a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ khyod
71a7(dkon brtsegs): de skad ma zer cig / shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ khyod yang de skad ma zer cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang 'di na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
71b1(dkon brtsegs): tu lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mtshungs la/ gang 'di
71b2(dkon brtsegs): na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
71b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang gang 'di na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying po la zhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der
71b4(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang mtshungs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub sems
71b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la brten pa yin par rig par bya ba dang / de dag ni/ bdud dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis mi brdzi bar rig
71b6(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni/ nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mtshams sbyor ba chad par rig par bya ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
71b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs
72a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
72a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di la gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis spobs pa ci 'di 'dra ba bdag gis gnas brtan rab 'byor la sad par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan
72a3(dkon brtsegs): pa kun dga' bos tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gnas brtan rab 'byor/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
72a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa de dang / bcom
72a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de blta bar bya'o/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa
72a6(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ khyod bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
72a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mi 'khrugs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa de dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de blta'am/ smras pa/ gnas
72b1(dkon brtsegs): brtan rab 'byor/ bdag cag gis blta'o/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa
72b2(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo/ gnam du ltos shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gnam du bltas so/ /bltas nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gnas brtan
72b3(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byor/ bdag gis gnam du bltas na/ steng gi nam mkha' thams cad dben par mthong ngo / /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa
72b4(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ ci ltar khyod kyis steng gi nam mkha' thams cad dben par mthong ba de bzhin du/ tshe dang ldan pa
72b5(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang
72b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa de dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang de ltar blta bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad
72b7(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du gang 'di na lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / der skyes
73a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mtshungs so/ /zhes bka' stsal lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de mnyam pa nyid
73a2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig gis mtshungs pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de
73a3(dkon brtsegs): ni| chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis mtshungs pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i bkod pa las/ le'u bzhi pa rdzogs so// //de nas
73a4(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa dgra bcom pa yang
73a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa yang bshad/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
73a6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yang bshad/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yang bshad/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bkod pa phun

73b1(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po ni/ da dung ma bshad pas/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis da ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

80a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas skabs la nye bar gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas 'chi 'pho ba na ltas 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams

80b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag btsun mo'i 'khor na 'dug pa dag mthong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams kha cig tu ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
81a1(dkon brtsegs): dag khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ba dag mthong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams kha cig tu ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
81a2(dkon brtsegs): po dag dka' ba spyod pa la sbyor ba ston pa dag mthong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams kha cig tu ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byang chub kyi snying por 'gro
81a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dag mthong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams kha cig tu ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byang chub kyi snying po la nges par rtog pa dag mthong ngo / /'jig

82a1(dkon brtsegs): 'da' ba chen pos yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i dam pa'i chos ni/ bskal pa

82a3(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i dam pa'i chos gnas par 'gyur ba'i bskal pa chen po 'bum phrag bcu po

82b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i mi rnams dam pa'i chos nyan pa'i 'dun pa chung bar 'gyur te/ de dag 'dun pa chung bas na/ chos smra ba'i dge slong rnams kyi drung du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de dag der mi
82b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bas na/ dam pa'i chos thos par mi 'gyur ro/ /dam pa'i chos ma thos pas na/ sgrub par mi 'gyur ro/ /mi sgrub pas na/ gong ma'i khyad par 'thob par mi 'gyur zhing

87a6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba de zad par byed mi nus so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de snod dag gis gzhal bar mi
87a7(dkon brtsegs): nus te| shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de'i snod ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gsum gyi rnam pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las dkon mchog gsum gyi

87b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po ni/ bdud sdig can dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams 'dul bar byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang der yang skye bar 'gyur ro/ /

87b7(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran par bya'o/ /gsum gyi rnam pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrug
88a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de ga la ba der yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye

94b3(dkon brtsegs): cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag

94b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'am/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ phal cher smon lam gyi dbang gis bcom ldan
94b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes sam/ skye ba'am/ skye bar 'gyur ba yin
94b7(dkon brtsegs): no| |shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams
95a1(dkon brtsegs): m ngon par dga' ba na bzhugs shing phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams
95a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams la phan 'dogs par gyur pa yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ni /

95a4(dkon brtsegs): ' das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de yang yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis
95a5(dkon brtsegs): p hyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag kun tu gnon cing rang gi sangs rgyas kyi
95a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing yang kun tu gnon par mdzad do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dgra bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
95a7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog
95b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam yang 'debs pa de dag 'chi

95b3(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de dag la bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sems can rnams kyis de dag gi
95b4(dkon brtsegs): smon lam bzlog par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag
95b5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye ba las phyir ldog pa'i 'jigs pa med par shes par bya'o/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo
95b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi lus la gang dag de las gzhan pa srog gi bar chad byed pa la brtson pa dang / gang dag srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ me dang / chu dang / dug dang /
95b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshon la sogs pa dag gis kyang phog par mi 'gyur ro/ /de dag gi lus la gang dag de las gzhan pa lag pa'i reg pa dang / bong ba dang / dbyig pa la sogs pa dag
96a1(dkon brtsegs): gis kyang phog par mi 'gyur ro/ /de dag la mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa yang med par shes par bya ste/ de ltar na/ de dag ni/ kun nas

96b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par shes so/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de yang thag ring

115b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni pham par mdzad/ /chos rnams thams cad rab mkhyen pas/ /de slad mtha' med mchog ces bgyi/ /nyams pa mi mnga'i 'dren pa la/ /bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags
