116a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyor 'ching ba yongs bcad pa/ /gdug pa'i zug rdu 'byin pa la/ /bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/ /ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs bcom zhing / /nyon mongs gdung ba nyer zhi ba/ /shin tu
116a4(dkon brtsegs): bsil la rab gnas la/ /bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/ /'jigs med ye shes bla med dang / /ye shes chags dang thogs med pa/ /chos kyi rgya mtsho'i mkhyen pa rnams/ /de
116a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum brnyes/ /sangs rgyas yon tan tshad med pas/ /mngon sum mkhyen pa yongs su rdzogs/ /zag pa thams cad zad gyur cing / /nyon mongs lta
116a6(dkon brtsegs): bas rab bcom pa/ /bcom ldan yon tan tshad med pa/ /mang po dag ni rab tu bsags/ /bsam gyis mi khyab chos rje la/ /bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/ /bcom ldan mchog
116a7(dkon brtsegs): gi mkhyen pa yis/ /'jig rten kun ni gsol bar mdzad/ /chos kyi snang ba ston mdzad pas/ /yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' mi mnga'/ /'dren pa'i chos kyi 'od zer gyis/ /'jig rten
116b1(dkon brtsegs): kun tu gsal bar mdzad/ /de slad 'jig rten sangs rgyas kyi/ /chos kyi 'od zer snang ba lags/ /chos kyi rgya mtsho thams cad mkhyen/ /spobs ba dag ni bla na med/ /brtson 'grus bsam
116b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab cing / rnam dag lta ba rab spangs pa/ /sangs rgyas spyan ni mtha' med pas/ /mkhyen pa'i yul yang mtha' mi mnga'/ /'jig rten mtshungs med gtso bo la/ /bdag ni the tshom zhu ba
116b3(dkon brtsegs): lags| |chos rgyal thub pa chen po yis/ /sems can the tshom gcod par mdzad/ /'dren pa la ni bdag zhu na/ /mos pa ji bzhin bkas bshad gsol/ /lha dang mi yi 'jig rten
116b4(dkon brtsegs): kun| |thams cad bdag gis rab brtags na/ /de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs med pas/ /thams cad ma lus gsal bar mdzad/ /yon tan rnams la rab gnas shing / /rgyan
116b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i skyes chen lags/ /bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi rgyal/ /drang srong nang na gsal ba po/ /dper na gangs ri chen po ni/ /rin chen kun gyis bkod pa'i gnas/ /bcom ldan
116b6(dkon brtsegs): chos gdan bzhugs pa yis/ /bkod pa dag kyang de bzhin no/ /rab yangs brtson 'grus chen po yis/ /yid 'ong sgra ni ston mdzad pa/ /sems can gang dag zos gyur na/ /dge ba'i
116b7(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba rnam dag 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das mi yi mchog lags pas/ /chos kyi snang ba ston par mdzad/ /des ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /yid bzhin blo ni bde bar 'gyur/ /dus dang 'khor ni
117a1(dkon brtsegs): rab mkhyen cing / /gang zag mkhyen pa 'dren pa yis/ /chos kyi snang ba ston mdzad pas/ /dus mkhyen pa yi blo ldan lags/ /tshangs skad brtson
117a2(dkon brtsegs): 'grus chen po yis/ /rnam dag gsung ni bkas bshad gsol/ /char chen sa la 'bab pa ltar/ /chos kyi rlan gyis khyab par mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'khor 'dus nang
117a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te/ /kun tu chos kyi char phab nas/ /chos 'di la ni gang re ba/ /sems can rnams ni tshim par mdzod/ /mchog tu bde la rab gnas pas/ /rgyal po ri rab ji lta
117a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin| |sems can rnams la sbyin mdzad cing / /mang po rnams ni dga' bar mdzod/ /dpa' chen rkang gnyis gtso dag gi /spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /sems
117a5(dkon brtsegs): can dag ni thams cad kyis/ /gang yang 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ro/ /skyes bu chen po tshad ma mchis/ /'khor 'dus mthun par gyur pa dag /thub pa che la brten nas ni/ /
117a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas spyod yul tshol ba lags/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas spyod yul la/ /gzhol ba'i slad du 'dir mchis na/ /'dren pa mkhyen pa thogs mi mnga'/ /ji ltar myur du
117a7(dkon brtsegs): dbye mi mdzad/ /bdag ni de yi mos pa yis/ /zhal du bltas nas zhu lags na/ /bcom ldan 'das thugs rjes rab phye nas/ /the tshom rnams ni gcad du gsol/ /bla med chos
117b1(dkon brtsegs): ni thos gyur na/ /sems ni rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /lus ni dga' bas khyab gyur nas/ /the tshom dra ba chad par 'gyur/ /chos kyi rgyal po bla med gtso/ /thams cad mkhyen pa
117b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs mi mnga'/ /thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pa la/ /bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/ /sangs rgyas chos ni thams cad la/ /the tshom cung zad yong mi mnga'/ /rab brtson 'dren
117b3(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po la/ /bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/ /bla med the tshom chad ba po/ /chos la the tshom mi mnga' ba/ /yon tan rgya mtsho dpag med la/ /bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/ /snang ba chen
117b4(dkon brtsegs): po dpag med dang / /yon tan chen po dpag med dang / /rnam dag mkhyen pa dpag med la/ /bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/ /brtson 'grus mkhyen pa dpag med dang / /spyod yul mkhyen
117b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dpag med dang / /phan 'dogs mkhyen pa dpag med la/ /bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/ /bcom ldan mkhyen pa mtha' med kyang / /mtha' dang mtha' med rab tu spangs/ /the tshom
117b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad gcod pa la/ /bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/ /bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi rgyal/ /thugs rjes zhu ba gsan du gsol/ /gnang bar mdzad na bdag zhu na/ /thub pa chen
117b7(dkon brtsegs): pos bshad du gsol/ /thams cad mkhyen pa shAkya'i gtso/ /grags chen la ni zhu ba lags/ /gal te thugs rjes gnang gyur na/ /the tshom dra ba gcad du gsol/ /de nas bcom
118a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros mtha' yas/ deng khyod kyis nga'i
118a2(dkon brtsegs): zhal du bltas nas sems rtse gcig tu gsol ba 'debs pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba du zhig zhu bar sems/ gal te zhu ba yod na/ ngas bshad par bya'o/ /de skad
118a3(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ blo gros mtha' yas khyod kyis ni/ /nga la ci zhig dri bar sems/ /de
118a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du ni zhus shig dang / /ngas ni rab tu bshad par bya/ /khyod kyis ji skad dris pa bzhin/ /re re nas ni gsal phye nas/ /ji ltar mos dang 'dun pa bzhin/ /myur du phye ste rab
118a5(dkon brtsegs): bshad do/ /ngas ni khyod la rab bshad kyi/ /thams cad the tshom med par byos/ /ji ltar khyod kyi 'dod pa bzhin/ /khyod kyis zhus dang 'tsham par bshad/ /deng khyod dus
118a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin zhu bar gyis/ /dus dang don ni ji lta bzhin/ /dus bzhin du ni zhus pa'i phyir/ /ngas ni nges par rab bshad do/ /ji ltar khyod kyi mos pa bzhin/ /zhu ba dag ni zhus shig
118a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / /ngas ni thams cad rjes mthun par/ /khyod la rab tu bshad par bya/ /deng khyod dus su zhus shig dang / /ngas kyang dus bzhin bshad par bya/ /the tshom dra ba bcad pas
118b1(dkon brtsegs): na| |the tshom med pa thob par 'gyur/ /nga ni chos kyi rjes gyur pas/ /don ni mthar phyin thugs su chud/ /chos rnams thams cad dag la yang / /the tshom med pa brnyes pa yin/ /nga ni
118b2(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams thams cad las/ /mngon sangs rgyas pas bsam dka' yin/ /sems can mos pa ji bzhin du/ /zhus pa dag ni ston par mdzad/ /nga ni chos rnams thams cad la/
118b3(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa dag ni mi mnga' bas/ /dus bzhin du ni zhus pa la/ /myur du bshad par mdzad pa yin/ /ngas ni dus bzhin rab bshad cing / /the tshom dag ni mi mnga' bas/ /de yi mos
118b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ji lta bar/ /de yi the tshom gcod par mdzad/ /nga ni rtag tu dus rnams dang / /'khor 'dus pa yi bsam pa dang / /sems can dag ni thams cad kyi/ /bsam pa tha dad mkhyen
118b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin| |rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi/ /'dod pa dang ni 'dod med pa/ /so sor rab tu brtags nas ni/ /de dag gsal bar gzigs pa yin/ /gal te blo dang ldan pa
118b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams| |legs pa nyid du sgrub byed na/ /nga yis dus dang sbyar nas ni/ /yang dag chos ston go bar mdzad/ /blo dang mi ldan de dag ni/ /gti mug dag gis rmongs dkrugs
118b7(dkon brtsegs): shing / /de dag shes rab snang byed pas/ /yang dag chos la gus mi 'gyur/ /gal te gus pa med gyur na/ /yang dag chos ni tshol mi byed/ /chos 'di thob par gyur
119a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang ni| |snang ba chen po'i shes mi skye/ /gang zhig chos la mkhas gyur pa/ /chos la mos shing tshol bar byed/ /gal te chos 'di thos gyur na/ /
119a2(dkon brtsegs): bar snang ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /theg chen dag la mos pa ni/ /mi yi gtso bo tshol byed pas/ /bar snang ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /bsam gyis mi khyab gnyer ba dag/
119a3(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab ye shes la/ /gzhol ba gang yin de dag ni/ /thos pas yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /dpag med ye shes la mos dang / /bsam gyis mi khyab
119a4(dkon brtsegs): gnyer ba dag / des ni chos ni thos gyur na/ /bla med ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /sems can dag ni la la zhig /byang chub snying po tshol ba dang / /bla med 'khor lo
119a5(dkon brtsegs): bskor 'dod pa/ /chos 'di thos na dga' bar 'gyur/ /mos shing rab tu brtson pa dang / /chos la gtso bor gang 'dzin pa/ /dri med chos ni thos gyur na/ /mos shing
119a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /gal te sems can la la dag /legs par sgrub pa mos gyur pa/ /chos kyi 'od zer snang ba yi/ /bla med chos 'di bstan par bya/ /khur
119a7(dkon brtsegs): lci rnams ni khyer ba dang / /nan tan sgrub la gang mos pa/ /des ni chos ni thos gyur na/ /dga' bas kun tu khyad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig rab tu mos pa yis/ /dge
119b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos ni sems byed na/ /de la snying brtse bsam bzhag nas/ /rab tu phye ste bstan par bya/ /khyod la sogs la thugs brtse'i phyir/ /khyod kyis ji skad zhus pa bzhin/ /ngas
119b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang yang dag nges par ni/ /khyed kyi the tshom gcad par bya/ /ngas ni lo mang stong phrag tu/ /thabs mkhas dag ni rab bsgoms shing / /the tshom dag ni bsal bas na/ /khyod
119b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi mos pa rab tu mkhyen/ /gal te the tshom yod gyur na/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin zhu bar gyis/ /khyod la rab tu bstan pas na/ /the tshom rnams ni gcad par bya/ /gal te the tshom
119b4(dkon brtsegs): yod gyur na/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin zhu bar gyis/ /ji ltar mos pa bzhin du ni/ /ngas ni rab tu bshad par bya/ /gal te the tshom yod gyur na/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin zhu bar
119b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis| |nga ni chos la rab gnas pas/ /g.yo ba med pa brnyes pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas
119b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag byang chub sems dpa'i theg
119b7(dkon brtsegs): pa la the tshom cung zad cig mchis pa deng zhu ba lags na/ ji ltar na skyes bu dam pa 'jigs pa spangs nas yang dag par sems rtse gcig tu sems can rnams kyi slad du
120a1(dkon brtsegs): go cha chen po bgos nas go cha chen pos rab tu brgyan pa dang / mos pa chen po bskyed nas gus par bgyid pa dang / bag yod pa dang bcas
120a2(dkon brtsegs): pas theg pa chen po 'di la 'tshal nas shin tu rnam par dag pa chen po mnyam pa nyid kyi shul mtho dman dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma dang / tsher ma dang / mi gtsang ba
120a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lta ba'i thibs po rnams ma mchis pa/ zug rngu gdug pa'i sdug bsngal dang / nyon mongs pa'i g.yang sa ma mchis pa/ 'chi ba dang / 'jigs
120a4(dkon brtsegs): shing skrag pa dang / bar chad ma mchis pa/ drang zhing gya gyur ma mchis pa dang / de kho na nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi shul dang / thogs pa ma mchis pa'i shul
120a5(dkon brtsegs): du zhugs nas lta ba'i thibs po rnams bcad pa dang / dra ba thams cad dral ba dang / mun nag rnams bsal ba dang / sred pa'i mngon par zhen pa rnams spang
120a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'du 'phrod rnams spang pa'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
120a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag don 'di'i slad du zhu ba gsol ba lags so/ /skyes bu dam pa ji lta bus go cha chen po ji lta bu
120b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gos na/ go cha chen po bgos pa des theg pa chen po la 'tshal nas lam chen po 'dis gzhol zhing yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
120b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi go cha'i bkod pa gang lags pa dang / lam gang la gnas pa dang chos rnams kyi tshul la mkhas pa la gnas pa gang lags
120b3(dkon brtsegs): pa bkas bshad du gsol/ chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa la rab tu gnas pas ni/ chos rnams kyi tshul la mkhas pa'i snang ba bskyed par 'gyur la/ chos kyi snang ba'i dbang
120b4(dkon brtsegs): gis ni| go cha mi spong bar theg pa chen po la 'tshal nas nur ba ma mchis pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / brjed ngas pa ma mchis pa'i dbang po dang / rgyun chad pa ma
120b5(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i shes rab kyi stobs myur du chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la gsal bar mkhas pa mngon par bsgrubs nas byang chub kyi snying por bgrod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor
120b6(dkon brtsegs): lo bskor nas sems can rnams la yang dag par chos ston pa'i slad du sems can thams cad ji ltar mos pa dang / ji ltar gzhol ba bzhin du 'khor ba las rnam
120b7(dkon brtsegs): par grol bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa chen po 'dis sems can rnams la sman pa dang / bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa
121a1(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag don 'di zhu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ thams
121a2(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa lags na/ chos gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting
121a3(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
121a4(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba gang lags pa bkas bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen
121a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gzigs pa ni/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs shing / sems can rnams kyi shes rab kyi sman rab tu mkhyen pa lags pas/ de'i
121a6(dkon brtsegs): slad du bdag zhu ba gsol lags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas kyis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ byang chub sems
121a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi slad/ /sangs rgyas chos don zab mo dag /thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pa po/ /rkang gnyis gtso la bdag gzhu lags/ /theg pa chen po'i rnal
121b1(dkon brtsegs): 'byor pa/ /ting 'dzin gang gis gzhol gyur pa/ /sems can rnams la sman slad du/ /bdag ni zhu ba gsol ba lags/ /ji ltar skyes bu dam pa yis/ /go cha
121b2(dkon brtsegs): dpag med bgo bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar go cha bgos nas kyang / /ji ltar rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'dun pa spong bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar de la sred par 'gyur//
121b3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar brtson 'grus chen por 'gyur/ /ji ltar bag yod ldan par 'gyur/ /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /theg chen 'di la gzhol bar bgyid/ /de la
121b4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal nas ci bgyid pa/ /dngos po 'di dag bkas bshad gsol/ /ji ltar theg chen bteg nas ni/ /byang chub sems la gzhol gyur pa/ /'jig rten 'dren pa'i thugs
121b5(dkon brtsegs): rje yis| |myur du bdag la bkas bshad gsol/ /ji ltar yang dag mnyam lam gyis/ /mnyam pa nyid du gzhol bar 'gyur/ /lta ba rnams kyi thibs po dag /gcod
121b6(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid la skyon med 'gyur/ /spyod yul dag ni thams cad las/ /ji ltar bgyis na 'da' bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar mnyam pa nyid dag gis/ /'dod chags dra ba
121b7(dkon brtsegs): dral bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar mun nag rab bsal nas/ /ye shes snang chen thob par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ /ji ltar bgyis na gzhol bar 'gyur//
122a1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar so sor rab brtags pas/ /'ching ba mang po spong bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /'ching ba spangs nas bde
122a2(dkon brtsegs): bar gnas/ /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /'jigs pa tshe las 'da' bar 'gyur/ /chos kyi don la mkhas gyur nas/ /bla med la ni gzhol bar
122a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur| |byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu'i/ /dpag med go cha bgo bar bgyid/ /go cha de dag bgos nas kyang / /theg chen la ni 'tshal bar bgyid/ /ji ltar byang
122a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams/ /mnyam pa nyid lam la gzhol bar bgyid/ /bdag gis deng 'dir zhus pa 'di/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsol/ /byang
122a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' ji lta bur/ /go cha bkod pa thob 'gyur dang / /bla med theg chen rab brgyan pa/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsol/ /lam 'di la ni
122a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa dang / /lam de'i bkod pa gang lags dang / /chos rnams la ni mkhas gyur pa/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsol/ /chos kyi dbyings
122a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshul rnams dang / /chos la mkhas pa'i snang ba dag /ji lta bur ni rtogs gyur pa/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsol/ /ji ltar byang chub sems
122b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams/ /chos kyi snang ba de thos nas/ /chos rnams thams cad mthar phyin pa/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsol/ /ji ltar byang chub sems
122b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams/ /chos kyi snang ba thob gyur nas/ /go cha chen po mi spong zhing / /de yi dbang gis gzhol gyur lags/ /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /theg chen
122b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di la 'tshal nas ni/ /brtson 'grus ldog par mi 'gyur zhing / /de yi dbang gis gzhol 'gyur lags/ /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /bsam pa dag ni
122b4(dkon brtsegs): rab brtan zhing / /'di ltar shes rab stobs dag gis/ /shin tu 'dul ba thob 'gyur lags/ /ji ltar chos kyi dbyings rnams kyi/ /tshul la mkhas pas thob par
122b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur| |chos kyi rgyal po bsam mi khyab/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsol/ /ji ltar myur ba kho nar ni/ /byang chub snying por bgrod gyur nas/ /su yang
122b6(dkon brtsegs): bskor bar mi 'gyur ba'i/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor 'gyur lags/ /ji ltar g.yo ba ma mchis par/ /sngon gyi smon lam ji lta bzhin/ /sems can thams cad
122b7(dkon brtsegs): kun la ni/ /chos rnams yang dag ston 'gyur lags/ /chos rnams yang dag bstan pas na/ /'khor ba las ni grol 'gyur lags/ /ji ltar bgyis na sems
123a1(dkon brtsegs): can rnams/ /gtan du bde ba thob 'gyur lags/ /sems can rnams la sman slad du/ /'jig rten 'dren la bdag zhu na/ /thams cad
123a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen zhing gzigs pa pos/ /thugs rjes bdag la bkas bshad gsol/ /chos ni gang dang gang dag gis/ /byang chub sems dpa' smin bgyid pa/ /chos kyi
123a3(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho thams cad kyis/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya mdzad du gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos la rab mos shing / /byang chub che la gang lta ba/ /chos kyi sgra 'di thos gyur
123a4(dkon brtsegs): na| |lus kun khyab par dga' bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la bka' stsal
123a5(dkon brtsegs): pa| blo gros mtha' yas/ khyod sngon sangs rgyas tshad med pa rnams la mchod cing rim gro byas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed cing yon tan gzhal du med
123a6(dkon brtsegs): pa bsags pas na/ chos zab mo 'di la rab tu gdung bas mos par gyur pa dang / bsam pa rgya chen pos sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir snying rje
123a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba zhus pa legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod legs par shin tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / ngas khyod la byang
123b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yon tan mngon par sgrub pa dang / ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ba
123b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bshad par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du thos par 'tshal lo/ /zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
123b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang
123b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir go cha chen po bgos pa des sems can rnams yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /sems can rnams sbyin
123b5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /sems can rnams tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o//
123b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams bzod pa rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /sems can rnams brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir
123b7(dkon brtsegs): go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /sems can rnams bsam gtan rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /sems can rnams shes rab rnam
124a1(dkon brtsegs): par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /sems can rnams bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /
124a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i dngos po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /sems can rnams kyi 'dod
124a3(dkon brtsegs): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nad kyi gnyen po bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /yon tan chen po mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas par bya ba'i
124a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /bla na med pa'i ye shes legs par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /sems can rnams 'khor
124a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'jigs pa las yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes legs par yongs su rdzogs par rab tu bstan
124a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'dod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud dang / bdud kyi rigs kyi 'khor dang / bdud kyi pho
124a7(dkon brtsegs): nya dang / bdud kyi las la gnas pa dang / lta ba rnams kyi thibs po dang / lam ya nga bar zhugs pa'i mu stegs can gyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba thams cad
124b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'jig rten rgyang pan dang / mu stegs can dang mthun pa ji snyed ba dag dang 'thab pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
124b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams de ltar go cha chen po bgo zhing / go cha mi spong bar brtson 'grus chen po bskyed nas sems can gyi khams thams cad du zhugs te bzod pa la gnas
124b3(dkon brtsegs): nas 'jigs pa rnams spangs te/ mi skrag mi dngang mi g.yo mi 'khrugs par byas nas go cha dpag tu med pa dag bgo bar bya'o/ /de 'di lta ste/ sems can thams
124b4(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su skyob pa'i go cha dang / lta ba thibs po thams cad gcod pa'i go cha dang / bdud kyi dpung rnams rnam par 'jig pa'i go cha dang / shes rab yang dag par
124b5(dkon brtsegs): len pa'i go cha dang / tshogs dpag tu med pa gsog pa'i go cha dang / khur lcib rnams sgrol ba'i go cha dang / mngon par yid ches pa 'phel bar byed pa'i go cha dang /
124b6(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims la gnas pa'i go cha dang / las kyi kun gzhi yongs su sbyong ba'i go cha dang / thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'i stobs kyi gter gyi go cha dang /
124b7(dkon brtsegs): thabs mkhas pa'i gter gyi go cha dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su spong ba'i go cha dang / ldog pa dang 'gyed pa med pa'i shes rab kyi go cha gang yin
125a1(dkon brtsegs): p a'o| |byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams go cha chen po de lta bu bgos nas 'khor ba'i mtha' ji srid pa de'i bar du shin tu
125a2(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs g.yo ba med pa mi spong bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
125a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams/ /bsdu phyir go cha bgo bar bya/ /sems can rnams ni tshad med phyir/ /go cha
125a4(dkon brtsegs): bgos pa tshad med do/ /sbyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed/ /sems can la ni phan gdags phyir/ /go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya/ /
125a5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten la ni phan 'dogs byed/ /sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya/ /bzod pa rnam
125a6(dkon brtsegs): par dag pa'i phyir/ /dpa' zhing bde la gnas par byed/ /sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya/ /brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa'i
125a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir| |phyir mi ldog par 'grub par byed/ /sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya/ /bsam gtan rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /spyod
125b1(dkon brtsegs): yul dag kyang de bzhin no/ /sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya/ /shes rab rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /zag med bla na med pa yin//
125b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya/ /sems can dag ni thams cad la/ /bde ba'i yo byad sbyin dgos pas/ /don de legs par
125b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i phyir/ /go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams/ /phan pa'i dngos po bya dgos pas/ /bsdu ba rnam dag 'di bzhi yis/ /srid
125b4(dkon brtsegs): pa kun tu 'jug par byed/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nad/ /gnyen po dag ni bsten pa'i phyir/ /sems can la ni sman gtong bas/ /nad rnams rab tu sel bar
125b5(dkon brtsegs): byed| |des na byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /go cha legs par bgos nas ni/ /yon tan rnams kyi tshogs dag la/ /mkhas pa dpag med thob pa yin/ /sems can
125b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis/ /nyam thag shin tu mi bde bas/ /bdag gis yongs su bskyab snyam nas/ /go cha dpag med bgo bar bya/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal tshad
125b7(dkon brtsegs): med rnams/ /bdag gis rnam par dgrol snyam pas/ /srid lta'i dra bas glags pa dag /thams cad yongs su gcad par bya/ /gang gis nyon mongs dra ba 'di/ /thams
126a1(dkon brtsegs): cad gcod par gang nus pa/ /brtan pa'i brtson 'grus stobs dag gis/ /dpa' bo'i go cha bgos pa yin/ /sems can dag ni thams cad
126a2(dkon brtsegs): kun| |bde ba'i lam la rab bkod cing / /mya ngan 'das la gzhol ba dang / /bla med bde la dgod par bya/ /gang zhig brtson 'grus chen po'i stobs/ /go cha 'di ni
126a3(dkon brtsegs): bgo byed pa/ /bdud rnams thams cad dag dang ni/ /rtag tu 'thab kyang ngal mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig lta la rab gnas nas/ /thibs po dag tu gang zhugs dang / /
126a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten rgyang pan dag la ni/ /go cha bgos nas phan gdags bya/ /gzhan yang 'khor ni tshad med pa/ /lam gol dag tu zhugs pa rnams/ /de dag la ni phan
126a5(dkon brtsegs): gdags phyir/ /go cha dpag med bgo bar bya/ /de ltar go cha bgos nas ni/ /go cha chen po mi spong bar/ /brtson 'grus chen po'i stobs bskyed nas/ /go bgos rab
126a6(dkon brtsegs): brtags khyad par 'phags/ /sems can khams la rab zhugs te/ /bzod pa la ni gnas gyur nas/ /brtan pa'i bzod pa sgrub byed pa/ /go bgos gong na
126a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin/ /'jigs pa dag ni rab spangs shing / /skrag pa dag ni med par yang / /go cha dpag med bgos nas ni/ /thams cad rab brtson 'grus par bya/ /gang
126b1(dkon brtsegs): zhig go cha rab gnas pa/ /rtag tu yang dag rtogs gyur cing / /rab dben g.yo ba med pas na/ /mi 'khrugs ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /de lta'i go cha rab bgos nas/ /blo
126b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pas gzhan yang ni/ /sems can skyob pa'i go bgos te/ /bdud kyi go cha gzhom par bya/ /yon tan dpag med go cha dag /thams cad rab tu bgo bar bya/ /
126b3(dkon brtsegs): dbang po shes mchog gang zag gis/ /bgos na bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /khur lci rab tu spang ba'i phyir/ /bla med go cha bgos nas su/ /sems can thams cad yongs
126b4(dkon brtsegs): bzlas nas/ /sdug bsngal khur las thar par bya/ /rnam dag dad pa 'phel byed cing / /dbang po drug ni rab sdom pa/ /tshul khrims gang dag ldan pa ni/ /go bgos gong
126b5(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yin/ /dpa' bo ye shes sgrub pa la/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab gnas pas/ /spyod lam tshul khrims ldan pas na/ /go bgos g.yo ba med pa yin/ /sngon
126b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi rgyal ba mang po las/ /rnam dag las ni sgrub pas na/ /de phyir go cha rab bgos nas/ /rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa yin/ /sems can la ni sred pa'i blos/ /'jig
126b7(dkon brtsegs): rten la ni phan 'dogs pa/ /thabs ni rab tu rtogs pas na/ /go bgos legs par gnas pa yin/ /thabs mkhas ye shes gang yin pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'
127a1(dkon brtsegs): rab rtogs pas/ /de ltar go cha bgos nas ni/ /'ching ba mtha' dag gcod par byed/ /mngon shes thams cad rab spong zhing / /yid
127a2(dkon brtsegs): ches rgyab kyis mi phyogs pa/ /go bgos blo dang ldan pa ni/ /bla med byang chub bgrod par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' nges par ni/ /bdag dang gzhan la
127a3(dkon brtsegs): phan 'dogs gang / /brtson 'grus stobs la rab gnas pas/ /brtan zhing phyir ldog mi 'gyur ro/ /bam po gnyis pa/ gzhan yang blo
127a4(dkon brtsegs): gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bskal pa tshad med pa nas khur chen po khyer zhing / go cha chen po bgos pa'i go cha de
127a5(dkon brtsegs): lta bu ni| bdud dam/ bdud kyi 'khor ram/ bdud kyi pho nya'am/ log par lta ba'i thibs po dgon dung ma rungs par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyis
127a6(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs med cing bstan du med pa dang / ltos pa med cing mtshan ma med pa dang / mtshan ma spangs pas mtshan ma
127a7(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba dang / ming dang yi ge med pa'i phyir ro/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ gal te la la zhig mda'i tshad ri rab tsam sha stag 'phangs na yang 'phog par mi
127b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa thams cad bdud kyi rgyal por gyur la/ re re la yang bdud kyi dmag rnam
127b2(dkon brtsegs): p a sna tshogs 'khor dang bcas par gyur pa de dag dus gcig tu mda' rnon po tshad ri rab tsam sha stag 'phangs na yang nam yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
127b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po de lta bu'i go cha bgos pa la rnam par zhig pa'am/ tha na spu nyag ma gcig tsam yang nyams par byed mi nus te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
127b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rnams la sems kyis kyang tha dad pa'i 'du shes bskyed par mi nus na/ lus kyis gnod pa bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
127b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po gang sems rtse gcig tu de dag 'dul bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ bdud mang po pham par byed cing nye bar zhi bar yang byed la/ go cha de lta bu
127b6(dkon brtsegs): la gnas shing g.yo ba med pas sems can thams cad kyis kyang rnam par 'jig par byed mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mtshan ma med pa'i phyir dang /
127b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyis blta bar bya ba'i spyad yul ma yin pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyis mthong zhing shes par mi nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
128a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rnams ni/ chos thams cad rtogs pa'i phyir yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin go cha chen po bgos pa de dag shes shing mthong ngo //
128a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir chos thams cad la yang mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir chos thams
128a3(dkon brtsegs): cad la yang dmigs par mi byed de/ de lta bas na/ sems can rnams kyis mthong zhing shes par mi nus so/ /go cha de lta bu bgos pa de dag la ni/ kha dog gi
128a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med cing bstan du med pa dang / tshig gi brjod pa med pa'i phyir gzugs dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
128a5(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur ro/ /nang dang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ phyi rol dang yang mtshungs par
128a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan par mi 'gyur/ nang dang phyi rol gnyis ka dang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ nang yang ma yin/ phyi rol yang ma yin pa dang mtshungs par ldan par
128a7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur/ khams dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ skye mched dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ sa'i khams dang yang mtshungs par
128b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan par mi 'gyur/ chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ 'dod pa'i khams dang yang
128b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa dang
128b3(dkon brtsegs): yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa dang / mngon
128b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'du byed pa med pa dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin/ mngon par 'du byed pa med pa yang ma yin
128b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi sa dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang yang mtshungs par ldan par
128b6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi sa dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ tshig gi lam dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ gzugs kyi rgyu dang yang mtshungs
128b7(dkon brtsegs): par ldan par mi 'gyur/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rgyu
129a1(dkon brtsegs): dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang yang
129a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid ma yin pa dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ chos thams cad dang mtshungs par
129a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan par yang mi 'gyur/ mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur ba yang ma yin te/ 'ching ba med pa dang / grol ba med pa dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dag gis shes
129a4(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni/ bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/ /de lta bu'i go cha dang ldan pa de dag ni/ chos thams
129a5(dkon brtsegs): cad du lta ba yang dag par mi dmigs te/ gzugs su lta ba yang dag par mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par
129a6(dkon brtsegs): lta ba yang dag par mi dmigs so/ /tha na chos cung zad tsam du lta ba yang dag par mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du go cha de lta bu bgos pa de dag ni/ chos thams
129a7(dkon brtsegs): cad dang mtshungs par ldan pa gang ma yin/ mtshungs par mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /gzugs dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/ mtshungs par mi ldan
129b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/ mtshungs par mi ldan pa yang ma yin
129b2(dkon brtsegs): te| chos thams cad kyi mtshungs par ldan pa dang / mtshungs par mi ldan pa de dag thag bsrings pa yin no/ /de bzhin du go cha de lta bu bgos pa de dag la ni/
129b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du bya ba med de/ byed pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /mtshan ma yang med de/ mtshan ma nyid yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gnas kyi mtshan ma med pa/ 'dus
129b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtshan ma med pa/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ g.yo ba med pa/ dmigs pa med pa/ ngo bo nyid du lta ba med pa ste/ go cha bgos pa nyid kyang dmigs su med pa'o/ /de bzhin du
129b5(dkon brtsegs): go cha bgos pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams go cha yang dag par bgos pa na/ gang gis
129b6(dkon brtsegs): go cha bgos pa dang / gang du go cha bgos pa dang / gang las go cha bgos pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / bdag gis go cha bgos pa dang / bdag gis
129b7(dkon brtsegs): go cha bgos par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / 'dir go cha bgos pa dang / gzhan du go cha bgos pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / go cha de lta bu
130a1(dkon brtsegs): bgos pa'i sems can yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i phyir dang / yod pa ma
130a2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha de lta bu bgos pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i go cha bgos pa yin pas lus kyang mi
130a3(dkon brtsegs): dmigs/ ngag kyang mi dmigs/ yid kyang mi dmigs/ dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa rab tu spangs pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
130a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po gang gal te chos cung zad tsam la gnas par gyur tam/ gal te chos cung zad tsam la dmigs nas go cha bgos sam/ go cha bgo'am/ go cha
130a5(dkon brtsegs): bgo bar 'gyur ba de dag ni/ go cha chen po bgos pa zhes mi bya ste/ gal te sems can de dag las yang dag par 'das par gyur na/ gdod bsam gyis
130a6(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa zhes brjod par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ sems can 'ga' tsam gyi phyir go cha chen
130a7(dkon brtsegs): po bgos pa ma yin/ bskal pa gcig gi sems can tsam gyi phyir go cha chen po bgos pa ma yin/ bskal pa brgya stong dang / bskal pa bye ba brgya
130b1(dkon brtsegs): stong dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi sems can tsam gyi phyir go cha chen po bgos pa ma yin gyi/ bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can gyi phyir
130b2(dkon brtsegs): go cha chen po bgos pa yin pas de phyir go cha chen po tshad med pa bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ go cha yang dag
130b3(dkon brtsegs): par bgos pa na/ sems can gyi 'du shes la mi gnas pa'i go cha gyon par byed de/ sems can gyi 'du shes mi bskyed pa'i go cha dang / sems can gyi 'du shes
130b4(dkon brtsegs): spang ba'i go cha dang / bdag gi 'du shes bzlog pa'i go cha dang / sems can gyi ngo bo nyid shes pa'i go cha dang / bdag gi ngo bo nyid shes pa'i go cha dang / 'du shes
130b5(dkon brtsegs): dang tshor ba las yang dag par 'das pa'i go cha dang / chos thams cad la byed pa 'du shes med par shes pa'i go cha dang / mtshan ma'i go cha dang / mtshan ma med
130b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtshan nyid kyi go cha dang / smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi go cha dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa'i go cha dang / 'gag pa med pa'i
130b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid shes pa'i go cha dang / chos thams cad kyi bye brag gi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid shes pa'i go cha dang / bye brag gi ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid shes
131a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i go cha dang / chos thams cad kyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid shes pa'i go cha dang / dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi go cha gyon par byed
131a2(dkon brtsegs): do| |blo gros mtha' yas/ gal te dngos po la gnas nas go cha gyon par byed la go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
131a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rnams ni/ dngos po la mi gnas par ye shes chen po yongs su tshol ba yin pas de phyir go cha chen po bgos pa zhes brjod pa yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe
131a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ bskal pa stong phrag tshad med du/ /go cha dpag med bgos nas su/ /sems can dag ni thams cad kun//
131a5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal rnams las grol bar byed/ /de lta'i go cha che bgos pa/ /bdud dang bdud kyi mngags pa dang / /bdud kyi las rnams byed pa dag /mig gis mthong
131a6(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de las gzhan pa'i sems can gang / /lta ba'i thibs por zhugs pa dag /bsam gyis mi khyab go cha 'di/ /des kyang thob par 'gyur ma yin//
131a7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med cing ni kha dog med/ /bstan du med cing ltos med pa/ /go cha bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /de phyir mig gis blta bya min/ /ming med mtshan ma med pa dang //
131b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma thams cad spangs pas na/ /go cha bgos pa dpag tu med/ /de phyir phan tshun mthong ba med/ /gal te mda' ni ri rab tshad/ /shin tu rnon po 'phangs na yang / /bsam
131b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab go bgos pas/ /mda' ni rang nyid chags par 'gyur/ /'jig rten bdud ni ji snyed pas/ /ri rab tshad kyi mda' rnams kyis/ /go cha chen po bgos pa
131b3(dkon brtsegs): la| |dus gcig 'ongs te 'phangs na yang / /go cha chen po bgos pa yi/ /spu nyag gcig ni nyams mi 'gyur/ /bsam gyis mi khyab go bgos pas/ /gang yang phan
131b4(dkon brtsegs): byed gzhig mi nus/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /lus dang sems ni 'gyur ba med/ /bsam gyis mi khyab go bgos la/ /su zhig bsgul zhing g.yo bar
131b5(dkon brtsegs): nus| |sems bskyed thang gcig tsam gyis kyang / /bdud ni mang po pham byed pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsam mi khyab/ /bdud dpung dag ni 'jil bar byed/ /de
131b6(dkon brtsegs): lta'i go cha che bgos pa/ /nam yang g.yo bar mi 'gyur bas/ /sems can dag ni thams cad kyis/ /mthong bar nus pa gang yang med/ /sems can dag ni thams
131b7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis/ /go cha mtshan nyid mi shes pas/ /de phyir sems can thams cad kyis/ /mig gis mthong bar mi nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyabs byed cing / /chos
132a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams thams cad shes pas ni/ /rdo rje mchog dang 'dra bas na/ /de ni legs par go bgos yin/ /chos rnams thams cad mi len
132a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing / /sems can thams cad skyob byed pas/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi rjes 'brang phyir/ /de ni legs par go bgos yin/ /go char 'dzin pa med par ni/ /chos
132a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kun gyi rjes 'brang ba/ /bsam gyis mi khyab go bgos pas/ /de ni legs par go bgos yin/ /go cha bstan pa med par yang / /chos ni thams cad gang
132a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyong ba| |chos rnams tshig dang bral bas na/ /ston par nus pa gang yang med/ /gzugs dang mtshungs par mi ldan zhing / /tshor ba dang yang mtshungs mi ldan//
132a5(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes 'du byed rnams shes dang / /mtshungs ldan 'dus pa yang ma yin/ /nang du mtshungs par mi ldan zhing / /phyi rol tu yang mtshungs mi ldan/ /nang dang
132a6(dkon brtsegs): phyi rol gnyi gar yang / /mtshungs ldan 'dus pa yang ma yin/ /khams dang mtshungs par mi ldan zhing / /skye mched dang yang mtshungs ldan mi na/ /khams
132a7(dkon brtsegs): dang skye mched dag dang yang / /'dus par gyur pa yod ma yin/ /sa dang mtshungs par mi ldan zhing / /chu dang mtshungs par ldan pa min/ /me rlung nam mkha'
132b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam shes dang / mtshungs ldan 'dus pa yang ma yin/ /'dod dang mtshungs par mi ldan zhing / /gzugs dang mtshungs par ldan pa'ang min/ /gzugs med pa yi
132b2(dkon brtsegs): khams rnams dang / mtshungs ldan 'dus pa yang ma yin/ /thams cad dmigs su med pas na/ /mngon par 'dus byas rnams dang ni/ /mngon par 'dus byas
132b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / /mtshungs ldan 'dus pa yang ma yin/ /bsam gyis mi khyab go bgos pas/ /gnas pa med cing 'dus pa med/ /'ching ba med cing grol ba med/ /mtshungs
132b4(dkon brtsegs): par mi ldan yod ma yin/ /go cha mtha' ni dpag med pas/ /nyan thos dag gi sa dag dang / /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang yang / /mtshungs ldan 'dus pa yang ma yin//
132b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi ni sa rnams dang / /chos rnams thams cad kun dang ni/ /thams cad mtshungs par mi ldan zhing / /thams cad 'dus par gyur ma yin/ /tshig gi lam
132b6(dkon brtsegs): ni thams cad kyis/ /gang yang reg par mi 'gyur bas/ /dpag tu med pa'i go cha 'di/ /ngo bo med cing bsam dka' yin/ /chos rnams thams cad bdag dang ni/ /mtshungs
132b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan mtshungs min ldan min pas/ /bsam gyis mi khyab go cha na/ /bgrang ba kun las 'das pa yin/ /go cha bla na med pas na/ /'ching ba med cing grol ba med//
133a1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang / /'du byed rnam shes mtshan nyid med/ /de dag gi ni mtshan nyid dang / /mtshungs ldan 'dus pa
133a2(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin/ /chos rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid dang / /mtshungs ldan mtshungs min ldan pa'ang med/ /mtshan ma med pa dag dang yang / /mtshungs ldan 'dus pa
133a3(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin/ /go cha bla na med pas ni/ /'ching ba med cing grol ba med/ /chos rnams dag ni thams cad las/ /chos gcig grangs su'ang bgrang ba med/ /
133a4(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams thams cad dag las ni/ /go cha dmigs par mi 'gyur bas/ /de phyir bla na med 'gyur zhing / /bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes brjod/ /go cha la ni
133a5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med cing / /tshor ba 'du shes yod ma yin/ /'du byed med cing rnam shes med/ /phung pho rnams kyis bsdus pa'ang min/ /de lta'i dpa' bo gang
133a6(dkon brtsegs): dag gis/ /go cha chen po 'di bgos pas/ /lus dang sems ni mi dmigs pas/ /chos ni cung zad mthong mi 'gyur/ /bsam pa rnams las 'das pa'i
133a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir| |rnam dag sems la rab gnas shing / /rtag tu zhum pa med pas na/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes brjod/ /shin tu brtan pas go bgos pa/ /de yi
133b1(dkon brtsegs): sems ni mi bsgul zhing / /bskal pa'i tshad ni mi 'dzin pas/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes brjod/ /go cha la ni tshad med cing / /chos dang chos min mi len pas/ /
133b2(dkon brtsegs): dus kyi tshad ni med pa'i phyir/ /gzhal du med pa zhes bya'o/ /sems can 'du shes mi skyed cing / /bdag gi 'du shes yod ma yin/ /'du shes 'di ni shes pa'i phyir//
133b3(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes thams cad skye mi 'gyur/ /chos rnams thams cad shes kyang ni/ /chos de'i 'du shes skye mi 'gyur/ /de ltar go cha gang bgos pas/ /bsam gyis mi khyab
133b4(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes brjod/ /gzhan yang blo gros mtha' yas/ go cha chen po 'di ni/ chos gya nom pa'i bkod pa'i yo byad ces kyang bya/ mchog tu gyur pa zhes kyang bya ste/ rnam par
133b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhig par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad dbye ba med pa zhes kyang bya ste/ /chos cung zad tsam la yang bye brag tu 'byed pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems
133b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang go cha 'di lta bu bgos pa de ni/ shes rab chen po'i stobs 'dzin cing / theg pa chen po dang / theg pa'i mchog dang / mtshungs
133b7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i theg pa dang / yongs su sdud pa chen po'i theg pa dang / dpag tu med pa sdud pa'i theg pa la zhon nas sems can thams cad theg pa 'dis 'degs
134a1(dkon brtsegs): par byed kyang theg pa 'di la mi shong ba gang yang med la/ theg pa de yang 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med par sems can rnams
134a2(dkon brtsegs): bde ba la 'god par byed cing / sems can rnams bde bar nges par 'byung bar byed do/ /sems can gang nges par bde bar byed pa'i theg pa 'di la zhon
134a3(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa de dag la ni/ lus dang sems ngal zhing nyon mongs par gyur pa yod par mi 'gyur ro/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ theg pa 'di ni/ lha dang mi dang
134a4(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / theg pa gzhan gang gis nges par 'byung bar byed pa thams cad zil gyis non
134a5(dkon brtsegs): par byed do/ /theg pa 'di ni/ 'gro ba med/ 'ong ba med/ gnas pa med pa/ bltar med pa/ shes pa med pa/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'
134a6(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs pa/ dbus kyi mtha' mi dmigs pa/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du gyur cing nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rdul gyis ma
134a7(dkon brtsegs): gos pa/ ltos pa med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mngon par zhen pa med pa yin pas/ theg pa 'dis nges par 'byung bar bya'o/ /theg pa 'di ni/ tshad med pa yin te/
134b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhal du med pa'i phyir ro/ /rang bzhin gyis thogs pa'i mtshan ma med pa yang yin te/ mtshan ma la gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /theg pa mchog 'di la zhon pa gang yin pa
134b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni/ sems zhum pa med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par gzhol zhing 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ 'di lta
134b3(dkon brtsegs): ste| dper na/ mar me dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ sems can rnams kyi snang ba chen por byed do/ /de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang 'od zer gyis
134b4(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gsal bar byed cing / gang gis kyang zil gyis gnon pa'am/ bar chad byed mi nus pas/ yon tan chen po'i
134b5(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho dpag tu med pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ theg pa 'di ni/ mun nag spong bar byed cing /
134b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi nad thams cad rab tu sel ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das shing sems can mang po yongs su sdud pa yin pas/
134b7(dkon brtsegs): dman pa rnams kyis bzhon par bgyi ba ma yin te/ go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ ma gtogs so/ /ngas ji skad du 'di ni/ bskal pa tshad med pa nas sems can rnams
135a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bskyabs pa/ sangs rgyas mang po rnams la mchod cing rim gro byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ tshogs yongs su
135a2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa rnams kyis bzhon par bya ba yin gyi/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de las gzhan pa 'jig rten gyis bcings pa/ 'jig rten dang mtshungs par
135a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal can dang / mu stegs can mngon par yid ches pa/ byed pa dman pa thams cad ni/ theg pa 'di'i ming thos par yang mi 'dod
135a4(dkon brtsegs): na| theg pa 'di la bzhon par bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /gal te sems can gang la la zhig bsam gyis khyab pa'i spyod yul la rnam
135a5(dkon brtsegs): par rtsen cing theg pa 'di la bzhon par byed na/ smon lam khyad par du 'phags pa ji lta ba bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol
135a6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ theg pa 'di ni/ mtha' med de/ sngon dang / dbus dang / tha ma'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/ /theg pa 'di ni/ mtha' yongs
135a7(dkon brtsegs): su chad pa yin te/ mtha' mi dmigs pas mtha' dpag tu med do/ /theg pa 'di'i mtha' ni/ tshad med pa'i mtha' yin no/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ theg pa 'di la
135b1(dkon brtsegs): ni| dpag tu med pas dbus kyi mtha' yang med la/ spang bar bya ba'i mtha' cung zad tsam yang yod pa ma yin no/ /de la mtha' spangs pa zhes bya ba ni/ mtha' zhes bya
135b2(dkon brtsegs): ba cung zad kyang med pas mtha' spangs pa zhes bshad do/ /rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtha' la mtha' spangs pa zhes bshad de/ de ni/ theg pa 'di'i mtha' spangs pa zhes
135b3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o| |mtha' yod pa ma yin pas dbus kyi mtha' zhes bya'o/ /mtha' yod pa ma yin pas mtha'i mtha' zhes bya'o/ /mtha' yod pa ma yin bas mtha' zhes bshad do/ /
135b4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' de la ni/ mtha' dmigs su med do/ /dmigs su med pa'i phyir mtha'i mtha' dang / dbus kyi mtha' dang / mtha' med pas rgyun mi chad par mtha'i sgor 'jug par
135b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /mtha'i sgor zhugs pa'i phyir theg pa 'di las yang dag par 'das pa yin yang yang dag par 'das pa nyid dmigs su med do/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ mtha'
135b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa'o/ /tshig gi rjes su zhugs pa'i phyir mtha' nyid ma yin no/ /des rtag pa'i mtha' spangs na mtha'i mtha'
135b7(dkon brtsegs): yang yod par mi 'gyur te/ mtha' de'i mtshan nyid mtha' med pa'i phyir ro/ /de la mtha' zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa chad pa'i phyir mtha'
136a1(dkon brtsegs): las yang dag par 'das shing chad pa dang / rtag pa rab tu spangs pa yin no/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ gang 'jig tshogs la lta ba
136a2(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa de ni/ mtha'i sgo la gnas par byed kyi/ gang 'jig tshogs la lta ba med pa de dag ni/ mtha'i sgo la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /mngon par
136a3(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa med pa'i phyir chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' las yang dag par 'das pa yin no/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' de dag ni/ yang dag
136a4(dkon brtsegs): par yod pa ma yin gyi/ slu ba'i tshig srid pa gsum po dag na mtha' rnam pa gnyis su rnam par rtog par byed pa yin pas/ mtha' gnyis po de dag gis
136a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su ma bsdus shing mtshungs par ldan par ma gyur na/ yang dag par 'das shing 'jig tshogs la lta ba spong pa'i phyir mtha' gnyis kyi sgo la mngon par
136a6(dkon brtsegs): zhen par mi byed do/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'jig tshogs la lta ba da dung ma spangs pa gang yin pa de dag ni/
136a7(dkon brtsegs): go cha chen po bgos nas theg pa chen po la zhon pa zhes mi bya ste/ mtha'i sgo de dag la mngon par zhen par gyur pas/ gal te mtha' spong bar 'dod par gyur
136b1(dkon brtsegs): na yang mtha' spong ba'i 'du shes skyed par byed pas sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' rnam par rtog par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'jig
136b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs la lta ba spangs pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ go cha chen po bgos nas theg pa chen po la zhon pa zhes bya ste/ mtha'i sgo de dag la mngon par zhen pa med pas mtha'
136b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis po dag las yang dag par 'das nas rab tu bde ba'i theg pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /blo gros
136b4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang blo gros chen po'i stobs kyis mtha'i chos la gnas pa thams cad mi spong mi gzhig pa'i thabs
136b5(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pas/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong yongs su bsdus nas mtshan ma med pa la mngon par bsgrubs te mtshan ma med pa mngon sum du gyur na/ sangs
136b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams kyis chos kyi snang ba sbyin par 'gyur la/ chos kyi snang ba thob pa'i dbang gis mtha' thams cad rab tu spong zhing / mtha' spong ba de dag la yang mngon
136b7(dkon brtsegs): par zhen pa med pas mtha' cung zad tsam yang mtha'i sgo de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'am/ mtshungs par mi ldan pa'am/ yid la byed pa'am/ yid la
137a1(dkon brtsegs): mi byed pa yang med par chos thams cad la thabs mkhas pas zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong de la rab tu gnas shing chos kyi snang
137a2(dkon brtsegs): ba chen po dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi snang ba thob pa'i phyir mun nag dang / spu zing zhes byed pa'i 'jigs pa dag yongs su spangs nas chos
137a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng ba dang / tshangs pa'i sgra chen po 'byin pa dang / seng+ge'i sgra chen po bsgrags nas sems can rnams la 'di skad du/ kye khyed
137a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams myur du 'dir shog la theg pa chen po rab tu bde pa'i theg pa dang / kha lo sgyur ba chen po'i theg pa dang / rab tu gzhol ba chen po'i theg pa 'dis bla
137a5(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs nas sems can rnams la chos kyi snang ba rab tu ston la/ chos kyi snang ba'i dbang
137a6(dkon brtsegs): gis sems can rnams la go cha chen po bgos nas theg pa chen po bzhon pa la dgod par bya'o/ /zhes sgrog par byed do/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub
137a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis theg pa chen po 'di dang / go cha chen po 'di la ser sna mi bskyed par sems can rnams la byang chub tu sems
137b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed de go cha 'di bgos nas theg pa chen po 'di la zhon par gyur cig ces smon lam gdab par bya'o/ /theg pa chen po 'di dang / go cha chen po 'di la ser
137b2(dkon brtsegs): sna mi bya bar sems can rnams la brgyud cing spel bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang sems can rnams go cha 'di bgos nas theg pa chen po 'di la zhon te nges par
137b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar gyur cig ces smon lam gdab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams spyod pa 'di lta bu la gnas pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi
137b4(dkon brtsegs): zhing yongs su dag pa yang yongs su sdud par byed la/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yon tan yongs su rdzogs pa yang sdud
137b5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur bas/ yon tan gyi rgya mtsho chen po dpag tu med pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar bya'o/ /blo gros mtha'
137b6(dkon brtsegs): yas| theg pa chen po 'di ni chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pas tshu rol gyi 'gram dang / pha rol gyi 'gram dmigs su med mong gyi/ 'on kyang rang gi ngang gis sems
137b7(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad bteg ste 'di nas chos kyi dbyings su phyin par byed pas gnas pa med pas rjes su mthun pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su mthun pa dang / go
138a1(dkon brtsegs): cha'i rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro/ /gang gis theg pa chen po'i chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa 'di la nan tan gyis sgrub par byed pa de
138a2(dkon brtsegs): dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par rab tu zhugs pa yin no/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chos kyi dbyings ni/
138a3(dkon brtsegs): rdul gyis gos pa med pas gang gis kyang rnam par gzhig pa'am gos par byar med do/ /theg pa chen po 'di yang de bzhin du rnam par 'jig pa med cing gos
138a4(dkon brtsegs): pa med de/ rnam par 'jig pa dang / gos pa med pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir theg pa 'di ni/ theg pa chen
138a5(dkon brtsegs): po zhes bya'o/ /theg pa 'di ni/ thogs pa med pas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad gang gis kyang bskor bar mi nus shing
138a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rab tu gzhol ba yin pas/ de phyir theg pa 'di ni/ theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /de la theg pa
138a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po zhes bya ba ni/ bkod pa chen po gang yin pa ste/ bkod pa thams cad gang yang theg pa chen po 'dir mi 'jug pa med pas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
138b1(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa 'di la yang 'dus byas kyi bkod pa
138b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bgyi ba lta ci mchis lags sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la 'di skad ces bka'
138b3(dkon brtsegs): stsal to/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ nga ni/ 'jig rten pa'i rjes su theg pa 'dir yang 'dus byas kyi bkod pa thams cad rab tu ston par
138b4(dkon brtsegs): mdzad do/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad ni/ theg pa
138b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'di las byung ngo / /'byung ngo / /'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i 'byor ba'i sa la gnas par byed kyang 'khor
138b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nyon mongs pa'i skyon rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur bas/ 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs re re nas 'jal bar byed cing gzhal nas kyang yongs su skyo bar
138b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas/ nges par 'byung ba'i lam rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang theg pa 'di la zhon par
139a1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ 'khor ba len par byed kyang gnas thams cad du skyon gyis gos par mi 'gyur zhing / nyes
139a2(dkon brtsegs): dmigs kyang mthong la nges par 'byung ba yang rab tu shes pas/ ngas 'dir ma bstan pa'i chos rnams dang / bkod pa gang yin pa de dag kyang theg pa
139a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di'i mtshan nyid kyi dbang gis chos de dag dang / bkod pa de dag kyang rab tu rtogs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu
139a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ theg chen bla na med pa'i theg /theg pa 'di ni bsam mi
139a5(dkon brtsegs): khyab| |gang zhig theg pa 'di zhon pa/ /de dag nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /brten pa'i gnas chen yin pas na/ /theg pa 'di ni bsam mi khyab/ /mtha' ni
139a6(dkon brtsegs): dpag med tshad med pas/ /de phyir theg chen zhes bya'o/ /sems can dag ni thams cad kyis/ /theg pa 'di la gzhol byed kyang / /theg pa 'di la 'grib pa
139a7(dkon brtsegs): med| |'phel bar yang ni mi 'gyur ro/ /sems can dag ni thams cad las/ /gang zhig theg pa 'di zhon pa/ /bde bar gzhol bar 'gyur bas na/ /de na
139b1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ci yang med/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /theg pa 'di la gzhol byed na/ /drang por 'gro zhing gzhan spyod med/ /lus dang sems ni ngal mi
139b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur| |'jig rten rnams ni gsal byed pas/ /lha mi lha ma yin rnams kyis/ /theg chen bla med 'di la ni/ /sems bskyed rab tu gzhol bar bya/ /rang sangs rgyas
139b3(dkon brtsegs): dang nyan thos kyi/ /theg pa zil gnon gang 'dod pa/ /theg chen bla med 'di la ni/ /sems bskyed rab tu gzhol bar bya/ /'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med/ /gnas
139b4(dkon brtsegs): pa med cing sngon mtha' med/ /phyi dang dbus kyi mtha' yang med/ /thob med mthong ba med pas na/ /dus gsum dag ni mnyam pa nyid/ /ji ltar nam mkha' dag
139b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ltar| |theg pa 'di yang de bzhin te/ /nyon mongs dag ni rab tu spangs/ /theg pa 'di ni ltos pa med/ /sgrib med thogs pa med pas na/ /thams cad yongs
139b6(dkon brtsegs): su skyob par nus/ /gzhol bar byed kyang mngon zhen med/ /theg pa 'di ni tshad med pas/ /mtshan ma thams cad yod ma yin/ /rang bzhin dag ni mi dmigs
139b7(dkon brtsegs): par| |'jigs med bsam gyis mi khyab yin/ /gang zhig theg pa 'di zhon nas/ /'jigs pa med pa thob pas ni/ /de yi sangs rgyas chos dag la/ /sgrib med thogs
140a1(dkon brtsegs): pa med par 'gyur/ /theg pa 'di la gang zhon pa/ /'jig rten kun ni snang byed par/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer brgya stong ltar/ /thams cad du ni
140a2(dkon brtsegs): gsal bar byed/ /theg pa 'di ni mi 'jigs shing / /zil gyis gnon pa med pas na/ /yon tan tshogs ni dpag med ldan/ /bla med 'di la gzhol bar bya//
140a3(dkon brtsegs): theg pa 'di ni 'jig rten 'das/ /khams dang las ni nges par 'byung / /mun nag dag ni rab tu spangs/ /zag pa med la gzhol bar byed/ /theg 'di byang
140a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams/ /'ba' zhig yongs su 'dzin pas na/ /de las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams/ /der ni shong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /blo dang ldan pa
140a5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig gis/ /bskal pa stong phrag tshad med du/ /thabs mkhas nan tan sgrub byed pa/ /des gdod theg pa 'di zhon 'gyur/ /nyan thos kyi na tshogs rnams
140a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / /rang rgyal dag gi tshogs dag dang / /mu stegs dag ni thams cad kyis/ /theg pa 'di la gzhol mi nus/ /gal te sems can gang zhig gis/ /bsam
140a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab chos 'di la/ /thabs mkhas rnam par gang rtsen pa/ /theg pa 'di la gnas par 'gyur/ /mos pa dag ni ji lta bzhin/ /khyad par smon lam
140b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam bzhag nas/ /yang dag lam la rab gnas shing / /bla med 'di la gzhol bar bya/ /theg pa 'di ni mtha' med pas/ /dbus kyi mtha' yang yod ma yin/ /mtha'
140b2(dkon brtsegs): yi mtha' dang dbus kyi mtha'/ /thams cad dmigs par mi 'gyur te/ /mtha' ni dmigs su med pas na/ /theg pa 'di la mtha' yod min/ /mtha' ni thams

140b6(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo ci yang med/ /mtha' dang mtha' med mtshan nyid ni/ /mtha' min mtha' yi mtshan nyid min/ /mtha' rnams de dag la yang ni/ /mtha' yi mtshan nyid ci
140b7(dkon brtsegs): yang med/ /mtha' min la ni mtha' bskor bshad/ /theg pa 'di ni yang dag 'das/ /de yi tshad las 'das pas na/ /mtshungs par ldan pa dmigs su med/ /ngas

141b1(dkon brtsegs): ma bgos pas/ /theg chen 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /mtha' rnams dag ni len byed cing / /mtha' yi mtshan nyid sngon gyi mtha'/ /phyi ma'i mtha' ni gang rtog pa/ /de

142a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das shing mun pa rnams rab tu bsal ba dang / 'jigs pa rnams rab tu bskyabs shing / brtson 'grus chen pos sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa dag las
142b1(dkon brtsegs): b yang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha'i bkod pa dag theg pa chen po'i bkod pa 'di thos pas rab tu dga' bar gyur te chos 'di sgom pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
142b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag la gus pas rim gro dang / bkur sti byas kyang 'di snyam du bdag ni/ go cha 'di lta bu bgos pa'o/ /bdag ni/ go cha 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'o/ /bdag ni/ chos 'di lta bu thos pa yin
142b3(dkon brtsegs): no| |bdag ni chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/ /bdag ni/ chos kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/ /snyam pa'i bsam pa ma byung ngo / /nga la de'i tshe bdag tu 'du shes pa med

142b6(dkon brtsegs): du yang sems yongs su skyo zhing ngal bar ma gyur to/ /nga de'i tshe go cha ma spangs shing theg pa dpag tu med pa la zhon par gyur pas tshe rabs thams cad du bdud kyi dpung dang / bdud kyi 'khor
142b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / bdud kyi dmag rnams bcom zhing pham par byas so/ /lam tha dad par gyur pa tsa ra ka dang / 'jig rten rgyang pan pa dang / pa ri ba ra tsa ka rnam par g.yeng bar gyur pa thams
143a1(dkon brtsegs): cad dang / gzhan yang mu stegs can 'di dang 'dra ba rnams ngas rab tu btul te bde ba la bkod do/ /tha dad par smra ba thams cad tshar bcad do/ /mu
143a2(dkon brtsegs): stegs can thams cad rab tu btul to/ /log par song ba'i sems can rnams theg pa 'di'i dbang gis dag pa'i sdom pa sna tshogs la gnas par byas so/ /sems can

143b2(dkon brtsegs): shing mthong bar gyur kyang rnam par rtog par mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ lam yang dag pa la gnas pas tshul bzhin

143b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin| |rnam par mi rtog pa yang ma yin pas rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa dag mnyam pa nyid du shes shing mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gis chos rnams btsal zhing

143b6(dkon brtsegs): par mi rtog pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa de dag la mngon par zhes cing 'dzin par mi byed la/ mngon par zhen cing 'dzin pa med pas rnam par

144b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa med par ting nge 'dzin du lta ba rab tu sbyangs nas yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas par byed do/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub
144b7(dkon brtsegs): s ems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de ltar mthong ba'i tshe thams cad du rnam par dag pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba thob pas shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lam la gnas par 'gyur
145a1(dkon brtsegs): te| shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lam 'di ni/ skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis bsgom par bya ba/ blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis bkur bar bya ba/ 'phags pa rnams dga'
145a2(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pa yin pas bdud dang / bdud kyi 'khor dang / bdud kyi mngag pa dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad kyis bgrod par

145a4(dkon brtsegs): par song ba dang / 'jig rten rgyang pan pa la sogs pas bgrod par bya ba'i phyir spyod yul yang ma yin no/ /mya ngan las 'das pa la sred pa thams cad kyis bgrod par bya ba'i spyod
145a5(dkon brtsegs): yul yang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dus ma byas la gnas pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pas na/ mya ngan las 'das bar

145a7(dkon brtsegs): las yang dag par 'das pa yin pas/ 'dus ma byas kyang yod pa ma yin na/ 'dus byas yod par mi 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ lam 'di ni/ rnam par rtog pa thams
145b1(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su sbyong bar byed pas/ tha na 'dus ma byas su rtog pa cung zad tsam yang med na/ 'dus byas su rtog pa thams cad lta yod par ga la 'gyur/ gang gis ji tsam du 'phags pa'i

145b5(dkon brtsegs): 'da' bar byed do/ /lam 'dis ni/ ngo bo nyid dang / ngo bo nyid ma yin pa thams cad spangs pa'i gnas su phyin par byed do/ /lam 'dis ni/ mtshan nyid bstan du med pa dang / gzugs can
145b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i gnas su phyin par byed do/ /lam 'dis ni/ nam mkha' bzhin du thams cad du khyab pas bla na med pa'i gzhal med khang chen por phyin par byed do/ /de ltar
145b7(dkon brtsegs): song ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ phyir ldog par mi 'gyur bas bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhal med khang chen po de yang bstan du med cing dngos po'i mtshan
146a1(dkon brtsegs): ma ci yang med pas 'dus byas cung zad tsam yang med la/ 'dus ma byas kyang cung zad tsam yang med de/ 'dus byas bkag cing 'dus ma byas spangs pa
146a2(dkon brtsegs): yin pas/ sems can rnams la 'dus byas kyi bde ba'am/ 'dus ma byas kyi bde ba gang yang sbyin par mi byed do/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ ji tsam du 'dus byas kyi mya ngan
146a3(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa la mos pa de dag kyang 'dus byas kyi bde ba yongs su tshol bar mi byed na/ gzhal med khang chen por zhugs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ gzhal med khang chen
146a4(dkon brtsegs): po de ni/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / rab tu bsil zhing dben par gyur pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o/ /'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug 'gog pa dang /
146a5(dkon brtsegs): pag la nyal rnams spong ba dang / sred pa'i lta ba'i dra ba dral ba dang / ma rig pa'i chu bo bskams pa dang / zug rdug dug pa rtsad nas bton pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams
146a6(dkon brtsegs): zang pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o/ /nga rgyal gyi nad dang / sdug bsngal mang pos nyon mongs pa thams cad thag bsrings pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o//
146a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir mya ngan 'das pa zhes bya'o/ /rtsod pa'i smra pa rnams dang / mtshams sbyor ba thams cad nas chos
146b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'du shes kyi bar du nye bar zhi bar gyur pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o/ /yid kyi mos pa rnams dang / yid kyi mos pa yongs su tshol ba gcod cing rnam par brtags pa
146b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par brtag par bya ba'i mtshan ma med pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ 'di ni/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid yin te/ mya
146b3(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das pa la mtha' med pas brjod kyis mi lang ngo / /gal te bgrod par bya ba dang bcas par gyur pa na/ de ni/ lam ma yin te/ lam la yang tshig med pas brjod par mi nus so//
146b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams lam 'dis mya ngan las 'das pa'i gzhal med khang chen por bgrod par gyur pa na sems can brgya stong tshad med pa rnams kyang lam
146b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ya dgod par byed do/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams lam 'di la gzhol bar gyur pa'i tshe yongs su ngal ba dang / gdung ba med par ji lta ji
146b6(dkon brtsegs): ltar yongs su tshol ba dang / ji lta ji ltar rab tu bkod pa dang / 'dun pa de lta de ltar rab tu bkod nas bkod pa re res kyang sems can yongs su bsdus nas chos ston par byed pas sems can
146b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams rab tu dga' bar byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lam 'di ni/ mtshungs pa med pas mi mthun pa'i phyogs yongs su dag par byed pa dang / bya ba rnams mthar phyin par byed pas sangs rgyas
147a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag kyang lam 'di la gzhol zhing 'gal bar mi mdzad pa dang / sa de dag tu ma byon cing smon pa rnams
147a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang spong bar mi mdzad pas so/ /de la sa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa dang / gzhal med khang chen po'i sa gang yin pa'o//
147a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni/ dper byar med kyang nam mkha' ma gtogs par dpe gzhan gyis nam mkha' mtshon par mi nus pas shin tu yangs shing rgya che ba'i nam mkha' dpen
147a4(dkon brtsegs): pa la nam mkha' zhes brjod do/ /mya ngan las 'das pa'i gzhal med khang yang de bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi dpen pa chen po bdag po med pa/ bdag gi ba med pa yin pas sems can thams
147a5(dkon brtsegs): cad der zhugs par gyur kyang spu nyag ma gcig tsam gyi tshad kyang yongs su gzung du med de/ shin tu yangs shing rgya che ba'i stong pa nyid rab tu dben pa rgya che zhing tshad med pas mya ngan las
147a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa chen po zhes kyang bya'o/ /gzhal med khang chen po zhes kyang bya'o/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang lam khyad par du 'phags pa 'di ni/ nyan
147a7(dkon brtsegs): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la yod pa ma yin no/ /snyam nas lam 'di la gnas pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad mngon par sgrub cing phyir mi ldog brjod
147b1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pas sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro/ /spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pas bkod pa byas nas lam 'dis sems bskyed de gzhol bar gyur pas na/ de'i
147b2(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa de lta bu de ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la yod pa ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ lam 'di la gnas pa'i tshe gal te 'khor los bsgyur
147b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyal po byas par gyur na yang chags shing lta ba med par mthu chen po dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul ston par byed pa dang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur
147b4(dkon brtsegs): ro| |gal te brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i rgyal bo byas par gyur na yang chags shing zhen pa med pas nga rgyal spangs nas sangs rgyas rnams la lta bar mos pa dang / yang dag pa'i chos nyan par
147b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / lha brgya stong tshad med pa rnams yongs su smin par byed cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems rab tu gzhol bar byed do/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
147b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par lam/ /'jig rten dag na mchog gyur pas/ /'phags pa theg pa pa gnyis dag /thams cad lam 'dir 'jug par
147b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur| |byang chub sems dpa' thams cad gang / /byang chub chen por bgrod pa dang / /lam gyi bkod pa mthong 'dod pa/ /lam 'di rab tu dbya bar bya/ /gang zhig lam 'di dag la ni/ /'gro dang
148a1(dkon brtsegs): bgrod par 'gyur ba dag/ de dag yang dag lta ba yis/ /lam 'di la ni gnas par bya/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad gang / /mnyam pa'i lta la gang gnas pa//
148a2(dkon brtsegs): lam 'dir rab tu zhugs nas ni/ /bde bas des par 'byung bar bya/ /lam 'di mchog tu khyad par 'phags/ /lam 'di bla na med pas na/ /yang dag ji bzhin 'dren byed kyang / /gzung
148a3(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba ci yang med/ /gang zhig lam 'dir gnas pa dang / /lam 'dir yang dag zhugs pa yi/ /blo ldan gang zag thams cad kyi/ /sems ni g.yo bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lam 'di la
148a4(dkon brtsegs): ni cung zad kyang / /g.yo ba yod par mi ston pas/ /des ni g.yo ba yod mi 'gyur/ /g.yo ba dag ni rtag tu spong / /nga yis lam 'di dag la ni/ /g.yo ba med cing byed pa med/ /sgro 'dogs
148a5(dkon brtsegs): med par rab bstan pas/ /lam 'di de phyir bla na med/ /byang chub dag ni thams cad kun/ /lam 'di la ni rab gnas kyang / /lam 'di la ni sred med cing / /khong khro ba yang yod pa
148a6(dkon brtsegs): yin| |lam 'di 'das pa ma yin te/ /lam 'di ma 'ongs pa yang min/ /de yis rnam rtog rab bsal nas/ /de bzhin du ni bsgom par bya/ /lam 'di la ni nyon mongs med/ /lam 'di
148a7(dkon brtsegs): la ni rnam rtog med/ /don dag dang ni mi 'gal bar/ /de bzhin du ni gnas par bya/ /lam mchog la ni gang gnas pa/ /gnas pa med par gnas par bya/ /lam 'di la ni gang
148b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa/ /rnam dag rang bzhin 'thob par 'gyur/ /nga yis yan lag brgyad pa'i lam/ /'phags pa'i bgrod pa yin par bshad/ /lam 'di la ni gang gnas pa/ /byang chub thob par dka'
148b2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' mgon med pas/ /de bzhin lam 'di gnas par bya/ /rnam dag lam 'di thob gyur nas/ /re re nas ni bgrod par bya/ /lam rab mchog tu gyur pa 'di//
148b3(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa sgrub byed cing / /de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pas na/ /ye shes 'di ni bla na med/ /bdud dang bdud kyi dmag rnams dang / /bdud kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / /mu
148b4(dkon brtsegs): stegs can ni gzhan rnams kyis/ /bgrod par bya ba'i yul ma yin/ /mya ngan 'das la gang rtog pa/ /lam mchog 'di la gnas mi 'gyur/ /byis pa rnam rtog gtses pas na/ /mya
148b5(dkon brtsegs): ngan 'das la phyogs mi 'gyur/ /rnam rtog las ni gang 'das pa/ /'du shes rnam rtog med pas na/ /lam ni chen po 'di dag la/ /des na rab tu zhugs par 'gyur/ /'phags
148b6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi lam mchog 'di/ /byis pa'i skye bos spong bar byed/ /chos 'di la ni gang zhugs pa/ /lam 'di bla na med pa yin/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i lam mchog 'di/ /bla med
148b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas su phyin par byed/ /de ni gnod dang mya ngan med/ /'jigs pa med cing gegs kyang med/ /bla na med pa'i lam 'di ni/ /gzugs med kha dog mtshan nyid med/ /gzugs kyi
149a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid dag gis kyang / /bstan par yang ni mi nus so/ /shin tu bde ba'i lam 'di ni/ /yang dag yin pas 'jigs pa med/ /lam
149a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di la ni gang zhugs pa/ /mthar ni mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /mchog tu rnam dag lam 'di ni/ /nam mkha' stong pa 'dra bas na/ /thams cad du ni thogs pa med/ /
149a3(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu mya ngan 'das la gzhol/ /gal te mya ngan 'das phyin na/ /phyir ldog par ni mi 'gyur bas/ /mya ngan 'das pa chen po 'di/ /bla med mchog tu bde ba yin/ /mya
149a4(dkon brtsegs): ngan 'das chen gzhal med khang / /stong dben mtshan ni gzhal du med/ /de phyir mya ngan 'das chen yin/ /gzhal med khang chen zhes kyang bya/ /mya ngan 'das pa chen po
149a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dir| |dug gsum nyon mongs rab tu zhi/ /gal te der ni phyin gyur na/ /ldog pa med cing skye len med/ /mya ngan 'das chen stong dben 'di/ /dper na nam mkha' ji lta
149a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin| |stong dben rgya ni che ba'i phyir/ /de na thogs pa ci yang med/ /mya ngan 'das chen gzhal med khang / /sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das spangs shing / /spyod yul gnas
149a7(dkon brtsegs): ni dpag med pas/ /mya ngan 'das pa zhes brjod do/ /mya ngan 'das la grangs med pas/ /grangs kyi tshad ni dmigs su med/ /rab zhi bsil ba'i rang bzhin la/ /mya ngan
149b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa zhes brjod do/ /mya ngan 'das la bya med pas/ /lam zhugs pa yang bla na med/ /tshad med rnam rtog med pas na/ /rnam par rtog pa dmigs su med/ /ngas ni byang chub
149b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i phyir/ /lam 'di rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ /lam 'di la ni gang gnas pa/ /de ni mya ngan 'das dang nye/ /lam 'di la ni gang gnas pa/ /'jig rten pa yi bde ba
149b3(dkon brtsegs): mchog / thams cad rab tu thob gyur pas/ /'jigs pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /lam 'di la ni rab gnas na/ /sems ni nyon mongs med par 'gyur/ /des na lam ni rnam dag
149b4(dkon brtsegs): pas| |'jigs pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /mnyam nyid yang dag lam mthong pas/ /thams cad rjes su rtogs par 'gyur/ /'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad la/ /thams cad du
149b5(dkon brtsegs): ni chags mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gnas med pa/ /yang dag khyad par 'phags pa'i lam/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa/ /rab tu rtsol pas gzhol
149b6(dkon brtsegs): bar bya| |bla med lam ni thob gyur na/ /lam mchog bkod pa 'di dag gis/ /'jig rten rnams ni mgu byed pas/ /lam 'di la ni gzhol bar bya/ /lam 'di mchog tu
149b7(dkon brtsegs): khyad par 'phags/ /yid ni yongs su dag par byed/ /ji ltar mos bzhin chol ba dag/ thams cad rab tu gzhol bar byed/ /gal te 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal/ /dpung chen
150a1(dkon brtsegs): thob par gyur na yang / /rgyal thabs dag ni rab spangs nas/ /rab byung lam ni slob par byed/ /gal te brgya byin tshangs pa yi/ /rgyal thabs thob
150a2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na yang / /de dag la ni chags med pas/ /de ni legs par rjes 'brang yin/ /'jig rten bslab pa'i gnas rnams kyang / /thams cad gsal bar khong du chud/ /lam
150a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di la ni gang gnas pa/ /bden tshig smra ba zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams lam 'di la yang dag
150a4(dkon brtsegs): par gzhol bar gyur pa na/ yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dag yongs su bsdu bar 'dod pa'i phyir chos gcig mngon par sgrub par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ mi dge
150a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos rnams mi byed pa gang yin pa'o/ /gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsdu pa'i phyir chos rnam pa gnyis mngon par sgrub par byed de/
150a6(dkon brtsegs): nang du dge pa'i chos gang yin zhes tshul bzhin du sems pa dang / phyi rol tu dge ba'i chos rnams gang yin zhes tshul bzhin du 'dri bar byed pa gang yin pa'o/ /gzhan
150a7(dkon brtsegs): yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir chos rnam pa gnyis mngon par sgrub par byed de/ dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du chos rnams rtogs par
150b1(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med par khong du chud pa gang yin pa'o/ /gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsdu ba'i
150b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir chos rnam pa gnyis mngon par sgrub par byed de/ nang du rtogs pa'i rjes su 'brang bar byed pa dang / phyi rol tu mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin pa'o/ /gzhan yang yang
150b3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir chos rnam pa gnyis mngon par sgrub par byed de/ rnam par rtog par bya ba med par bdag nyid mngon par yid ches pa
150b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can gang da dung mngon par yid ches par ma gyur pa de dag bdag gis lam 'di la dgod par bya'o/ /snyam du sems pa gang yin pa'o/ /gzhan yang yang dag
150b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir chos rnam pa gnyis mngon par sgrub par byed de/ lus su bya ba rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes shing mthong ba
150b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / lus su bya ba rnams la mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin pa'o/ /gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir chos rnam pa gsum
150b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sgrub par byed de/ nye bar len pa'i phung po sdug bsngal dang bcas pa rnams re re nas rtogs par khong du chud par byed pa dang / nye bar len pa'i phung po'i sdug bsngal
151a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa rnams nan tan gyis yongs su tshol zhing mos par byed pa dang / 'dus pa'i chos rnams yongs su spong bar brtson pa gang yin pa'o//
151a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir chos rnam pa gsum mngon par sgrub par byed de/ chos mchog tu gyur pa yang dag par ston pa
151a3(dkon brtsegs): na tshig 'gal ba med par chos kyi don rjes su mthun par ston cing / sems la rtsod pa med pa dang / tshig 'bru dang / yi ge thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa
151a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos thams cad yongs su sdud par byed pa gang yin pa'o/ /gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir chos rnam pa bzhi mngon
151a5(dkon brtsegs): par sgrub par byed de/ don la yang dag par sbyor ba'i dngos po mngon par sgrub par byed pa dang / don ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su mthun par yang dag par sbyor ba'i dngos
151a6(dkon brtsegs): po mngon par sgrub par byed pa dang / chos kyi rjes su mthun par so sor rtog pa la yang dag par sbyor ba'i dngos po mngon par sgrub par byed pa dang / thams cad la yang
151a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par zhen pa mi skyed par yang dag par sbyor ba'i dngos po mngon par sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa'o/ /gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su
