151b1(dkon brtsegs): bsdu ba'i phyir chos rnam pa bzhi mngon par sgrub par byed de/ shin tu brtan pa'i yi dam gyis bdag nyid bsrung zhing ji skad bstan pa kho na bzhin du sgrub par byed pa dang / dbang
151b2(dkon brtsegs): po drug la mkhas shing lam la gzhol bar byed pa dang / bsam pa rnam par dag par byed pa dang / bag yod pa la gnas par byed pa gang yin pa'o/ /blo gros mtha'
151b3(dkon brtsegs): yas| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ chos kyi spyod pa 'dis lam yongs su sdud par byed pa'i phyir lam gyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/ chos thams
151b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba'i phyir dang / ming med pa'i phyir dang / mtshan ma med pa'i phyir dang / smon pa med pa'i phyir dang / skye ba med pa'i phyir dang / mngon
151b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'du bya ba med pa'i phyir dang / yongs su skyo bar gyur pa'i phyir dang / spangs par gyur pa'i phyir dang / 'gag pa'i phyir dang / nges par 'gyur ba'i phyir chos kyi snang ba thob pa yin
151b6(dkon brtsegs): no| |skye ba rnams zad par so sor rtog pa na yang skye ba med pa la yang skye ba'i 'du shes skyed par mi byed pas/ de'i tshe skye ba las yang dag par 'das nas chos ma yin pa
151b7(dkon brtsegs): las nges par byung ba dang / rnam par dag pa'i lam thob nas mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /lam rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir 'du shes thams cad las
152a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med pa la mi gnas pa dang / lam gyi 'du shes bkag nas chos kyi 'du shes spong ba dang / ma rig pa'i
152a2(dkon brtsegs): dra ba las nges par 'byung zhing rig pas sgom pas 'thob par bya ba'i chos rnams kyang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /rig pas sgom pas chos gang zhig thob par 'gyur
152a3(dkon brtsegs): zhe na| 'di lta ste/ rig pas sgom pas 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa thob pa dang / chos thams cad la nges par mkhas pa thob pa dang / gsang ste gsungs pa rtog
152a4(dkon brtsegs): pas chos nyid kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams lam 'dir zhugs par gyur pa'i tshe yul la mi
152a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas shing mtshan mas bsgribs par mi 'gyur te/ chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / skye ba nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / skye ba'i ngo bo nyid nam
152a6(dkon brtsegs): mkha'i ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs par shes pas mtshan ma cung zad tsam gyis kyang bar chad byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /lam 'di shin tu rnam par dag pas gnod pas 'jigs
152a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yang med do/ /go cha chen po bgos pas 'dzin pas 'ching bar yang mi 'gyur la/ theg pa chen po la zhon pas rmongs par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /sgrib pa rnams spangs
152b1(dkon brtsegs): pas nam mkha' lta bur gyur nas lam 'dir zhugs te sems can rnams kyi snang ba chen po byed par 'gyur ro/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
152b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam khyad par du 'phags pa yin te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis
152b3(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ yang dag lam brgyad bsdu ba'i phyir/ /chos spyod rnams ni ston pa yi/ /lam 'di la ni gang gnas pa/ /de ni brtson 'grus chen
152b4(dkon brtsegs): po yin| |dge ba'i chos kyi lam bsgrubs shing / /dus ni thams cad dag tu yang / /mi dge'i chos ni mi byed pa/ /spyod pa 'dis ni lam sdud 'gyur/ /byang chub sems
152b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnal 'byor pas/ /nang du tshul bzhin yid byed cing / /phyi rol tu ni 'dri byed pa/ /spyod pa 'dis ni lam sdud 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang rtog pa/ /dngos
152b6(dkon brtsegs): po ji bzhin rab shes shing / /tshul bzhin chos bzhin gang gnas pa/ /spyod pa 'dis ni lam sdud 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyabs byed pas/ /nang du rjes su rtog byed
152b7(dkon brtsegs): cing | |phyi rol tu ni zhe na byed pa/ /spyod pa 'dis ni lam sdud 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pas/ /bdag nyid rtog med yid ches shing / /gzhan dag yid
153a1(dkon brtsegs): ches gnas byed pa/ /spyod pa 'dis ni lam sdud 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' yid ches pas/ /bya ba'i lam rnams dag byed cing / /lam rnams
153a2(dkon brtsegs): la ni 'dzin byed pa/ /spyod pa 'dis ni lam sdud 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'ching med pas/ /rtag tu sdug bsngal nyer len shes/ /nyer len sdug bsngal med tshol ba/ /
153a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa 'dis ni lam sdud 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab shes pas/ /'dus pa spyod pa spyod sgrub cing / /'du 'phro dag ni gang spong ba/ /spyod pa 'dis ni lam sdud
153a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur| |byang chub sems dpa' don shes pas/ /don gyi rjes su rab rtogs shing / /rtsod pa med par gang ston pa/ /spyod pa 'dis ni lam sdud 'gyur/ /byang chub sems
153a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' blo ldan pas/ /tshig 'bru'i yi ge zhen med par/ /chos rnams thams cad sdud byed pa/ /spyod pa 'dis ni lam sdud 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos
153a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa| |chos kyi rjes su mthun byed cing / /don gyi rjes su mthun gyur pa/ /spyod pa 'dis ni lam sdud 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' lam 'brang bas/ /brtan pa'i
153a7(dkon brtsegs): yid dam yang dag gnas/ /ji skad bstan bzhin gang bsgrubs pa/ /spyod pa 'dis ni lam sdud 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' lam dag pas/ /yid la mos pa
153b1(dkon brtsegs): rab sbyangs nas/ /chos la gnas shing bag yod pa/ /spyod pa 'dis ni lam sdud 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du/ /spyod pa 'di rnams rab bsgrubs nas/ /lus
153b2(dkon brtsegs): dang sems ni bde thob nas/ /spyod pa 'dis ni lam sdud 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang dag dran/ /rnam dag lam la gang gnas pa/ /chos rnams stong zhing mtshan med
153b3(dkon brtsegs): par| |thams cad rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab brtags na/ /smon lam rnam par dag byed cing / /smon pa med la mi gnas pas/ /mtshan ma rnams ni
153b4(dkon brtsegs): spong bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du/ /don tshul mnyam par rab brtags na/ /chos rnams skye bar mi 'gyur bas/ /the tshom cung zad yod mi 'gyur/ /byang
153b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' blo ldan dag / thams cad chos ni rab brtags na/ /skye zhing zhi bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/ /gsal bar mthong nas gzhol bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'
153b6(dkon brtsegs): chos rtogs pas/ /tshul bzhin chos skye mthong bas na/ /skye ba la ni skye mi mthong / /zad pa las ni zad mi mthong / /byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus ldan/ /de ltar so sor
153b7(dkon brtsegs): rtog byed na/ /chos min pa las nges 'byung zhing / /yang dag gnas la gnas par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo dam pas/ /lam 'di rnam par dag pas na/ /myur du bde
154a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas phyin sems pa/ /bla med bzod pa 'grul bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo dam pas/ /tshul bzhin chos rnams rtogs byed cing / /
154a2(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes rnams las gang 'das pa/ /'du shes med la rtag gnas 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo dam pas/ /lam 'di rab spyong 'gyur ro zhes/ /lam gyi 'du shes
154a3(dkon brtsegs): gang spong ba/ /chos kyi 'du shes la mi gnas/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo dam pas/ /lam 'di rab tu spyod pa'i phyir/ /ma rig dra ba dral sems pa/ /chos kyi snang chen thob
154a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo dam pas/ /rig pas sgom par byed pas ni/ /sems can rnams la ston byed pas/ /des na rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur/ /byang chub
154a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rig sgom pa/ /chos rnams thams cad rtogs pa'i phyir/ /don zab la ni nges 'gyur zhing / /thabs mkhas chen po thob par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'
154a6(dkon brtsegs): rig sgom pa/ /thabs kyi 'du shes kun spong pa/ /gsang ba'i chos kyi rjes 'brang zhing / /nges pa'i don ni rtogs par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo dam pas/ /chos kyi
154a7(dkon brtsegs): snang ba chen po yis/ /'du shes tshor ba 'gog byed na/ /des na yang dag gzhol bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo dam pas/ /lam 'di la ni mi gnas te/ /lam
154b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di la ni mi gnas phyir/ /lam la yang dag gzhol bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pas/ /chos rnams dag ni thams cad kyang / /nam mkha' dag pa ltar
154b2(dkon brtsegs): shes pas/ /mtshan ma rnams kyis bsgribs mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams kyi/ /rang bzhin nam mkha' 'drar shes te/ /chos rnams nam mkha' 'dra ba'i
154b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir| |rnam dag dri ma med par shes/ /byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur/ /gnas pas mtshan ma bsgribs par 'gyur/ /myur du sems can rnams la ni/ /gdams ngag rjes
154b4(dkon brtsegs): su ston par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo dam pas/ /las rnams thams cad rnam dag pas/ /lam la bar chad ci yang med/ /thogs pa med par gzhol bar 'gyur/ /
154b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pa'i lam 'di ni/ /byang chub chen por myur du 'grod/ /'dus ma byas ni mngon sum byed/ /mnyam pa nyid du gzhol bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i go
154b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po| |theg chen lam ni chen po dag / nam mkha' 'dra bar thogs med cing / /rnam par dag pas gzhal bar bya/ /theg dang lam 'di gang skyes pa/ /nam mkha' bskyed
154b7(dkon brtsegs): pa lta bur ni/ /mtshan ma mang po rab spangs nas/ /mtshan ma med pas bgrod par bya/ /theg pa chen po mnyam pa'i theg /rgya chen nam mkha' 'dra bas na/ /shin tu rnam dag
155a1(dkon brtsegs): lam 'di la/ /theg pa 'dis ni bgrod par bya/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang / /chos 'di la ni gus byed pas/ /sems can rnams
155a2(dkon brtsegs): ni kun gyi phyir/ /dpa' bos rab tu bgrod par bya/ /byang chub chen por bgrod byed cing / /khyad par lam 'dir gang gnas pa/ /theg pa gnyis la sogs pas/ /bgrod par
155a3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i yul ma yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang dag dran/ /lam ni dag par gang byed pa/ /rnam par dag pa'i lam 'di yis/ /bla med mchog tu bgrod par 'gyur//
155a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ de ltar yang dag par zhugs shing gzhol bar gyur pa'i tshe dran pa nye bar
155a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / /
155a6(dkon brtsegs): snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong tshad med pa rnams yang dag par khong du chud pas yon tan khyad par 'phags pa tshad
155a7(dkon brtsegs): med pas brgyan nas 'jig rten pa rnams rab tu gdul ba'i phyir dang / go cha bgos nas khams gsum las nges par 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir dang / theg pa chen po la zhon
155b1(dkon brtsegs): nas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin rnams yongs su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir lam 'di la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par gzhol
155b2(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ go cha chen po bgos te theg pa chen po la zhon nas lam 'di la gnas pa'i tshe gal
155b3(dkon brtsegs): te byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis sems can kun la khyab par byed dam/ sems can rnams la bdag dang 'dra bar phangs par mi byed na ni/ de
155b4(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i go cha dang / theg pa chen po'i lam tshan po 'di dag ni/ sa chen po kyang theg par mi 'gyur la/ sems can thams cad kyis kyang ston par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ 'di
155b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar sems can rnams la snying brtse zhing phan gdags pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgos te theg pa chen po la zhon nas lam 'di la gnas pa yin pas/ go cha dang / theg pa chen
155b6(dkon brtsegs): po'i lam chen po 'di dag tu lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad kyis kyang bgrod par mi nus la/ byis pa so so'i skye bo 'jig rten la mngon
155b7(dkon brtsegs): par zhan pa dang / 'jig rten na gnas par mos pa thams cad kyis kyang mthong bar mi nus pa yin no/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ sems
156a1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgos pa yin pas/ 'di ltar go cha'i mthus sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung gi khams
156a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams byin gyis brlabs pas/ sa'i khams 'di g.yo zhing 'khrug pa med pa dang / sems can thams cad 'jigs pa mi skye ba dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams
156a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rlung gi khams rnams kyang de dag gi rjes su ci rigs par bya ba rnams byed pa yin no/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang po
156a4(dkon brtsegs): s ems bskyed de go cha bgos nas deng go cha chen po 'di bgos te theg pa chen po 'di la zhon nas rnam par dag pa'i lam gyis skye ba gcig gis thogs pa la gzhol zhing
156a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi shing drung du bgrod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la zhugs par gyur gyi bar du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje las mngon par grub
156a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor shin tu brtan pa 'di gal te byin gyis ma brlabs na/ 'khrug cing g.yo bar 'gyur te/ shin tu brtan pa'i rdo rje las mngon par 'gyur pa
156a7(dkon brtsegs): yin yang go cha chen po dang / theg pa chen po'i lam chen po 'di 'degs pa'i 'os su mi 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
156b1(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi smon lam gyis sems can rnams la byams pa dang / snying rje chen po bskyed pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams thabs cig tu
156b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa brjod nas gal te rdo rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang / ri rab dang / rin po che'i ri thams cad dang / de las gzhan pa'i ri'i rgyal po rnams byin gyis brlabs
156b3(dkon brtsegs): par ma gyur na/ go cha chen po dang / theg pa chen po'i lam chen po 'di dag 'degs pa'i 'os su mi 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
156b4(dkon brtsegs): ni/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthu'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir dang / sems can rnams la rnam par mi
156b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshe ba'i phyir dang / gnod pa mi byed pa'i phyir dang / mnyam par mi byed pa'i phyir dang / skrag par mi byed pa'i phyir dang / 'khon du mi 'dzin pa'i phyir dang / mnar bar mi byed pa'i
156b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir dang / nyon mongs par mi byed pa'i phyir dang / sems can rnams bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgos nas theg pa chen po la zhon te lam 'di la gnas nas bla na
156b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar byed do/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ go cha bgos pa na shes rab kyi
157a1(dkon brtsegs): go cha bgos nas shes rab kyi mtshon cha thogs te shes rab chen pos yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /yongs su bsngo ba'i theg pa la zhon nas shes rab kyi
157a2(dkon brtsegs): snang ba skyed par byed do/ /snang ba'i lam la gnas nas shes rab kyi snang ba'i mig gis chos rnams so sor brtags te thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rab tu gzhol
157a3(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / sems can rnams yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
157a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab
157a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams sgom par byed do/ /thams cad kyang shes rab sngon du 'gro zhing shes rab kyis mngon par sgrub pa dang / shes rab kyis yongs su bsdus nas bla
157a6(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas
157a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad du khyab cing / sangs
157b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos tshad ma mchis pa rnams yongs su sdud cing mngon par sgrub par bgyid pa ni/ shin tu ngo mtshar che lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
157b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros mtha' yas/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
157b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ shes rab rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kun du khyab cing / chos thams cad yongs su bsdus te go cha chen po bgos nas theg pa chen po la zhon te lam
157b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'di la gnas nas thams cad kyang shes rab sngon du 'gro bas rab tu gzhol bar byed do/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ gal te shes rab dang ldan pa yang shes rab sngon du
157b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba med na/ lam 'di la rab tu gzhol bar mi 'gyur gyi/ gal te shes rab dang ldan zhing shes rab sngon du 'gro bas thams cad du khyab bar 'gyur nas rjes su 'jug pa
157b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rjes su spyod pa dang / shes rab kyis yongs su bsdus shing shes rab kyis rab tu bsngams par gyur na/ gdod go cha chen po bgos nas theg pa chen po la zhon pa dang
157b7(dkon brtsegs): lam chen po 'di la gnas pa zhes bste/ rab tu bde ba'i chos kyis 'jig rten la phan 'dogs shing shes rab kyi mig 'byed par byed do/ /shes rab kyi mig gis so sor
158a1(dkon brtsegs): b rtags nas shes rab kyi lus gsal bar gyur nas 'od zer chen po bkye nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol
158a2(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bgo bar bya ba'i go cha dang / go cha'i bkod pa dang / bzhon par bya ba'i
158a3(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po dang / theg pa chen po'i bkod pa dang / bgrod par bya ba'i lam chen po dang / lam chen po'i bkod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
158a4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ skyes bu dam pa gang go cha'i bkod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i bkod pa dang / lam chen po'i bkod pa dang / yon
158a5(dkon brtsegs): tan rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ngas yongs su rdzogs par brjod par gyur na/ bskal pa tshad med pa rnams su brjod
158a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyed la sogs pas rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / ma 'ongs pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams go cha'i bkod pa dang / theg
158a7(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po'i bkod pa dang / lam chen po'i bkod pa dang / yon tan dpag tu med pa'i tshogs kyi bkod pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ngas deng 'dir phyogs cung zad tsam zhig mdor
158b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan par bya ste/ skyes bu dam pa de dag gal te ngas bstan pa'i chos thos par gyur na/ go cha chen po bgos nas theg pa chen po la zhon te lam chen po 'di la gnas par
158b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing yon tan gyis rab tu brgyan nas rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ /ngas ni yang dag spong ba
158b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / /dran pa nyer gzhag rnam bzhi dang / /thabs mkhas thams cad bshad pa na/ /de phyir bag yod bcas par 'gyur/ /yang dag dran pa phun tshogs shing / /chos mkhan
158b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par ldan pa dang / /rab brtson des bar 'byung byed pas/ /de phyir bag yod bcas par 'gyur/ /dbang po stobs dang byang chub phyogs/ /go bgos theg chen zhon byas te//
158b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di yis bsrung ba rab byas nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzhol bar bya/ /bsam gtan zil mnon rnam thar dang / ting 'dzin snyoms par rab zhugs te/ /'di yis bsrung
158b6(dkon brtsegs): pa rab byas nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzhol par bya/ /snying rje byams dang dga' btang snyoms/ /go bgos theg chen zhon byas te/ 'di yis bsrung ba rab byas nas/ /byang chub
158b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' gzhol bar bya/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong rdzu 'phrul rkang / /cho 'phrul dag ni rdzogs byas te/ /'di yis bsrung ba rab byas nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzhol bar
159a1(dkon brtsegs): bya| |tshad med yon tan rnams dang ni/ /go bgos theg chen zhon byas te/ /lam la ngal ba med byas nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzhol bar bya/ /
159a2(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus dang ni bag yod dang / /go bgos theg chen zhon byas te/ /dran nas de dag shes byas nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzhol bar bya/ /snang ba go cha chen po yis/ /
159a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten dag ni rab btul te/ /go cha 'di ni bgo byas pa/ /'di ni blo ldan zhes bya'o/ /thams cad mkhyen la yang dag phyogs/ /khams gsum las ni nges 'byung phyir/ /
159a4(dkon brtsegs): theg chen 'di la gang zhon pa/ /'di ni blo ldan zhes bya'o/ /lam chen rnam par dag pa'i lam/ /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin/ /'jig rten zil gyis mnan pa ni/ /kun du
159a5(dkon brtsegs): grags pa zhes bya'o/ /'di 'dra'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /sems can rnams ni kun gyi phyir/ /dus rnams thams cad dag tu yang / /go cha brtson 'grus bgo bar
159a6(dkon brtsegs): byed| |gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang / /btang snyoms chen po mi sgom na/ /sa chen dag ni shong mi 'gyur/ /gal te byang chub
159a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams/ /sems can rnams ni de dag la/ /dus rig phan 'dogs mi byed na/ /sa chen dag ni shong mi 'gyur/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /snying rje
159b1(dkon brtsegs): theg chen mi zhon na/ /ri dang rgya mtsho chen po rnams/ /sa chen dag ni shong mi 'gyur/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /byams pas sems can dran byed cing / /theg chen
159b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di la mi zhon na/ /sems can gang yang bsten mi 'gyur/ /gal te go cha 'di bgos nas/ /byams 'od gsal bar ma byas na/ /go cha chen po de dag la/ /sems can gang yang
159b3(dkon brtsegs): bsten mi 'gyur/ /go cha 'di ni rab bgos nas/ /yon tan rgya mtsho dpag med kyis/ /'byung chen khams bzhin byin brlabs pas/ /de 'degs 'os su gyur pa yin/ /sems can
159b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir/ /snying rje 'od kyis kun khyab cing / /'byung chen khams bzhin byin brlabs pas/ /de 'degs 'os su gyur pa yin/ /sems can yongs su bsdu ba'i
159b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir| |byang chub chen po mngon bsgrubs nas/ /'byung chen khams bzhin byin brlabs pas/ /de 'degs 'os su gyur pa yin/ /sems can mi smod gnod mi byed/ /go cha chen po
159b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di bgos nas/ /theg chen gyis ni nges 'byung ba/ /'di ni blo ldan zhes bya'o/ /thabs la mkhas pa chen po yis/ /thams cad byin gyis rab brlabs nas/ /bla na med pas nges
159b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba/ /'di ni blo ldan zhes bya 'o/ /des na sa ni chen po 'di/ /mi 'bying rab tu mi g.yo zhing / /chu dang me dang rlung gi khams/ /bya ba dag ni byed pa yin/ /byang chub sems dpa'
160a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams/ /go cha dpag med bgos nas ni/ /theg chen 'di la zhon byas nas/ /lam gyis rab tu gzhol bar byed/ /tshe gcig thogs pa mngon
160a2(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs te/ /tha ma'i lus ni thob gyur nas/ /byang chub shing rgyal drung song ste/ /rab brtan sa la 'dug nas ni/ /byang chub snying po de dag tu/ /rdo rje bzhin du rab gnas nas/ /
160a3(dkon brtsegs): lus dang sems ni ngal med par/ /thams cad mkhyen pa mngon du byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pas/ /gal te byin gyis ma brlabs na/ /sa chen de dag g.yo
160a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing / /zhig nas phyir yang chags mi 'gyur/ /sa chen khams ni thams cad kun/ /gal te byin gyis ma brlabs na/ /rdo rje las ni grub gyur kyang / /mi g.yo mi 'khrugs
160a5(dkon brtsegs): gang yang med/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa'i dus/ /smon lam chen po rab brgyan pas/ /sems can rnams ni de dag la/ /byams pa chen pos dran par byed/ /mngon
160a6(dkon brtsegs): sum phyogs bcu'i zhing khams na/ /sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad mkhyen/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo gang bzhugs pa/ /thams cad srung zhing dgongs par 'gyur/ /gal te de las
160a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan pa'i ri/ /ri rab rin po che yi ri/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor khor yug ri/ /shin tu brtan par gang gnas pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan dag /gal te byin gyis
160b1(dkon brtsegs): ma brlabs na/ /go cha chen po 'di bgos pa/ /'degs pa'i 'os su mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis byin brlabs pa/ /sems can
160b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ni sa chen po/ /bsten 'degs 'os su gyur pa yin/ /go cha chen po gang bgos pa/ /sems can 'tshe ba mi byed pas/ /go cha dag ni gong na med/ /theg pa dag gis gzhol bar
160b3(dkon brtsegs): bya| |go cha chen po gang bgos pa/ /sems can gnod pa mi byed pas/ /go cha dag ni bsam mi khyab/ /theg pa dag gis gzhol bar bya/ /go cha chen po gang bgos pa/ /sems
160b4(dkon brtsegs): can dag la 'khon mi 'dzin/ /sems can nad ni bsal ba'i phyir/ /theg pa dag gis gzhol bar bya/ /lam mchog dag ni phun tshogs pa/ /bla med mchog tu sbyor bas na/ /mi
160b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshe 'khon 'dzin med pa dang / /gnod pa mi byed yang dag gnas/ /shes rab chen po'i go bgos te/ /shes rab bsngo ba'i theg zhon pa/ /go cha 'dzin par mi 'gyur bas/ /bsngo ba'i
160b6(dkon brtsegs): nang na mchog tu 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyabs byed pas/ /shes rab snang ba la gnas te/ /shes rab chos rnams rab brtags nas/ /bla na med par gzhol bar byed/ /byang
160b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i lam mchog dang / /go cha dang ni theg chen dag /shes rab 'od las byung bas na/ /de phyir sems ni rnam par dag /pha rol phyin la rab zhon nas/ /byang chub chen
161a1(dkon brtsegs): por bgrod byed cing / /shes rab yongs sdud shes rab gtsang / /shes rab dag ni sngon du 'gro/ /pha rol phyin pa thams cad kyi/ /shes rab 'di ni sngon du
161a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro/ shes rab yongs sdud shes rab gtsang / /bla med ye shes len par byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsam mi khyab/ /shes rab snang ba skyed byed cing / /shes rab sgron
161a3(dkon brtsegs): chen sbar byed pas/ /bde bar rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur/ /shes rab snang ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ /des na shes rab mig kyang 'byed/ /sangs rgyas bla med ye shes dag /gsal
161a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo dag /go cha dpag tu med pa yis/ /tshad med par ni brgyan pa'i phyir/ /go cha bgos pa zhes bya 'o/ /byang
161a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' blo chen dag / theg chen rab tu brgyan pas na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa la/ /gos pa med par gzhol bar byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo
161a6(dkon brtsegs): chen dag / lam chen rab tu brgyan pas na/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mchog dag la/ /rnam par dag pas gzhol bar byed/ /bam po bzhi pa/ gzhan yang blo
161a7(dkon brtsegs): gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi go cha'i spyod yul dpag tu med pa dang / theg pa chen po'i spyod yul dpag tu med pa dang / lam
161b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i spyod yul dpag tu med pa dag la rab tu gzhol bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
161b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams ni/ /chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug par 'dod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar byed do/ /chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug par 'dod pa'i phyir theg pa chen po la
161b3(dkon brtsegs): zhon par byed do/ /chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug par 'dod pa'i phyir lam chen po la rab tu gnas par byed do/ /chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir
161b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gzhol bar byed do/ /'on kyang go cha des chos cung zad tsam yang nang ngam/ phyi rol lam/ rags pa'am/ phra ba'am/ thag ring ba'am/ thag nye ba'am/ 'das pa'am/ da
161b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar gyur pa'am/ ma 'ongs pa'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas sam/ gnas pa'am/ mi gnas pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi dmigs so/ /gal te go cha 'dis
161b6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed mi nus sam/ /gtan la 'bebs par mi nus sam/ yongs su mi shes sam/ rjes su 'jug par mi nus sam/ mngon sum du byed mi nus
161b7(dkon brtsegs): sam| yang dag par 'da' bar mi nus na/ go cha chen po bgos pa zhes mi bya'o/ /chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed par byed dam/ gtan la 'bebs sam/ yongs su shes
162a1(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur tam/ rjes su 'jug par byed dam/ mngon sum du byed dam/ yang dag par 'da' bar byed na/ go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /theg pa
162a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po des kyang chos 'ga' tsam yang nang ngam/ phyi rol zhes bya ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bsngo ba'i bar du yang dag par mi dmigs shing / yongs su shes pa
162a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rjes su 'jug pa dang / mngon sum du byed pa dang / yang dag par 'da' bar byed pas de'i phyir theg pa 'di ni/ theg pa chen po dang / chos la rab tu mkhas pa'i
162a4(dkon brtsegs): theg pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par phyin par byed pa'i theg pa dang / gong na med pa'i theg pa dang / mtshungs pa med pa'i theg pa zhes bya'o/ /lam chen po des kyang cung
162a5(dkon brtsegs): z ad tsam yang nang ngam phyi rol zhes bya ba nas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi lam chen por gyur nas gzhol bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yang dag par mi dmigs
162a6(dkon brtsegs): shing / mnyam pa nyid kyi lam 'dis chos 'ga' tsam yang yongs su mi shes pa med pas/ de'i phyir lam 'di ni/ bla na med pa'i lam dang / grangs dang / tshad med pa'i
162a7(dkon brtsegs): lam dang / mtshungs pa med pa'i lam zhes bya'o/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi
162b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dang / sems las byung ba'i spyod pa kun gyi rjes su yang dag par 'jug par byed de/ /sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa spong zhing yongs
162b2(dkon brtsegs): su dag par byed do/ /theg pa chen po la zhon nas sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par 'phel bar byed do/ /lam chen po 'di la gnas nas sems can rnams
162b3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sgrub par yang dag par skul bar byed do/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ sems can re re'i phyir sems
162b4(dkon brtsegs): can gyi spyod pa re re'i phyir yang 'khor ba'i mtha' ji srid pa de srid du yun ring por 'khor ba na 'khor zhing shes rab kyi sman yongs su tshol ba dang / go cha mi spong bar shin tu
162b5(dkon brtsegs): brtan par byas nas go cha chen po dang / tshad med pa'i go cha dang / bsam par dka' ba'i go cha dang / rnam par dag pa'i go cha dang / dpag tu med pa'i go cha dang / blang ba med pa'i go
162b6(dkon brtsegs): cha dang / sems can gyi 'du shes rig pa'i go cha dang / sems can med par shes pa'i go cha dang / bdag med par shes pa'i go cha dang / sems can gyi rang bzhin rjes su rtogs
162b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i go cha dang / bdag gi rang bzhin shes pa'i go cha dang / nang gi rang bzhin shes pa'i go cha dang / nang gi rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pa'i go cha dang / phyi rol gyi rang bzhin shes pa'i
163a1(dkon brtsegs): go cha dang / phyi rol gyi rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pa'i go cha dang / nang dang phyi rol gnyi ga'i rang bzhin shes pa'i go cha dang / nang dang phyi rol gnyi ga'i
163a2(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pa'i go cha dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin shes pa'i go cha dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pa'i go cha dang / chos thams cad
163a3(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su med par shes pa'i go cha dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med par shes pa'i go cha dang / chos thams cad rtogs pa'i khong du chud pa'i go cha
163a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / mtha' med pa'i go cha dang / dbus med pa'i go cha dang / dbus dang mtha' med pa'i go cha dang / 'das pa ma yin pa'i go cha dang / ma 'ongs pa ma yin pa'i go cha
163a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / da ltar byung ba ma yin pa'i go cha dang / bya ba med pa'i go cha dang / byed pa med pa'i go cha yang dag par bgo bar byed do/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems
163a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ go cha 'di la bgo bar yang mi byed/ rjes su rtogs par yang mi byed/ gtan la 'bebs par yang mi byed/ nges par 'byung bar yang mi
163a7(dkon brtsegs): byed| mngon sum du yang mi byed de/ go cha nyid yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /go cha bgos pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ rjes su rtogs par mi byed pa'i phyir rjes su rtogs par
163b1(dkon brtsegs): byed do| |gtan la 'bebs par mi byed pa'i phyir gtan la 'bebs par byed do/ /nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa'i phyir nges par 'byung bar byed do/ /mngon sum du mi byed pa'i phyir
163b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du byed/ gdags par bya ba med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po la zhon par byed do/ /theg pa chen po la gdags par mi byed de/ gdags pa med pa'i gdags pas gdags
163b3(dkon brtsegs): par byed kyang theg pa chen po la ni/ gdags par bya ba ci yang med do/ /gal te gdags pa dang bcas par gyur na/ de nyid gdags pa ma yin te/ gdags pa de dag dmigs su
163b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i phyir dang / bltar med pa'i phyir ro/ /theg pa yang yod pa ma yin te/ theg pa la gnas pa dag ni/ dmigs su med pas theg pa chen po la gnas par byed pas/ gzhol
163b5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa spong zhing mthar phyin par yang mi byed la/ mya ngan las 'das par byed pa yang mi byed de/ dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /lam ma yin pas lam med de/ lam la
163b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhol bar byed pa nyid yang dag par mnyam pa'i phyir ro/ /yang dag pa'i lam 'di ni/ gdags su med pas su zhig gang du gang las gdags par byed de/ bya ba yang med/ byed
163b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yang med/ 'dus pa yang ma yin/ 'dus pa med pa yang ma yin/ thams cad la skyo zhing thams cad yongs su mi 'tshal ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag par mnyam
164a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lam 'di ni/ chos thams cad dang gcig pa yang ma yin/ tha dad pa yang ma yin zhing mtshungs par mi ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /chos kyi 'du shes
164a2(dkon brtsegs): mi bskyed cing / chos thams cad spong bar byed pas gtsang ba yang med/ mi gtsang ba yang med do/ /chos nyid kyang de bzhin te/ gtsang ba yang med/ mi gtsang ba yang med
164a3(dkon brtsegs): pas de'i phyir lam 'di ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i lam zhes bya ste/ bgrod pa med pas bgrod par byed do/ /yongs su gzung ba med pas yongs su gzung bar byed
164a4(dkon brtsegs): do| |lam 'di ni/ shin tu zab pas skye ba med pa/ 'byung ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ thob pa med pa/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa/ gnas med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dngos
164a5(dkon brtsegs): po med pa/ dngos po thams cad rab tu ston pa/ dngos po thams cad dbyer med pa/ dngos po'i rjes su mi 'jug pa yin te/ dngos po med pa'i phyir bla na med pa'i gnas
164a6(dkon brtsegs): su phyin par byed pa yin no/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi go cha 'di dang / theg pa 'di dang / lam 'di de ltar rig par bya'o//
164a7(dkon brtsegs): 'on kyang go cha 'di dang / theg pa 'di dang / lam 'di ni/ bltar med cing shes par byar med pa dang / dmigs su med pa'i phyir su zhig go cha bgo bar byed/ su zhig
164b1(dkon brtsegs): theg pa 'di la zhon par byed/ su zhig lam 'di la spyod par byed do/ /bltar med pa/ shes bar byar med pa/ dmigs su med pas so/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems
164b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis chos 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang bar klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / chos kyi tshul dang 'gal
164b3(dkon brtsegs): ba med cing / rjes su mthun par bsgrubs pa dang / rab tu dga' bar mos par byed pa dang / chos 'di'i phyir rab tu brtson par byed pa dang / chos kyi tshul nges pa 'di la thabs
164b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa'i nus pa dang ldan par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ go cha 'di bgos te theg pa 'di la zhon nas lam 'dir zhugs te chos zab mo dmigs su med pa 'di la gzhol
164b5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pas| 'khor ba'i mthar gtugs nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing / yon tan dpag tu med pas rab tu
164b6(dkon brtsegs): brgyan nas 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis chos 'di la rab tu dga' bas brtson 'grus bskyed
164b7(dkon brtsegs): nas bag yod par bsgrub par bya'o/ /sems can la la zhig chos zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu dga' ba bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag kyang ngas phan pa chen po thob par rab tu bstan
165a1(dkon brtsegs): na| gang zhig nan tan brtson 'grus kyis bag yod pa dang bcas pa dang / tshul khrims kyi spyod pa rnam par dag pas gzhol bar byed pa lta smos kyang ci
165a2(dkon brtsegs): dgos| blo gros mtha' yas/ khyed kyis chos 'di shin tu yangs shing rgya che ba rnam pa du ma dang / khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa du ma dang / rnam par dag pa du ma dang ldan pa
165a3(dkon brtsegs): la ltos| ngas chos 'di la nan tan gyis bsngags pa rab tu brjod pa ni/ sems can rnams rab tu dga' ba bskyed pas yun ring po'i phan pa dang bde ba thob nas yongs su skyo
165a4(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba'i phyir dang / rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang / yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ yang khyod kyis chos 'di 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las
165a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba sbyin par byed pa yin yang srid pa rnams su dbul phongs pa sna tshogs snang bar gyur pa ni/ sems can rnams chos zab mo 'di
165a6(dkon brtsegs): las rab tu nyams par gyur pa'i phyir 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'byor pa dang bde ba rnams spangs pa yin par blta bar bya'o//
165a7(dkon brtsegs): blo gros mtha' yas/ yang khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bzhugs pas chos rin po che zab mo 'di 'byor ba du ma rnyed sla bar gyur to/ /snyam du blta bar bya
165b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing | khyod kyis chos zab mo 'di la nan tan gyis rab tu bsgrub par bya'o/ /byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni/ ngas chos rin po che 'di yang dag par bstan pa na thos par yang mi
165b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod na/ len pa dang / 'dzin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de bzhi gshegs pa mngon sum du bzhugs shing chos rin po che 'byor pa'i dus su yang mnyan par mos pa dang /
165b3(dkon brtsegs): 'bri bar yang 'dun par mi 'gyur na/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la yang dag par chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe sangs rgyas dang / chos dkon mchog dang / chos
165b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin par byed pa rnam pa gsum mngon du mi 'gyur ba'i dus su mnyan pa dang / 'bri bar mos par lta ga la 'gyur/ blo gros mtha' yas/ 'on kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gal te
165b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas legs par byin gyis brlabs par gyur na/ chos rin po che zab mo 'di rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i dus de'i tshe
165b6(dkon brtsegs): chos rin po che zab mo 'di yang dag par nyams shing 'grib pa'am/ zad par gyur pa med mod kyi/ 'on kyang chos 'di la nyan pa dang / 'dzin par byed pa med de/ nga'i spyan sngar
165b7(dkon brtsegs): sems rtse gcig tu mnyan par mos pa dang / go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ ma gtogs te/ de dag de'i tshe chos 'di la rab tu dga' bas nyan pa dang / len par 'gyur bas so/ /
166a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe sems can gang chos 'di thos nas rab tu dang ba tsam skyed par byed na yang ngas de dag chos rgya chen po 'di mngon par sgrub par 'gyur bar
166a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa yin na/ da ltar chos 'di la yongs su dang ba bskyed nas nan tan gyis sgrub par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa'
166a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ bla na med pa'i go cha dang / go cha chen po tshad med pa rnams yang dag par bgos pa na 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni/ sems can dbul
166a4(dkon brtsegs): phongs par gyur ba 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyis rgud pa dang / thos pas rgud pa dang / shes rab kyis rgud pa dang / rnam par grol bas rgud pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye
166a5(dkon brtsegs): shes mthong bas rgud pa de dag thams cad la chos chen po 'dis phongs pa med par bya'o/ /chos chen po 'dis phongs pa med par bya ba'i phyir rgud pa thams cad spangs nas
166a6(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi nor dang / thos pa'i nor dang / shes rab kyi nor dang / rnam par grol ba'i nor dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i nor gyis phyug par bya'o/ /'dod
166a7(dkon brtsegs): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi me rnams rab tu zhi bar bya'o/ /nad thams cad las sos par bya'o/ /bla na med pa'i sman gya nom pa gtang bar bya'o/ /sman 'di'i dbang
166b1(dkon brtsegs): gis nad rnam pa sna tshogs bsal nas bde ba chen po thob par bya'o/ /lhag ma dang bcas pa gtan du spangs te shin tu bsil ba'i ngo bo nyid bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa mngon
166b2(dkon brtsegs): du byas nas yid la sems pa dang / so sor rtog pa'i lhag ma gcig kyang lus pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas thams cad yongs su tshol ba med pa la dgod
166b3(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mya ngan las 'das pa 'di ni/ mchog tu bde zhing yongs su tshol ba thams cad lus pa med pa'i phyir dang / yongs su tshol ba gtan du
166b4(dkon brtsegs): zhi zhing yongs su zad pa'i phyir ro/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ go cha chen po de lta bu bgos nas gzhan yang sems can thams
166b5(dkon brtsegs): cad la snying brtse bas yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir theg pa chen po la zhon nas 'di snyam du/ theg pa chen po 'di la ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang chibs nas nges par byung
166b6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'di la chibs nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'di la chibs nas nges par 'byung
166b7(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur kyang gshegs par gyur pa yang med la/ chibs pa dang / nges par 'byung ba yang med do snyam mo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
167a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / byed pa med pa'i phyir nges par 'byung bar gyur pa yang ma yin/ nges par 'byung ba yang ma yin/ nges par 'byung
167a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba yang ma yin no/ /theg pa 'di la zhon nas de ltar nges par 'byung ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ legs par 'byung ba yin te/ mngon par zhen pa med pas chos thams
167a3(dkon brtsegs): cad dang 'dus pa yang ma yin/ 'dus pa med pa yang ma yin pas 'ong ba med pa/ 'gro ba med pa yin no/ /theg pa 'di lam gang gis nges par 'byung ba'i tshe yang 'dus pa
167a4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pas 'ong ba med pa/ 'gro ba med pa yin no/ /theg pa 'di dang / lam 'dis go cha chen po byas nas nges par 'byung ba'i tshe yang 'dus pa yang ma yin/ 'dus pa
167a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang ma yin pas/ 'ong ba med pa/ 'gro ba med pa yin te/ dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
167a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni/ go cha 'di dang / theg pa 'di dang / lam 'dis de ltar gzhol bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang go cha 'di dang / theg pa 'di dang / lam 'dis gzhol bar byed pa'i tshe
167a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du/ so so'i skye bo'i chos gang yin pa dang / nyan thos kyi chos gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa'i
167b1(dkon brtsegs): chos de dag bdag dang nye ba zhig gam/ 'on te thag ring ba zhig ces yongs su rtog par mi byed do/ /stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa
167b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag bdag dang nye ba zhig gam/ 'on te thag ring ba zhig ces yongs su rtog par mi byed do/ /yongs su skye ba dang
167b3(dkon brtsegs): bral ba dang / 'gag par 'gyur ba nas mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar gyi go cha de dag la yang bdag dang nye ba zhig gam/ 'on te thag ring ba zhig ces yongs su rtog par
167b4(dkon brtsegs): mi byed do/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ go cha chen po dang / theg pa 'di dang / lam 'di dag la ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos thams cad dang / rang
167b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad gang gis kyang bskul bar mi nus pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar byed do// blo
167b6(dkon brtsegs): gros mtha' yas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ go cha 'di dang / theg pa 'di dang / lam 'di la g.yo ba mi mnga' ba brnyes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das
167b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa'i phyir dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid mi mthun pa dang bral ba'i phyir dang /
168a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma rnam par dag pa'i phyir dang / yongs su rnam par dag pa'i phyir dang / mtshan ma dag gis so sor brtag pa dang / mchog tu so sor
168a2(dkon brtsegs): brtag pa dang / kun tu so sor brtag par bya ba ma yin no/ /chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyang ngo bo nyid kyis so sor brtag pa dang /
168a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu so sor brtag pa dang / kun tu so sor brtag par bya ba ma yin no/ /chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / bstan du med pa dang /
168a4(dkon brtsegs): brjod du med pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid ces bya'o/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ go cha 'di dang / theg pa 'di dang / lam 'di lta bu
168a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag gi de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyang de bzhin du bstan du med cing brjod du med pa yin yang sems can rnams kyis khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir dang / chos rnams
168a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi snang ba 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir go cha 'di dang / theg pa 'di dang / lam 'di dag btags pa tsam du mdor bstan pa yin no/ /deng khyod kyis gal te go cha 'di dang /
168a7(dkon brtsegs): theg pa 'di dang / lam 'di'i don gyi rjes su 'jug cing spyod par 'dod na/ gdags pa med pa dang / bstan du med pa dang / brjod pa med par don gyi rjes su 'brang bar
168b1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o| |don gyi rjes su 'brang ba gang yin pa de dag la ni/ 'di ni/ spyad par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba yang cung zad kyang med la/ 'di ni/ rjes su 'brang bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba yang cung
168b2(dkon brtsegs): zad kyang med pas don ma yin pa de dag gi rjes su ni/ 'brang bar mi byed la/ don gang yin pa de dag gi rjes su 'brang bar byed do/ /don gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tshe sgra'i rjes su
168b3(dkon brtsegs): 'brang bar mi byed do/ /yi ge'i rjes su 'brang bar mi byed do/ /ngag gi rjes su 'brang bar mi byed de/ rjes su mi 'brang ba de'i rjes su mi 'jug pa gang yin pa'o/ /de la don gang
168b4(dkon brtsegs): yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gsang ste bstan pa gang yin pa dag yin pas gsang ste bstan pa rnams rjes su rtogs par byas nas mngon par yid ches pas spyad par bya'o/ /mngon
168b5(dkon brtsegs): par yid ches pas spyod pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ don de dag la rnam par rtog par mi byed pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i rjes su 'brang bar byed do/ rjes su 'brang bar byed pa gang
168b6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni/ spyod pa med pa dang / rjes su 'brang ba med pa zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don de dag la spyod pa zhes bya ba yang cung zad kyang med la/ rjes su 'brang ba dang /
168b7(dkon brtsegs): kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba yang cung zad kyang med de/ spyod pa yongs su spangs pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang bar mi byed do/ /byang chub kyi rjes su mthun par yang mi spyod la/ 'khor ba'i
169a1(dkon brtsegs): rjes su mthun par yang mi spyod de/ rjes su mthun pa dang / rjes su mi mthun pa de dag ni/ yid la byed pa yang ma yin/ yang dag pa'i dran pa yang
169a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin te/ bsam pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir rjes su 'brang bar mi byed do/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ khyod kyis don 'di'i rjes su 'brang bar bya'o/ tha dad pa'i
169a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dang ldan par mi bya'o/ /gal te tha dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bar byed na/ de ni brjed ngas pa yin pas sgra'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / tshig 'bru dang / yi ge'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / ngag gi rjes
169a4(dkon brtsegs): su 'brang bar 'gyur te/ tshig gi brjod pa de dag kyang yongs su spong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sgra yongs su shes pa dang / tshig 'bru dang / yi ge las yang dag par 'das pa dang /
169a5(dkon brtsegs): tshig gi brjod pa rjes su rtogs pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ de ltar rjes su 'brang bar mi byed pas 'khor bar 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/ /don 'di la de ltar rjes su 'brang ba dang /
169a6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar rjes su 'jug pa gang yin pa de dag la ni/ spyod pa cung zad kyang med de/ spyod pa nye bar zhi bar gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ don gyi rjes su 'jug
169a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe mngon par 'du byas pa dang bcas pas don gyi rjes su 'brang bar mi bya'o/ /gal te mngon par 'du byed pa med par don gyi rjes su 'brang bar byed na/ de ni/ 'ong ba
169b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ste/ 'ong ba med pa dang / phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ go cha 'di dang / theg pa 'di dang / lam 'di dang
169b2(dkon brtsegs): rjes su mthun par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar byed pa yin pas sems can rnams la phan pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro/ /blo gros mtha'
169b3(dkon brtsegs): yas| gang gis chos 'di de ltar ston pa dang / don gyi rjes su 'brang bar byed pa dang / rjes su 'jug par gang yin pa de dag ni/ sems phyin ci log med pa dang / the tshom
169b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i mos pa yongs su sgrub pa yin pas/ go cha 'di dang / theg pa 'di dang lam 'di yongs su ma bsdus pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ yongs su bsdus nas myur du gzhol
169b5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pas go cha 'di ma bgos pa yang myur du bgo bar byed do/ /theg pa 'di la da dung zhon par ma gyur pa yang myur du zhon par byed do/ /lam 'di la gnas par ma gyur pa
169b6(dkon brtsegs): yang myur du gnas par byed do/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ sems can de dag ni/ bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po yongs su sdud pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
169b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis rjes su bsrung zhing dgongs par 'gyur bas chos dang 'gal ba med pa dang / dge 'dun dang mthun par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ khyod ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
170a1(dkon brtsegs): t shad med pa rnams yongs su bsdus pa yin pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus su chos 'dis sems can rnams yongs su bsdus nas sems can rnams kyi
170a2(dkon brtsegs): ched du khur lci ba bkur bar bya'o/ /des ni/ bsod nams kyi tshad shin tu brjod par dka' ba dag rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su
170a3(dkon brtsegs): bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pas/ /de ltar go cha bgos pa'i tshe/ /sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /go cha dpag med bgo bar
170a4(dkon brtsegs): byed| |sems can gal te phongs gyur tam/ /sdug bsngal chos ni med pa'i tshe/ /tshul khrims dang ni mang du thos/ /shes rab rnam grol tshad med pa/ /go cha dpag med rab
170a5(dkon brtsegs): bgos nas/ /chos kyis rab tu phyug par byed/ /chos kyis phyug por gyur pa'i tshe/ /thams cad bde ba thob par byed/ /dbul ba'i sdug bsngal spangs pa'i phyir/ /bla med chos
170a6(dkon brtsegs): ni ston byed pas/ /thos pa dag ni rdul spangs nas/ /bde lam 'di la dgod par byed/ /tshul khrims phung po rab rgyas shing / /mang du thos pa rgya mtsho 'dra/ /shes rab mchog ni
170a7(dkon brtsegs): thob pas na/ /des na 'ching ba gcod par byed/ /rnam grol kun tu gsal byed dang / /rnam grol yang dag shes mthong ba/ /gang gis mngon sum byed pa ni/ /thams cad bde ba
170b1(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug mes/ /rtag tu bsreg cing kun gdungs pas/ /des na sems can sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /me de bdag gi gsad par bya/ /sems can
170b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la sman btang nas/ /nad rnams thams cad sel bar byed/ /gal te nad ni zhi gyur na/ /mya ngan 'das dbyings phyin par 'gyur/ /lhag ma thams cad gtan spangs nas/ /bde
170b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas la ni gzhol bar byed/ /bde ba'i gnas su bzhag pas na/ /ldog par 'gyur ba gang yang med/ /'dus byas bde ba thams cad la/ /yongs su tshol bar mi byed cing / /bla
170b4(dkon brtsegs): na med pa'i bde chen dag / thams cad mngon sum byed par 'gyur/ /spros pa med pa'i chos dag gis/ /sems can yongs su smin byed pas/ /mthar phyin pa yi bde ba dag /thams
170b5(dkon brtsegs): cad rab tu thob par byed/ /de lta bur ni gang gzhol ba/ /lan gcig song nas phyir mi ldog /gzhol ba las ni yang dag 'das/ /mchog tu bde ba brtag tu 'thob/ /bde ba chen po dag
170b6(dkon brtsegs): gis ni| |mos pa dang ni mi mos pa/ /gzhol ba dang ni gzhol med pa/ /thams cad rab tu spong bar byed/ /de ltar go cha bgos nas kyang / /theg pa 'di la zhon nas ni/ /sems can
170b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la snying brtse'i phyir/ /thams cad yongs su gzung bar bya/ /'das pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa rnams/ /theg pa 'di yis nges byung gyur/ /ma byon thams cad mkhyen rnams
171a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang / /theg pa 'di dbang nges 'byung 'gyur/ /da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /theg pa 'di dbang nges 'byung brnyes/ /de phyir theg pa 'di
171a2(dkon brtsegs): la ni| |ma chibs pa ni gang yang med/ /'jig rten dag la mgon mdzad pas/ /rgyal ba dag ni thams cad kun/ /theg pa 'di yi nges 'byung yang / /theg pa'i 'du shes skyed
171a3(dkon brtsegs): mi mdzad/ /theg pa med pas theg pa mdzad/ /lam med pa la lam du mdzad/ /nges 'byung med par nges par 'byung / /de phyir nges 'byung bla na med/ /theg pa 'di ni nges
171a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung tshe/ /nges 'byung cung zad yod ma yin/ /stong pa mtshan ma med pa dang / /smon med byed pa med phyir ro/ /theg min nges byung ma yin pa/ /de ni theg chen zhes bya'o//
171a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rab tu mnyam pas na/ /des na yang dag gzhol bar byed/ /theg pa 'di la 'dus pa med/ /ma 'dus pa yang yod ma yin/ /bla med lam la gzhol byas pas//
171a6(dkon brtsegs): bde ba chen po mngon du byed/ /theg pa 'di la mtshungs ldan med/ /mtshungs mi ldan pa yid ma yin/ /gnas pa med cing brten pa med/ /des na rab tu gzhol bar byed//
171a7(dkon brtsegs): lam 'di la ni 'ong ba med/ /lam 'di la ni bgrod pa med/ /yang dag lam 'di gang spyod pa/ /rab dben yang dag gzhol bar 'gyur/ /ngas ni lam 'di theg 'di dang //
171b1(dkon brtsegs): go cha chen po 'di dag ni/ /chos la rten par mi byed pas/ /rab dben bla med mchog tu bstan/ /so so skye bo'i chos rnams dang / /nyan thos chos ni thams cad dang / /rang rgyal chos
171b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams thams cad kyang / /thams cad dmigs su med pa yin/ /sangs rgyas chos ni thams cad dang / /dri med bla na med pa'i chos/ /ring ba ma yin nye min pas/ /thams cad dmigs
171b3(dkon brtsegs): su med pa yin/ /stong dang mtshan ma med pa'i chos/ /smon dang byed pa med chos kyang / /ring ba ma yin nye min pas/ /thams cad dmigs su med pa yin/ /skyon bral dang ni 'gag
171b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos/ /rab dben mya ngan 'das pa'i chos/ /ring ba ma yin nye min pas/ /thams cad dmigs su med pa yin/ /theg pa 'di dang go cha 'di/ /lam 'di la ni 'dzin med cing //
171b5(dkon brtsegs): bla med g.yo ba med pas na/ /mthar ni gang yang dmigs su med/ /chos kyi rang bzhin thams cad dang / /de kho na yi mtshan nyid ni/ /gdags su rung ba ma yin te/ /chos nyid
171b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni stong phyir ro/ /theg pa 'di dang go cha 'di/ /lam 'di bstan du med pa yin/ /chos rnams rang bzhin ji lta ba/ /de yi rang bzhin de bzhin no/ /chos rnams dag ni thams
171b7(dkon brtsegs): cad la| |mtshan nyid rang bzhin med pa'i chos/ /nga yis mdor ni bstan pa yin/ /chos rnams thams cad dag la ni/ /rang bzhin mtshan nyid thams cad kun/ /ji ltar ngas ni
172a1(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa bzhin/ /mthar ni yod par mi 'gyur ro/ /theg pa 'di dang lam 'di dang / /go cha'i rang bzhin mtshan nyid la/ /tshig gi brjod pa
172a2(dkon brtsegs): rab bsal nas/ /mthar ni dmigs par 'gyur ma yin/ /tshig ni yod pa ma yin phyir/ /ngo mtshar rab tu gyur pa yin/ /tshig gi brjod pa de dag la/ /ngag gi mtshan nyid yod
172a3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin| |chos rnams dag ni gzhal du med/ /mchog dang kun tu gzhal du med/ /thams cad dpag tu med pas na/ /de phyir chos ni bla na med/ /theg pa 'di dang go cha 'di/ /
172a4(dkon brtsegs): lam 'di yang ni de bzhin du/ mtshan ma med pa de dag la/ /de ltar rjes su 'jug par bya/ /sems can rnams ni kun gyis kyang / /yongs su shes nan tan sgrub pa dang / /myur
172a5(dkon brtsegs): du chos snang thob bya'i phyir/ /de phyir ngas ni de skad bstan/ /chos rnams la ni tshig med pas/ /thams cad brjod du med pa yin/ /chos rnams de dag kun la ni/ /thams cad
172a6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'jug par bya/ /chos la tshig ni med pa'i phyir/ /de yi rjes su 'brang bar bya/ /spyod kyang spyad pa cung zad med/ /thams cad chos ni spyod pa med/ /tshol ba med cing
172a7(dkon brtsegs): mos tshol med/ /'gro ba med pas rjes su 'brang / /de ltar rjes su gang 'brang ba/ /don la so sor rtog mi byed/ /khyod kyis yang dag bden pa'i don/ /thams cad rjes su 'brang
172b1(dkon brtsegs): bar bya| |sgra rnams dang ni tshig dag gi / rjes su 'jug par mi bya'o/ /sgra rnams dang ni tshig dag gi /rjes su gal te mi 'jug na/ /don gyi rjes su 'brang byed pas/ /'di ni don tshol
172b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes kyang bya/ /don zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ /gsang ste gsungs par rig par bya/ /rnam rtog med la yid ches pas/ /don de rjes su 'brang bar bya/ /don de gsal bar rab rtogs na/ /
172b3(dkon brtsegs): gsang ste gsungs pa de dag la/ /'dzin med zhen pa med pa dang / /'brang dang rjes su 'jug mi 'gyur/ /gal te rjes su 'brang byed na/ /mngon shes rjes su 'brang bar byed/ /gal
172b4(dkon brtsegs): te rjes su mi 'brang na/ /thams cad rjes su 'jug mi 'gyur/ /yang dag dran pa de dbang gis/ /rjes su 'jug pa spong bar byed/ /byang chub dang ni 'khor ba dang / /gnyis ka yang ni
172b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs mi ldan/ /de la bsam par mi byed pas/ /bsam med yang dag dran pa yin/ /bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ /rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o/ /'di dang tha dad sgrub
172b6(dkon brtsegs): byed na| |bla med chos ni spong bar 'gyur/ /khyed kyis don de dag la ni/ /ji skad bstan bzhin bsgrub par bya/ /gal te tshig gi rjes 'brang na/ /de ni sgra yi rjes 'brang bas/ /de las
172b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag mi 'da' zhing / /'jig rten chos dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /sgra dang tshig 'bru yi ge rnams/ /de dag rjes su 'brang mi bya/ /yang dag don ni rtogs byas nas/ /bgrod pa med
173a1(dkon brtsegs): pas rjes 'brang bya/ /yang dag don la sgra yang med/ /tshig 'bru yi ge yod ma yin/ /tshig las yang dag 'das pa'i phyir/ /yang dag don zhes bya
173a2(dkon brtsegs): ba yin| |don de'i rjes su 'brang byed kyang / /rjes su 'brang ba ci yang med/ /'brang bar bya ba zhi ba'i phyir/ /yang dag don zhes bya ba yin/ /yang dag don ni de dag la/ /'brang
173a3(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa 'brang med pas/ /de ni phyir ldog mi 'gyur zhing / /go cha spong bar mi byed do/ /go cha chen po theg chen dang / /lam chen rjes su gang 'brang ba/ /bde ba'i gnas su bgrong
173a4(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/ /sems can rnams la phan byed 'gyur/ /rab tu bde ba'i chos 'di dag /ngas ni khyod la rab tu bshad/ /khyod don rjes su 'brang byed na/ /khyod kyi the tshom chad par
173a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /theg pa 'di la gang zhon pa/ /zhon nas rab tu bgrod byed na/ /byang chub chen por myur phyin nas/ /bla med sangs rgyas mngon sum byed/ /theg pa mchog tu gyur pa 'di//
173a6(dkon brtsegs): zhon byed gang yin myur zhon byed/ /lam dang go cha chen po yi/ /don dag kyang ni de bzhin no/ /bla na med pa'i chos 'di la/ /nan tan gyis ni gang bsgrubs pa/ /sems can de
173a7(dkon brtsegs): dge thams cad la/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur/ /ma 'ongs 'jig pa'i dus kyi tshe/ /khyod kyis chos 'di rab phye nas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /
173b1(dkon brtsegs): phan pa dag ni rab tu byos/ /ma 'ongs 'jig pa'i dus kyi tshe/ /gal te chos 'di rab phye nas/ /bla med bsod nams skye 'gyur bas/ /de yi grangs ni gzhal mi nus/ /blo gros mtha'
173b2(dkon brtsegs): yas| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bgos pa'i go cha gang yin pa de ni/ rgyal po chen po zhes bya'o/ /dpag tu med pa'i rgyal po zhes kyang bya'o/ /bkod pa
173b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang ldan pas bzhon pa'i theg pa zhes kyang bya'o/ /ded dpon chen po zhes kyang bya'o/ /dpag tu med pa'i 'od ces kyang bya'o/ /bkod pa dam pa dang ldan pa bgrod par bya ba'i
173b4(dkon brtsegs): lam zhes kyang bya'o/ /bkod pa tshad med pa'i tshogs zhes kyang bya'o/ /thabs tshad med pa'i tshogs zhes kyang bya ste/ lam 'di'i dbang gis skyes bu dam pa rnams bla na med pa yang
173b5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar byed do/ /gzhan yang blo gros mtha' yas/ sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa tshad med cing grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs
173b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/
173b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tsan+dan spos kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ bskal pa'i ming ni/ glog
174a1(dkon brtsegs): gi 'od ces bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams ni/ rab tu snang ba zhes bya ste/ de'i tshe zhing de sa gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam zhing mi gtsang ba rnam pa sna
174a2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma dang / tsher ma dang / sdong dum la sogs pa med de/ gser dang / dngul gyi bye ma gcal du bkram pas 'jig rten gyi khams de gang
174a3(dkon brtsegs): gis mthong ba rab tu dga' bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe gling bzhi po rnams yangs shing rgya che bas thams cad kyang dpag tshad 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis kyis 'khor bar gyur te/
174a4(dkon brtsegs): gling re re na yang grong khyer chen po bzhi khri brgyad stong yod de/ grong khyer re re'i tshad kyang zheng du dpag tshad bcu dang / srid du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod de/ tha ma'i ra ba yang
174a5(dkon brtsegs): shin tu mtho zhing bkod pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /grong khyer re re na yang mi bye ba phrag brgyad brgyad gnas te/ de yang grong rdal khri dang / skyed mos tshal stong gis bskor
174a6(dkon brtsegs): nas rab tu brgyan par gyur to/ /gzhan yang zhing khams de na me tog gi ljon shing dang / 'bras bu'i ljon shing dang / spos kyi ljon shing dang / gos kyi ljon shing dang /
174a7(dkon brtsegs): ro mchog tu gyur pa'i ljon shing dang / rdo rje'i ljon shing rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bkod pa dang / rdzing dang / rdzing bu dang / chu mig dang / 'bab chu rnams kyang g.yas g.yon gyi
174b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gram drang zhing mdzes pa dang / yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus rab tu gang ba dang / de na me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po kha dog sna tshogs kyi
174b2(dkon brtsegs): 'od dang ldan par kun tu khyab par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tsan+dan spos kyi 'od zer de'i sku tshe tshad ni/ lo bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad thub par gyur to/ /nyan thos
174b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'khor ni/ bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu lnga par gyur to/ /de'i tshe mi rnams byad bzhin sdug cing mdzes pa dang / rab tu bde ba dang ldan pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang
174b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / gti mug srab pas gdul sla ba dang / cung zad tsam zhig bshad cing bstan pas kyang chos rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid yongs su shes par gyur to/ /blo gros mtha'
174b5(dkon brtsegs): yas| gzhan yang de'i tshe 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa/ gling bzhi pa rnams skyabs su song ba zhig byung ste/
174b6(dkon brtsegs): dzam+bu'i gling de na grong khyer chen po chu zheng du dpag tshad bzhi bcus 'khor ba zhig yod de/ /mis rab tu gang ba/ bde zhing 'byor pa dang ldan pa/ grong khyer gyi nang du dpag tshad
174b7(dkon brtsegs): lnga tshun chad rin po che sna bdun gyis gcal du bkram pa/ shing ta la mchog rnams kyang dril bu g.yer kha dpyangs shing / gser yang dag pa'i dra bas g.yogs pa dag kun
175a1(dkon brtsegs): du gang bar gyur to/ /rgyal po de'i pho brang ni/ bai DUR+Ya 'ba' zhig las byas shing zheng du dpag tshad gcig yod de/ ngos bzhin ka ba stong stong yod
175a2(dkon brtsegs): do/ /pho brang gzhal med khang de'i steng na yang khang pa brtsegs pa shin tu mtho zhing rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa stong yod do/ /pho brang gzhal med khang de'i mdun
175a3(dkon brtsegs): na spos kyi rdzing chen po shin tu dang ba zhig yod de/ de'i nye 'khor na gzhan yang spos kyi 'od dang ldan pa'i rdzing bu phra mo rin po che sna bdun las mngon par bsgrubs pa bcu
175a4(dkon brtsegs): drug yod do/ /de dag gis mtha' ma 'khor bar bskor to/ /rdzing bu re re las kyang 'bab chu dag rab tu 'bab pas de las dper na/ rol mo mang po byas pa lta bu'i sgra
175a5(dkon brtsegs): snyan pa dag byung bar gyur to/ /rdzing bu phra mo re re la yang lam stegs brgyad brgyad yod do/ /spos kyi 'od kyi rdzing chen po la ni/ lam stegs sum cu rtsa gnyis yod de/
175a6(dkon brtsegs): lam stegs thams cad kyang gser ba'i zhig las mngon par grub bo/ /rin po che'i shing ljon pa phreng du dkris pa/ rin po che'i dra bas g.yogs pa/ spos mchog dam
175a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dris grong khyer kun tu gang bar byed pa'i phyir rdzing de dag spos kyi 'od ldan zhes bya'o/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po de la btsun mo bzhi yod de/
175b1(dkon brtsegs): dpag med spos dang / legs pa'i dbyangs dang / dam pa sna tshogs kyi dbyangs dang / dang pa'i rgyal po lta bu'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dag yin no/ /btsun mo re re la yang bu gnyis gnyis
175b2(dkon brtsegs): yod de| gdon mi za ba'i mchog dang / bzang po'i mchog dang / klu'i mchog dang mchog gi dbyangs dang / dam pa'i dbyangs dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / mchog gi sprin
175b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / sprin gyi dbyangs zhes bya ba dag yin no/ /de la slas ni/ 'bum phrag drug yod de/ bu ni/ stong phrag bcu yod do/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang gi nang du 'khor rnams dang lhan cig
175b4(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' ba myong zhing rtse ba las/ nam mkha' las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku shin tu mdzes pa zhig mthong ngo / /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa des rgyal po de la 'di skad ces
175b5(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to/ /kye rgyal po chen po/ bla na med pa'i go cha bgos te bla na med pa'i theg pa la zhon nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol zhing / sems
175b6(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la shes rab kyi sman gtang bar bya'i/ /lha dang mi'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /go cha chen po 'dis ni/ bla na med pa'i bde ba yongs
175b7(dkon brtsegs): su sdud par byed do/ /bla na med pa'i theg pa 'dis kyang skye rgu rnams bla na med pa'i skyed mos tshal du rab tu 'dren par byed de/ gang gis der zhugs pa de dag ni/ phyir ldog par mi 'gyur
176a1(dkon brtsegs): ro| |lha dang mi thams cad kyi 'dod pa rnam pa sna tshogs ni/ mi rtag pa/ rnam par 'jig cing yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can/ mthu yun ring du mi
176a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa/ de ma thag tu 'gag pa'i chos can yin no/ /zhes gsungs so/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ de'i tshe rgyal po chen po don thams cad grub pas de skad ces bka' stsal
176a3(dkon brtsegs): pa thos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ su zhig go cha chen po de lta bu rab tu ston par bgyid/ go cha 'di ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu bgo bar bgyi'o//
176a4(dkon brtsegs): su zhig theg pa chen po de lta bu rab tu ston par bgyid/ theg pa chen po de ji lta ba bzhin du de la 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /su zhig lam chen po de lta bu rab tu ston par bgyid /
176a5(dkon brtsegs): lam chen po de ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu gzhol bar bgyi'o/ /zhes de skad ces gsol pa dang / de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dres rgyal po chen po de la 'di skad ces bka'
176a6(dkon brtsegs): stsal to| |kye rgyal po chen po/ 'di ltar shes par gyis shig /de bzhin gshegs pa tsan+dan spos kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba yod kyi/ rgyal po de'i thad du song zhig dang / rgyal
176a7(dkon brtsegs): po chen po la ji ltar go cha chen po bgo ba dang / theg pa chen po la zhon pa dang / lam chen po la gzhol bar bya ba'i chos de yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas
176b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa des de skad ces bka' stsal nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ de'i tshe rgyal po chen po don thams cad grub pa dngos po de lta bu mthong ba
176b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / ba spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas ngo mtshar gyi bsam pa dang / 'jigs pa'i sems skyes pas lha dang mi'i 'dod pa'i bde ba sna tshogs la ma mos shing 'dus byas thams
176b3(dkon brtsegs): cad la yongs su skyo bar gyur nas go cha chen po dang / theg pa chen po dang / lam chen po yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir rgyal bu brgyad dang / btsun mo bzhi dang / bu gzhan rnams
176b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / slas dang / g.yog 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa tsan+dan spos kyi 'od zer ga la ba de logs su dong ngo / /der phyin pa dang / 'khor dang bcas te
176b5(dkon brtsegs): g us pas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos gtugs te phyag byas nas rin po sna bdun me tog rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong du mas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
176b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mngon par gtor to/ /gzhan yang na bza' tshad med pa snyed de de bzhin gshegs pa dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams la phul
176b7(dkon brtsegs): lo| |gzhan yang bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis lo stong phrag bcu'i bar du bsnyen bkur dang / rim gro dang / mchod pa byas so/ /de'i 'og tu rgyal thabs spangs nas 'khor
177a1(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas te de bzhin gshegs pa tsan+dan spos kyi 'od zer gyi gsung rab la rab tu byung ngo / /blo gros mtha' yas/ de bzhin gshegs pa tsan+dan
177a2(dkon brtsegs): spos kyi 'od zer des dge slong don thams cad grub pa dang / 'khor rnams kyi mos pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas go cha'i bkod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i bkod pa gang
177a3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa rnam par phye ste de dag la yang dag par bstan to/ /de dag gis thos par gyur pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i sems bskyed nas chos zab mo'i phyir ji srid 'tsho'i
177a4(dkon brtsegs): bar du lus drang por bsrang ste nan tan gyis dub pa med par bsgoms pa dang / rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa la brten pas 'jig rten pa'i 'dod pa thams cad kyis ma
177a5(dkon brtsegs): g.yos pa'i yid la byed pa thob par gyur to/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa des dge slong don thams cad grub pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
177a6(dkon brtsegs): bu| deng khyod go cha chen po bgos nas theg pa chen po la zhon te lam la yang dag par gzhol bar byed na/ lam 'di'i dbang gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
177a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes mngon par 'grub par 'gyur gyi/ khyod kyis tshul bzhin du nan tan brtson 'grus kyis bsgom par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa
177b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge slong don thams cad grub pa des de bzhin gshegs pa tsan+dan spos kyi 'od zer la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni/ da ltar go cha
177b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bgyi ba'i chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /go cha bgo bar bgyid pa yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / go cha bgos nas bgod par bgyid pa'i phyogs kyang yang
177b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rjes su ma mthong / go cha bgos pa'i gnas kyang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni/ theg pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyang
177b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / theg pa chen po la bzhon par bgyid pa yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / theg pas bgrod par bgyi ba'i chos kyang yang dag par rjes su ma
177b5(dkon brtsegs): mthong / theg pa chen po la 'tshal ba'i gnas kyang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni/ lam zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyang yang dag
177b6(dkon brtsegs): par rjes su ma mthong / lam 'di'i dbang gis gzhol bar gyur pa dang / gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhol bar bgyi ba yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / lam
177b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi bgrod par bgyi ba'i phyogs kyang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / lam gyi gnas kyang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni/ bla
178a1(dkon brtsegs): nam mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la thag ring ba zhes bgyi pa'am/ thag nye ba zhes bgyi ba'am/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa
178a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / da ltar byung ba zhes bgyi ba yang yang dag par mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so/ /bdag de ltar rnam par blta ba na chos cung zad tsam
178a3(dkon brtsegs): yang rnyed par bgyi ba'am/ mngon du bgyi ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so/ /bdag la ni/ mngon du bgyi ba ci yang ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i
178a4(dkon brtsegs): slad du bdag la go cha chen po bgos nas theg pa chen po la zhon te lam la yang dag par gzhol bar byed dam zhes bka' stsal lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni/
178a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa lags pas/ ji ltar bdag cag la sogs pas chos la mngon par sgrub par bgyid pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyag
178a6(dkon brtsegs): gcig gi thugs su chud kyi/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni/ ma lags so/ /zhes gsol to/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ dge slong don thams cad grub
178a7(dkon brtsegs): pas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar de skad ces smras pa'i tshe 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /
178b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi bzod pa thob pa'i phyir thams cad phyir mi ldog pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tsan+dan spos kyi 'od zer gyis kyang khyed bskal pa grangs med pa lnga brgya
178b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan to/ /de dag gis lung bstan pa thob pas rab tu dga'
178b3(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur nas nam mkha' la ta la bdun tsam du 'phags te de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa/ grags pa chen po tshad med pas/ /ri rgyal bzhin
178b4(dkon brtsegs): du mngon par 'phags/ /bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pa yis/ /yon tan rnams ni ston par mdzad/ /sangs rgyas spyan ni gsal gzigs pas/ /nyi ma bzhin du snang bar
178b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad| |gtso bo 'khor 'dus bzhugs pa yi/ /zhabs la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan tshogs ni tshad med cing / /sangs rgyas mkhyen pa yongs rdzogs pas/ /bdag
178b6(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pas sangs rgyas kyi/ /bla med ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /bla med snang ba chan po yis/ /lha mi ma lus gsal mdzad pas/ /chos kyi gter ni rab phye nas/ /yon tan
178b7(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho dpag med ston/ /mkhyen pa rtag tu mi nyams shing / /yang dag sangs rgyas nyon mongs spangs/ /shes rab 'od dang brtson 'grus che/ /yon tan zab la bdag phyag 'tshal//
179a1(dkon brtsegs): klu chen bkod pa chen po ste/ /mtshan mang dag gis sku rab brgyan/ /bzhugs pa dag ni ri rab 'dra/ /'khor bzhugs dpe zla yong ma mchis/ /'jig
179a2(dkon brtsegs): rten 'dren pa rab mdzad pas/ /lha min 'khor ni zil gyis gnon/ /chos ston pa la bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /skyes mchog la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /bcom ldan thub pa chen po ni/ /
179a3(dkon brtsegs): yon tan dpag med mtsho lags pas/ /bdag cag chos mig rnam par phye/ /bdag cag go cha rab tu bskon/ /bdag cag dus ni thams cad du/ /theg pa che la rab 'tshal
179a4(dkon brtsegs): nas| |rtag tu lam mchog 'di dag la/ /gzhol bgyid gzhan du mi mchi 'o/ /thub pa chen po dpa' bo'i gtso/ /chos rnams thams cad thugs su chud/ /'jig rten dag na

179b3(dkon brtsegs): khams rab tu snang ba dang tha dad pa med par gyur to/ /nyan thos rnams kyi grangs kyang tshad med par gyur to/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo dang / rgyal bu dang / 'khor rnams kyang bskal pa
179b4(dkon brtsegs): grangs med pa lnga brgya 'das nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa'
179b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ go cha chen po bgos nas theg pa chen po la zhon te lam 'dis chos kyi sgron ma chen po bzung nas chos kyi snang ba chen po byed pa dang / chos kyi
179b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer chen po 'gyed pa dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng ba dang / chos kyi rnga chen po brdung ba dang / chos kyi sgra chen por zhugs nas chos chen po yongs su bsdus te rab tu
179b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhol bar byed pa dang / skyes bu dam pa'i rnam par rtsen pas rnam par rtse ba dang / chos kyi char gyis sems can rnams tshim par byas nas rab tu dga' bar byed pa dang / nan tan
180a1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar byed do/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa'
180a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams lam 'di la gnas pa'i tshe chos kyi snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur te/ snang ba 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos
180a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rang bzhin gyis gzod ma nyid nas stong pa dang / rang bzhin gyis mtshan ma med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis 'byung ba med par mthong bas gzugs la gzugs nyid
180a4(dkon brtsegs): du mi mthong ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la yang de bzhin no/ /rnam par shes pa la yang rnam par shes pa nyid du mi mthong bas
180a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa tha dad pa'i rkyen las byung ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid rang bzhin gyis gzod ma nyid nas stong pa dang / rang bzhin gyis mtshan ma med pa dang /
180a6(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin gyis 'byung ba med de/ rgyu rkyen mang por gtogs pa tsam yin par rab tu rtogs so/ /rgyu rkyen 'dus par mthong ba dang / rgyu rkyen nyid kyang stong pa dang / mtshan
