216b7(dkon brtsegs): ro| |chos kyi sgo 'di las kyang yang snang ba byung nas snang ba des kyang chos kyi sgo ji lta bu dang / spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'jug cing rjes su spyod par 'gyur bas/ tshul ji lta
217a1(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis chos kyi sgo rnams la so sor rab tu rtogs par byed de/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo nas shes rab bskyed pas kyang
217a2(dkon brtsegs): de kho na nyid kyi tshul gang yin pa dag rab tu rtogs par 'gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu'i phyir dang / /chos kyi sgo la so sor rab tu rtog par byed pa'i phyir dang / shes
217a3(dkon brtsegs): rab bskyed pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams chos kyi dbyings rtogs shing thabs mkhas pa la gnas par 'gyur bas/ chos kyi sgo'i snang ba thams cad rab tu bskyed
217a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ chos kyi sgo zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yi
217a5(dkon brtsegs): g e a zhes bya ba'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas ma rig pas mngon par 'dus byas pas 'du byed yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa yi ge
217a6(dkon brtsegs): a zhes bya ba sngon du 'gro bas ma rig pa nye bar zhi bar byed de/ gnas par bya ba ci yang med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mtshan
217a7(dkon brtsegs): ma med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ /yi ge i zhes bya ba'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang / las
217b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bya ba dang / las dang / 'bras bu dang / tshogs pa rnams 'grub par byed pa dang / las dang / 'bras bu dang / tshogs pa dang / rkyen rab tu rtogs par byed pa'i phyir
217b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams las med pa dang / 'bras bu med pa dang / tshogs pa med pa dang / rkyen med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ /'di
217b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar 'du byed rnams kyi phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas las rnam pa sna tshogs dang / las kyi bya ba sna tshogs dag las chos kyi ye shes kyi snang ba thams
217b4(dkon brtsegs): cad rab tu skyed par byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'du byed thams cad la thabs mkhas pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ /'di
217b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar yi ge d+ha zhes bya ba'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas yi ge ma zhes bya bas ming dang / tshig tu gdags pa'i grogs byas pas chos sna tshogs dang
217b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par ldan par 'gyur ba dang / yi ge d+ha dang mas grogs byas pas rab tu rtogs par byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dus
217b7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / grogs med pa dang / ming med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ /'di ltar phyag rgya dpag tu med pas/ chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pas rnam
218a1(dkon brtsegs): p ar rtog pa thams cad mi dmigs shing rnam par rtog pa yongs su spong bar byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rnam
218a2(dkon brtsegs): par mi rtog pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ /'di ltar mtha' med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas mtha' 'dus pa med cing mtha' yongs su
218a3(dkon brtsegs): zad par byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rtog pa med pa dang / dpyod pa med pa dang / tshig med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ /
218a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar rang bzhin sna tshogs med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pas rang bzhin gcig gis mngon par 'dus byas pas mtshan ma dang / rang bzhin
218a5(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rab tu sel bar byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rang bzhin sna tshogs kyi phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ /'di
218a6(dkon brtsegs): l tar 'dun pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pas 'dus byas kyi spyod pa mngon du byung ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dag
218a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa spangs nas rab tu dben par gyur pa dang / tshogs pa nyid yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dod pa zad par byed
218b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / tshogs pa med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya ste/ blo gros mtha' yas/ 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
218b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi phyag rgya'i sgos chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin te/ phyag rgya'i sgo 'dis chos thams cad la rab tu 'jug par byed do/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ gzhan yang
218b3(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa med pa'i sgo dang / rjes su mthun pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis khong du chud par byas nas rjes su 'jug
218b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ /de la thogs pa med pa'i sgo dang / tshogs pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba gang yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pas byang
218b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ /'di ltar rab tu dben pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas
218b6(dkon brtsegs): btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gnyis su med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ /'di ltar rab tu zhi ba'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad
218b7(dkon brtsegs): phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rab tu zhi ba'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ /'di ltar rnam par phye ba med pa'i phyag rgyas
219a1(dkon brtsegs): c hos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams g.yo ba med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par
219a2(dkon brtsegs): b ya'o| |'di ltar gnas pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyag
219a3(dkon brtsegs): rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ /ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
219a4(dkon brtsegs): thob pa med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ /mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
219a5(dkon brtsegs): po rnams thabs mkhas pa sgom pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ /smon pa med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa'
219a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams rab tu zhi ba'i smon lam gyi snang ba'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ /'dod chags med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa
219a7(dkon brtsegs): yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rnam par rtog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ /skye ba
219b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i shes pa dang / mthong ba skye ba dang / skye ba
219b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ /nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
219b3(dkon brtsegs): phung po yongs su spong ba'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ /mtshan ma zad par byed pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems
219b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rnams skye ba zad par byed pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems
219b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs pa la mkhas pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ /rjes su dran pa med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad
219b6(dkon brtsegs): p hyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag par rnam par rtog pa med cing mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par
219b7(dkon brtsegs): b ya'o| |ngo bo med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rang bzhin thams cad yongs su shes pa'i
220a1(dkon brtsegs): phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems
220a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu zhi ba dang / 'gog pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ /blo gros mtha'
220a3(dkon brtsegs): yas| 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad thogs pa med pa'i sgo dang / rjes su mthun pa'i sgo dang / rtag pa dang
220a4(dkon brtsegs): chad par lta ba thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i sgo dang / mtha' med pa'i sgo dang / sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' med pa'i sgo yin te/ 'di ltar yongs su skyo
220a5(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa'i phyir dang / 'gog par byed pa'i phyir dang / zhi bar byed pa'i phyir dang / bsil bar byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
220a6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i sgo 'di'i rjes su bslab par bya/ rjes su 'jug par bya/ legs par bsgom par bya'o/ /chos kyi sgo 'di rnams kyis ni/ chos kyi rgya
220a7(dkon brtsegs): mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad rab tu thob par byed do/ /ting nge 'dzin 'di dang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su mthun par gyur na/ chos rnams la
220b1(dkon brtsegs): thabs mkhas pa'i shes pa yongs su sdud par byed do/ /de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyag rgya'i sgo 'di legs par bsgoms
220b2(dkon brtsegs): nas chos kyi rgya mtsho'i ting 'dzin thams cad la gnas te chos thams cad la so sor rab tu rtog par byed na/ chos kyi snang ba chen po tshad med pa dpag tu med pa skye zhing rab tu
220b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i chu ni/ tshad med pas de'i tshad gang gis kyang dpag par mi nus so/ /de bzhin du chos
220b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang tshad med pas gang gis kyang de'i tshad dpag par mi nus so/ /gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu klung thams cad ni/ rgya mtsho chen por 'bab cing 'jug
220b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang chos kyi phyag rgyar 'jug par 'gyur bas de'i phyir rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ste/ chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas
220b6(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgyar zhugs par gyur na/ phyag rgya 'dis chos thams cad chos kyi phyag rgya dang mtshungs par mthong bas so/ /gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper
220b7(dkon brtsegs): na| klu chen po dang / klu'i 'khor lus chen po dang ldan pa rnams ni/ rgya mtsho dang ldan zhing rgya mtshor 'jug par nus pas rgya mtsho chen po de dag la gnas su byed do/ /
221a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang de bzhin du bskal pa brgya stong tshad med pa snyed du theg pa rnams legs par bsgoms pas
221a2(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i sgo 'dir 'jug par nus shing phyag rgya'i sgo 'di nyid la gnas par byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mngon du bya ba'i phyir dang / thams cad mkhyen pa
221a3(dkon brtsegs): legs par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos rnams kyi phyag rgya'i sgo de lta bu dag mngon par sgrub par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos kyi
221a4(dkon brtsegs): sgo 'di nan tan gyis sgrub par byed na/ chos thams cad kyi sgo la yang dag par slob par 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi sgo rnams chos kyi sgo 'dir 'du bar mthong ba'i phyir chos kyi snang ba rnams
221a5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed nas chos kyi rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur bas de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang 'di
221a6(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ rin po che chen po rnams 'du ba'i gnas su gyur pa yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin 'di yang de bzhin du chos thams cad dang / chos la thabs mkhas
221a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams 'du ba'i gnas su gyur pa yin no/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ sems can gang la la zhig sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa dang gzigs pa bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ting
221b1(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin 'di yongs su gsol bar gyur pa dang / yongs su tshol bar 'gyur ba dang / yongs su tshol bar byed pa de dag ni/ chos kyi rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs pa'i shes rab thams
221b2(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su tshol bar byed pa yin pas/ don de'i phyir ngas chos kyi phyag rgya 'di khyed la gtad pa yin gyi/ khyod kyis kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la yang dag pa'i chos
221b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig par 'gyur ba'i tshe chos kyi phyag rgya 'dis sems can rnams la yongs su gdab par bya'o/ /chos kyi phyag rgya 'dis gang la btab par gyur na/ de dag thams cad bla na
221b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par byed pas myur du byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bla na
221b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi gdung bsab pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la rjes su mthun par gnas pa dang / bla na med pa'i yongs su mya
221b6(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das pa chen pos yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / lha dang mi rnams kyang yang dag pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la gzung bar byed do/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ byang
221b7(dkon brtsegs): c hub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa de lta bu yongs su spyad par 'dod pa des chos zab mo 'di la nan tan gyis bslab par bya zhing
222a1(dkon brtsegs): pag yod pa dang ldan par bya'o/ /gzhan yang blo gros mtha' yas/ ngas mngon par dran te/ sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches
222a2(dkon brtsegs): grangs med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/
222a3(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi 'od las yang dag par 'das pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba
222a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du byung ste/ bskal pa'i ming ni/ dge ba la gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams ni/ yid dga' bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ /bskal pa de'i sems can
222a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams tshe ring zhing tshe'i tshad med pa dang / rab tu bde zhing 'byor pa dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i chos la rab tu gnas pas de'i phyir bskal pa de'i ming dge ba la gnas
222a6(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yangs shing rgya che ba dang / shin tu mdzes pas mthong ba rnams yid bde zhing dga' bar byed pa dang / spos kyi ngad dang ldan pas
222a7(dkon brtsegs): kun tu khyab par byed pas de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de yid dga' bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ /de'i tshe gling bzhi las gling gsum gyi tshad mnyam ste/ dpag tshad
222b1(dkon brtsegs): brgyad khri brgyad khri yod do/ /gling re re na yang grong khyer nyi khri nyi khri yod de/ grong khyer re re'i tshad kyang dpag tshad bcu bcu yod de/ /dzam+bu'i gling gi tshad ni/ dpag tshad bye ba yod
222b2(dkon brtsegs): do| |de na grong khyer brgyad khri yod de/ grong khyer re re'i tshad kyang dpag tshad nyi shu nyi shu yod do/ /de dag kyang gzhal med khang brtsegs ma dang ra bas 'khor bar bskor ba/ gos sna tshogs
222b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dang / ro sna tshogs 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi shing ljon pa dang / rin po che'i shing ta la dag gis rab tu brgyan pa/ yul bde
222b4(dkon brtsegs): zhing mis rab tu gang bar gyur to/ /de nas grong khyer mchog tu che ba dpag tshad brgyas 'khor ba yod de/ de yang skyes mos tshal nyi khris 'khor bar bskor ba/ skyed mos tshal de
222b5(dkon brtsegs): kun du yang 'bab chu dag rab tu 'bab cing me tog dang / 'bras bu dag rab tu rgyas pa/ spos mchog dam pa'i ngad ldang bas yid dga' bar byed pa/ bya dang / ri dwags rnams
222b6(dkon brtsegs): sgra snyan pa 'byin pas rab tu gang bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de skyed mos tshal de gcig tu zhugs nas 'khor rnams la chos bstan par gyur to/ /blo gros
222b7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi 'od las yang dag par 'das pa'i rgyal po'i sku tshe'i tshad ni/ bskal pa chung du bcu thub par gyur to/ /yongs su mya ngan
223a1(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang dag pa'i chos ni/ bskal pa chung du gcig gi bar du 'jig rten du gnas par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa des
223a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'dus pa lan bzhir chos bstan te/ 'khor 'dus pa re re la yang nyan thos slob pa'i sa la gnas pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag lnga lnga yod do/ /dgra bcom pa dang /
223a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni/ bye ba khrag khrig phrag lnga bcu lnga bcu yod do/ /de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de la byang chub sems dpa' gnyis yod do/ /gcig
223a4(dkon brtsegs): gi ming ni/ dpa' bo'i sde zhes bya'o/ /gcig gi ming ni/ dpa' bo'i stobs zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyang rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing mi skye ba'i chos
223a5(dkon brtsegs): la bzod pa thob pa yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos ji lta bu zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
223a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams kyi chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par 'gyur lags/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa des tshig gi rnam grangs
223a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /'di yang dag par bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /byang chub
223b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de gnyis kyis ni/ chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par gyur to/ /chos kyi rgya mtsho'i
223b2(dkon brtsegs): phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon du gyur pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rdzu 'phrul chen po bstan pa dang / 'od zer chen po
223b3(dkon brtsegs): bkye ba dang / tshangs pa'i sgra shin tu gya nom pa bsgrags nas sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i chos bstan cing yongs su smin par byas pas srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad bla
223b4(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa des 'di skad du/ khyed bskal pa brgya 'das pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag
223b5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bskal pa re re la yang de bzhin gshegs pa lnga brgya la mchod pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / de
223b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis dus bar mar gsungs pa'i chos yang dag pa gang yin pa dang / dus tha mar gsungs pa'i chos yang dag pa gang yin pa de dag kyang ma
223b7(dkon brtsegs): lus par yongs su bzung nas sems can rnams la phan pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa re rer yang sems rtse gcig tu gyur cing rnam par g.yeng ba med pas
224a1(dkon brtsegs): skye ba thams cad du yang rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /skye ba thams cad du yang ting nge 'dzin las ldog par mi 'gyur zhing rdzu 'phrul gyi chos ston
224a2(dkon brtsegs): pas sems can mang po rnams yongs su bzla bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa brgya 'das nas gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba la mchod
224a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rim gro byas pas ting nge 'dzin dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par thar pa tshad med pa rnams la rnam par rtsen par 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan to/ /byang chub
224a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dang phrad par gyur pa'i tshe gcig gi ming ni/ mya ngan med pa zhes bya'o/ /gcig gi ming ni/ rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ste/ de
224a5(dkon brtsegs): b zhin gshegs pa de'i rjes su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can tshad med grangs med pa rnams btul te sheg pa gsum po dag la rab tu bkod pas de'i tshe de
224a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa des kyang 'di skad du/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu mya ngan med pa 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
224a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa dpag tu med pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das
224b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'og tu rab tu gnas pa 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer khyad par du
224b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku tshe'i tshad kyang bskal pa re re thub par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang yon tan tshad med pa
224b3(dkon brtsegs): bsags pa las mngon par grub pa yin no/ /zhes lung bstan to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lung bstan pa thob pas rim gyis
224b4(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
224b5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par 'dod pas rab tu dga' ba dang / brtson 'grus chen po bskyed nas lus dang srog la phangs pa med pa dang / bag
224b6(dkon brtsegs): yod pas mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don gyi blo gros zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur
224b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de 'dug pa'i stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos
225a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi ye shes la thabs mkhas pa thob par bgyi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa thob par bgyi ba'i slad du chos
225a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag par gsungs pa ni/ ngo mtshar che lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting
225a3(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin rnams thob par gyur na/ gdon mi 'tshal bar chos rnams kyi tshul la thabs mkhas pa thob nas myur du byang chub kyi snying por mchi bar 'gyur bas/ yon tan
225a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi rgya mtsho dpag tu ma mchis pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar bgyid pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams mthong zhing
225a5(dkon brtsegs): nan tan gyis chos yang dag par mngon par sgrub pa dang / dge 'dun dang spyod pa mtshungs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa chen po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba
225a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
225a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po don gyi blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du don gyi blo gros/ byang chub sems
225b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par gyur na/ yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa tshad med pa rnams rab tu thob
225b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ /gal te chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas par gyur na/ chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rnams la thabs mkhas pas gdon
225b3(dkon brtsegs): mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /don gyi blo gros/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab rin po che sna
225b4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs las mngon par grub pas/ rgya mtsho chen po las dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong gis gyen du 'phags shing mchog tu gsal bar gnas so/ /byang chub sems
225b5(dkon brtsegs): d pa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin 'dis legs par gzhol bar byed pa'i phyir chos kyi gter gyi rgya mtsho chen po thams cad las mngon par
225b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phags nas lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad zil gyis gnon cing bla na med pa'i gnas pas mchog tu gsal bar gnas so/ /gzhan yang 'di lta
225b7(dkon brtsegs): ste/ dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ skar ma'i tshogs mang pos yongs su bskor ba yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang de bzhin
226a1(dkon brtsegs): du lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad du rab tu gsal bar gnas so/ /don gyi blo gros/ khyod kyis
226a2(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di thos par gyur na/ 'di la su yang mi dga' zhing mos pa mi skye ba'am/ brtson 'grus mi bskyed pa'am/ bag yod pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ba gang
226a3(dkon brtsegs): yang med par blta bar bya ste/ sems can bsod nams chung zhing dman pa la mos pa ni/ ma gtogs so/ /sems can gang shes rab chen po dang ldan pa dag
226a4(dkon brtsegs): gis ni| chos rgya chen po 'di mngon par sgrub par byed la/ chos rgya chen po mngon par sgrub pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i skyes bu dam
226a5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur te/ ngas ji skad du gang gis chos kyi nor rgya chen po 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni/ lha dang mi rnams kyis
226a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su srung zhing rim gro byed pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis rjes su dgongs par 'gyur
226a7(dkon brtsegs): ro| |zhes bstan pa lta bu'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
226b1(dkon brtsegs): to| |blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nan tan gyis sgrub cing slob par byed pa de dag ni/ sems can
226b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la phan par byed cing the tshom thams cad rab tu sel ba dang / mdud pa thams cad rab tu dgrol ba dang / bag chags rnams spong ba dang / bag la nyal ba rnams
226b3(dkon brtsegs): gcod pa dang / sred pa'i dga' ba rnams las yang dag par 'das pa dang / sred pa'i rgya mtsho las yang dag par brgal ba dang / mun nag rnams gtan du bsal
226b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / skrag cing 'jigs pa rnams rab tu spong ba dang / thabs mkhas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems rab tu shes par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan
226b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'od zer chen po bkye bas/ 'od zer des 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa gsal bar mdzad cing / nyi ma dang zla ba'i
226b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan to/ /'od zer bkye nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
226b7(dkon brtsegs): to| |blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la nan tan gyis sgrub par byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin du rdzu
227a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul chen po rab tu ston cing 'od zer chen po 'gyed pa dang / seng+ge'i sgra chen po bsgrags nas chos 'di yang dag par ston par byed pas khams
227a2(dkon brtsegs): gsum las yang dag par 'das shing snang ba chen po byed par 'gyur te/ deng nga ji lta ba bzhin pas bye brag tu gyur pa ci yang med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
227a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs
227a4(dkon brtsegs): nas slad ma'i dus kyi tshe sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos pa tsam gyis kyang yon tan dpag tu ma mchis par 'thob par 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol/ de
227a5(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyis rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir yang 'od zer chen po rab tu bkye'o/ /gzhan yang phyag sor gcig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen
227a6(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams rab tu g.yo par mdzad pas sems can rnams bde ba chen po thob par gyur to/ /de'i tshe 'khor der 'dus pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
227a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis lha'i me tog dam pa dang / lha'i gos dam pa
227b1(dkon brtsegs): dag gis mngon par gtor nas dus gcig tu lha'i rol mo rnams byas so/ /lha tshad med pa rnams kyis kyang lha'i gos rgyang nas mngon par gtor nas nam mkha' kun tu gang bar
227b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur te skad mthun par 'di skad du/ kye ma sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /gang gis chos zab mo 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni/ sems
227b3(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyis gus par mchod cing phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
227b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po blo gros mtha' yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang bsod nams chung ba'i sems can de dag gis ni/ go cha bkod pa
227b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi bkod pa 'di thos par mi 'gyur gyi/ sems can gang thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa dang / tshogs chen po yongs su sdud pa gang yin pa de dag gis ma 'ongs
227b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus na chos 'di thos par 'gyur ro/ /chos 'di la gang gis nan tan du sgrub par byed pa de dag ni/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su gzung
227b7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro/ /blo gros mtha' yas/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jigs pa chen po byung ba'i tshe nga'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la sogs pa la yongs su gtad do/ /ngas bskal
228a1(dkon brtsegs): pa bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa nas bla na med pa'i chos kyi gter rab tu bsags pas yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang / dpag tu med pa'i
228a2(dkon brtsegs): bde ba thob pa gang yin pa de dag khyod kyis kyang thob par 'gyur gyi/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad khyod kyis rab tu spangs te/ yon tan gyi rgya mtsho dpag tu med
228a3(dkon brtsegs): pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas byang
228a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga brgya dang / khyim bdag ma smad pa dang / tshong dpon bzang skyong la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi
228a5(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rnams mthu ci mchis pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub chen po'i chos
228a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bzung nas slad ma'i dus kyi tshe sems can rnams la phan gdags par bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
228a7(dkon brtsegs): ' dug pa'i stan las langs te me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor nas lus kyi gos mchog dam pa phud de mchod pa byas
228b1(dkon brtsegs): nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can rnams byang chub kyi
228b2(dkon brtsegs): phyogs kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub par 'gyur ba dang / slad ma'i dus kyi
228b3(dkon brtsegs): tshe sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar smon lam 'debs lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan
228b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rab tu dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad kun la ni/ /phan pa chen po bya
228b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir/ /nga yi byang chub chos bzung nas/ /chos rgyal seng+ge'i sgra sgrog cing / /ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe/ /gang zhig chos ni yongs tshol pa/ /rgya chen chos 'di thos gyur na/ /thams cad
228b6(dkon brtsegs): bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /ngas ni ji skad bstan pa bzhin/ /gang gis theg pa 'di mthong zhing / /mdo sde'i chos 'di thos gyur na/ /ji ltar mos pa'i bde ba 'thob/ /blo dang ldan pa gang
228b7(dkon brtsegs): zhig gis/ /thabs mkhas dag ni rab bsgoms te/ /chos mchog 'di ni thos gyur na/ /lus dang sems ni rab bder 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'khor 'dir 'dus gyur pa/ /nga yis mngon
229a1(dkon brtsegs): sum bshad mthong ngam/ /chos 'di thos par gyur nas ni/ /rab tu dga' ba gang bskyed pa/ /ma 'ongs tha ma'i dus kyi tshe/ /khyod kyis bsod nams tshad
229a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i/ /phung po dag ni rab bskyed cing / /'khor ba mtha' med sgrol bar 'gyur/ /ma 'ongs tha ma'i dus kyi tshe/ /chos rjes rab tu gsungs pa'i tshe/ /chos 'di gang zhig
229a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin byed pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bzung bar 'gyur/ /ma 'ongs tha ma'i dus kyi tshe/ /nga yi byang chub chos 'dzin pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas tshad med pa'i/ /tha ma dus kyi chos
229a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos 'di bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa snyed mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /sems can tshad med pa snyed
229a5(dkon brtsegs): ni| dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas dang /
229a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
229a7(dkon brtsegs): pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsigs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ go cha'i bkod pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/
229b1(dkon brtsegs): le'u bdun pa rdzogs so// //lo ts+tsha ba 'gos chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya d+harma d+hA tu pra kr-i ti a sa ma b+he
229b2(dkon brtsegs): da ni ra de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med par bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
229b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yong na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
229b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' ra ba na dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs tha dad pas nas 'dus pa khri nyis stong dang / lha'i bu thams
229b5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sum khri nyis stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
229b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / lha'i bu rin chen mchog ces bya ba yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas lha'i bu rin chen mchog 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis
229b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la chos ston par skul bar mdzad de/ bskul nas kyang bshad la/ ci nas kyang bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa bkong par 'gyur ba dang / bdud sdig can
230a1(dkon brtsegs): yi chad par 'gyur pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal can thams cad nga rgyal med cing
230a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa brda sprod par 'gyur ba dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dag 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / 'bras bu thob pa dag kyang khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas dang /
230a3(dkon brtsegs): chos dang / dge 'dun gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir skye bo mang po dag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa grangs med par
230a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di yang yun ring du gnas pa dang / rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs sam yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/
230a5(dkon brtsegs): chos bstan pa de gang dag gis thos par gyur pa de dag theg pa gang la mos pas myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan na ci ma rung snyam mo/ /de
230a6(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu rin chen mchog gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/
230a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'di khyod las chos nyan pa thos par 'dod kyi/ 'khor 'di dag la gtam gyi rgyud 'ga' zhig la khyod spobs par gyis shig /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol/
230b1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci las brtsams te spobs par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las rtsoms la khyod spobs
230b2(dkon brtsegs): par gyis shig / 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang
230b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin brjod pa'am mnyan par cung zad kyang rngo mi thogs lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las brtsams te bstan par bgyi lags/ bcom
230b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ chos bstan pa 'di thos na/ gang zag mngon pa'i nga rgyal can dag ni/ skrag par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom
230b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ gang dag skrag par 'gyur ba de dag kyar chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can lags na/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni/ skrag par mi lags so/ /de nas tshe dang
230b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ gal te chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin na/ chos kyi dbyings kyi
230b7(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin la ni/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba yang med la/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba yang med na/ sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba ci las
231a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byis pa so so'i skye bo 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i phyin ci log gis bslad cing ngar
231a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pa rnams la ni/ bdag dang gzhan gyi 'du shes 'byung ngo / /bdag dang gzhan gyi 'du shes pa la gnas pa de dag la ni/ dge ba dang /
231a3(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba dag 'byung ste/ sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos de dag gis dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba dag mngon par
231a4(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed cing de dag la rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / ngo bo nyid de'i rnam par smin pa nyid mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de dag gis ji tsam du srid pa'i
231a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar skye ba yongs su bzung ba de tsam du kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ kun nas nyon mongs pa de yang chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin nyid yin
231a6(dkon brtsegs): pas kun nas nyon mongs pa nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de nyid rnam par byang ba zhes bya ste/ don dam par ni/ de la kun nas nyon mongs
231a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'am| rnam par byang ba'am/ gang kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba ci yang med do/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad
231b1(dkon brtsegs): pa na/ dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan par shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
231b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ khyod kyis bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol te/
231b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal/ chos kyi dbyings ni/ khyod las phyad par 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin sngon bcings par gyur
231b4(dkon brtsegs): la| da grol ba zhig yin snyam mam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni/ sngon bcings par gyur pa yang ma yin la/ da grol bar yang ma yin no/ /smras pa/
231b5(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'o na dge slong de dag gi sems ci zhig las rnam par grol/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos mang po btul te/ de dag gi
231b6(dkon brtsegs): sems ni/ len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos yin
231b7(dkon brtsegs): nam| smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de de bzhin te/ kho bo ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos yin no/ /smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci khyod kyi sems len pa med par zag pa
232a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams las rnam par grol lam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ rnam par grol lo/ /smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci khyod kyi sems 'das la rnam par
232a2(dkon brtsegs): grol lam/ 'on te ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par grol/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems 'das pa ni/ zad pa'i mtshan nyid yin la/ sems ma 'ongs pa ni/ ma
232a3(dkon brtsegs): thob pa'i mtshan nyid yin/ sems da ltar byung ba ni/ mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid yin na/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ khyod kyi sems rnam par grol ba de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan
232a4(dkon brtsegs): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ sems 'das pa yang rnam par grol ba ma yin la/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun
232a5(dkon brtsegs): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'o na khyod kyi sems rnam par grol ba de gang yin/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ kun rdzob rnam par gzhag pas sems rnam par grol bar bstan par zad kyi/ don
232a6(dkon brtsegs): dam par ni/ 'di la gang bcings pa'am grol ba'i sems dmigs su med do/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ khyod chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la kun
232a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzob dang / don dam pa yod par 'dod dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la ni/ kun rdzob dang / don dam pa dmigs su med do/ /'jam dpal gyis
232b1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa| btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'o na ji ltar kun rdzob rnam par bzhag pas sems rnam par grol bar ston/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ nam yang sems rnam par grol ba ci yang med dam/
232b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gal te sems shig nang ngam/ phyi rol lam/ gnyi ga'i bar na dmigs su yod na ni/ sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba zhig
232b3(dkon brtsegs): na| btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems ni/ nang ngam/ phyi rol lam/ gnyi ga med par yang dmigs su med pas de la bcings pa'am/ rnam par grol ba ci yang med do/ /de nas 'khor de
232b4(dkon brtsegs): las dge slong nyis brgyas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos pa dang stan las langs te dong nas tshig 'di skad ces smras te/ gal te 'di la su la yang rnam par grol ba
232b5(dkon brtsegs): med cing su yang rnam par mi grol na/ 'u bu cag gi rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po la don ci zhig yod/ gal te nges par 'byung ba ci yang med na/ lam
232b6(dkon brtsegs): sgom pa la don ci zhig yod ces dge slong de dag smod cing yi chad nas 'khor de nas dong ngo / /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag 'dul ba'i dbang rig nas
232b7(dkon brtsegs): lam gang nas dge slong de dag dong pa'i lam de'i mdun du sprul pa'i dge slong zhig sprul to/ /de nas dge slong de dag sprul pa'i dge slong de ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas sprul pa'i
233a1(dkon brtsegs): dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa/ khyod ga las 'ongs/ de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
233a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa dag /kho bo ni/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos bstan pa la ma bzhugs/ ma shes/ ma mos/ yid ma ches nas kho bo 'khor de nas dong ngo / /de nas dge slong nyis
233a3(dkon brtsegs): brgya po de dag gis kyang 'di skad ces smras so/ /kho bo cag kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos bstan pa la ma zhugs/ ma shes/ ma mos/ yid ma ches nas kho bo cag
233a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor de nas dong ngo / /de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des dge slong nyis brgya po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos
233a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa la mi mthun pa ci zhig thos nas khyed cag 'khor de nas dong / de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni/ 'di la su la yang thob pa med/
233a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rtogs pa med/ rnam par grol ba med par ston pas kho bo cag 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te 'di la su la yang thob pa med/ mngon par rtogs pa med/ rnam par
233a7(dkon brtsegs): grol ba med na/ 'u bu cag gi rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po la don ci yod/ 'u bu cag gi tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa la don ci yod/ gal te 'di
233b1(dkon brtsegs): la nges par 'byung ba ci yang med na/ lam sgom pa la don ci yod snyam du bsam nas kho bo cag 'khor de nas dong ngo / /de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
233b2(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa dag /ci khyed cag ma mos nas dong bar zad dam/ 'on te spangs shing mi snyan par brjod nas dong / /de dag gis smras so/ /kho bo cag ni/ ma mos nas dong bar zad kyi/ kho bo cag
233b3(dkon brtsegs): gis spangs pa yang med la mi snyan par brjod pa yang med do/ /de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des dge slong de dag la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin nas 'di skad ces kyang smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag /
233b4(dkon brtsegs): rtsod pa med pa ni/ dge sbyong gi chos kyi mchog yin pas mi snyan par brjod par mi bya/ brtsod par mi bya'o/ /re zhig je 'gro bar bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag/ ci sems 'di sngon po zhes bya
233b5(dkon brtsegs): ba zhig gam/ ser po zhes bya ba zhig gam/ dmar po zhes bya ba zhig gam/ dkar po zhes bya ba zhig gam/ btsod ka zhes bya ba zhig gam/ shel gyi kha dog lta bu zhes bya ba zhig
233b6(dkon brtsegs): gam| yang dag pa zhes bya ba zhig gam/ yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba zhig gam/ rtag pa zhes bya ba zhig gam/ mi rtag pa zhes bya ba zhig gam/ gzugs can zhes bya ba zhig
233b7(dkon brtsegs): gam| gzugs can ma yin pa zhes bya ba zhig gam zhes rtogs shig/ /de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ sems ni/ gzugs can ma yin pa/ bstan du med pa/ snang ba med pa
234a1(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa med pa/ gnas med pa/ rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'o/ /de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang
234a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dag / ci gzugs can ma yin pa/ bstan du med pa/ snang ba med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ gnas med pa/ rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i sems de nang na gnas so/ /zhes
234a3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'am/ phyi rol na gnas so/ /zhes bya ba'am/ gnyi ga'i bar na gnas so/ /zhes bya bar dmigs su yod snyam mam/ smras pa/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
234a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dag / gal te sems de gzugs can ma yin/ bstan du med pa/ snang ba med/ thogs pa med/ gnas med/ rnam par rig byed ma yin/ nang na yang med/ phyi rol na yang
234a5(dkon brtsegs): med/ gnyi ga med par yang dmigs su med na/ ci de la yang dag par yongs su grub pa yod snyam mam/ de dag gis smras pa/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag
234a6(dkon brtsegs): gang yang dag pa ma yin zhing yongs su grub pa ma yin pa de la ci rnams par grol ba yod snyam mam/ de dag gis smras pa/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/
234a7(dkon brtsegs): de las bsam nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad du/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la ni/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba yang med la/ rnam par byang bar
234b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba yang med do/ /zhes bstan to/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag /yang byis pa so so'i skye bo phyin ci log gis bslad pa rnams la ni/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzin pa
234b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ngo / /ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas te rtag tu yul rnams la spyod cing gnas pa de dag la ni/ dmigs pa las byung ba'i sems 'byung ste/ dmigs pa zad
234b3(dkon brtsegs): na zad par 'gyur la byung nas zhig cing zhu ste gnas pa med do/ /sems kyi dmigs pa gang gis rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur ba dang / lam
234b4(dkon brtsegs): sgom par byed pa'i sems de ni/ rang bzhin gyis med pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa dang / byung ba ma yin pa'o/ /med pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa dang / byung ba ma yin pa gang
234b5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de la ni/ skye ba yang med/ 'jig pa yang med/ gnas pa yang med do/ /gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa dang / gnas pa med pa de la ni/ bcings pa yang med/ rnam
234b6(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba yang med do/ /de la ni/ thob pa yang med/ mngon par rtogs pa yang med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag /de las bsam nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad du/ chos
234b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la ni/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba yang med/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba yang med do/ 'di la ni/ su la yang thob pa med/ mngon par rtogs pa yang
235a1(dkon brtsegs): med| rnam par grol ba yang med do/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong de dag len pa med par zag
235a2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de dag sems rnam par grol nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / rang rang gi bla gos 'jam dpal
235a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa la mngon par bkab nas tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras so/ /'jam dpal/ khyod kyis ni/ kho bo cag yongs su bskyabs so/ /'di ltar kho bo cag kyang dam
235a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos spong bar ma zhugs pas da phyin chad chos 'dul ba zab mo la 'jug pa las phyi rol tu gyur pa ma yin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis dge slong de dag la
235a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag gis ci zhig thob cing ci zhig mngon par rtogs na/ rang rang gi bla gos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mngon par bkab/
235a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ kho bo cag gis ni/ ci yang thob pa med cing mngon par rtogs pa med pas de'i phyir kho bo cag gis rang rang gi bla gos 'jam dpal
235a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa la mngon par bkab bo/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ gang gi tshe kho bo cag la thob pa'i 'du shes yod par gyur pa de'i tshe na/ kho bo cag stan las langs te 'khor
235b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas dong ngo / /gang gi tshe kho bo cag thob pa'i 'du shes de dang bral bar gyur pa'i tshe slar lhags so/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ khyed ci las bsam ste de skad smra/
235b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ thob pa zhes bya ba de ni/ g.yo ba yin no/ /de ni/ rlom sems yin te/ gang la g.yo ba yod pa dang / rlom sems yod pa de la ni/
235b3(dkon brtsegs): thob pa med cing mngon par rtogs pa med do/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ gang la thob pa med cing mngon par rtogs pa med pa de ni/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom
235b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /khyed cag sus btul/ de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ gang thob pa med pa dang / mngon par rtogs
235b5(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / gang skye ba med pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba med pa dang / gang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa dang / sems rnam par g.yeng ba med pa des rab tu btul
235b6(dkon brtsegs): to| |smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /ci khyed cag btul ba yin nam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la dris shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
235b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ dge slong 'di dag sus btul/ 'jam dpal gyis smras la/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ gang la phung po
236a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams med pa dang / khams rnams med pa dang / skye mched rnams med pa dang / gang so so'i skye bo ma yin pa dang / slob pa ma yin pa dang / mi slob
236a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin pa dang / nyan thos ma yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin pa dang / gang lus dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / ngag dang
236a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa ma yin pa dang / sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa dang / bral ba ma yin pa des btul to/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de ston pa su
236a4(dkon brtsegs): zhig / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa zhig sprul na/ de mtshungs par ldan pa yin snyam mam/
236a5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de ni/ chos gang dang yang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ chos
236a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de de bzhin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ dge slong 'di dag ni/ sprul pas btul
236a7(dkon brtsegs): ba yin te/ sprul pa'i 'dul ba ci 'dra bar nyan thos thams cad kyi 'dul ba yang de 'dra'o/ /btsun pa kun dga' bo/ gang dag de ltar btul ba de dag ni/ yang dag par btul ba
236b1(dkon brtsegs): yin no| |gang dag chos 'dul ba 'di la mos par mi byed pa de dag ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'jam dpal gzhon nur
236b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ ji ltar na/ dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ 'di la dge
236b3(dkon brtsegs): slong tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pas yongs su dag par rlom sems su byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam
236b4(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su dag pas yongs su dag par rlom sems su byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o/ /bdag
236b5(dkon brtsegs): gis thob bo/ /bdag gis mngon sum du byas so/ /snyam du sems shing rlom sems su byed pa dang / yongs su rtog par byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o/ /'jig
236b6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs la lta bas skrag cing bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam gyi ro myong bar byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid gang gis 'jig tshogs
236b7(dkon brtsegs): la lta ba spong ba'i stong pa nyid des bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam yang stong pa'i phyir te/ stong pa de lta bu la stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par mi 'jug pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du
237a1(dkon brtsegs): shes par bya'o/ /btsun pa kun dga' bo/ gzhan yang dge slong gang 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bgrod pa gcig pa'i
237a2(dkon brtsegs): lam gyi stong pa nyad de la stong pa nyid kyis mnyam par byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
237a3(dkon brtsegs): yin la/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba yang gzhan ma yin te/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba nyid stong pa nyid yin pa dang / stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la lam yang gzhan ma yin te/
237a4(dkon brtsegs): lam nyid stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa kun dga' bo/ gzhan yang dge slong gang ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred pas 'jigs shing ma rig pa las rnam par grol ba'i
237a5(dkon brtsegs): ro myong bar byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang la gnyis su 'du shes 'jug pa de ni/ rnam par grol ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa
237a6(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo / gzhan yang dge slong gang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyis skrag cing rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag gi ro myong bar byed pa dang / phyin
237a7(dkon brtsegs): ci log bzhis skrag cing 'du shes bzhi'i ro myong bar byed pa dang / sgrib pa lngas skrag cing dbang po lnga'i ro myong bar byed pa dang / skye mched drug gis skrag cing mngon par
237b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa drug gi ro myang bar byed pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i gnas bdun gyis skrag cing byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi ro myang bar byed pa dang / log pa nyid brgyad kyis skrag cing
237b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i lam brgyad pa'i ro myong bar byed pa dang / 'dus byas kyi dngos po dgus skrag cing mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ro myang bar byed pa dang / mi dge
