237b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ de dag thams cad ni/ g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / spros pa yin te/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ ji
237b5(dkon brtsegs): tsam du g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / spros pa dang / sems mtho ba dang / dma' ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / spong ba dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / rten pa dang / lhag par zhen
237b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sgro 'dogs pa yod pa de tsam du lhag par byed pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yin pa'i phyir te/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ de lta bu'i dge slong ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du
237b7(dkon brtsegs): shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ 'dus byas kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i stong pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i stong
238a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / stong pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid du mi 'jug pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
238a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ ji ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa
238a3(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo/ gang gi tshe dge slong nang nye bar zhi bas yul thams cad kyang nye bar zhi bar mthong zhing / mnyam pa zhes bya ba'am/ mi mnyam pa zhes bya ba'am/ rig pa zhes
238a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'am/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba'am/ dmigs su zhes bya ba'am/ mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'am/ 'dus byas zhes bya ba'am/ 'dus ma byas zhes bya bar rlom sems
238a5(dkon brtsegs): su mi byed/ rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed/ gnyis su 'byed par mi byed/ gcig tu sdud par mi byed/ len par mi byed/ 'dor bar mi byed/ 'phro bar mi
238a6(dkon brtsegs): byed| mngon par zhen par mi byed cing / chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong la/ mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa med
238a7(dkon brtsegs): par mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pas mnyam par bya ba'am/ mi mnyam par bya ba'i chos gang yang med de/ mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
238b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing rlom sems su mi byed/ rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed/ mngon par zhen par yang mi byed na/ thob pa'am/ mngon par rtogs pa'am/ mngon sum du bya bas
238b2(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems su byed pa lta ci smos te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /btsun pa kun dga' bo/ de ltar na/ dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med cing gnyen po med pa dang / phyogs med pa dang / rang
238b3(dkon brtsegs): gi phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs dang bral ba dang / tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa dang / tshor ba dang / tshor ba med pa thams cad dang / dmigs pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang /
238b4(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / 'ching ba med pa dang / nye bar len pa med pa dang / zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi pa yin te/ de ni/ ngar 'dzin pa dang /
238b5(dkon brtsegs): nga yir 'dzin pa dang bral bas chos gang la yang spang ba'am/ mngon par rtogs pa'am/ mngon sum du bya ba yod pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar zhugs
238b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dge slong ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no/ /des na/ nam mkha'i khams mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pas na/ chos gang la yang dge ba
238b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'am/ mi dge ba zhes bya ba'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa zhes bya ba'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'am/ zag pa med pa
239a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'am/ 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya ba'am/ 'dus byas zhes bya ba'am/ 'dus ma byas zhes bya bar sgro
239a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs par mi byed do/ /de ni/ sgro 'dogs pa med pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su mi byed/ rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed de/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
239a3(dkon brtsegs): ngo / /des na/ chos thams cad sgro btags pa med par mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam zhing nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa yin no/ /btsun pa kun dga' bo/ gang de
239a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar mos pa'i dge slong ni/ yang dag par shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ste/ de ltar na/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no/ /de la dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di
239a5(dkon brtsegs): skad du/ ji ltar na/ nam mkha' lag mthil la mi chags pa ltar dge sbyong gi chos kyang de bzhin no/ /zhes gsungs so/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong nyis brgya len
239a6(dkon brtsegs): pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de nas lha'i bu rin chen mchog gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/
239a7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod par byed pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems
239b1(dkon brtsegs): dpas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par 'phags pa'i sems/ nyon thos dang rang
239b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i sems de nang na gnas par yang mi mthong / phyi rol na yang ma yin/ gnyis ka med par yang ma yin/ phyi rol gyi yul la rgyu zhing
239b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas par yang mi mthong la dge ba'i rtsa ba gsag par bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir yang rgyu zhing thams cad
239b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de yang sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la rjod par byed la/ sems de yang yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par
239b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ dris na sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs shing / sems can thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs la/
239b6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid brda sprod par
239b7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de ni/ lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa yin no/ /lha'i bu/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa na gang gtong
240a1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa dang / gang gis gtong bar byed pa dang / gang la gtong bar byed pa dang / gang du gtong bar byed pa dang / gang du yongs su bsngo bar byed pa
240a2(dkon brtsegs): da dag shin tu gtong bas gtong bar byed cing rten par mi byed/ gnas par mi byed/ mngon par zhen par mi byed/ re bar mi byed/ dmigs par mi byed la/ yang dag
240a3(dkon brtsegs): par rjes su mi mthong ba sa dris na/ shin tu gtong ba nyid dang / shin tu mi dmigs pa nyid dang / shin tu stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag nyid gtong ba'i ngo bo nyid du
240a4(dkon brtsegs): rtogs shing / gtong ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid rtogs la/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs te/ chos
240a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs shing / sems can thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid brda sprod par
240a6(dkon brtsegs): byed do| |lha'i bu/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa sbyin pas yongs su dag pa yin no/ /lha'i bu/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems
240a7(dkon brtsegs): dpas lus nye bar zhi bas tshul khrims nye bar zhi bar rtogs te/ ngag nye bar zhi ba dang / sems nye bar zhi bas tshul khrims nye bar zhi bar rtogs shing / lus dang /
240b1(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang / sems nye bar zhi bas byang chub nye bar zhi bar rtogs la/ byang chub nye bar zhi bas sems can nye bar zhi bar rtogs te/ sems can nye bar zhi bas chos thams cad
240b2(dkon brtsegs): nye bar zhi bar rtogs shing / chos thams cad nye bar zhi bas yang dag pa'i mtha' nye bar zhi ba zhes bya bar rtogs la/ de yang dag pa'i mtha' nye bar zhi bas zhi ba dang / rab tu
240b3(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi bar gyur pas dris na/ chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba nyid du brda sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod
240b4(dkon brtsegs): pa tshul khrims kyis yongs su dag pa yin no/ /lha'i bu/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas shin tu zad pa'i chos nyid dang / shin tu skad cig pa'i chos nyid
240b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / shin tu ya ma brla'i chos nyid du rig nas sems can thams cad kyi nyes par byas pa yang bzod cing / gang gi tshe phyi nang gi sems kun nas mi slong bar bzod pa
240b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang gis khong khro bar 'gyur ba'i yid la byed pa'i phyi rol tu mi gtong zhing / sems can thams cad kyi nyes par spyad pa bzod pa dang / sems can de dag gi
240b7(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni/ bzod pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa dang / bzod pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa dang / byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin
241a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni| chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yin par rtogs shing chos thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs te/ dris na/ shin
241a2(dkon brtsegs): tu zad pa'i chos nyid dang / shin tu skad cig pa'i chos nyid dang / shin tu ya ma brla'i chos nyid du rtogs pas rgyu ba med pa nyid kyis bzod pa brda sprod par byed de/
241a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu| de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa bzod pas yongs su dag pa yin no/ /lha'i bu/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems
241a4(dkon brtsegs): d pas yid la byed pa thams cad kyis dben pa'i chos rtogs shing sgro 'dogs pa med la btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pas brtsam pa gang rtsom
241a5(dkon brtsegs): pa de dben pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ba dang / de nang dben pas phyi rol tu rgyu ba med par sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rgyu zhing / brtson
241a6(dkon brtsegs): 'grus dben pas sems can dben par rtogs la/ sems can dben pas byang chub dben par rtogs pa dang / byang chub dben pa'i chos thams cad dben par
241a7(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa dang / chos thams cad dben pas yang dag pa'i mtha' dben par rtogs pas dris na/ brtson 'grus de dag nyid kyi rang bzhin dben pa ji lta ba bzhin
241b1(dkon brtsegs): du dben par brda sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa brtson 'grus kyis yongs su dag pa yin no/ /lha'i bu/ gzhan yang
241b2(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad mnyam zhing bye brag med par gyur par bsam gtan byed de/ bsam gtan de las sems gnas par 'jog cing gnas da
241b3(dkon brtsegs): la yang rnam par shes pa gnas par mi byed pa dang / des rnam par shes pa mi gnas shing sems mnyam pa nyid kyis bsam gtan mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / bsam
241b4(dkon brtsegs): gtan mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / sems can thams
241b5(dkon brtsegs): cad mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rjes su rtogs pas de ltar chos thams cad mnyam pa zhes bya bar rig la dris na/ rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du mnyam
241b6(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du brda sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa bsam gtan gyis yongs su
241b7(dkon brtsegs): dag pa yin no/ /lha'i bu/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi mig gis rnam par sbyangs pa'i ye shes kyis chos thams cad mthong ste/ ji ltar chos
242a1(dkon brtsegs): g ang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar mthong zhing gang gi tshe chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de'i tshe ci yang
242a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin par 'gyur ro/ /de ci yang ma yin pa'i shes pa thob pas mi rgyu/ rab tu mi rgyu/ rnam par mi rgyu'o/ /des rgyu ba dang / rab tu rgyu ba dang / rnam par rgyu ba thams cad
242a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rgyun bcad pas mi 'khor ro/ /rnam par mi 'khor ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des gang gis 'khor bar 'gyur ba'i rab tu rgyu ba de 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa dang /
242a4(dkon brtsegs): chags pa dang / smon pa'i rgyun bcad pa'i phyir te/ de 'dod pa don du gnyer ba thams cad med par sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
242a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsdu ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi bcad pa'i phyir bsam bzhin du skye ba rnams
242a6(dkon brtsegs): su rgyu bar byed de/ de ni/ rgyu ba med pa nyid kyis rgyu bar byed cing / chos rnams kyi rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam par 'khrug par mi byed de/ de ni/
242a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i shes rab yin pas de shes rab kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub tu rab shes pa dang / byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyis sems can gyi rang bzhin dang / sems can gyi
242b1(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin gyis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs shing / chos thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin du rab tu shes te/ dris na/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin
242b2(dkon brtsegs): dbyer med pa de nyid brda sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa shes rab kyi mig gis yongs su dag pa yin no/ /lha'i
242b3(dkon brtsegs): bu| gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pas gnas pa na/ des sngon gyi mtha'i lus ni/ ma skyes par rab tu
242b4(dkon brtsegs): shes so/ /phyi ma'i mtha'i lus ni/ 'pho ba med par rab tu shes so/ /da ltar byung ba'i lus la ni/ rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / bong ba dang / mig yor gyi ngo bo nyid
242b5(dkon brtsegs): lta bur so sor rtog par byed de/ de de ltar lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pas lus kyi rang bzhin skye ba med par rig nas lus kyi rnam par rig pa dang ldan pa'i yid
242b6(dkon brtsegs): la byed pa kun nas slong bar mi byed do/ /yid la byed pa kun nas slong bar mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ lhag par byed pa la mi gnas pa yin te/ de lhag par byed pa dang
242b7(dkon brtsegs): bral zhing / rnam par shes pa mi gnas pas lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom yang chos gang la yang sgom par mi byed/ rnam par 'jig par
243a1(dkon brtsegs): mi byed do/ /des chos thams cad dngos po med par rig nas lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na sems gang gis de ltar lus la lus
243a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i sems de yang sgyu ma'i chos nyid dang / brag ca'i chos nyid lta bur rab tu shes so/ /de ltar rab tu shes pas bde ba'i tshor ba la yang rjes su
243a3(dkon brtsegs): chags pa med la/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la yang khong khro ba med cing / sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la yang rmongs pa med pas/ ma rig pa
243a4(dkon brtsegs): bag la nyal bar mi 'gyur te/ gang gi tshe tshor ba rnams kyis mi 'phrog pa de ni/ de'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no/ /de de
243a5(dkon brtsegs): l tar tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na chos thams cad la tshor ba'i rgyu ba dag gis sems mi rgyu bas de chos thams cad la sems mi gnas pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems
243a6(dkon brtsegs): spong bar mi byed/ 'dor bar mi byed/ yongs su gtong bar mi byed de/ de ni/ de'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no/ /de chos shes
243a7(dkon brtsegs): pa mngon sum du gyur pas chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pas chos nyid la 'jug par byed cing / lus dang / tshor
243b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sems dang / chos rnams la 'du shes dang / yid la byed pa dang / lta ba dang / kun nas dkris pa dag gis gnas par mi byed de/ de ni/ de'i chos la chos kyi rjes
243b2(dkon brtsegs): su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no/ /des chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma byung zhing dngos po med pa dang / nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid lta bur rtogs pas dris na/ dran pa
243b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa brda sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa dran pa nye bar
243b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhag pas yongs su dag pa yin no/ /lha'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa ni/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de la kun shes
243b5(dkon brtsegs): par byed/ rnam par rig par byed/ gnas par byed/ mi spong bar byed/ rnam par mi g.yeng bar byed/ mi brjed par byed pa dang / dang por dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi thog mar
243b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dang / ser sna'i sems la mi 'jug pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i rjes su 'jug pa dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi sems spong ba dang / tshul
243b7(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa med pa dang / sems can thams cad la gnod sems med cing rtsod pa med pa dang / lus dang ngag dang sems kyis rma mi 'byin pa dang / nyan
244a1(dkon brtsegs): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi brtson 'grus mi rtsom pa dang / theg pa chen po'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams yid la
244a2(dkon brtsegs): mi byed cing mi dran pa dang / bsam gtan dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la mi gnas par sgom pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad la mi rgyu ba dang / chos thams
244a3(dkon brtsegs): cad la 'phro bar mi byed pa dang / chos thams cad la rnam pa med par 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i rnam pa la 'jug pa dang / yul rnams la mi
244a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ba dang / 'phags pa'i skye bo rnams kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bo rnams dang ma 'dres pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las
244a5(dkon brtsegs): ma smad pa dang / bag yod pa lhur len cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su tshol ba dang / bstang mi dgos par dgos pa thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa
244a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spangs pas rnam par dag pa dang / tshul khrims la skyon med pa'i phyir yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / log par
244a7(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa rnams dang ma 'brel pa dang / nang shin tu dag pas tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / ngag gi las yongs su dag pas kha gsag med pa dang / rang gi rnyed
244b1(dkon brtsegs): pas chog shes pas tshol ba med pa dang / 'tsho ba ngan pa rnam par spangs pas thob kyis 'jal ba med pa dang / ngan don tsam gyis chog shes pas rnam par g.ye ba med pa
244b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / khams gsum la 'dun pa dang bral bas 'dod pa chung ba dang / sdig pa 'dod pa dang bral bas chog shes pa dang / chos thams cad dben par mos pas dben pa dang
244b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa spangs pas don nyung ba dang / spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcas pas spros pa med pa dang / 'dun pa dang / zhe sdang dang / 'jigs pa dang / gti
244b4(dkon brtsegs): mug dang bral bas 'gro ba med pa dang / nga rgyal nges par bcom pas chos la dga' ba dang / sems shin tu dul bas cang shes pa dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po kun tu
244b5(dkon brtsegs): srung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung pos sems gnas pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi phung pos sems rnam par grol ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs mi 'dor ba dang / byang
244b6(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi sems la dam bcas pa ma nyams pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti thams cad don du mi gnyer ba dang / sems can pha rol dag gi ngor byed pa med pa dang / gzhan
244b7(dkon brtsegs): kun tu bsrung ba'i phyir bdag rjes su srung ba dang / rang gi sems la nges par sems pas gzhan gyi 'khrul pa rnams mi tshol ba dang / tshul khrims legs par bsdams
245a1(dkon brtsegs): pas 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pas chos kyi bgo bsha' byed pa dang / sems can thams cad
245a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams rjes su srung ba dang / dang por dge ba'i chos thams cad la thog mar 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pas spyod pa tha dad pa med pa dang /
245a3(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pas rlom sems med pa dang / skye ba med par yang so sor rtog la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsam
245a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du skye ba yang yongs su 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad la gzod ma nas stong pa nyid du yang so sor rtog la lta ba thams cad gdul ba'i phyir sems can yongs
245a5(dkon brtsegs): su smin par yang byed pa dang / mtshan ma med pa yongs su 'dris par yang byed la mtshan ma la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la yang lta ba dang / smon pa'i shes pa yang
245a6(dkon brtsegs): med la| thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyir smon lam thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med par yang so sor rtog
245a7(dkon brtsegs): la dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya bas kyang ngoms mi myong ba dang / dngos po ni/ dngos po med par snang bas dngos po dang / dngos po med pa la rtog pa dang / lhag
245b1(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa dang bral ba'i phyir yid la byed pa med pa dang / sems can bdag med pa la sbyor bas bdag la bdag med pa dang / nyon mongs pa yongs su btang ba dang / sems
245b2(dkon brtsegs): can yongs su ma btang bas btang ba dang / ma btang ba dang / thabs dang shes rab bsgoms pas zhi zhing zhi la nye bar zhi ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad
245b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ma 'dres pas 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba dang / bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'das pas lam ma yin pa'i lam dang / byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang ma 'dres
245b4(dkon brtsegs): pas spyod pa ma yin pa spyod pa dang / chos thams cad la rtog pas gdeg pa med cing gzhag pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / gzhan la lhag par rlom sems su mi byed
245b5(dkon brtsegs): pas bdag mi sgrog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pas shes pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang ma 'gag par bzod
245b6(dkon brtsegs): pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ste/ lha'i bu/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no/ /lha'i bu/ mi skye ba dang / mi 'byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin
245b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi| skye ba'i 'khor ba yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /skyo zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba ni/
246a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par rig par bya ba la dga' zhing mchog tu dga' ba ni/ byang
246a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no/ /mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ skye bar mtshams sbyor ba'i shes pa ni/ byang chub sems
246a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i shes pa yin no/ /yongs su gcod pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyun chags pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no/ /dge
246a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba dang zhe 'gras pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ dge ba'i rtsa bas ngoms mi myong ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no/ /khams gsum du
246a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshams mi sbyor bar byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsam bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ byang chub
246a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i shes pa yin no/ /rang gi nyon mongs pa spong ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi /sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang pa'i phyir brtson pa ni/
246a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no/ /bdag gi phyir byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i phyir byed pa
246b1(dkon brtsegs): ni| byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no/ /yal bar 'dor ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can yongs su smin par bya bar sbyor ba ni/ byang chub sems
246b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i shes pa yin no/ /'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa zad par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ 'dod chags dang / zhe
246b3(dkon brtsegs): sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa yongs su shes pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no/ /'gog pa'i chos mngon sum du byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i
246b4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa ma yin gyi/ 'gog pa yongs su 'dris par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no/ /zag pa zad par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin
246b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi| dge ba'i rtsa bas zag pa dbri bar byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no/ /rnam par thar pa gsum mngon sum du byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma
246b6(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi| rnam par thar pa gsum la yongs su 'dris par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no/ /phung po lnga'i khur 'dor ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma
246b7(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi| sems can thams cad kyi khur 'dor bar byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no/ /dbang po drug 'gog par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin
247a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi| sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no/ /skye ba zad par byed pa
247a2(dkon brtsegs): ni| byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ skye ba'i mtshams sbyor bar byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par
247a3(dkon brtsegs): grol ba'i 'bras bu thob par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub kyi snying por rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bus sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar
247a4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no/ /yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa'i le'u bstan pa 'di bshad pa na 'khor de las srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag
247a5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal/ legs so/ /legs
247a6(dkon brtsegs): so| |khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa brda sprod pa de lags par smras so/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag shes pa brda sprod pa bstan pa 'di
247a7(dkon brtsegs): thos na mos par 'gyur zhing mi skrag mi dngas la dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de
247b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod par 'gyur ro/ /bam po gnyis pa ste/ tha ma/ de nas lha'i bu rin chen mchog gis 'jam
247b2(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal ci ci khyed shes pa brda sprod par byed dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gal te kho bos chos 'ga'
247b3(dkon brtsegs): zhig thob bam/ spangs par gyur na ni/ kho bos shes pa brda sprod par yang 'gyur ba zhig na/ lha'i bu/ kho bos ni/ chos 'ga' yang thob pa med cing spangs pa med pas ni/ kho
247b4(dkon brtsegs): bos ci zhig shes pa brda sprod par bya/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag la thob pa dang / mngon
247b5(dkon brtsegs): par rtogs pa med dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ thob pa'am mngon par rtogs pa'i phyir chos ston par mi mdzad do/ /
247b6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa| 'jam dpal/ 'o na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji ltar chos ston par mdzad/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
247b7(dkon brtsegs): ni| chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa nyid kyis chos ston par mdzad kyi/ skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / gdog pa med pa dang / gzhag pa med pa dang /
248a1(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / sems can dang bral ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang
248a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / 'khor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir chos ston par mi mdzad de/ lha'i bu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ de ltar chos ston par
248a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad do/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir chos ston par mi mdzad na/ 'o na gang
248a4(dkon brtsegs): gi don du sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ sangs rgyas ni/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rang bzhin gyis ngo bo nyid rtogs par bya ba'i
248a5(dkon brtsegs): don du 'byung ngo / /lha'i bu/ sangs rgyas ni/ ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i don du 'byung ngo / /lha'i bu/ sangs rgyas
248a6(dkon brtsegs): ni| 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid rtogs par bya ba'i don du 'byung ngo / /lha'i bu/ sangs rgyas ni/ phyin ci log gi rang bzhin
248a7(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i don du 'byung ngo / /lha'i bu/ sangs rgyas ni/ lta ba'i rnam pa rnam pa thams cad rtogs par bya ba'i don du 'byung ngo / /lha'i bu/ sangs rgyas ni/
248b1(dkon brtsegs): phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i don du 'byung ngo / /lha'i bu/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba zhes bya ba
248b2(dkon brtsegs): de ni| chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i tshig bla dwags yin te/ gang la chos gang yang skye ba med pa de la ni/ 'khor ba yang med la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang
248b3(dkon brtsegs): med do| |lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de ltar na/ sems can gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir go cha bgos pa de dag gi go cha ni/
248b4(dkon brtsegs): bgos pa med pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni/ phan pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ phan pa gang
248b5(dkon brtsegs): gis rab tu phye ba yin snyam mam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ phan pa ni/ mngon par 'du byed pas rab tu phye ba yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ khyod de bzhin
248b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la mngon par 'du mdzad pa yod par 'dod dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de ni/ ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' ba
248b7(dkon brtsegs): yin pas/ de ni/ 'dus ma byas pa brnyes pa dang / 'dus ma byas shing mngon par 'du mdzad pa ni/ mi mnga' ba yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ khyod kyis
249a1(dkon brtsegs): dam bcas pa de nyid kyis na mngon par 'dus ma byas pa la ni/ phan pa dang gnod pa dmigs su med do/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ chos
249a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di ni/ las dang po pa rnams kyi mdun du bshad par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thos nas skrag par 'gyur ba dang / skrag nas kyang phyir ldog par 'gyur du 'ong
249a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skrag pa dang / phyir ldog pa gang yin pa de ni/ phyir mi ldog pa nyid la yang dag
249a4(dkon brtsegs): par gnas pa yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod ci las bsam ste de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ las dang po pa'i byang chub sems
249a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sas skrag cing / ser sna dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / gnod sems dang / le lo dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang /
249a6(dkon brtsegs): 'chal ba'i shes rab ngag las phyir ldog pa de ni/ phyir mi ldog pa nyid la yang dag par gnas pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar gnas na yang dag par gnas
249a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin| smras pa/ lha'i bu/ mnyam par gnas shing mi mnyam par gnas pa ma yin na/ de'i phyir yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ las
249b1(dkon brtsegs): dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar gnas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang gi tshe las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid la mi gnas pa'i tshul
249b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa de lta bu ni/ las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' las dang po
249b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin| smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dang po nyid nas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med
249b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos la mos pa de'i phyir las dang po pa zhes bya'o/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' yun ring po nas spyad pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu/ byis pa so
249b5(dkon brtsegs): so'i skye bo thams cad ni/ yun ring po nas spyad pa yin te/ de dag gi 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon pa'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
249b6(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa srung ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags la spyod pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dod chags kyi spyad pa la spyod kyang 'dod
249b7(dkon brtsegs): chags kyi spyod pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni/ byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa srung ba yin no/ /zhe sdang la spyod pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir zhe sdang gi spyad pa la spyod
250a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang zhe sdang gi spyod pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa dang / gti mug la spyod pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gti mug gi spyad pa la spyod kyang gti
250a2(dkon brtsegs): mug gi spyod pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa dang / cha mnyam pa la spyod pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir cha mnyam pa'i spyad pa la spyod kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig
250a3(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas pa de lta bu ni/ byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa srung ba yin no/ /lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams
250a4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'jug kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid kyang rnam par 'khrug par mi byed na/ de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' spyad
250a5(dkon brtsegs): pa srung ba yin no/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
250a6(dkon brtsegs): chos gang yang 'jig par mi byed/ chags par yang mi byed la/ chos kyi dbyings ni/ rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa med cing / chags pa med par rtogs pa de lta bu ni/ byang
250a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa yin no/ /lha'i bu/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' ldog pa dang / 'jug par byed pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi
250b1(dkon brtsegs): ldog pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams su yang ldog la/ bsam gtan rnams la yang 'jug par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bu/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub
250b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ma rtogs pa rtogs shing mi rtsod pa lhur len pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des sems can gyi khams dang / chos kyi
250b3(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / bdag gi khams ma rtogs pa de mngon sum du gyur pas chos thams cad la yang phyir ldog pa med pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya ste/ de ni/ sangs
250b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing nem nur med la the tshom med cing som nyi dang bral ba'i phyir gzod ma nas dag cing dri ma med la nyon mongs pa med cing / shes
250b5(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi snang ba gsal bar gyur pas chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa de'i phyir phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya'o/ /smras pa/ 'jam
250b6(dkon brtsegs): dpal| ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas
250b7(dkon brtsegs): skye ba thams cad skye ba med par shes shing sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba yang rab tu shes la/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir skye ba thams cad du
251a1(dkon brtsegs): skye ba ston cing / len pa med par skye ba yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang / skye ba dang / tshe rabs thams cad du len pa dang bral bas 'chi ba
251a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / skye ba las yang dag par 'das pa dang / chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi 'da' zhing yang dag par mi 'da' ba dang / rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa'i don rtogs
251a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sems can thams cad dang lus mnyam pa dang / sems can thams cad dang sems mnyam pa dang / sems can thams cad dang dag mnyam pa dang / sems
251a4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad dang yul mnyam pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul la rab tu gnas pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi yul rtogs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis
251a5(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i bya ba shes pa dang / dus la lta ba dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug pa de ni/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa zhes bya ste/ lha'i
251a6(dkon brtsegs): bu| de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa yin no/ /de nas lha'i bu rin chen mchog gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
251a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho ba med cing thams cad du dpyas med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems
251b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams byed pa dang / nga rgyal gyis byas pa dag mi byed pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho ba med cing thams cad du dpyas med pa yin no//
251b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba de lta bu ni/ kha na ma tho ba med pa yin
251b3(dkon brtsegs): no| |gang yang ser sna dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni/ dpyas med pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / bslab pa dang / tshul khrims dang / yi dam
251b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang ldan pa de lta bu ni/ kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/ /gang yang 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni/ dpyas med pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe sems
251b5(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems med pa de lta bu ni/ kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/ /gang yang brnab sems dang / gnod sems kyi bag la nyal dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de
251b6(dkon brtsegs): lta bu ni| dpyas med pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus la yang dag par snang ba de lta bu ni/ kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/ /gang yang le lo
251b7(dkon brtsegs): dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni/ dpyas med pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de lta bu ni/ kha na ma tho ba med pa yin
252a1(dkon brtsegs): no| |gang yang bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i ro myang bar mi byed pa de lta bu ni/ dpyas med pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe shes rab kyi rtsa ba thos pa yongs su
252a2(dkon brtsegs): tshol ba la brtson pa de lta bu ni/ kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/ /gang yang 'chal ba'i shes rab dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni/ dpyas med pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe rma
252a3(dkon brtsegs): phyung yang rma mi 'byin pa de lta bu ni/ kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/ /gang yang rma phyung yang rma mi 'byin pa de lta bu ni/ dpyas med pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe ji lta ba bzhin du smra ba
252a4(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu ni/ kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/ /gang yang de bzhin du byed pa de lta bu ni/ dpyas pa med pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe nang nye bar zhi ba de lta bu ni/ kha na ma tho ba med pa yin
252a5(dkon brtsegs): no| |gang yang phyi rol gyi yul rnams kyis mi gos pa de lta bu ni/ dpyas med pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la bsam pa tha dad pa med pa de lta
252a6(dkon brtsegs): bu ni| kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/ /gang yang theg pa dman pa la 'dod pa med pa de lta bu ni/ dpyas med pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe bdud kyi las rnams rtogs pa de lta bu ni/
252a7(dkon brtsegs): kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/ /gang yang bdud kyi las rnams bzlog pa de lta bu ni/ dpyas med pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe 'jig rten na snang ba thob pa de lta bu ni/ kha na ma tho ba
252b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin no/ /gang yang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi gos pa de lta bu ni/ dpyas med pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe bya ba dang 'gal bar mi byed pa de lta bu ni/ kha na ma tho ba
252b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin no/ /gang yang bya ba ma yin par mi ltung ba de lta bu ni/ dpyas med pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / snyems pa thams cad dang bral ba de lta bu
252b3(dkon brtsegs): ni| kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/ /gang yang ye shes dang rnam par shes pa phun sum tshogs shing 'phags pa'i bde ba dang ldan pa de lta bu ni/ dpyas med pa yin no/ /gang gi
252b4(dkon brtsegs): tshe dam bcas pa brtan pa de lta bu ni/ kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/ /gang yang dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa de lta bu ni/ dpyas med pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe rten
252b5(dkon brtsegs): cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs dang mthun par byed pa de lta bu ni/ kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/ /gang yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams la mngon par zhen pa
252b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa de lta bu ni/ dpyas med pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe shes pa rab dang ye shes kyis chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par rab tu shes pa de lta bu ni/ kha na ma tho ba med
252b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ /gang yang thabs shes pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag sdud pa de lta bu ni/ dpyas med pa yin no/ /gang rtsom pa thams cad la snying rje chen pos 'jug
253a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de lta bu ni/ kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/ /gang yang chos thams cad la rnam par thar par gnas pa de lta bu ni/ dpyas med pa yin no/ /
253a2(dkon brtsegs): gang yang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa de lta bu ni/ kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/ /gang yang dmigs pa'i lta ba spang pa'i phyir chos ston pa de lta bu ni/ dpyas med pa
253a3(dkon brtsegs): yin no| |gang yang tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor zhing chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de lta bu ni/ kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/ /gang yang 'bras bu thob pa
253a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du byed pa de lta bu ni/ dpyas med pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe chos kyi dbyings stong pa zhes bya bar so sor rtog pa de lta bu ni/ kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/ /gang yang sems
253a5(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba de lta bu ni/ dpyas med pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe khams gsum dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni/ kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/ /gang yang
253a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la blta ba'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba de lta bu ni/ dpyas med pa yin no/ /lha'i bu/ gzhan yang ji tsam du tshig 'jug pa dang /
253a7(dkon brtsegs): tshig gis rlom sems su byed pa dang / tshig gis rtogs par byed pa dang / tshig la mngon par zhen par byed pa de tsam du skyon yin no/ /lha'i bu/ ji tsam du chos
253b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la bsnyad du med pa nyid dang / 'jug pa med pa nyid dang / rlom sems med pa nyid dang / rtog pa med pa nyid dang / 'phro ba med pa nyid dang / brjod du med pa nyid
253b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir gtan du yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba nyid yin pa de tsam du kha na ma tho ba med cing dpyas med pa yin no/ /lha'i bu/
253b3(dkon brtsegs): gang la kha na ma tho ba med cing / dpyas med pa de ni/ yi ge med pa yin no/ /gang la yi ge med pa de ni/ brjod du med pa yin te/ brjod du med pa'i don la ni/ kha na ma
253b4(dkon brtsegs): tho ba med cing dpyas med do/ /lha'i bu/ de lta bas na/ brjod du med pa'i don la rton pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ rang gi sems gtso bor byed pas kha na ma tho ba med cing
253b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa rnams kyis dpyas byar med pa yin no/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/
253b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / dpyas med pa de legs par smras so/ /'jam dpal/ gang
253b7(dkon brtsegs): g i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de ltar kha na ma tho ba med cing dpyas med par gyur pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
254a1(dkon brtsegs): chub tu lung bstan to/ /bstan pa 'di thos nas 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur nas
254a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag tu ming tha dad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag tu 'gyur ro/ /zhes bla na med pa
254a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /de nas 'khor de las lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ lha'i bu rin chen mchog 'di yun ji srid cig na
254a4(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni/ ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/ byang chub thob
254a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ming ni/ ji skad ces bya bar 'gyur snyam mo/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
254a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ lha'i bu rin chen mchog 'di yun ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di'i
254a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni/ ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/ byang chub thob pa'i ming ni/ ji skad ces bgyi bar 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
254b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ lha'i bu rin chen mchog 'di ni/ bskal pa 'bum 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa rin chen
254b2(dkon brtsegs): ' byung gnas zhes bya ba la shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba bkod pa zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
254b3(dkon brtsegs): rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen bkod pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga'
254b4(dkon brtsegs): bo| 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba bkod pa de yang 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyis kun tu gang ba dang / mi
254b5(dkon brtsegs): khom pa dang / ngan song thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ 'jig rten gyi khams de ni/ rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med cing / lag mthil
254b6(dkon brtsegs): ltar mnyam la/ rin po che sna gsum 'di lta ste/ bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyis spras shing blta na sdug la/ gser gyi dra bas kun nas bkab par 'gyur
254b7(dkon brtsegs): ro| |kun dga' bo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa ci 'dra ba de bzhin du mi de dag gi longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa yang de
255a1(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams der ni/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dag kyang yid la bsam pa tsam gyis 'byor par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi
255a2(dkon brtsegs): khams der ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag gi ming yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang chos kyi dga' ba sna tshogs dang / chos kyi rnam par
255a3(dkon brtsegs): grol ba sna tshogs dang / bsam gtan dang / ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa sna tshogs dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa sna tshogs dag gis
255a4(dkon brtsegs): dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur te/ chos kyi rab tu dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dag gis dga' bar 'gyur ba ma gtogs par tshor ba gzhan dag myong
255a5(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de dga' ba bkod pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad ni/ lo bye ba phrag drug cur 'gyur ro/ /
255a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cur 'gyur ro/ /de'i byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas
255a7(dkon brtsegs): pa ni| dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bkod pa de gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston par 'gyur ba de'i tshe steng gi bar snang
255b1(dkon brtsegs): l a ta la bye ba phrag brgyad cu tsam du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te steng gi 'jig rten gyi khams skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par byas nas 'od zer brgya stong dag gis
255b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der snang bas khyab par byas shing lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / phye ma'i char dag mngon par rab tu phab nas lha'i sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu
255b3(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs brgya stong dag gi sgra phyung ste/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de sgras go bar byas nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di lta ste/ mi zad pa'i sgo zhes bya
255b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gzungs kyi sgo'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /de la mi zad pa'i gzungs kyi sgo gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang sems dben pa nyid du ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi
255b5(dkon brtsegs): dpen pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi nges par rtog pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad la so sor rtog pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi nye bar zhi ba ston par byed pa
255b6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyi tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi kha na ma tho ba med pa ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i nan tan gyi sgo dang / chos
255b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi shes pa'i snang ba ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi snang ba'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi bye brag med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi
256a1(dkon brtsegs): sgo dang / chos rnams kyi rnam par g.yeng ba med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi zhi gnas kyi sgo dang / chos thams cad kyi 'gal
256a2(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi lhag mthong gi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi 'khrug pa med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi nges par sems pa'i sgo
256a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos rnams kyi mi brjed pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi dran pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi don rtogs pa ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi rtogs pa'i
256a4(dkon brtsegs): sgo dang / chos rnams kyi yid rnam par dag pa ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi blo gros kyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms
256a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid kyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi zhi ba nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi mtshan ma med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi
256a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba thams cad yang dag par gcod pa ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi smon pa med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi mngon par 'du byed pa dang bral ba ston par byed
256a7(dkon brtsegs): pa chos thams cad kyi mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi mngon par 'grub pa med pa ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi skye ba med pa'i sgo dang / chos
256b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi 'byung ba med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi rtogs pa med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi 'dod
256b2(dkon brtsegs): chags dang bral ba'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi mngon sum gyi shes pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi spros pa med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi gnyis dang bral ba ston par
256b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa chos thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa nyid kyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi g.yo ba med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi rten pa med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi sems
256b4(dkon brtsegs): can mnyam pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi sems can med pa nyid kyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi 'gyur ba med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi byed pa med pa'i
256b5(dkon brtsegs): sgo dang / chos rnams kyi spyod pa med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi gzung ba med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi gzhi yang dag par 'joms pa ston par byed pa
256b6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyi gzhi med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi lhag par byed pa med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi nges pa'i sgo dang / chos thams cad kyi 'bras bu
256b7(dkon brtsegs): 'grub bston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi rgyu'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi mi brjed ba nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi mngon par brtson pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi
257a1(dkon brtsegs): kun nas ldang ba med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ston par
257a2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi dbyer med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i mtha'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi ro
257a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi yang dag
257a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi sgra dbyangs dang / tshig gi lam gyis brjod pa thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams
257a5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi brjod du med pa'i don gyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi nye bar zhi ba nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi bsam gtan gyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi gang zag med pa
257a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rtogs pa ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sgo ste/ kun dga'
257a7(dkon brtsegs): b o| de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bkod pa de nam mkha'i dkyil de nyid las ma bzhengs par byang chub sems dpa' de dag la mi zad pa'i sgo'i gzungs kyi
257b1(dkon brtsegs): sgo de dag rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur te/ der yang byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gis bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom
257b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams lhun gyis grub cing mngon par 'du
257b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa mi mnga' bas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa ni/ ngo mtshar lags so/ /
257b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams lhun gyis grub cing mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas 'das pa dang /
257b5(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa de ni/ ma 'dres pa yin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
257b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' bos lha'i bu rin chen mchog la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa

258a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas gzugs kyang lung bstan du med la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
258a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas rnam par shes pa yang lung bstan du med pa dang / sa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas sa'i
258a3(dkon brtsegs): khams kyang lung bstan du med pa dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas rlung gi khams kyang lung bstan du

258b1(dkon brtsegs): bo| byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni/ brda'i gzhi'i tshig bla dwags yin no/ /de ni/ nye bar zhi ba'i gzhi yin te/ chos gang shin tu nye bar zhi ba de la ni/ lung bstan pa gang
