258b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' nang ngam/ phyi rol lam/ dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang yongs su 'dzin par mi byed na/ de'i 'og
258b4(dkon brtsegs): tu lung bstan par 'gyur te/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad yongs su gzung du med par lung bstan
258b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ /lung bstan pa ni/ chos thams cad rjes su gzung du med par lung bstan pa yin no/ /lung bstan pa ni/ chos thams cad gnas med par lung bstan pa yin
258b6(dkon brtsegs): no| |lung bstan pa ni/ chos thams cad skye ba med par lung bstan pa yin no/ /lung bstan pa ni/ chos thams cad rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med par lung bstan
258b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa ni/ de lta bu yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu rin chen mchog la legs
259a1(dkon brtsegs): so| |zhes bya ba byin te/ lha'i bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /de lta bu'i chos rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
259a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to/ /gtam 'di brjod par gyur pa na bdud sdig can dpung dang bcas/ bzhon pa dang bcas/
259a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la bdud
259a4(dkon brtsegs): sdig can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' lung ston par mdzad cing nyan thos lung ston par mi mdzad lags/
259a5(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sdig can/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ stong gsum gyi stong
259a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha dang / mi rnams kyis legs par rtogs shing rig pa yin pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' lung ston par mdzad kyi/ nyan
259a7(dkon brtsegs): thos ni| lha dang / mi rnams kyis rig pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir nyan thos lung ston par mi mdzad do/ /bdud sdig can/ byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan na ni/
259b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can mang po dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par byed kyi/ nyan thos lung bstan pas ni/ de lta ma yin la/ theg pa chen po
259b2(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyang phyir ldog par 'gyur bas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' lung ston par mdzad kyi/ nyan thos lung ston par ni/ mi
259b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad do/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sdig can/ khyod ci'i phyir 'khor 'dir 'ongs/ de skad ces smras pa
259b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / bdud sdig can gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu'i rin chen mchog 'di
259b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen bkod pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
259b6(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa'i tshe de lung bstan pa'i sgras bdag gi gnas dag dang / gzhal med khang thams cad dang / skar khung dang / rta babs thams cad dang / rin po che'i shing
259b7(dkon brtsegs): ljon pa dang / dga' zhing rtse ba'i longs spyod kyi gnas thams cad las 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas lha'i bu rin chen mchog ni/
260a1(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan zin to/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang lung bstan du 'ong gi
260a2(dkon brtsegs): sdig can khyod song zhig ces sgra byung ngo / /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sdig can/ khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams lung bstan pas yid ma rangs par gyur tam/
260a3(dkon brtsegs): bdud sdig can gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ /gal te dzam+bu'i gling na sems can ji snyed pa rnams dgra bcom pa nyid du lung bstan na ni/ bdag kyang yid rangs
260a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gcig cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan kyang de lta ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam
260a5(dkon brtsegs): dpal| gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe bdag gi gnas thams cad spa bkong ba'i phyir te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' des ni/
260a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag theg pa gsum po dag gis khams gsum nas nges par 'byin par 'gyur bas/
260a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal/ de ltar na/ bdag gi yid la gcags pa chen por gyur to/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sdig can/ khyod 'ongs kyang rung / ma 'ongs kyang rung ste/
260b1(dkon brtsegs): sdig can| khyod kyis ni/ lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zhugs shing thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas nges par byung ba'i byang chub sems
260b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' la bar chad bya bar mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas nges
260b3(dkon brtsegs): par byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdud sdig can gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur
260b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / shes rab
260b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pas nges par byung ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sdig can/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyi che ba'i spyod pa thams cad la lhag par mi spyod
260b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de lta bu ni/ lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / bdud kyi las thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par
260b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la phan par mthong ba de lta bu ni/ thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni/ shes rab
261a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pas nges par byung ba yin no/ /sdig can/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can thams
261a2(dkon brtsegs): cad bsgral ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgos pa de lta bu ni/ lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams
261a3(dkon brtsegs): sdud pa de lta bu ni/ thabs mkhas pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe sems can thams cad la shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid du so sor rtog pa de lta bu ni/ shes
261a4(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas nges par byung ba yin no/ /sdig can/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' nang dang phyi'i dngos po rnams la mi lta bar gyur cing byang
261a5(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba de lta bu ni/ lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe sems
261a6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la sbyin gnas su 'du shes skyed par byed pa de lta bu ni/ thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe sbyin pa po dang len pa po yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mnyam
261a7(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid du mos pa de lta bu ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas nges par byung ba yin no/ /sdig can/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsams
261b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dag las phyir mi ldog pa de lta bu ni/ lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe gzhan gyi don gyis zin cing rang gi don las ldog par byed pa de lta
261b2(dkon brtsegs): bu ni/ thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe don la rton pa yin gyi tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin pa de lta bu ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas nges par byung ba yin no/ /sdig
261b3(dkon brtsegs): can| gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas slong ba po mthong na khong khro ba med cing yid rangs par byed pa de lta bu ni/ lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zhugs
261b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sdud cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar byed pa de lta bu ni/ thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe chos
261b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad byang chub kyi rang bzhin du rab tu shes pa de lta bu ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas nges par byung ba yin no/ /de nas lha'i bu rin chen mchog gis 'jam
261b6(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ gal te bdud sdig can dpung dang bcas/ bzhon pa dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas/ gnas dang
261b7(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa 'di lto ba'i nang du bcug na ni/ 'di theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag la bar chad byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam
262a1(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ bdud sdig can lto ba'i nang du gzhug pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i cha ma yin pas/ rigs kyi bu/ kho
262a2(dkon brtsegs): bos ci nas kyang bdud sdig can 'di sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi mtshan gyis legs par brgyan cing bde ba mchog dang ldan pas seng+ge'i khri la 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas
262a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi spobs pas chos ston par 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshig de thos nas mi snang bar bya bar 'dod cing 'bros par 'dod
262a4(dkon brtsegs): na| 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor de nas mi snang bar bya ba dang / 'bros par yang ma nus so/ /de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon
262a5(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pas bsam pa 'di snyam du bsam ste/ bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi mtshan dang ldan zhing seng+ge'i khri la 'dug par thams cad dang ldan pa'i
262a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyis mthong bar bsam nas de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sdig can/ khyod kyis ni/ de bzhin gshegs
262a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi byang chub thob ste/ khyod ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi mtshan dang ldan zhing seng+ge'i khri la 'dug go /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi
262b1(dkon brtsegs): glangs kyis bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis kyang byang chub la brnyes na/ kho bos lta thob par 'gyur re skan/ de
262b2(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni/ thob pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas na/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la ni/ thob pa yang med/ mngon par rtogs
262b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang med de/ byang chub ni/ 'dus ma byas pa thob pa yin no/ /de yang thob pa med pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin pa dang / byang chub ni/ stong pa nyid rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid
262b4(dkon brtsegs): yin pas na/ stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba dang / byang chub ni/ mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas na/ mtshan ma med
262b5(dkon brtsegs): pas mtshan ma med pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba dang / byang chub ni/ smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas na/ smon pa med pas smon med pa mngon par
262b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba dang / byang chub ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin pas na/ rang bzhin gyis rang bzhin mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba dang /
262b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ni/ de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas na/ de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba dang / byang chub ni/ yang dag
263a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtha' la gnas pa yin pas na/ yang dag pa'i mthas yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba dang / byang chub ni/
263a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / skyes bu med pa dang / gang zag med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na/ de la ni/
263a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba gang yang med pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis byang chub kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa 'di thos
263a4(dkon brtsegs): nas chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed pa de ni/ sangs rgyas nyid yin par brjod par bya'o/ /bdud kyi bstan pa 'di bshad pa
263a5(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad
263a6(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ khyod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdud sdig can de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog dang gzugs kyi mtshan dang ldan zhing seng+ge'i khri la 'dug
263a7(dkon brtsegs): nas zab mo'i gnas 'di lta bu 'di dag ston pa ni/ ngo mtshar to/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ kho bos ni/ sems med pa'i dngos po
263b1(dkon brtsegs): shing dang / rtswa dang / nags tshal 'di dag la de lta de ltar byin gyis brlabs na yang 'di dag kyang de lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyi spobs pas chos ston par
263b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /kho bos gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu nyid la de lta de ltar byin gyis brlabs na yang gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu yang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / sku'i mtshan dang
263b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyi spobs pas chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
263b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / sku'i mtshan dang ldan par byin gyis brlabs nas nyan thos ston pa'i gzugs su gnas pa ni/ mi mthun pa yin pas bdag 'khor 'di nas
263b5(dkon brtsegs): mi snang bar bya'o/ /snyam du bsam pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis des mi snang bar byed ma nus so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
263b6(dkon brtsegs): pas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / sku'i mtshan dang ldan zhing
263b7(dkon brtsegs): seng+ge'i khri la 'dug par thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mthong bar byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
264a1(dkon brtsegs): bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par mdzad pa de bzhin du bdud sdig can
264a2(dkon brtsegs): dang lhan cig tu ston cig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / sku'i mtshan dang ldan pas bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang /
264a3(dkon brtsegs): sku'i mtshan dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sdig can/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni/ ci zhig gis rab tu phye ba yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa
264a4(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ni/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pas rab tu phye ba yin no/ /chos dang chos ma yin pa
264a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis su med par rtogs pas rab tu phye ba yin no/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi dbang bskur bas rab tu phye ba yin no/ /sems can thams cad kyi
264a6(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi spyod pa rtogs pas rab tu phye ba yin no/ /dngos po dang dngos po med pa thams cad rtogs pas rab tu phye ba yin no/ /dngos po rnam par 'jig pas rab tu
264a7(dkon brtsegs): phye ba yin no/ /sgom pa dang dngos po med pas rab tu phye ba yin te/ rab tu phye ba yang ma yin/ rab tu ma phye ba yang ma yin/ rgyu ba med pa/ rgyu ba dang bral ba/ rgyu ba
264b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yang dag par chad pa ste/ 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa yin no/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun
264b2(dkon brtsegs): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ci zhig la gnas pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ sdig can/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ 'khor ba mnyam
264b3(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid la gnas pa yin no/ /mya ngan las 'das pa'i rlom sems med pa la gnas pa yin no/ /lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid la gnas pa yin no/ /
264b4(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi gnas la gnas pa yin no/ /chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba'i rtsa ba'i gnas la gnas pa yin no/ /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas gnyis
264b5(dkon brtsegs): su med pa'i gnas la gnas pa yin no/ /gnas thams cad la mi gnas pa la gnas pa yin te/ sdig can/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ de lta bu la gnas pa yin no//
264b6(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus yang bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sdig can/ byang chub ga las btsal bar bya/ bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i
264b7(dkon brtsegs): bu| byang chub ni/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba la gnas pa dang / ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa kun tu sbyor ba dang / phyin ci log gis kun nas dkris pa dang / sgrib pa dang /
265a1(dkon brtsegs): chod pa dag las btsal bar bya'o/ /smras pa/ sdig can/ khyed ci las bsam ste de skad ston/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos de
265a2(dkon brtsegs): dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa gang yin pa de nyid byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong brgyad brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams
265a3(dkon brtsegs): las sems rnam par grol lo/ /shwa ra dwa ti'i bu la dad pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / bdud kyi ris la dad pa'i lha'i bu rnams las srog chags sum khri nyis stong gis ni/ bla na
265a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /lha'i bu de dag gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bdud sdig can dang / gnas
265a5(dkon brtsegs): brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu gnyis sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / sku'i mtshan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyi rlabs
265a6(dkon brtsegs): de phyir bsdus so/ /de nas gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / bdud sdig can yang rang rang gi gzugs kyi mtshan dang ldan par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe phyogs bzhi'i
265a7(dkon brtsegs): s angs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po dag lhags shing 'dus te de dag nam mkha' las babs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la
265b1(dkon brtsegs): der dong ste phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/
265b2(dkon brtsegs): /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni/ chos kyi dbyings
265b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang bzhin dbyer ma mchis par bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du 'dir mchis lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/
265b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du
265b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
265b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gang nas 'dir mchis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni/ sangs
265b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag nas 'dus pa ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yongs su smin par byas shing chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med par bstan pa'i
266a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid kyis yongs su smin par byas pa dag yin pas/ 'di dag ni/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la byas pa gzo ba dang /
266a2(dkon brtsegs): byas pa tshor ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la yang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /
266a3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang rjes su yi rang bar bya ba'i phyir 'dir lhags so/ /kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis ni/ nga yongs su mya ngan las
266a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i 'og tu yang dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dzam+bu'i gling du rgyas par byed par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems
266a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag mang po dag gis dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la mngon par brtson pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'khor
266a6(dkon brtsegs): de na brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba gang ji snyed pa de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kyang dam pa'i
266a7(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i skyes bu dam pa dang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo 'di dag dang / gzhan dag la yang rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi zhing / kun
266b1(dkon brtsegs): tu bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / 'tshe ba ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du brtson par bgyi lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
266b2(dkon brtsegs): skyong ba de dag la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ grogs po dag /khyed cag dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kun tu srung ba la brtson par zhugs pa ni/
266b3(dkon brtsegs): legs so/ /legs so/ /gang dag dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la brtson par byed pa de dag gis ni/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
266b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams la yang mchod par byas pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod kyis
266b5(dkon brtsegs): ci nas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus dzam+bu'i gling na rgya cher spyod par 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis rlobs shig / 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
266b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das| 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ sreg pa'i bskal pa byung bar gyur na nam mkha'i khams mi tshig par bgyi ba'i slad du byin gyis brlab par bgyi mi 'tshal ba de bzhin du
266b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad kyang nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin lags pas/ de dag la ni/ skye ba yang mi mngon/ 'gag pa yang mi mngon lags te/ gang
267a1(dkon brtsegs): la skye ba ma mchis shing 'gag pa ma mchis pa de la ni/ byin gyi rlabs kyi rang bzhin ci yang ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos
267a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni/ byin gyi rlabs ma mchis pa lags pas de dag gi ngo bo nyid gang lags pa de nyid byin gyi rlabs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'on du lags kyis kyang
267a3(dkon brtsegs): gang dag chos la gus shing chos las nges par byung la mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu 'di mnod par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa
267a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi slad du de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci nas kyang bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges
267a5(dkon brtsegs): par bcom zhing bar chad ma mchis pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dzam+bu'i gling na spyad par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de
267a6(dkon brtsegs): n as de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'od gser gyi kha dog lta bus snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od
267a7(dkon brtsegs): dag sku las rab tu phyung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i
267b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od 'di thams cad du rjes su song ba de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi chos la shes pa dang / bsam pa ma nyams pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi
267b2(dkon brtsegs): bu mo de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs
267b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di zungs shig / chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig dang / de lta na khyed kyis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang /
267b4(dkon brtsegs): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yang mchod par byas par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs
267b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ chos kyi dbyings
267b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang bzhin dbyer med par bstan pa zhes bya bar zungs shig / lha'i bu rin chen mchog gis zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i man
267b7(dkon brtsegs): ngag ces bya bar yang zungs shig / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub
268a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rin chen mchog dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
268a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs
268a3(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med par bstan pa'i le'u ste/ brgyad pa rdzogs so// //rgya
268a4(dkon brtsegs): gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya da sha d+harma ka nA
268a5(dkon brtsegs): ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
268a6(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi
268a7(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
268b1(dkon brtsegs): po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med
268b2(dkon brtsegs): r nam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal po stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga pad+ma'i snying po la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la
268b3(dkon brtsegs): ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la
268b4(dkon brtsegs): skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig las brtsams te zhu lags so/ /
268b5(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka'
268b6(dkon brtsegs): stsal to| |rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas khyod la rtag tu skabs phye'i/ ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas khyod kyi
268b7(dkon brtsegs): sems rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal
269a1(dkon brtsegs): pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dge slong theg pa chen po la
269a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bgyi ba bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam gyis na/ dge slong theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa lags/ de bzhin gshegs pas
269a3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa lags par 'dogs par mdzad/ don gang gis na/ theg pa chen po 'di la theg pa chen po zhes bgyi lags /
269a4(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal po la legs so/ /zhes

269b1(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das

269b4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa yin/ byang chub kyi sems 'dod pa yin/ chos 'dod pa yin/ chos la nye bar rtog par byed pa yin/ chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la zhugs pa yin/ nga rgyal
269b5(dkon brtsegs): dang che ba'i nga rgyal dang bral ba yin/ dgongs te gsungs pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i theg pas yongs su mya ngan

270a6(dkon brtsegs): bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi rgyan dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'od 'dom gang ba nyid la yang mngon par yid ches/ nyan

270b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /dad pa theg pa mchog yin te/ /des ni 'dren rnams nges bar byung / /de
271a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir blo gros ldan pa'i mis/ /dad pas rjes 'brang nyid la brten/ /'jig rten dag na dad pa mchog /dad ldan rnam par nyams pa med//

274a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis yang dag par bskul ba dang / yang dag par skyo ba bskyed

274b7(dkon brtsegs): chub tu sems bskyed par byed na/ de ni/ byang chub kyi sems 'dod pa'i rgyu bzhi pa yin no/ /gzhan yang sems can rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba kho na'i don du sbyin pa sbyin
275a1(dkon brtsegs): par byed/ tshul khrims srung bar byed/ bzod pa sgom par byed/ brtson 'grus rtsom par byed/ bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog
275a2(dkon brtsegs): par byed/ shes rab sgom par byed pa yin te/ de la ji ltar na sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa yin zhe na/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas dang / skom 'dod pa rnams la
275a3(dkon brtsegs): skom dang / bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa dang / mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha dang / gos 'dod pa rnams la gos dang / gdu bu dang / dbung rgyan
275a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / rna cha gdub kor dang / rgyan dod pa rnams la rgyan sbyin par byed pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ mdor na/ rang gi sha dag gis kyang sems can rnams la
275a5(dkon brtsegs): phan 'dogs par byed de/ de ltar sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /sbyin pa de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed la sbyin pa
275a6(dkon brtsegs): des kyang rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de la ji ltar na/ tshul khrims srung bar byed pa yin zhe na/ de lus kyis legs par bsdams pa dang / ngag gis legs
275a7(dkon brtsegs): par bsdams pa dang / yid kyis legs par bsdams pa dang / de lus kyi nyes par spyod pa thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs
275b1(dkon brtsegs): su spong bar byed pa dang / ngag gi nyes par spyod pa dang / yid kyi nyes par spyod pa thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su spong bar byed la/
275b2(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang / ma ral ba dang / ma 'dres pa dang / nag nog tu ma gyur bar srung bar byed de/ de ltar tshul khrims srung bar byed do/ /tshul khrims
275b3(dkon brtsegs): de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed la/ tshul khrims des kyang rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de la ji ltar na bzod pa sgom par
275b4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa yin zhe na/ de la khyim na gnas pa'am/ rab tu byung ba dag gis spyod sam/ brgyad bkag gam/ brdegs sam/ btsogs sam/ bcings sam/ go
275b5(dkon brtsegs): rar bcug gam/ bzhugs sam/ rnam par gtses na yang bzod par byed/ dang du len par byed de/ de ltar bzod pa sgom par byed do/ /bzod pa de yang bla na med pa
275b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed la/ bzod pa des kyang rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de la ji ltar na/ brtson 'grus rtsom par byed pa yin
275b7(dkon brtsegs): zhe na| de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin du sems can gyi khams kyang mtha' yas mu med pa yin
276a1(dkon brtsegs): pas| de dag bdag gcig pu gnyis su med pas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su dgod par bya'o/ /snyam du
276a2(dkon brtsegs): sems te/ de rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des brtson 'grus rtsom par byed cing / de lus kyi tshor ba la lus dang ldan pa'i dran pas nye bar rtog par byed do/ /
276a3(dkon brtsegs): de tshor ba la nye bar rtog pa la brtson par byed pa na sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa dang / chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba la yang brtson par byed do/ /
276a4(dkon brtsegs): de de ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa na sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed/ 'bad par byed/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ sems
276a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'dzin cing / yang dag par rab tu 'jog par byed do/ /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed/ 'bad par byed/ brtson
276a6(dkon brtsegs): 'grus rtsom/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog par byed do/ /dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed/ 'bad par byed/
276a7(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus rtsom/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog par byed do/ /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang / phyir zhing 'byung ba dang /
276b1(dkon brtsegs): nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / brjod par mi 'gyur ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed/ 'bad par byed/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ sems rab tu
276b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog par byed do/ /de de ltar brtson 'grus brtsams pa na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang po sgom par byed do/ /de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
276b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa yang sgom par byed do/ /de de ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su grub pas bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag par gnas shing /
276b4(dkon brtsegs): de bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de ltar brtson 'grus rtsom par byed do/ /brtson 'grus de yang
276b5(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed la/ brtson 'grus des kyang rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de la ji ltar na/ bsam gtan la
276b6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par 'jog par byed pa yin zhe na/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la mi gnas pa dang / 'gog pa la mi gnas pa dang / rnam par spangs par yongs su ma bsngos
276b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / nang la mi gnas pa dang / phyi rol la mi gnas pa dang / gzugs la mi gnas pa dang / tshor ba la mi gnas pa dang / 'du shes la mi gnas pa dang /
277a1(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed la mi gnas pa dang / rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas pa dang / gzugs kyi khams
277a2(dkon brtsegs): la mi gnas pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas pa dang / stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la mi gnas pa dang / smon pa
277a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa la mi gnas pa dang / 'jig rten 'di la mi gnas pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas pa dang / gzugs la mi gnas pa dang / sgra la mi gnas
277a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dri la mi gnas pa dang / ro la mi gnas pa dang / reg la mi gnas pa dang / chos la mi gnas pa dang / sbyin pa la mi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims
277a5(dkon brtsegs): la mi gnas pa dang / bzod pa la mi gnas pa dang / brtson 'grus la mi gnas pa dang / bsam gtan la mi gnas pa dang / shes rab la mi gnas pa
277a6(dkon brtsegs): yin no| |rigs kyi bu/ mdor na/ chags pa thams cad spangs nas mi gnas par bsam gtan byed de/ de ltar bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed do//
277a7(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed la/ bsam gtan des kyang rlom sems su mi byed do/ /rigs
277b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu| de la ji ltar na shes rab sgom par byed pa yin zhe na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can gyi khams su med pa dag yongs su mya ngan las bzlas byang
277b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad ni/ bdag med pa'o/ /chos thams cad
277b3(dkon brtsegs): ni| sems can med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ gang zag med pa'o/ /zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /snyam ste/ de ltar shes rab sgom par byed do/ /shes rab de
277b4(dkon brtsegs): yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed la/ shes rab des kyang rlom sems su mi byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang
277b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems 'dod pa yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /nor bu rin chen
277b6(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin gyis/ /'od 'bar 'byung gnas nyid na 'dug /byi dor byas na de bas ni/ /nyis 'gyur gyis kyang mdzes pa ltar/ /de bzhin rigs dang ldan pa yang //
277b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems ni chol byed do/ /mtha' gnyis rnam par dag pa yi/ /spyod yul du ni bdud mi 'ong / /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos
278a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod pa dang /
278a2(dkon brtsegs): chos la dga' ba dang / chos kyi kun dga' la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pa yin te/ des dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ bkres pas nyen cing zas 'dod pa gzhan
278a3(dkon brtsegs): dag mthong na/ des de dag la ldam ldum mam/ sngo rngad dam/ bza' bca' ci bdog cing yod pa dag sbyin par byed cing de 'jig rten gyi 'tsho ba dang / yo byad
278a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu dang / sdong bu la sogs pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang bsags shing sems can rnams la sbyin par byed pa dang / de dam pa'i
278a5(dkon brtsegs): chos 'dzin pa rnams kyi drung du song ste gus par smra ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mngon par ldan ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / gus par bya ba'i las dag byas nas zhe
278a6(dkon brtsegs): sa dang bcas/ gus pa dang bcas pa'i tshul bzhin du dri ba 'dri bar byed cing / de'i 'og tu de la dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa de yang ji ltar dri ba dris pa bzhin du lan 'debs
278a7(dkon brtsegs): par byed la/ de yang dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa de la ston par 'du shes skyed par byed/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes skyed par byed/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las
278b1(dkon brtsegs): sgrol bar byed par 'du shes skyed par byed/ mkhan por 'du sems skyed par byed/ slob dpon du 'du shes skyed par byed/ bdag yun ring po nas 'khor ba'i dgon
278b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'khyams ba tshol bar byed pa yin no/ /snyam du tshol bar byed pa yin par 'du shes skyed par byed/ bdag yun ring po nas gti mug gis bsgribs shing gnyid
278b3(dkon brtsegs): log pa'i gnyid sad par byed pa yin no/ /zhes sad par byed pa yin par 'du shes skyed par byed/ bdag 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'dam du bying ba'i 'byin par byed pa
278b4(dkon brtsegs): yin no| |zhes 'byin par byed pa yin par 'du shes skyed par byed/ bdag lam ngan par zhugs pa la lam bzang po ston par byed pa yin no/ /zhes lam ston par
278b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa yin par 'du shes skyed par byed/ bdag 'khor ba'i brtson rar bcings pa 'grol ba yin no/ /zhes 'grol bar byed pa yin par 'du shes skyed par byed/ bdag
278b6(dkon brtsegs): yun ring po nas nyam thag pa'i sman pa dam pa yin no/ /zhes sman pa yin par 'du shes skyed par byed/ bdag 'dod chags kyi med dang / zhe sdang gi me dang / gti mug
278b7(dkon brtsegs): gi mes kun tu 'bar bar gyur pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin no/ /zhes char sprin yin par 'du shes skyed par byed cing / de chos kyi rgyu dang / chos kyi gzhi dang / chos
279a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi ched kyi phyir tsha ba yang khyad du gsod/ grang ba dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu mchu ring dang / sdig sprul gyis
279a2(dkon brtsegs): reg pa yang khyad du gsod/ bkres pa yang khyad du gsod/ skom pa yang khyad du gsod la/ gzhan bde ba dag mthong na yang 'dod pa'i sems skyed par mi
279a3(dkon brtsegs): byed par de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag la dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i snang ba 'cha bas na/ bdag ni/ 'jig rten na bde ba yin no/ /snyam du sems te/ de
279a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des mya ngan mi byed/ smre sngags mi 'don cing sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba'i sems khyed par mi byed la/ de mya ngan
279a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang bral bas bdag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos tshig gcig tsam
279a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi phyir yang bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gnas par spro'o/ /snyam pa de lta bu'i sems skye bar 'gyur
279a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing / de de ltar yid yongs su skyo ba med pas na/ sgrim mi dgos pa kho nar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang dag par sgrub par byed cing / sangs rgyas
279b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos ma thob pa rnams kyang thob par byed pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'dod pa yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig
279b2(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /rgyal ba'i sras po shes rab che/ /chos 'dod par ni gyur pa rnams/ /dam chos yongs su tshol ba na/ /skyo ba skyed par mi byed do/ /
279b3(dkon brtsegs): gus pas dam chos yongs tshol ba'o/ rgyal ba'i thugs las skyes pa rnams/ /sems kyis 'dzin par byed pa dang / /nan tan gyis ni sgrub pa yin/ /rigs kyi bu/ de
279b4(dkon brtsegs): la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos la nye bar rtog par byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar nye bar rtog par byed/ chos
279b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni/ byis pa so so'i skye bo kun tu rmongs par byed pa'i phyir sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir rmi lam lta bu'o/ /chos thams cad ni/
279b6(dkon brtsegs): dngos po med pa'i phyir chu zla lta bu'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ sems can med pa'i phyir mig yor lta bu'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa'i phyir
279b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs brnyan lta bu'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ byung nas 'jig cing 'du ba'i phyir brag ca lta bu'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir byung
280a1(dkon brtsegs): nas 'jig cing 'ju ba yin no/ /chos thams cad ni/ de bzhin nyid la yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyir ma skyes pa yin no/ /chos thams
280a2(dkon brtsegs): cad ni| ma skyes pa'i phyir ma 'gag pa yin no/ /chos thams cad ni/ byed pa po med pa'i phyir bcos ma ma yin no/ /chos thams cad ni/ gos pa med pa'i phyir
280a3(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' lta bu yin no/ /chos thams cad ni/ rang bzhin gyis kun tu 'bar ba ma yin pa'i phyir zhi ba yin no/ /chos thams cad ni/ rang bzhin gyis kun nas
280a4(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i phyir gzod ma nas yongs su dag pa yin no/ /chos thams cad ni/ dri ma thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir dri ma med pa yin no/ /chos
280a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni/ nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir gzod ma nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin no/ /chos thams cad ni/ nges par snang ba ma yin pa'i phyir
280a6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs can ma yin no/ /chos thams cad ni/ lus med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i yul las yang dag par 'das pa yin no/ /chos thams cad ni/ gnas
280a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir mi gnas pa yin no/ /chos thams cad ni/ rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spangs pa'i phyir rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin no/ /chos
280b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni/ nyon mongs pa'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir gnas med pa yin no/ /chos thams cad ni/ thabs la mkhas pa'i rig pa dang bral ba'i
280b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir sbrul gdug pa lta bu yin no/ /chos thams cad ni/ snying po med pa'i phyir chu shing gi sdong po lta bu yin no/ /chos thams cad ni/ rang bzhin gyis nyam chung ba'i
280b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir lbu ba rdos pa lta bu yin no/ /zhes nye bar rtog par byed pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos la nye bar rtog par byed pa yin no/ /de
280b4(dkon brtsegs): nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /chos kun sgyu ma lta bu ste/ /byis pa rnams kyi sems rmongs byed/ /yang dag ma yin rmi
280b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dra bar/ /de ltar ltos shig dge slong dag /chos rnams chu zla lta bu ste/ /mig yor gyis ni kun nas bslangs/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bur ni/ /mkhas pa su
280b6(dkon brtsegs): zhig rtog mi byed/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la zhugs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang
280b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' gzugs mi rtag go / zhes yang dag par rjes su lta zhing / gzugs la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings mngon sum du mi byed

281b1(dkon brtsegs): lta ba bzhin du sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa la yang de bzhin te/ de gzugs bdag med de/ /zhes yang dag par rjes su lta zhing / gzugs bdag
281b2(dkon brtsegs): med do| |zhes yang dag par rjes su lta ba na/ gzugs kyis mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni/ yang dag pa ma yin
281b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslangs pa yin la/ des de yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
281b4(dkon brtsegs): byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med do/ /zhes yang dag par rjes su lta zhing / rnam par shes pa bdag med do/ /zhes yang dag par rjes su lta ba na/ rnam par
281b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pas mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa ni/ yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslangs pa
281b6(dkon brtsegs): yin la| des de yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa
281b7(dkon brtsegs): zhig gis skye bo phal po che'i mdun du sgyu mar byas pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs sam/ rta'i tshogs sam/ shing rta'i tshogs sam/ dpung bu
282a1(dkon brtsegs): chung gi tshogs dag mngon par sprul te bstan par gyur na/ skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can ni/ de mthong na mi skrag mi dngang zhing
282a2(dkon brtsegs): dngang par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des de ni/ sgyu mar byas pa ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa dang / yod pa ma yin pa dang / rdzun pa dang / slu bar byed
282a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos yin par rig cing kun tu shes pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang gzugs bdag med do/ /zhes yang dag par
282a4(dkon brtsegs): rjes su lta ba na/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni/ yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslangs
282a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin la/ des de yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shas pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
282a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag med do/ /zhes yang dag par rjes su lta ba na/ rnam par shes pas mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes
282a7(dkon brtsegs): pa ni/ yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslangs pa yin la/ des de yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom
282b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar
282b2(dkon brtsegs): n a| byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mi rtag par yang dag par rjes su lta zhing gzugs la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i slad du chos kyi dbyings mngon sum du mi
282b3(dkon brtsegs): bgyid par chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor gyi chos rnams yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis legs par rtogs par bgyid pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
282b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ skyes
282b5(dkon brtsegs): bu mkhas pa la dpes bshad pas don kun shes par 'gyur bas na/ de'i phyir dpe brjod par bya'i/ nyon cig /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shes rab
282b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi la la zhig dug spyod par gyur na/ de dus dus su byi dor byed/ sbed par byed/ nor du byed/ bdag gir byed cing yo byad rnam pa sna
282b7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dag tu 'tshong bar byed kyi/ de za bar ni/ mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi 'dis bdag gi srog gi bar chad du 'gyur du 'ong ngo / /snyam du sems pa'i phyir
283a1(dkon brtsegs): ro| |rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang mya ngan las 'das bar sems pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol
283a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bab pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la bab par byed mod kyi/ mya ngan las 'das pa de mngon sum du ni/ mi byed do/ /de ci'i
283a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ gzhi 'dis bdag kyang byang chub las ldog par gyur du 'ong ngo / /snyam du sems pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shes rab dang
283a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi la la zhig me spyod par gyur na/ de dus dus su me de la bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ legs
283a5(dkon brtsegs): par rim gro byed kyang de 'di snyam du bdag gis me 'di la bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas/ legs par rim gro byas mod kyi/
283a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di la lag pa gnyis kyis ni/ gzung bar mi bya'o/ /snyam du sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi 'dis bdag la lus kyi sdug bsngal dang / sems kyi yid
283a7(dkon brtsegs): mi bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo / /snyam du sems pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang mya ngan las 'das pa la sems pa
283b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bab pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la bab par byed mod kyi/ mya ngan las 'das pa de
283b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du ni/ mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi 'dis bdag byang chub las ldog par 'gyur du 'ong ngo / /snyam du sems pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa
283b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
283b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das| bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ byang chub sems dpas ni/ 'khor ba kho nar gnas par bgyi ba lags so/ /
283b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpas ni/ 'khor ba kho nar gnas par
283b6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe 'khor ba'i skyon rnams kyis mi gos pa lags /
283b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir dpe brjod par bya'i/ nyon cig /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sprul 'dzin pa'i mi gsang
284a1(dkon brtsegs): sngags dang / sman gyi stobs bskyed pa chen po dang ldan pa ni/ sbrul gdug pa dag dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod
284a2(dkon brtsegs): par byed kyang gzhi des de'i srog gi bar chad byed par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab dang / thabs dang / rig pa'i gsang sngags
284a3(dkon brtsegs): dang | sman gyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam
284a4(dkon brtsegs): dag rin chen zla 'od chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mya ngan las 'das
284a5(dkon brtsegs): pa de yang mngon sum du mi bgyid la/ 'khor ba'i skyon de dag gis kyang mi gos pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ ngo mtshar lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/
284a6(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shin tu ngo mtshar lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ shin tu ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
284a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag la skyabs su mchi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas tha na sems dang ba
284b1(dkon brtsegs): gcig tsam rnyed par gyur pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos
284b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di bshad pa ni nyan par bgyid pa de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
284b3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos bstan pa 'di bshad pa na nyan par
284b4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba yin no/ /chos bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga brgya po de dag len
284b5(dkon brtsegs): p a med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar gyur nas sems rnam par grol ba de dag stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo
284b6(dkon brtsegs): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la bcugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba dag btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
284b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ phyag bgyi bar 'os pa lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

285a3(dkon brtsegs): rab khyad par 'phags pa yis/ /nyan thos rnams kyis dag las/ /yang dag 'das par gyur pa dang / /phung po skye 'jig zad 'gyur par/ /yang dag ji bzhin
285a4(dkon brtsegs): shes gyur kyang / /'gro ba nyam thag 'di mthong nas/ /mya ngan 'da' bar mi 'gro ba'i/ /shes rab che rnams phyag bya'i 'os/ /'jigs pa med rnams phyag bya'i 'os/ /
285a5(dkon brtsegs): spyan yangs ldan rnams phyag bya'i 'os/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams phyag bya'i 'os/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i
285a6(dkon brtsegs): chos la zhugs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal dang / che ba'i nga rgyal dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la
285a7(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal zhes bya ba ni/ bdag ni/ gzhan dag dang rigs dang / rus dang / gzugs dang / 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor dang / yo byad gang yang rung
285b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dag gam/ glang po che'i tshogs sam/ rta pa'i tshogs sam/ shing rta'i tshogs sam/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs dag mi mtshungs so/ /snyam du 'gran par
285b2(dkon brtsegs): byed cing / de ltar sems mngon par mtho bar byed pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni/ nga rgyal zhes bya'o/ /che ba'i nga rgyal zhes bya ba ni/ bdag ni/ gzhan dag pas

285b4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs sam/ shing rta'i tshogs sam/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs dag gis khyad par du 'phags pa yin no/ /snyam du sems la/ de ltar sems khengs shing mi
285b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dud pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni/ che ba'i nga rgyal zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni/ de dag dang bral bas na/ de'i phyir nga rgyal dang / che ba'i nga rgyal dang bral ba zhes
285b6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o| |de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /nga rgyal che ba'i nga rgyal bral zhing rtag tu byams pa'i sems/ /snying rje'i yid
285b7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan zhing 'gro ba dag la bag yod pa'i/ /sems dpa' gtso bo yangs pa 'di ni bsod snyoms spyod byed cing / /lha dang mi rnams dag la phan pa rjod par byed pa
286a1(dkon brtsegs): yin| / bam po gnyis pa ste/ tha ma/ rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dgongs te gsungs pa rtogs

286a6(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa yang de ltar mi blta'o/ /mau dgal gyi bu/ khyod song la sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed gyi gan nas sman longs shig dang bza' bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs
286a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yang de ltar mi blta'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dag dang lhan cig tu tshigs gis rtsod par byed do/ /zhes

286b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa lhas byin ni/ yun ring po nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gshed ma dang / gcugs can dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bor gyur pa yin no/ /zhes
286b3(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa yang de ltar mi blta'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms kyi phyir bram ze'i grong sA la can du ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa bzhin du phyir byung
286b4(dkon brtsegs): ngo / /zhes gsungs pa yang de ltar mi blta'o/ /bram ze'i bu mo dregs mas shing gi gzhong bu lto bar bcings te de bzhin gshegs pa la skur ba btab bo/ /zhes gsungs
286b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang de ltar mi blta'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs med kyi ljongs su dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes pa na zla ba gsum du rta chas kyi nas dag gsol
286b6(dkon brtsegs): to| |zhes gsungs pa yang de ltar mi blta'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med

287a6(dkon brtsegs): par byed cing de dbang po rtul la dbang po mi rno ba zhig yin pas/ de phyis bslab par bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ sngar slob par byed la/ sngar bslab par bya ba gang
287a7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni/ phyis slob par byed na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de gzhi des rgyal po'i bu ma yin no/ /zhes brjod par bya ba yin snyam mam/ gsol
287b1(dkon brtsegs): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de ni/ ma lags te/ de ni/ rgyal po'i bu zhes bgyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

288a6(dkon brtsegs): ba yang sku ro rgyab snyung na/ gzhan dag lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du sems pa la thugs brtse bas de skad gsungs pa yin na/ de la mi blun po kha cig /de bzhin
288a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku ro rgya ba stung zhe'o/ /zhes sgra ji bzhin kho nar 'dzin par byed de/ de dag ni/ rang yang nyams par byas la/ gzhan yang nyams par byed pa
288b1(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas de la dgongs nas de skad ces gsungs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ nga ni/ rgas 'khogs te gtugs pa yin gyi/
288b2(dkon brtsegs): nga'i bsnyen bkur ba tshol cig ces gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de yang ngas phyi ma'i skye bo rnams
288b3(dkon brtsegs): l a thugs brtse bas nga'i nyan thos rgas 'khogs te gtugs pa gang dag gi lus la bsnyen bkur ba dgos pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pas
288b4(dkon brtsegs): rjes su ma gnang ngo / /zhes phongs par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir de skad ces gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pas de las dgongs nas de skad gsungs pa yin
288b5(dkon brtsegs): na| de la mi blun po kha cig / de bzhin gshegs pa bgres 'khogs te gtugs so/ /zhes sgra ji bzhin kho nar 'dzin par byed de/ de dag kyang rang yang nyams par
288b6(dkon brtsegs): byas la gzhan yang nyams par byed pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mau dgal gyi bu khyod song la sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyi gan nas sman longs shig
288b7(dkon brtsegs): dang bza' bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de yang ngas phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la
289a1(dkon brtsegs): thugs brtse bas nga'i nyan thos gang dag la sman dgos pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su ma gnang ngo / zhes phongs par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir de skad gsungs te/
289a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas de las dgongs nas de skad gsungs pa yin na/ de la mi blun po kha cig
289a3(dkon brtsegs): sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyi dge slong mau dgal gyi bu la zhes med pa dang / gus par bsgrims pa med pa ma yin par bstan cing dris na/ yang rings pa rings pa kho
289a4(dkon brtsegs): nar snyun gyi gsos sman bstan pa las na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ sku la snyun mnga' ba yin no/ /snyam pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la yang nyes
289a5(dkon brtsegs): dmigs dag snang ste/ chos mthong ba rnams la yang de lta bu'i bag med pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur na/ so so'i skye bo dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes sgra ji bzhin
289a6(dkon brtsegs): kho nar 'dzin par byed de/ de dag kyang rang yang nyams par byas la gzhan yang nyams par byed pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs
289a7(dkon brtsegs): pa ni| gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dag dang lhan cig tu tshig gis rtsod par byed do/ /zhes gang gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/
289b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de yang ngas phyi ma'i skye bo dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la yang dgra bo dang / phyir rgol ba dag yod na/ bdag cag
289b2(dkon brtsegs): la lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du sems pa dag la thugs brtse bas de skad gsungs pa yin na/ de la mi blun po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dgra bo dang / phyir rgol
289b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dag yod do/ /zhes sgra ji bzhin kho nar 'dzin par byed de/ rigs kyi bu/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa la yang dgra bo dang / phyir rgol
289b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dag med na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi chu bo chen po dang ldan pa la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
289b5(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la seng ldeng gi tshal pa zug go / zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu /de bzhin gshegs
289b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni| las bdag gir bya ba nyi ston par mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la yang sngon byas pa'i las dag yod na/ gzhan dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos
289b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des sdig pa'i las la mi dga' zhing dga' bar mi 'gyur ba'i don gyi dbang de gzigs pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa las
290a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gir bya ba nyid ston par mdzad pa yin na/ de la mi blun po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la seng ldeng gi tshal pa zug
290a2(dkon brtsegs): go / zhes sgra ji bzhin kho nar 'dzin par byed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa lhas byin ni/ yun ring po nas de bzhin gshegs
290a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gshed ma dang / gcugs can dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bor gyur pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das
290a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gal te skyes bu dam pa lhas byin med par gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i bdag nyid gcig kyang
290a5(dkon brtsegs): yod par mi mngon te/ rigs kyi bu/ gang gi phyir skyes bu dam pa lhas byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la rtsod pa dang / sgrun pa dang / phyir rgol ba dag bstan
290a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i bdag nyid dag yod par mngon no/ /rigs kyi bu/ rgyal po'i tshig gis skyes bu dam pa lhas byin 'dis
290a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzhom par bya'o/ /snyam nas grong bar gyi dbus nas de bzhin gshegs pa la glang po che nor skyong rbad par gyur pa gang yin pa de /
290b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas btul cing rnam par btul nas dul bar mdzad de/ skye bo phal po ches de mthong nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin cing rmad du byung bar bzung ste/ dkon mchog
290b2(dkon brtsegs): gsum po 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog la skyabs su dong ste/ de yang skyes bu dam pa lhas byin gyi
290b3(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu'i rtsal yin par blta bar bya'o/ /de la blun po de dag ni/ kye ma lhas byin ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gshed ma dang / gcugs can dang / phyir rgol ba
290b4(dkon brtsegs): yin no| |zhes sgra ji bzhin kho nar 'dzin par byed do/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' gyur pa na tshe rabs lnga brgyar skyes bu dam pa lhas byin ni /
290b5(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa de yang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad bstan par bya ba'i phyir byas pa yin na/ de lta mi blun po kha cig /kye ma lhas byin ni/ de
290b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i gshed ma dang / gcugs can dang / phyir rgol ba yin no/ /zhas sgra ji bzhin kho nar 'dzin te/ de dag ni/ gzhi des lus zhig nas sems
290b7(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltas skyes bu dam pa lhas byin ni/ tshogs shin tu bsags pa/ dge
291a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags pa/ rgyal ba du ma la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par
291a2(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa/ byang chub chen po la gzhol ba/ byang chub chen po la 'bab pa/ byang chub chen po la bab pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye ba yin
291a3(dkon brtsegs): pas na| de la sdang ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag ni/ lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dwags rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba'i
291a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro| |gsol pa| bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms kyi phyir bram ze'i grong sA la can du ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa bzhin
291a5(dkon brtsegs): du phyir byung ngo / /zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de yang ngas phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la
291a6(dkon brtsegs): bltas te de lta bu bstan to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa la las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang med pa'i phyir te/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs
291a7(dkon brtsegs): pas phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la bltas nas de lta bu bstan te/ dge slong bsod snyoms pa kha cig bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs
291b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu zhugs pa'i tshe bdag nyid bsod nams chung bas bsod snyoms ma rnyed pa na/ de dag de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs
291b2(dkon brtsegs): p a yid la byas nas 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa de nyid kyang ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa bzhin
291b3(dkon brtsegs): du phyir byung na/ bdag cag dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ bsod snyoms ma rnyed pa 'dis bdag cag yongs su gdung bar mi bya'o/ /
291b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes brjod par 'gyur ba'i don gyi dbang 'di gzigs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms kyi phyir bram ze'i grong sA la can du ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs
291b5(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhin du phyir byung bar bstan to/ /gzhan yang bdud sdig can gyis bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams byin gyis brlabs pas na/ de ltar bsod snyoms mi ster to/ /
291b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes zer na/ de yang de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdud sdig can gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod snyoms kyi bar chad byed par mi nus pa'i phyir te/ 'on
291b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdud sdig can gyis bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kun tu byin gyis brlabs pa yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa
292a1(dkon brtsegs): la ni/ las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang med de/ sems can de dag nyid yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas thabs la
292a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa de lta bur ston par mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pas zhal zas bcad cing chad pa de na bdud dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha dang / lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang
292a3(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong go'u ta ma dang / nyan thos dag yid mi bde bar mi 'dug gam zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i thugs la sems par
292a4(dkon brtsegs): byed| de dag nyin mtshan du de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i thugs la sems kyis sems par byed pa na/ thugs kyi gnas gcig
292a5(dkon brtsegs): tsam la yang mtho ba med cing dma' ba med la/ sngon ji lta ba bzhin du phyis kyang de bzhin/ phyis ji lta ba bzhin du sngon yang de bzhin te/ yid mi bde ba med par
292a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rjes su mthong nas de'i tshe na lha'i bu bdun khri 'dus par gyur pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu btud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas
292a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang de dag la ci nas kyang de dag thams cad chos rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par dag par 'gyur pa de lta de ltar chos bshad de/ de ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs
292b1(dkon brtsegs): pa phyi ma'i skye bo la gzigs pa yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la las kyi sgrib pa yod pa ni/ ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bram ze'i bu mo dregs mas
292b2(dkon brtsegs): shing gi gzhong bu lto bar bcings te de bzhin gshegs pa la skur ba btab bo/ /zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
292b3(dkon brtsegs): pa| rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni/ las kyi sgrib pa'i nyes pa med de/ de bzhin gshegs pas bram ze'i bu mo dregs ma 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
292b4(dkon brtsegs): gi bye ma snyed du 'phang bar yang spyod mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas thabs la mkhas pas las kyi bya ba bstan te/ nga'i bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ba la skur pa btab pa
292b5(dkon brtsegs): dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag yang dag pa ma yin pa'i skur pas skur bar 'gyur bas de dag 'gyod pa can du gyur pa'i tshe de dag skur ba btab pa na 'di skad du/ de bzhin
292b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dkar po'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa des kyang re zhig mngon sum du skur ba brnyes par gyur na/ bdag cag gis lta ci'i phyir mi rnyed ces zer zhing / de dag
292b7(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe na skur pa de zil gyis mnan nas tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba spyod par 'gyur ba dang / nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro/ /bram ze'i
293a1(dkon brtsegs): bu mo dregs ma ni/ re zhig sdig pa'i las kun tu rgyas pa yin pas rmi lam na yang de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa 'debs par byed
293a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ shi 'phos nas kyang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas de kun tu srung bar spyod do/ /zhes
293a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen par gyur na ni/ de kun tu srung bar yang mdzad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can 'ga' yang yongs su ma btang ba'i phyir
293a4(dkon brtsegs): ro| |gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs med kyi ljongs su dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes pa na zla ba gsum du lta chas kyi nas dag
293a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ /zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ngas bram ze dang / khyim bdag de dag de
293a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa spyan drang bar mi sems par shes te/ shes bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa der dbyar gnas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
293a7(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par zla ba gsum gyi bar du gang dag gi rta chas gsol ba'i rta lnga brgya po de dag thams cad ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa
293b1(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi rgyal pa la bsnyen bkur byas pa sha stag yin te/ de dag sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du song nas sdig pa'i las byas pas las des de dag dud 'gro'i skye gnas su
293b2(dkon brtsegs): skyes te/ rta lnga brgya bo de dag gi nang na rta cang shes gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba smon lam gyi dbang gis bsam bzhin du der skyes
293b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin la/ rta lnga brgya po de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po de nyid kyis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa yin pas/ de dag yongs su smin par
293b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir der skyes te/ rta cang shes de nyid kyi mthus rta lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur cing / de dag gi byang chub kyi sems de
293b5(dkon brtsegs): yang mngon du gyur pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu/ de lta bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rta lnga brgya po de dag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir dbyar der gnas so/ /des na rta cang
293b6(dkon brtsegs): shes kyi chas kyi nas gang dag yin pa de dag las phyed ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'bul lo/ /rta lnga brgya po de dag gi chas kyi nas gang dag yin pa de dag las
293b7(dkon brtsegs): phyed ni/ dge slong lnga brgya po de dag la 'bul zhing / rta cang shes de rta'i skad des rta lnga brgya po de dag sdig pa 'chags su bcug cing / sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge
294a1(dkon brtsegs): slong lnga brgya po dag la phyag 'tshal du yang bcug go / rigs kyi bu/ de nas zla ba gsum po de dag 'das nas rta lnga brgya po de dag shi
294a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phos te dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skyes nas lhar gyur pa de dag gis yang de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri
294a3(dkon brtsegs): mor byas/ mchod par byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas kyang de dag la ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba
294a4(dkon brtsegs): de lta de ltar chos bstan to/ /rta lnga brgya po de dag 'dul zhing 'tsho bar byed pa'i rta rdzi gang yin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rang sangs rgyas rab tu sems
294a5(dkon brtsegs): dul zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de lta mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas gang yin pa de la ni/ mi bsod pa cung zad
294a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang med de/ rigs kyi bu/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas shing dang / bod ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo la sogs pa yongs su longs spyad par gyur na yang
294a7(dkon brtsegs): shing dang / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo la sogs pa de dag gi ro de lta bu dang / ro bro ba'i mchog gang dag yin pa de lta bu dag ni/ stong gsum gyi
294b1(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa
294b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba brnyes pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir rnam grangs des na/ khyod kyis 'di ltar blta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas thams cad ni /
294b3(dkon brtsegs): bsod pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang dge slong kun dga' bo 'di snyam du/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid
294b4(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas rta chas kyi nas dag gsol bar mdzad pa lta zhes snying rje bar gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas de'i sems la rnam par gzigs nas kun dga'
294b5(dkon brtsegs): bo| |'di ci'i ro yin shes sam zhes nas kyi 'bru gcig byin pa dang / des de zos nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur te nga la 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
294b6(dkon brtsegs): ni| rgyal po'i khyim du skyes shing rgyal po'i khyim du legs par rgyas pa lags na/ bdag gis ro 'di lta bu ni/ sngon chad ma myong lags so/ /zhes zer te/ de'i byin
294b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo zas mi za bar dga' ba dang / bde bas zhag bdun 'das par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di
295a1(dkon brtsegs): ltar blta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ gang la yang las kyi sgrib pa mi mnga' ba yin par rig par bya ste/ sems can gang dag
295a2(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong dang / bram ze tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag mgron du gnyer la zas 'bul gar mi byed pa de dag gis ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa nyid kun tu bstan
295a3(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir las kyi rgyud de lta bu nye bar ston par mdzad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs la zhal zas ma gsol ba de yang de bzhin
295a4(dkon brtsegs): g shegs pas log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ba'i chos su lung bstan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid kyi khyad par la
295a5(dkon brtsegs): ltos| rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu dbyar zla ba gsum gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge slong lnga brgya po gang dag yin pa de
295a6(dkon brtsegs): dag las dge slong bzhi bcu ni/ 'dod chags spyod pa dang / sdug pa'i mtshan ma la spyod pa yin pas gal te de'i tshe na de dag gis zas bsod pa dag zos par
295a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur na 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa shin tu shas chen po dag skye bar 'gyur ba zhig na/ de dag gis zas ngan pa zos pa des 'dod chags dang ldan
295b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag sra ba mor gyur nas de dag gis zhag bdun gyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de lta bas na/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs
295b2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyis gsungs pa nges par rtogs pa des ni/ legs pa kho nar nges par rtogs pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' dgongs te
295b3(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i
295b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag |bkri don gsungs pa gang yin dang / /des don gsungs pa gang yin pa/ /legs pa kho nar rtogs par byed/ /brtan pa dgongs la mkhas gyur pa/ /nying mtshams
295b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba spangs pa rnams/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan gyis/ /gsungs pa khong du chud pa yin/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyan
295b6(dkon brtsegs): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'dod pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sems
295b7(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dag| gam/ dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal dag gam/ yid dwags kyi sdug bsngal dag gis kun tu gdungs zhing tsha bar gyur kyang nyan thos dang
296a1(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i theg pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pa mi skyed cing / e ma'o/ /kye ma bdag len pa med par zag pa
296a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams las sems rnam par grol bar gyur cig / ces don nyung ngur mi byed de/ bya ba nyung ngur mi byed cing / don nyung ba nyid dang / bya ba nyung ba nyid la brtson
296a3(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed kyi/ de ni/ sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i las bya ba dag la grogs su 'gyur zhing / sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
296a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug / yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byed de/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub
296a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'dod pa yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
296a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid can dag ni/ /ri 'dra'i sems kyis spyod byed la/ /sems can don la mi skyo zhing / /byang
296a7(dkon brtsegs): chub las ni phyir mi ldog / byang chub sems dpa' sems can la/ /phan par 'dod pas skyo mi byed/ /sems can gzhan la phan pa'i phyir/ /bag med pa yang
296b1(dkon brtsegs): mi byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
296b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' chos gang dag dang ldan na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa lags pa'i chos bcu po de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
296b3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal lags na/ don gang gis ni/ theg pa chen po 'di la theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma stsal lags so/ /de skad ces
296b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
296b5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir de khyod nyid la 'dri'i/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa bzhin du lan thob cig /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
296b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan cig tu lam gang nas 'gro ba'i lam de ji skad brjod par bya snyam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ rgyal po'i
296b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs shul zhes brjod par bgyi lags so/ /shul po che zhes brjod par bgyi/ shul bde ba zhes brjod par bgyi/ shul bzang po zhes brjod par bgyi/ zhe 'gras
297a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis pa'i shul zhes brjod par bgyi/ 'khrug long ma mchis pa'i shul zhes brjod par bgyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
297a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg pa gang gis gshegs pa'i theg
297a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de la yang theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /theg pa mchog ces bya/ theg pa rab ces bya/ theg pa rab mchog ces bya/ theg pa thub bo zhes bya/ theg pa gtso bo zhes bya/
297a4(dkon brtsegs): theg pa bla na med pa zhes bya/ theg pa gong na med pa zhes bya/ theg pa mnyam pa med pa zhes bya/ theg pa mi mnyam pa med pa zhes bya/ theg pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
297a5(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'di la theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa chen po ni/ bzang ba lags so//
297a6(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa/ theg pa chen po ni/ bzang ba lags so/ /de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni/ bdag gi bdud kyi yul
297a7(dkon brtsegs): las yang dag par 'das shing / gzhan dag kyang yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa yin gyi/ bdag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas te dge sbyong go'u
297b1(dkon brtsegs): ta ma de dang / chos kyi rnam grangs de la mtho ba tsam du 'gro bar bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas bdud sdig can dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa go gyon nas
297b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang / bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig ga la ba de legs su song ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri
297b3(dkon brtsegs): med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal pos bdud sdig can dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das la mtho ba tsam pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs

298a1(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / gzhan ma stegs can rnams la tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba /

298a6(dkon brtsegs): dang | na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dang dag thogs te rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba
