303b7(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ /rgya gar
304a1(dkon brtsegs): skad du/ AR+Ya sa man+ta mu kha pa ri brtan ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa kun nas sgo'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ /
304a2(dkon brtsegs): bam po gcig pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das

304a5(dkon brtsegs): g shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang
304a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
304a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos yongs
304b1(dkon brtsegs): su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi mdun du bdar nas nam mkha' las 'ong bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das
304b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
304b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas me tog kun tu rgyas pas kun nas sgo'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par yongs su gzung ba'i phyir 'dir 'ong bar gnang ste btang gi / ngas kyang byang
304b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' dag bsdu bar bya bar nges so/ /snyam du dgongs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa de lta bu dgongs nas des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha'
304b5(dkon brtsegs): yas mu med pa dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dar lhags so/
304b6(dkon brtsegs): /lhags nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /byang chub sems
304b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang 'dus so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
305a1(dkon brtsegs): d pa' chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa thogs nas de bzhin gshegs

305a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun tu rgyas pa/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun gsol te/
305a5(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/
305a6(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa chung ngam zhes snyun gsol zhing 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa

305b1(dkon brtsegs): n as byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i snying pos bcom ldan 'das la rnam pa de dag gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan cig tu 'khor

305b3(dkon brtsegs): d pal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su

305b6(dkon brtsegs): t e| 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu snang ba'i sgron ma las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas ting nge

312a3(dkon brtsegs): de yang 'byung ba med/ /'byung ba med la gnas pa med/ /de yi gnas kyang rnyed mi 'gyur/ /gnas med gnas pa yod min pas/ /'dod chags nam mkha' 'dra
312a4(dkon brtsegs): ba yin| |byis pa bslad par gyur rnams kyis/ /kun nas nyon mongs yongs su brtags/ /kun nas nyon mongs med chos de/ /'dod chags zhes bya'i ming gis
312a5(dkon brtsegs): brjod| |phyogs bcu dag tu btsal byas kyang / /de yi dngos po rnyed mi 'gyur/ /'dod chags dngos po med pa la/ /byis pa rmongs pa 'jigs byed de/ /'jigs
312a6(dkon brtsegs): med 'jigs pa'i 'du shes can/ /de dag la ni bde ba med/ /ji ltar skyes bu la la dag /mkha' la 'jigs par 'du shes nas/ /skrag cing bdag gis nam
312a7(dkon brtsegs): mkha' ni/ /mi mthong bya zhes 'bros byed kyang / /nam mkhas kun tu khyab pas na/ /su yang de las mi thar te/ /byis pa bslad par gyur rnams kyis/ /phyin ci log
312b1(dkon brtsegs): tu rnam par brtags/ /de ltar chos rnams mkha' 'dra bar/ /shes pa'am gyur byis pa rnams/ /dngos po med pa'i 'dod chags la/ /yongs su spang bar mngon par
312b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod| |'dod chags nam mkha' 'dra bas na/ /su yang de las 'grol ba med/ /grol zhing rnam grol phun sum tshogs/ /chos rnams mya ngan 'das dang 'dra/ /sangs
312b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang / /'dren pa gang dag bzhugs pa dang / /gang dag 'byung 'gyur rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /de kun spyod yul 'dod chags yin/ /'dod chags
312b4(dkon brtsegs): stong par shes gyur na/ /chags pas grol ba gang yang med/ /gang dag chags la 'jigs 'du shes/ /de dag chags las grol byang sems/ /ci yang med pa'i
312b5(dkon brtsegs): mtha' 'di ni/ /'dod chags mtha' ste 'od gsal zhing / /mtshan ma med la brtag mnyam par/ /byang chub snying por nga yis mthong / /dngos por 'du shes sems
312b6(dkon brtsegs): can gang / /de dag 'dod chags 'bri bar 'gyur/ /yod pa min pa yongs su brtags pas/ /de dag gis ni spong ba brtags/ /bdag gis 'dod chags spang bya zhes/ /
312b7(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra'i 'du shes skyes nas ni/ /de la spangs zhes brjod par bya/ /'gro ba 'di dag 'du shes tsam/ 'dod chags mtha' ni bsam yas te/ /mtha' de 'jig pa med
313a1(dkon brtsegs): pas na| yang dag mtha' dang de mnyam pas/ /de las grol bar ma rtogs shig /gal te chags las grol 'gyur na/ /stong pa nyid las
313a2(dkon brtsegs): grol bar 'gyur/ 'dod chags dang ni stong pa nyid/ /de gnyis gnyis su yod ma yin/ 'di ltar skye ba med pa la/ /de dag skye bar rnam brtags pas/ /byis pa
313a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis su shes rnams la/ /ngas ni spong ba rab tu bstan/ /'dod chags de ni skye med na/ /'dod chags zhes bya'i ming du brjod/ /ming rnams kun tu chags med
313a4(dkon brtsegs): pas| |ming la su yang chags pa med/ /'dod chags chags pa med shes shing / /mtha' las 'das pa'i stong mthong na/ /'dod chags rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir//
313a5(dkon brtsegs): thar pa mkhas pas mi mthong ngo / /'dod chags sangs rgyas chos mtshungs shing / /mya ngan 'das pa 'drar shes nas/ /rdul dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ /'dod
313a6(dkon brtsegs): chags sgras ni ngas bstan to/ /zhi pa'i dbyings la brten pa yin/ /'dod chags rab tu zhi shes nas/ /mkhas pa rnams la nga yis ni/ /ting 'dzin 'dod chags
313a7(dkon brtsegs): sgrar bstan to/ /'jam dpal/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpas 'dod chags ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub
313b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas zhe sdang ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na/ spong las zhe sdang kun tu 'byung / /nyon mongs pa yang rkyen pas skyes/ /bdag med pa las byung ba'i bdag /mang
313b2(dkon brtsegs): po'i tshogs las skyes pa yin/ /rtsub po'i sgra las zhe sdang ni/ /dug rnon lta bu kun tu 'byung / /sgra ni nga ro'i rang bzhin pas/ /shin tu yod pa ma yin no/ /ji ltar tshogs
313b3(dkon brtsegs): pas gtsub shing dang / /gtsub stan las ni me 'byung ste/ /tshogs dang bral bar gyur na ni/ /de na me yang yod min ltar/ /de bzhin yod du mi 'ong ba'i/ /sgra las zhe
313b4(dkon brtsegs): sdang gsog 'byung zhing / /gsog gi sgra la yongs brtags na/ /de las zhe sdang rnyed mi 'gyur/ /zhe sdang sgra las ma byung zhing / /nang na gnas pa'ang ma yin la/ /zhe sdang
313b5(dkon brtsegs): phyi rol nas 'ongs te/ /byung ba med pas gsog yin no/ /rgyu rnams phan tshun 'dus pa las/ /zhe sdang kun tu 'byung ba yin/ /phan tshun bral bar gyur na ni/ /de la zhe
313b6(dkon brtsegs): sdang rnyed mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar zho dang 'o ma la/ /skyes bus brtsal te srub shing gis/ /bsrubs pa byas pas rkyen rnams las/ /mar ni kun tu 'byung ba ltar/ /de bzhin
313b7(dkon brtsegs): yid du mi 'thad pa'i/ /sgra las zhe sdang gsog 'byung zhing / /yongs su brtags pas de'i gnas la/ /mi mkhas pa dag rab tu 'bar/ /kun tu brtags pas zhe sdang
314a1(dkon brtsegs): ni| |shin tu dngos med shes pas na/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba brjod pa ni/ /zhe sdang sgra yis rab tu bstan/ /zhe sdang yang dag mtha' dang
314a2(dkon brtsegs): mnyam| |de bzhin nyid la bstan pa yin/ /chos kyi dbyings dang 'drar shes pas/ /des na ting nge 'dzin ces bstan/ /'jam dpal/ de ltar na/ zhe sdang ting nge
314a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpas gti mug ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na/ ma rig pa las gti mug
314a4(dkon brtsegs): byung / /ma rig pa yang yod ma yin/ /gang na gti mug yod min pa/ /de na yang rmongs pa med/ /rmongs med sems can rmongs gyur cing / /chags med
314a5(dkon brtsegs): chags par 'du shes pa/ /ji ltar byis pas nam mkhal la/ /mdud pa bor ba gsog bzhin no/ /yod pa ma yin chos rnams la/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnams
314a6(dkon brtsegs): brtags pa/ /byis pa rnams kyi 'di mtshar te/ /mchog tu shin tu bya bar dka'/ /ji ltar skyes bu la la zhig /nam mkha' la ni 'jal byed cing / /bskal pa
314a7(dkon brtsegs): bye bar gzhal byas kyang / /de la phung po mi rnyed ltar/ /de bzhin rmongs pas byis pa yi/ /sngon gyi mtha' ni bsam mi khyab/ /gti mgu phung por 'byung med de/ /
314b1(dkon brtsegs): des ni ci yang bkang ba med/ /ji ltar nam mkha' gzhal byas kyang / /de la sngon gyi mtha' med cing / /de nas ci yang bkang ba med/ /gzhal ba nus pa med pa ltar/ /de bzhin bskal
314b2(dkon brtsegs): pa stong rnams su/ /kun tu rmongs pas dgang byad kyang / /de la bkang ba ci yang med/ /ngoms pa'ang nyung zad yod ma yin/ /ji ltar skyes bu la la yis/ /spud pa stong pa bud
314b3(dkon brtsegs): byas shing / /bzhag nas sbud pa rnyongs pa na/ /de yi nang na rnyed min ltar/ /de bzhin 'dod pa sbud 'dra ba/ /kun tu rmongs pas spyod par byed/ /de ni ngoms par mi 'gyur te/ /
314b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhing 'dod pa tshol bar byed/ /gti mgu yod pa min zhes brjod/ /rtsa ba chad cing dngos po med/ /rtsa ba med cing gnas kyang med/ /des na gti mug zad pa med/ /'di
314b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar gti mug mi zad pas/ /de yi mtha' ma rnyed mi 'gyur/ /de phyir sems can thams cad la/ /zad par bya bar ngas mi nus/ /gal te dpe tsam brjod bya na/ /bskal pa byed
314b6(dkon brtsegs): ba bsam yas su/ /nga yi tshe ni gnas gyur la/ /nyin gcig bzhin du nyin re la/ /stong gsum sems can ji snyed pa/ /thams cad mya ngan bzlas byas shing / /thams cad
314b7(dkon brtsegs): de ltar byas kyang ni/ sems can khams la zad pa med/ /gti mug gis ni bskyed pa'i khams/ /sems can khams la mtshan nyid med/ /gti mug de ni sgyu ma 'dra/ /
315a1(dkon brtsegs): des na de yi mtha' mi rnyed/ /sangs rgyas gti mug mnyam pas na/ /de dag gnyis su med par bstan/ /rmongs gyur gyis pa de dag gis/ /
315a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dir ni sangs rgyas rnam par brtags/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid gti mug mnyam/ /gti mug thams cad yod ma yin/ /gti mug sems can kun dang mnyam/ /
315a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can kun kyang bsam mi khyab/ /bsam mi khyab dang gti mug ni/ /sems bskyed pa yis rnam par brtags/ /sems kun bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /de yi
315a4(dkon brtsegs): tshad ni yod ma yin/ /gti mug de la tshad med pas/ /de yi 'byung ba rnyed mi 'gyur/ /'byung ba yod pa ma yin no/ /skye ba yod par ga la 'gyur/ /gti mug skyes
315a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin na/ /de yi rmongs byed ci 'dra zhig /de yi rmongs byed ci 'dra ba/ /sangs rgyas kun kyang de dang 'dra/ /tha dad dbye ba med shes na/ /chos rnams thams cad
315a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis su med/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba brjod pa ni/ /gti mug sgra yis rab tu bstan/ /gang tshe nga yis mnyam nyid shes/ /de ni de dang gti mug mnyam/ /de dag
315a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mnyam shes nas/ /ting 'dzin de ltar shes par gyis/ /'jam dpal/ de ltar na/ gti mug ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o/ /'jam dpal /
315b1(dkon brtsegs): de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpas mi dge ba thams cad ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na/ 'dod chags spyod pa'i rtags gang dang / /zhe sdang spyod pa'i g.yo
315b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / /gti mug spyod pa gang yin pa/ /thams cad ting 'dzin shes par gyis/ /nyon mongs kun gyi sgrub pa ni/ /ting 'dzin yin par mos par gyis/ /rdzun dang
315b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ma yin par/ /thams cad de bzhin sgom par gyis/ /'jam dpal/ de ltar na/ mi dge ba thams cad ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o/ /'jam dpal/
315b4(dkon brtsegs): de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpas dge ba thams cad ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na/ sems can rnams kyi ji snyed dge /sems dang spyod pa ci 'dra ba/ /
315b5(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa thams cad spyod gcig ste/ /de ltar ting 'dzin shes par gyis/ /sems can kun gyi spyod pa dag /sgrub pa gcig tu shes pas na/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba
315b6(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa ni/ /kun gyi sgra yis bstan pa yin/ /'jam dpal/ de ltar na/ dge ba thams cad ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ de la ji ltar na /
315b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas 'dus byas thams cad ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na/ 'du byed thams cad 'du byed min/ /de dag bgrang bas gzhal byas na/ /
316a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhal du med cing dpag tu med/ /de ltar ting 'dzin shes par gyis/ /dpag tu med par shes na ni/ /lus med dngos po yod
316a2(dkon brtsegs): min pas/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba brjod pa ni/ /'du byed kun gyis bstan pa yin/ /'jam dpal/ de ltar na/ 'dus byas thams cad ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o/ /
316a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpas 'dus ma byas thams cad ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na/ chos 'di rang bzhin zhi bas na/ /de la grangs
316a4(dkon brtsegs): ni yod ma yin/ /ma rig pa yis bsgrub zhi ba/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgrub par bstan/ /'dus byas kun la brjod med cing / /sgrub pa med pa shes nas ni/ /sems
316a5(dkon brtsegs): can gang dag brjod la chags/ /de dag rnams la de ltar bstan/ /'jam dpal/ de ltar na/ 'dus ma byas thams cad ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o/ /tshigs
316a6(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa mngon par sgrub pa'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ /
316a7(dkon brtsegs): lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /dge slong sum khri drug stong ni/ len pa
316b1(dkon brtsegs): med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /dge slong ma drug stong nyis ba rgyas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /dge
316b2(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen sa ya brgyad 'bum gyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /dge bsnyen ma sa ya phrag bzhi dang nyis 'bum gyis kyang bla na med
316b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /byang chub sems
316b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' dbang po rnon po gang dag 'byung ba de dag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ming thos na/ chos thams cad la snang ba thob par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i
316b5(dkon brtsegs): bu thams cad dang / gang zag dmigs pa'i lta ba can rnams kyis thul bar dka' ba dang / yi ge gcig gis yi ge thams cad rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / yi ge
316b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis yi ge gcig rtogs par 'gyur pa dang / thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pas sems can thams cad la chos ston pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /
316b7(dkon brtsegs): chos zab mo la bzod par 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa thams cad la mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs shing so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis mun pa ma mchis pa thob par
317a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ming bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
317a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad
317a3(dkon brtsegs): do| |'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin no/ /zhes gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de
317a4(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal/ mtha' yas dri ma med ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob na/ byang chub sems dpa'
317a5(dkon brtsegs): gzungs thams cad yongs su dag par ston to/ /'jam dpal/ mgyogs par 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob na/ byang chub sems
317a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' nyi ma dang / zla ba'i 'od zil gyis gnon par byed do/ /'jam dpal/ 'od zer 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob na/ byang chub
317a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dag gi gzi brjid zil gyis gnon par byed do/ /'jam dpal/ yul ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin
317b1(dkon brtsegs): de thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug zhi bar byed do/ /'jam dpal/ 'od zer thogs pa med pa
317b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'od zer gyis snang bar byed do/ /'jam dpal/ chos
317b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mi brjed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa thams cad 'dzin cing gzhan la
317b4(dkon brtsegs): yang ston par byed do/ /'jam dpal/ seng+ge'i sgra mngon par bsgrags pa'i dbyangs yid du 'ong ba rjes su sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob
317b5(dkon brtsegs): na| byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sgras mngon par go bar byed do/ /'jam dpal/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / tshim pa thams cad yang dag
317b6(dkon brtsegs): par bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pa sna tshogs yang dag
317b7(dkon brtsegs): par mgu bar byed do/ /'jam dpal/ lta bas chog mi shes shing mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob na/ byang chub
318a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' lta ba dang mnyan pas chog mi shes par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyad pa'i 'byung gnas shes
318a2(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi yul rin po che'i 'byung khungs rgyun gcig pa nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' rdzu
318a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul bstan pa thams cad ston pa dang / sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do/ /'jam dpal/ sgra skad thams cad kyi brda zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge
318a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin de thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' sgra skad dang / brjod pa dang / brda thams cad rtogs shing yi ge thams cad kyis yi ge gcig ston pa dang / yi ge gcig
318a5(dkon brtsegs): gis yi ge thams cad ston par byed do/ /'jam dpal/ las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gsog cing ston
318a6(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' cang mi smra bar snyoms par zhugs te yi ge gcig tsam yang mi brjod
318a7(dkon brtsegs): par sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / nyan thos kyi sgra dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / byang chub sems
318b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sgra dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra thos par byed do/ /'jam dpal/ gzungs thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge
318b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin de thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs mtha' yas pa sgrub pa la 'jug pa khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ chos thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa zhes
318b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' yi ge thams cad la spobs shing sgra skad thams cad dang / dbyangs thams cad dang / brjod
318b4(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad la yang spobs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag chos
318b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan brjod pa'i khyad par la spobs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod spobs par gyis shig /'jam
318b6(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag nem nur ma mchis pa dang / the tshom ma mchis pa'i sems kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston
318b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par bgyid pa de tshe 'di nyid la gdon mi 'tshal bar
319a1(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa thob par re bar bgyi ste/ spobs pa myur ba dang / spobs pa rgya che ba dang / zab mo la spobs pa dang / mi brjed pa'i spobs pa dang /
319a2(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa sna tshogs pa thob par re bar bgyi'o/ /de ni/ sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa ma mchis pa'i sems su 'gyur bar re bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na /
319a3(dkon brtsegs): gang ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgrub pa de ni/ spyod pa 'di nyid dang rjes su 'brel ba lags pa'i slad du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon
319a4(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras so/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/
319a5(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ sbyin pa ni/ longs spyod chen po thob par slu ba med do/ /tshul khrims ni/ mtho ris su skye bar slu ba med do/ /thos pa ni/ shes rab chen por 'gyur bar
319a6(dkon brtsegs): slu ba med do/ /sgom pa ni/ 'bral bar 'gyur bar slu ba med do/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang tshe 'di nyid la spobs pa skye bar slu bar med
319a7(dkon brtsegs): do| |'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma shar bas ni/ mun pa mun nag thams cad sel bar byed do/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs
319b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di yang bstan ma thag tu spobs pa skye bar re bar bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ nges par bla na
319b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
319b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu 'don pa de yang the tshom med par nges par tshe 'di nyid la spobs pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems
319b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe 'di nyid la spobs pa thob par 'dod pas nem nur med pa dang / the tshom med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/ bcang
319b5(dkon brtsegs): bar bya| kha ton du bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la
319b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das yongs
319b7(dkon brtsegs): su mya ngan las 'das nas byang chub sems dpa' gang nem nur ma mchis pa dang / the tshom ma mchis pa'i sems kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang
320a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyi ba dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba de la
320a2(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /de nas bdud sdig can du zhing smres sngags 'don bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song sten phyin nas bcom ldan
320a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ thugs rje
320a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan zhing sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams la bde ba rab tu stsol ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi yid mi bde ba de legs par bsal
320a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di slar zhing byin gyis mi brlab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs
320a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / da ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe bdag 'dir shin tu cher sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba dang / mya ngan gyi zug rdus gzir bar gyur
320a7(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tha na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can gang dag gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang
320b1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par 'gyur lags na/ gang dag gis thos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par
320b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par bgyid pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi
320b3(dkon brtsegs): ldog par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ sems can de dag thams cad ni/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/
320b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i slad du bdag gi bdud kyi gnas stong par 'gyur lags na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ thugs
320b5(dkon brtsegs): rje dang ldan zhing sdug bsngal ba rnams la bde ba stsol ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag dbugs dbyung du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag
320b6(dkon brtsegs): dbugs dbyung du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sdig can/ ma 'jigs shig /sems can thams
320b7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur la/ sdig can/ nga yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la byin gyis rlob par mi byed kyi/ sdig can/ ma 'jigs
321a1(dkon brtsegs): shig / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs dbyung ba mdzad pas bdud sdig can tshim zhing dga' la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga'
321a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas de nyid du mi snang par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol
321a3(dkon brtsegs): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ ci las dgongs te 'di skad du / nga chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la byin gyis rlob par mi byed do/ /zhes bdud sdig can la bka'
321a4(dkon brtsegs): stsal| bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ chos thams cad ni/ byin gyi rlabs med pas byin gyis brlabs pa yin te/ chos kyi
321a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di yang byin gyi rlabs med pas byin gyis brlabs pa yin pas 'jam dpal/ de'i phyir ngas bdud sdig can la 'di skad du/ nga chos kyi rnam grangs
321a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di la byin gyis rlob par mi byed do/ /zhes smras so/ /'jam dpal/ bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis chos thams cad byin gyi rlabs med pas byin
321a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis brlabs pa dang / tha dad du dbyer med pa dang / brjod du med pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / bsnyad du med pa dang / smrar med pa dang / gnyis su
321b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / gnyis dang bral ba dang / yang dag par mtha' dang mnyam pa dang / de bzhin nyid du zhugs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i bden pa
321b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i sling na rab tu spyod par gyur cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs de mdzad
321b3(dkon brtsegs): nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gang yin pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang yin pa de dag
321b4(dkon brtsegs): ni| mnyam pa'i phyir khyod kyis kun nas sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zungs shig / chongs shig / lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la yang
321b5(dkon brtsegs): rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ kun nas sgo'i chos kyi dbyings 'di legs par thugs su chud
321b6(dkon brtsegs): nas sems can rnams la chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par srung pa dang / legs
321b7(dkon brtsegs): par gzung ba dang / legs par kun chub par gyis shig / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i
322a1(dkon brtsegs): snying po dang / /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i
322a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa
322a3(dkon brtsegs): las| kun nas sgo'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ le'u bcu pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang su ren+d+ra po d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye
322a4(dkon brtsegs): shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya pra b+ha sa man+ta muk+to nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa
322a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer kun tu bskye ba bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag
322a6(dkon brtsegs): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang rang dbang chen po thob pa lnga
322a7(dkon brtsegs): brgya dang / gzhan yang tshe gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu dang / gzhan yang byang
322b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa khrag khrig phrag bzhi bcu dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de nyid
322b2(dkon brtsegs): d u zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba zhig 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa de stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs nas
322b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs
322b4(dkon brtsegs): pas sngon 'phrin las ci zhig mdzad na/ 'di ltar rnam par nges pa'i 'od zer dang / yongs su sdud pa'i 'od zer dang / kun nas slong ba'i 'od zed dang / rab tu ston pa'i 'od
322b5(dkon brtsegs): zer dang / kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer dang / kha dog 'dres pa ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / rgya chung du'i 'od zer dang / rgya chen po'i 'od zer dang / rnam par dag pa'i 'od
322b6(dkon brtsegs): zer dang / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od zer dang / dri ma ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / shin tu dri ma ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od zer dang / rim
322b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis 'phel ba'i 'od zer dang / gsal ba'i 'od zer dang / shin tu gsal ba'i 'od zer dang / mtha' ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / shin tu mtha' ma mchis pa'i 'od zer
323a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshad ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / shin tu tshad ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / grangs kyi tshad ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / shin tu grangs
323a2(dkon brtsegs): kya tshad ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / myur ba'i 'od zer dang / shin tu myur ba'i 'od zer dang / gnas ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / kun tu 'bar ba'i 'od zer dang / snang bar
323a3(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa'i 'od zer dang / mos par bgyid pa'i 'od zer dang / pha rol tu phyin par bgyid pa'i 'od zer dang / thogs pa ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / g.yo ba ma mchis
323a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'od zer dang / drang po'i 'od zer dang / dpag tu ma mchis pa la gnas pa'i 'od zer dang / gzugs kyi mtshan gyi 'od zer dang / gzugs kyi mtshan sna tshogs kyi 'od zer dang /
323a5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi mtshan nyid tshad ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od zer dang / kha dog leb
323a6(dkon brtsegs): rgan gyi 'od zer dang / chu shel gyi kha dog gi mtshan nyid kyi 'od zer dang / nam mkha'i kha dog gi mtshan nyid kyi 'od zer dang / de lta bu la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs
323a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'od zer re re kun kyang kha dog rnam pa lnga'i 'od zer 'dres par gyur pa ston par mdzad pa nas kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po'i dngos
323b1(dkon brtsegs): po re re kun kyang 'od zer kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs tshad ma mchis pa dpag tu ma mchis pa dag dang 'dres par gyur pa rab tu ston par mdzad pa'i bar du brnyes par gyur lags/ /
323b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /dge ba'i las kyi rgyu rkyen gyis/ /rmongs pa
323b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni rab spangs nas/ /'od zer sna tshogs grub pa yin/ /gzhan yang spyod pa sna tshogs kyis/ /sangs rgyas lam la rab gnas shing / /stong pa byed med shes rab kyis//
323b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dres pa'i 'od zer bstan pa yin/ /ji ltar phyi rol chos dag la/ /mtshan nyid bye brag sna tshogs snang / /de ni stong zhing bdag kyang med/ /byed pa med cing sems yid med//
323b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang ji ltar nang gi lus/ /stong zhing bdag med byed med kyang / /de las rnam pa sna tshogs gyi/ /sgra skad dag ni rab tu ston/ /de ltar byed med dbang gis ni/ /kha
323b6(dkon brtsegs): dog dpag med 'od bstan nas/ /mos pa dag ni ji bzhin du/ /re ba dag ni skong bar mdzad/ /res 'ga' 'od zer gcig las ni/ /kha dog rnam pa gnyis bskyed nas/ /so
323b7(dkon brtsegs): sor rab 'bring tha ma yi/ /bye brag yod par rab tu ston/ /res 'ga' 'od zer gcig las ni/ /kha dog rnam pa gsum bskyed nas/ /so sor rab 'bring tha ma yi/ /bye brag

333a3(dkon brtsegs): rin po che yi gdugs dam pa/ /bye ba phrag ni brgyad cu snyed/ /bcom ldan de la rab tu phul/ /rin chen gdugs ni re re la/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i dra ba dag /mtha'
