333a6(dkon brtsegs): ni rab gsal bas/ /nyin mtshan dag ni med par yang / /rtag tu 'od zer rab tu gtong / /'od zer de dag re res kyang / /dpag tshad brgya ni snang bar byed/ /'od zer de
333a7(dkon brtsegs): dag rab gsal bas/ /nyi zla dag ni zil gyis gnon/ /gzhan yang rin chen gdugs de dag /seng+ge rin chen chun 'phyang ni/ /bye ba phrag ni brgyad cu dang / /gser skud
333b1(dkon brtsegs): rin chen phreng ba yang / /bye ba phrag ni brgyad cu dag /ngos bzhi dag ni rab tu brgyan/ /gzhan yang rin chen dam pa ni/ /'di ltar rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /mu tig rin
333b2(dkon brtsegs): chen dra ba dag / spel ba dag gis rnam par brgyan/ /'di lta bu yi gdugs dag gis/ /skyed mos tshal ni kun tu g.yogs/ /de yi steng du gzhan yang ni/ /pad+ma su man
333b3(dkon brtsegs): da dang ni/ /pad+ma a ti muk+ta ka /btang bzung zhes ni bya ba dang / /pad+ma u dum wa ra dang / /pad+ma sngon po la sogs dang / /de bzhin rnam pa sna tshogs kyi/ /pad+ma'i gdugs ni
333b4(dkon brtsegs): tshad med pa/ /re re thams cad kun kyang ni/ /rin chen dra ba 'tsham par byas/ /gzhan yang gser gyi skud pa las/ /byas pa'i gos bzang dag gis ni/ /bla re dag tu
333b5(dkon brtsegs): rab byas nas/ /de yi steng du khyab par g.yogs/ /gzhan yang tsan+dan rin chen khri/ /gser dag las ni rkang byas pa/ /de yi grangs kyang bye ba phrag /brgyad cu snyed ni
333b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bshams/ /rin chen khri ni de dag la/ /zab dar dag las byas pa yi/ /stan ni bye ba phrag brgyad cu/ /de yi steng du rab brgyan to/ /de yi tshe na sems can gyi/ /
333b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa dag ni ji snyed pa/ /srid pa'i rtse mo man chad kyang / /thams cad der ni 'dus gyur nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de las ni/ /mdo sde 'di ni rab tu nyan/ /lha
334a1(dkon brtsegs): dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /dri za yi ni rgyal bo dang / /lto 'phye chen po lha ma yin/ /de dag mdo sde 'di thos nas/ /rab tu dga' ba'i
334a2(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed nas/ /tshigs su bcad pa brgyad stong gis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags brjod nas/ /de dag thams cad kun gyis kyang / /byang chub chen por
334a3(dkon brtsegs): smon lam btab/ /lha dang klu dang lha ma yin/ /de la sogs pa thams cad kyang / /yongs su dang ba'i sems kyis ni/ /me tog man+dA ra ba dang / /mu tig rin chen la
334a4(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa'i/ /char phab mchod pa rab tu byas/ /de yi tshe na gzhan yang ni/ /lha chen mthu dang gzi ldan pa/ /bye ba phrag ni brgyad cu snyed/ /mdo sde 'di ni thos pas
334a5(dkon brtsegs): na| |rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas/ /byang chub chen por smon lam btab/ /ma 'ongs pa yi dus kyi tshe/ /'od zer 'di 'dra thob par shog /de bzhin gshegs
334a6(dkon brtsegs): pas de yi tshe/ /de yi bsam pa thugs chud pas/ /ma 'ongs sangs rgyas 'grub 'gyur zhes/ /byang chub tu ni lung yang bstan/ /de yi tshe na gzhan yang ni/ /brgya
334a7(dkon brtsegs): byin lha yi dbang po dang / /tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas pa yang / /bye ba phrag ni brgyad cu snyed/ /'od zer rab tu ston pa yi/ /mdo sde 'di ni thos pas na/ /rab
334b1(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas/ /byang chub tu ni sems kyang bskyed/ /ma 'ongs sangs rgyas 'grub 'gyur zhes/ /byang chub tu ni lung yang bstan/ /de yi tshe na gzhan yang
334b2(dkon brtsegs): ni| |klu ni bye ba khrag khrig phrag / brgyad cu snyed ni 'dus pa dag /mdo sde 'di ni thos pas na/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed pas/ /lung bstan pa yang thob par gyur/ /de
334b3(dkon brtsegs): yi tshe na gzhan yang ni/ /gser 'dab rgyal po bye ba phrag /brgyad cu snyed ni 'dus pa dag /mdo sde 'di ni thos pas na/ /sdom pa lnga ni rab bsrungs te/ /lung bstan pa
334b4(dkon brtsegs): yang thob par gyur/ /de yi tshe na gzhan yang ni/ /dri za'i rgyal po bye ba phrag /brgyad cu snyed ni 'dus pa dag /mdo sde 'di ni thos pas na/ /rol mo brgya stong rnams byas
334b5(dkon brtsegs): te| |sgra snyan dag ni rab phyung nas/ /bcom ldan de la mchod byas pas/ /lung bstan pa yang thob par gyur/ /de yi tshe na gzhan yang ni/ /gnod sbyin rgyal po khrag khrig
334b6(dkon brtsegs): snyed| |mdo sde 'di ni thos pas na/ /sangs rgyas ye shes dag la ni/ /shin tu dang ba skyes par gyur/ /de dag thams cad kun gyis kyang / /byang chub lung bstan thob par
334b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur| |zla 'od 'di ltar shes par gyis/ /de tshe rgyal po sgra mos pas/ /mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /bcom ldan de la mchod byas pa/ /gzhan yin snyam du mi
335a1(dkon brtsegs): blta ste/ /de ni khyod bdag nyid yin no/ /khyod ni sngon 'das dus kyi tshe/ /mdo sde 'di ni thos pa'i rgyus/ /de lta bas na deng 'dir yang / /'di
335a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid slar yang zhus pa yin/ /nga ni mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og /gang yang rung ba su zhig gis/ /dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor la dag /rnam par 'jig pa'i dus kyi tshe/ /
335a3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi bstan pa 'di dag la/ /dang ba'i sems ni gang bskyed pa/ /'di lta bu yi mdo sde dag /rgya cher yang dag ston par nus/ /ma 'ongs mdo sde 'di ni gang ston pa/ /
335a4(dkon brtsegs): des ni nga yi chos 'dzin srung bar byed/ /de ni 'gro mang 'deng pa'i ded dpon 'dra/ /rin chen gter 'dzin srung ba zhes kyang bya/ /ma 'ongs dus tshe mdo sde gang thos nas/ /
335a5(dkon brtsegs): skad cig tsam du mos pa skyed byed pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ /'jam dpal byin gyis brlabs par rig bar bya/ /des ni sangs rgyas mang po
335a6(dkon brtsegs): mthong 'gyur pas/ /gsang ba'i chos gtad shes rab rno bar 'gyur/ /sems can gang dag sems drang mnyen des shing / /rtag tu sangs rgyas rim gro byed la brtson/ /
335a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag med sgom zhing byams dang bzod skyed pa/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ /gang zhig rtag tu mi dge'i sems 'chang zhing / /rnyed la gdu zhing chog mi
335b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / /rab dben rnams la mos par mi 'gyur ba/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod dang / /dam chos zab mo
335b2(dkon brtsegs): legs par rtogs pa dang / /sangs rgyas yang dag ye shes yid ches pa/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ /gang zhig sems g.yeng dang ba'i sems med cing / /rtag
335b3(dkon brtsegs): tu srog gcod 'dul bar rab dka' dang / /'dod pa'i yul rnams kyi ni bran byed pa/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig rtag tu dgon gnas rab mos
335b4(dkon brtsegs): shing / /gcig bu dben par 'dug cing sems zhi dang / /rnyed dang / gnyen la mngon par zhen med pa/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ /gang zhig grogs ngan dag
335b5(dkon brtsegs): gi rjes 'brang zhing / /bdag dang gzhan gyi dge ba 'jig byed dang / /tshul khrims ting 'dzin dag ni cher nyams pa/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig
335b6(dkon brtsegs): yid mos shin tu rnam dag cing / /rtag tu shes rab chos rnams rab 'byed dang / /dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag gis rab bsrungs pa/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par
335b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur| |gang zhig gnyen gyi khyim la rab chags shing / /me tog 'bras bu byin na dga' byed dang / /sems la drang po med cing sgyu 'chang ba/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos
336a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig rtag tu sangs rgyas drin dran zhing / /dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog la mos pa dang / /byang chub bsngo zhing g.yo sgyu med gyur
336a2(dkon brtsegs): pa| |des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chung ma bu mor sred chags shing / /gos mchog sna tshogs dag gis rab brgyan nas/ /rtag tu bde dang
336a3(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig rtse smon pa/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig sems zab gnas ba med gyur cing / /'dod pa'i yul gyis gos pa med pa dang / /
336a4(dkon brtsegs): zas skom dag gis g.yo sgyu mi skyed pa/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ /gang zhig skye rgu rnams la 'di skad du/ /'dod chags sbyad kyang nyes med gang
336a5(dkon brtsegs): zer ba| |dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams la skur ba yin/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig yid ches rtag tu rab brtan zhing / /nan tan bskyed
336a6(dkon brtsegs): nas chos rnams tshol ba la/ /skye ba med cing brnyas par mi byed pa/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chung ma bu mor mngon zhen cing / /
336a7(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu 'dod pa'i yul ni rjes dran dang / /shes rab mi sgom rgya cher phan mi 'dogs/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig ri dang nags khrod rab
336b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas shing / /shes rab bsgoms nas shin tu dga' 'gyur dang / /'tsho ba'i yo byad dag la 'dod med pa/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig
336b2(dkon brtsegs): gi sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha'/ /rtag tu rmongs dang mi rtog gang yin pa/ /de ni gti mug bdud kyis bcings pas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig
336b3(dkon brtsegs): mig gi sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha'/ /rtag tu rtogs shing rmongs pa med gyur pa/ /de ni bdud kyi bcings las grol bas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ /gang
336b4(dkon brtsegs): zhig mig mtha' yod dang med pa la/ /rtag tu rmongs nas khong du ma chud pa/ /de ni gti mug bdud kyis bcings pas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /gang
336b5(dkon brtsegs): zhig mig mtha' yod dang med pa dag / rtag tu rtogs shing rmongs pa med gyur pa/ /des ni bdud gyi bcings las grol bas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par
336b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur| |gang zhig mig gnas 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid la/ /rtag tu rmongs shing khong du mi chud pa/ /de ni gti mug bdud kyi bcings pas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di
336b7(dkon brtsegs): la mos mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig gnas 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid dag /rtag tu khong du chud cing rmongs med pa/ /de ni bdud kyis bcings las grol bas na/ /
337a1(dkon brtsegs): des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ /rna ba sna dang lce lus yid dag dang / /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos rnams dang / /sa chu me rlung
337a2(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid dag dang / /dngos po sems can sdug bsngal phung po dang / /khams dang 'jig rten skye sgra mi bden dang / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal sred/ /
337a3(dkon brtsegs): 'chab rgyags ser sna phrag dog g.yo sgyu dang / /khro sogs pa yang de bzhin rig par gyis/ /gang zhig mig zad mtha' ni de dag la/ /rtag tu rmongs shing khong du mi chud
337a4(dkon brtsegs): pa| |de ni skye ba'i spyod par lhung bas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig zad mtha' ni de dag la/ /rtag par khong du chud cing rmongs med pa/ /
337a5(dkon brtsegs): de ni skye ba'i spyod dang bral pas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig gi 'jig pa de dag la/ /rtag tu rmongs shing khong du ma chud pa/ /de
337a6(dkon brtsegs): ni skye ba'i spyod par lhung bas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig gi 'jig pa de dag la/ /rtag par khong du chud cing rmongs med pa/ /de ni skye
337a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i spyod dang bral bas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig gi rab dben de dag la/ /rtag tu rmongs shing khong du ma chud pa/ /de ni skye ba'i
337b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod par lhung bas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig ri rab dben de dag la/ /rtag par khong du chud cing rmongs med pa/ /de ni skye ba'i spyod dang bral
337b2(dkon brtsegs): bas na| |des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig gi 'gro 'ong med pa la/ /rtag tu rmongs shing khong du ma chud pa/ /de ni skye ba'i spyod par ltung bas na/ /des
337b3(dkon brtsegs): ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig gi 'gro 'ong med pa dag /rtag tu khong du chud cing rmongs med pa/ /de ni skye ba'i spyod dang bral bas na/ /des ni mdo sde
337b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di la mos par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig la bdag med ma rtogs nas/ /mig zad ngo bo nyid la rtag rmongs pa/ /de ni skye bo'i spyod par ltung bas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di
337b5(dkon brtsegs): la mos mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig la bdag med rab rtogs nas/ /mig zad ngo bo rtag tu rtogs gyur pa/ /de ni skye ba'i spyod dang bral bas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos
337b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig la bdag med ma rtogs nas/ /bzod pa'i gnas la rtag tu rmongs gyur pa/ /de ni skye ba'i spyod par ltung bas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos
337b7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig la bdag med rab rtogs nas/ /bzod pa'i gnas ni rtag tu rtogs gyur pa/ /de ni skye ba'i spyod dang bral bas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos
338a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig zang ngo bo ma rtogs pa/ /de ni mi gnas tshul khrims sgrub mi nus/ /mi gnas tshul khrims mngon par mi sgrub
338a2(dkon brtsegs): pas| |des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig zad ngo bo rab rtogs pa/ /de ni mi gnas tshul khrims sgrub par nus/ /mi gnas tshul khrims mngon
338a3(dkon brtsegs): par sgrub pas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig zad ngo bo ma rtogs pa/ /des ni zag med tshul khrims sgrub mi nus/ /zag med tshul
338a4(dkon brtsegs): khrims mngon par mi sgrub pas/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig zad ngo bo rab rtogs pa/ /des ni zag med tshul khrims sgrub par nus/ /
338a5(dkon brtsegs): zag med tshul khrims mngon par sgrub pas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig zad ngo bo ma rtogs pa/ /des ni zag med shes rab sgrub
338a6(dkon brtsegs): mi nus| |zag med shes rab mngon par mi sgrub pas/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig zad ngo bo rab rtogs pa/ /des ni zag med shes rab
338a7(dkon brtsegs): sgrub par nus/ /zag med shes rab mngon par sgrub pas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig zad ngo bo ma rtogs pa/ /mig stong nyid la
338b1(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu rmongs par 'gyur/ /des ni kun 'dzin ye shes mi skyed pas/ /mdo sde 'di la rab tu mos mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig zad ngo bo rab rtogs pa/ /mig stong nyid
338b2(dkon brtsegs): ni rtag par rtogs par 'gyur/ /des ni kun 'dzin ye shes rab skyed pas/ /mdo sde 'di la rab tu mos par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig zad ngo bo rab rtogs pa/ /des ni
338b3(dkon brtsegs): kun 'dzin ye shes sgrub pa na/ /bla med ma chags ye shes rab sgrub pas/ /mdo sde 'di la rab tu mos par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mdo sde 'di la ma mos pa/ /mig
338b4(dkon brtsegs): zad ngo bo nyid la rtag tu rmongs/ /de ni ting 'dzin rnams las nyams pas na/ /bla med ye shes thob par shin tu dka'/ /gang zhig mdo sde 'di la rab mos shing / /
338b5(dkon brtsegs): mig zad ngo bo nyid ni mngon rtogs pa/ /de ni ting 'dzin mngon par sgrub pas na/ /bla med ye shes mngon byed dka' ba med/ /gang zhig mig zad ngo bo nyid rtogs shing //
338b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag med pa yi mtshan nyid rab rtogs pa/ /des ni rtag tu chos 'di thos pas na/ /mngon par yid ches the tshom med pa 'thob/ /gang zhig mig zad ngo bo nyid sems
338b7(dkon brtsegs): shing / /nyin mtshan rab brtson le lo med gyur pa/ /des ni kun 'dzin spobs pa mngon sgrubs nas/ /mdo sde 'di ni rtag tu ston par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mdo
339a1(dkon brtsegs): sde 'di ni sems byed pa/ /'od zer 'byin pa'i ye shes rdzogs par 'gyur/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rab ston cing / /mig stong
339a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid ni rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /gang gis mchod rten brgya stong rab byas shing / /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa byas pa bas/ /gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni sems
339a3(dkon brtsegs): byed na| |'di yi yon tan de bas khyad par 'phags/ /gang gis rol mo brgya stong rab byas nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel mchod pa pas/ /gang zhig
339a4(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde 'di ni thos gyur na/ /'di yi yon tan de bas khyad par 'phags/ /sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs pa'i sems can rnams/ /bskal pa dag ni bye ba tshad
339a5(dkon brtsegs): med par/ /de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs par mchod pa bas/ /mdo sde 'di bzung bsod nams khyad par 'phags/ /gang gis mdo sde 'di las tshig bzhi pa'i//
339a6(dkon brtsegs): tshigs bcad gcig tsam 'dzin cing ston byed na/ /de la rgyal ba thugs rje chen po yi/ /gtso ltar gus pa rab tu bskyed par bya/ /nga ni 'das pa'i bskal pa brgya
339a7(dkon brtsegs): stong du| |srid pa gsum du 'khor bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /sangs rgyas dag ni tshad med pa rnams la/ /mdo sde 'di yi phyir ni rim gro byas/ /res 'ga' mar me brgya
339b1(dkon brtsegs): stong tshad med pa/ /snying po re re'i tshad kyang dpag tshad tsam/ /spar nas mdo sde 'di la rang dbang dag/ 'thob par bya phyir 'dren pa rnams la mchod/ /res 'ga' me tog tsam pa
339b2(dkon brtsegs): ka dang ni/ /su ma na dang mya ngan med pa yi/ /phreng ba rgyal mtshan gdugs ni sna tshogs kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mchod pa byas/ /nga sngon 'khor ba'i 'khor
339b3(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /slong du 'ongs pa dag la sbyin btang ste/ /res 'ga' me tog 'bras bu dag kyang btang / /res 'ga' bram pa khron pa chu mig btang / /res 'ga' glang
339b4(dkon brtsegs): po che dang bzhon pa dang / /res 'ga' rin chen rta dang chung ma btang / /res 'ga' gser gyi khri dang rin chen gur/ /res 'ga' se mo de dang phreng ba btang / /de bzhin
339b5(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa brgya stong rdzogs par ni/ /mdo sde 'di phyir sems la ser sna med// /bam po gnyis pa/ nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /tshul khrims yongs
339b6(dkon brtsegs): su dag par bsrungs/ /ting 'dzin shes rab rtag tu bsgoms/ /sems can rnams la sbyin pa btang / /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /gtum po dag gis brgyad bkag
339b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang / /de tshe nga ni snying brtse bas/ /de la gnod pa yong ma byas/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /slong du 'ongs pa dag la ni/ /ji ltar mos bzhin rab btang bas/ /thams
340a1(dkon brtsegs): cad rab tu dga' bar byas/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /gzhal med khang chen rnams la ni/ /rin chen dra bas rab brgyan nas/ /sangs rgyas
340a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la yongs su phul/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /yid bzhin nor bu rin po ches/ /sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas/ /nga
340a3(dkon brtsegs): sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /drin yod rnams ni rtag dra na byas/ /tha na tshigs bcad gcig nyan pa/ /de la yang ni bkur sti byas/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /tshul khrims
340a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan la rab bkur bas/ /tha na 'chag pa'i tshe na yang / /de la rtag tu gus pa bskyed/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /'khor ba dag na 'khor ba'i tshe/ /dri na ni cung zad
340a5(dkon brtsegs): yod pa la'ang / /de la rtag tu drin du gzos/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /rnyed pa ma btsal chos ma skur/ /nye bshes sems can rnams la ni/ /snying brtse dag ni rab
340a6(dkon brtsegs): tu bskyed/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /mang thos legs bshad ldan pas na/ /chos la mngon par zhen byed cing / /bshes pa'i khyim la ser sna med/ /nga sngon mdo
340a7(dkon brtsegs): sde 'di yi phyir/ /mi dge'i sems ni skyes gyur na/ /myur ba nyid du rab bshags pas/ /'phel bar yang ni yong ma byas/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /rgyal po'i
340b1(dkon brtsegs): bur ni gyur pa na/ /rin po che dang byug spos dang / /spos kyi phye ma ji snyed pa/ /dad pa'i sems ni ngas bskyed nas/ /sangs rgyas rnams la bsngos shing phul/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di
340b2(dkon brtsegs): yi phyir/ /khri mon btson la snying brtse bas/ /sdug bsngal sna tshogs gang myong ba/ /lus kyi skyin par dang du blangs/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga
340b3(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas/ /rtag tu dus drug dag gi tshe/ /sdom pa dag ni rab tu blangs/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /rtag tu bzod pa rab bsgoms pas/ /tha na chung ma dag la yang / /
340b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i ser sna yong ma bskyed/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /dbul phongs dag ni thams cad kun/ /bde ba dag ni thob bya'i phyir/ /nor dag gis ni phyug por byas//
340b5(dkon brtsegs): nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dang / /skye rgu rnam pa sna tshogs kun/ /thams cad dag ni rab tu bsdus/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /thams cad
340b6(dkon brtsegs): kun la phan gdags phyir/ /rtag tu sbyin bdag cher byas nas/ /slong ba dag la yongs su btang / /res 'ga' me tog 'bras bu dag /gzhan dag gcod du mi gzhug
340b7(dkon brtsegs): par| |sems can rnams la yongs btang zhing / /yid bzhin du ni tshim par byas/ /nga sngon sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe/ /sems ni stag tu snyoms pas na/ /tshul khrims
341a1(dkon brtsegs): yon tan ldan pa dang / /tshul khrims 'chal dang ngo tsha med/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po thob pa nas/ /so so'i skye bo'i bar dag la/ /ngo mtshar snyam
341a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems bskyed nas/ /gus pas kun la sbyin pa btang / /nga sngon sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe/ /sems la mtho dman med pas na/ /sdug bsngal 'gro ba mi tshol zhing / /
341a3(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde 'di la rtse gcig mos/ /res 'ga' yul khams dag tu ni/ /phyir rgol thams cad med byas shing / /klu rnams kun ni rab btul nas/ /dus bzhin char ni
341a4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu phab/ /zla 'od khyod kyis shes par gyis/ /ngas ni tshe rabs dpag med nas/ /mdo sde 'di ni gnyer ba'i phyir/ /dka' ba rnams ni rab tu spyad/ /bskal pa brgya
341a5(dkon brtsegs): stong snyed du ni/ /brjod kyang mthar thug mi 'gyur ro/ /yid ches pa la khyod gnas nas/ /ma 'ongs tha ma'i dus kyi tshe/ /yang dag dran pa'i sems bskyed la/ /mdo sde
341a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni bshad par gyis/ /ngas ni sangs rgyas spyan dag gis/ /ma 'ongs dus ni gsal gzigs pas/ /spyod pa sna tshogs ji lta ba/ /thams cad rab tu mkhyen pa
341a7(dkon brtsegs): yin| |dge slong dag ni gang zhig gis/ /bla med ye shes btsal ba'i phyir/ /shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni/ /mdo sde 'di ni gang ston pa/ /gang zag de dang phyogs
341b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang / /thams cad ma lus thugs su chud/ /ma 'ongs tha ma'i dus kyi tshe/ /mdo 'di thos nas gang mos pa/ /bsam pa dang ni thabs rnams kyang / /thams cad ma lus
341b2(dkon brtsegs): thugs su chud/ /dman pa dag ni gang zhig gis/ /mdo sde 'di ni ma thos pas/ /chos bstan pa la skur 'debs pa/ /thams cad ma lus thugs su chud/ /dge slong rnams
341b3(dkon brtsegs): ni gang zhig dang / /dge slong ma ni gang zhig gis/ /mdo sde 'di ni thos gyur nas/ /shin tu gdung bas gdung byed pa/ /de kun ngas ni lung bstan nas/ /rgyal ba gtso bo mthong
341b4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ /zla 'od khyod kyis shes par gyis/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /gang dag yid ni dag pa dang / /gang dag gi ni ma dag dang / /tha na mos pa gang yin
341b5(dkon brtsegs): pa| |thams cad ma lus thugs su chud/ /sems can dag ni gang zhig gis/ /rab zhi dben la rtag mos shing / /ting 'dzin rnams la rab gnas nas/ /'khor ba dag la
341b6(dkon brtsegs): ma chags pas/ /tha na bag chags rnams kyang ni/ /gtan nas rab tu gang spangs dang / /de la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams/ /thams cad ma lus thugs su chud/ /sems can
341b7(dkon brtsegs): dag ni gang zhig gis/ /mi bden chos la zhen pa dang / /sems can dag ni gang zhig gis/ /sangs rgyas la ni rab mos shing / /ma 'ongs dngos po 'di lta bu/ /thams cad
342a1(dkon brtsegs): ma lus thugs su chud/ /sems can dag ni gang zhig gis/ /'jig rten bde la rab chags pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sa bon dag /legs
342a2(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid du mi bskyed pa/ /rgyu dang rkyen ni de yi phyir/ /sbyor ba rnams ni nyams par 'gyur/ /su yang rung ba gang zhig gis/ /byang chub sa bon rtogs gyur na/ /gang zag
342a3(dkon brtsegs): de yis nges par ni/ /rnam dag 'od zer dpag med thob/ /zla 'od khyod kyis 'di lta bu/ /'od zer 'di la sogs pa yi/ /rgyun du rkyen ni re re kun/ /so so tha dad nyid du
342a4(dkon brtsegs): ltos| |khyod kyi shes rab stobs kyis ni/ /thams cad de ltar rig par bgyi/ /gang zhig mi dge'i grogs spangs te/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas/ /tshul
342a5(dkon brtsegs): khrims rnam dag gang srung ba/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer sgrub par 'gyur/ /khyod kyis dbang po rab srungs la/ /ngo tsha khrel med rab tu spongs/ /dge ba'i chos ni rab bsgoms
342a6(dkon brtsegs): la| |sems can rnams ni srung bar gyis/ /khyod kyis rtsod pa rab spongs la/ /stong nyid dag ni rtogs par gyis/ /rnyed pa dag la ma gdu bar/ /mang thos legs
342a7(dkon brtsegs): bshad ldan par gyis/ /khyod kyis rnyed pa dag la ni/ /mi gtsang lta bur blta bar gyis/ /rnyed ba'i dri ma dag gis ni/ /rnam dag sems ni spags ma byed/ /rnam par
342b1(dkon brtsegs): grol ba btsal bar byos/ /bla med rnyed pa thob par 'gyur/ /khyod kyis sangs rgyas lam bsgrubs la/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid 'dra bar ltos/ /chos kyi sgron ma rtag sbyor la/ /
342b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten kun ni snang bar gyis/ /khyod kyi sems ni ri rgyal ltar/ /mi g.yo nyid du rab tu byos/ /kha ngan dang ni brdeg pa yang / /thams cad bzod pa dang du longs/ /khyod
342b3(dkon brtsegs): ni sems can rnams kyi phyir/ /dge bshes yang dag rab tu byos/ /dman pa'i sems ni yongs spongs la/ /rnam dag las ni rtag tu sgrubs/ /khyod kyi sems ni brtan
342b4(dkon brtsegs): byos la| |bla med chos ni rab tu ston/ /mdo sde dam pa 'di lta bu/ /brtse ba can la sbyin par gyis/ /bla med ye shes gang tshol ba/ /'khor ba dag la 'jigs ma byed/ /des
342b5(dkon brtsegs): ni sdig pa rnam spangs nas/ /phan yon mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /dper na blo dang ldan pa dag /me la spyod par mkhas pa gang / /ro rnams sna tshogs sbyin byed kyang / /
342b6(dkon brtsegs): mes ni bsreg par yong mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig blo dang mi ldan pa/ /thabs dag la ni mi mkhas pas/ /me khyer lag mthil gang bzhag pa/ /mes ni rab tu bsreg par 'gyur/
342b7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar mi zhig dug dag gis/ /sems ni 'khrugs nas myos ba gang / /me la rab tu ba sros na ni/ /de yi rgyu yis sos par 'gyur/ /zla 'od khyod kyis shes par kyis/ /blo dang
343a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'ang de bzhin du/ /yid brten yid ni stong par rig /de phyir 'khor bar gnas kyang ni/ /mig brten mig ni stong rig pas/ /mig la
343a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par zhen pa med/ /gal te de ltar rab shes na/ /mig la gnas kyang nyon mongs med/ /gal te mig nyid stong rig na/ /yang dag ye shes sgrub par 'gyur/ /yang
343a3(dkon brtsegs): dag ye shes thob pa'i phyir/ /'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gal te mig nyid stong rig na/ /'dod chags dag ni gtan nas spong / /'dod chags dag ni med
343a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir/ /'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin zhe sdang gti mug dang / /ngar 'dzin 'chab dang khro ba dang / /ser sna phrag dog ngo tsha med/ /mi bzod sems
343a5(dkon brtsegs): ni mtho ba dang / /rgyags dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang / /g.yo sgyu dang ni bag med dang / /gya gyu la sogs bar du yang / /thams cad 'dod chags bzhin du bshad/ /
343a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ye shes thob gyur na/ /mig ni zhi ba nyid du rtogs/ /zhi ba nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir/ /'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /yang dag ye shes thob gyur na/ /
343a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas tshul la rab tu gnas/ /tshul la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir/ /'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /yang dag ye shes thob gyur na/ /sangs rgyas thabs la
343b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas par 'gyur/ /thabs la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir/ /'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /yang dag ye shes ma bsgrubs par/ /sgrib pa dag ni gtan spong zhing / /'od zer
343b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba sgrub par ni/ /bsngon ma thos ma mthong ngo / /yang dag ye shes rab bsgrubs nas/ /sgrib pa'i gnod pa gtan spong zhing / /spyod pa 'di rjes gang 'brang ba/ /'od zer
343b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyed pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i spyod pa yongs tshol zhing / /mdo sde 'di la bslab byas nas/ /de bzhin gshegs la gang mchod pa/ /yang dag ye shes thabs thob
343b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur| |yang dag ye shes gang sgrub pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams la mchod par gyis/ /'od zer 'gyed pa rdzogs par 'gyur/ /lag mthil 'bras bu ji bzhin no/ /mig la
343b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag med gang rmongs pa/ /dge sbyong chos ni nyams par 'gyur/ /gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/ /'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur/ /mig la bdag med gang rtogs pa/ /dge
343b6(dkon brtsegs): sbyong chos ni sgrub par 'gyur/ /gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/ /'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur/ /mig gi mtha' zad gang rtogs pa/ /rna ba skye ba'i mtha' yang rtogs/ /rna
343b7(dkon brtsegs): ba skye ba'i mtha' rtogs pas/ /dge sbyong chen po'i chos zhes bya/ /gal te mig ni ngo bo nyid/ /mtha' ni yongs su ma shes na/ /mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang / /yongs
344a1(dkon brtsegs): su shes par mi 'gyur bas/ /gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/ /'od zer 'gyed pa 'thob mi 'gyur/ /gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ /mtha' ni yongs su
344a2(dkon brtsegs): shes gyur na/ /mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang / /yongs su shes pa nyid du 'gyur/ /gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/ /'od zer 'gyed pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /gal te mig gi ngo
344a3(dkon brtsegs): bo nyid| |mtha' ni legs par ma shes na/ /mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang / /legs pa nyid du mi shes pas/ /gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/ /'od zer 'gyed pa 'thob mi
344a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur| |gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ /mtha' ni legs par shes gyur na/ /mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang / /legs pa nyid du shes 'gyur bas/ /gang zag de yis de
344a5(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i| |'od zer 'gyed pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ /mtha' ni mngon sum ma shes na/ /mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang / /mngon sum nyid du
344a6(dkon brtsegs): mi shes pas/ /gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/ /'od zer 'gyed pa 'thob mi 'gyur/ /gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ /mtha' ni mngon sum shes gyur na/ /mig ni skye ba'i
344a7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' dag kyang / /mngon sum nyid du rab shes pas/ /gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/ /'od zer 'gyed pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ /mtha' ni
344b1(dkon brtsegs): legs par ma shes na/ /mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang / /yongs su shes par mi 'gyur bas/ /gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/ /'od zer 'gyed pa 'thob mi 'gyur/ /gal te mig
344b2(dkon brtsegs): gi ngo bo nyid/ /mtha' ni legs par shes gyur na/ /mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang / /mngon sum nyid du shes 'gyur bas/ /gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/ /'od zer 'gyed pa
344b3(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par 'gyur/ /gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ /rnam dag legs par ma shes na/ /rna ba'i ngo bo rnam dag pa/ /legs pa nyid du mi shes pas/ /gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/ /
344b4(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer 'gyed pa 'thob mi 'gyur/ /gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ /rnam dag legs par shes gyur na/ /rna ba'i ngo bo rnam dag pa/ /legs pa nyid du rtogs 'gyur bas/ /gang
344b5(dkon brtsegs): zag de yis de lta bu'i/ /'od zer 'gyed pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin sna dang lce dang lus/ /yid dang gzugs sgra dri ro dang / /reg bya chos dang sa chu dang / /me rlung dag gi
344b6(dkon brtsegs): dngos po dang / /'jig rten sdug bsngal phung po dang / /khams dang 'jig rten skye mched dang / /sgra dang ming la sogs pa yang / /thams cad de bzhin rig par gyis/ /de nas bcom
344b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can gang theg pa chen po la yang dag par gzhol zhing 'od zer 'gyed pa
345a1(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa des dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs rnam pa brgyad cu po 'di dag mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rnam pa brgyad
345a2(dkon brtsegs): cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yongs su srung zhing rjes su dran pa dang / gnod sems med pa dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag pa srung zhing nyams par mi
345a3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / sems shin tu mnyam pa dang / g.yo sgyu med pa dang / /ser sna med pa dang / phrag dog med pa dang / 'dod chags kyi bsam pa med pa dang / slu ba'i bsam
345a4(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dam pa dag la mngon par yid ches pa dang / dbang phyug dang / rgyags pa la zhen cing sred pa med pa dang / bzod pa'i stobs
345a5(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa dang / smon lam las phyir mi ldog pa dang / bsam pa shin tu rnam par dag par gyur pa dang / dgon pa na gnas pa dang / 'khor rnams la mi
345a6(dkon brtsegs): brten pa dang / rnyed pa la mi brten pa dang / grags pa la mi brten pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la rab tu gnas pa dang / 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin rab tu ston pa
345a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag la sgyu med par rim gro byed pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag la mchog gi bsam pa bskyed pa dang / chos la gus
345b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir mkhan po dang slob dpon dag la shin tu bkur ba dang / mdo sde'i don rab tu rtogs pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa la rab tu mkhas pa dang / tshig smras pa rnams la mi
345b2(dkon brtsegs): bden pa med pa dang / yang dag pa'i bsam pa la gnas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa la brtson pa dang / rtag tu sbyin pa gtong ba dang / bdud kyi las rab tu rtogs pa dang /
345b3(dkon brtsegs): dbang po rnams dam du srung ba dang / tshig rab tu brtags pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa la mkhas pa dang / sa rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa dang / gzungs zad
345b4(dkon brtsegs): mi shes pa yongs su tshol ba dang / lus dang srog la phangs pa med pa dang / 'khor bzhi po dag la rjes su ston par byed pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa yongs su bcad
345b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'jig rten phyi ma'i chos med do/ /zhes zer ba'i log par lta ba rnams spangs pa dang / da dung ma bslab pa dag la gya gyu'i mtshan ma mi ston pa dang / gang bslab par
345b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa dag la ci nus kyis rnam par phye nas rab tu ston pa dang / glu dang rol mo'i sgra dag gi bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang / rgyan dang yo byad kyi bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang / bden
345b7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la yang dag par zhugs pa dang / mang du thos pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / gnyid rab tu spangs pa dang / yang dag pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la rab tu brtson pa
346a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / sangs rgyas la gus pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i las yongs su spang ba dang / bslab pa'i gnas rnams la
346a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par brtson pa dang / chos la sred pa'i phyir grogs khyad par can la rten par byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su tshol ba la skyo ba med pa dang / rab tu 'byung
346a3(dkon brtsegs): ba la shin tu mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos srung zhing yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang / sdig pa'i las mi spong ba dang / bstan pa rnams la the tshom med pa dang / dpes ston
346a4(dkon brtsegs): pa la rab tu mkhas pa dang / gsang ba rnams rnam par phye nas ston par byed pa dang / byang chub chen po yongs su tshol ba la ngal ba med pa dang / mdo sde yang dag par bzung
346a5(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams brjed par mi byed pa dang / rang gi bslab pa mi spong ba dang / pha rol gyi smra ba rnams tshar gcod pa dang / nges par 'byung ba'i lam yongs su tshol ba dang / spyod pa tshad
346a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa dang / chos kyi ye shes de dag la sems nges par gyur pa dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu gsal bar mthong zhing 'khor ba'i rgyun mi gcod pa dang / srid
346a7(dkon brtsegs): pa gsum po dag la chags pa med pa dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal spangs pa dang / mngon par yid ches pa dag la gnyen po rnam par gzhag pa dag ston par byed pa dang / ma
346b1(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i bye brag rtogs par khong du chud pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' yongs su legs par shes pa dang / gzhan gyi dring la mi ltos pa dang / yongs su spong
346b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i spyod pa dag la brtson 'grus kyis sgrub par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang dpe byad kyi bkod pa dag phun sum tshogs par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ rnam pa brgyad
346b3(dkon brtsegs): cu zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon nu/ /chos brgyad cu po 'di dag ni/ chos lnga'i nang du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /chos lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba shes pa dang / mya ngan
346b4(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa zad pa shes pa dang / mchog tu gyur pa shes pa dang / bsod nams kyi 'bras bu shes pa gang yin pa'o/ /gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon nu/ chos
346b5(dkon brtsegs): lnga po de dag ni/ chos gnyis kyi nang du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems yongs su dag pas rab tu brgyan pa dang / gzugs yongs su dag pas rab tu
346b6(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa gang yin pa'o/ /gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon nu/ chos gnyis po de dag ni/ chos gcig gi nang du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs
346b7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par grol ba mngon par grub pa gang yin pa'o/ /gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon nu/ yang chos rnam pa brgyad cu yod de de dag gis de bzhin
347a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par grol ba legs par yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /rnam pa brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta
347a2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ sbyin pa'i tshogs dang / shes rab rgya chen por gyur pa dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yongs su sgrub pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba dang bral ba dang / nga rgyal rab
347a3(dkon brtsegs): tu bcom pa dang / tshig mnyen pa dang / dngos po sna tshogs rab tu shes pa dang / dge ba'i grogs po yongs su shes pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par gzhol ba dang / brtson
347a4(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyi go cha bgos pa dang / spyod lam gyis sems can 'dul ba dang / nyon mongs par ltung ba rnams kyi the tshom rab tu gcod pa dang / mi dge ba rnams la smod cing chos
347a5(dkon brtsegs): dkar po rnams mngon par sgrub pa dang / mi dge ba'i grogs po dang mi 'grogs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa la yongs su skyo ba med pa dang / byang chub tu sems
347a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa dang / brtson 'grus rab tu rtsom pa dang / bdud kyi dngos po rab tu rtogs pa dang / bden pa rnams mngon du gyur pa dang / yang dag pa kho nar mchod pa byed pa dang /
347a7(dkon brtsegs): the tshom yongs su gcod pa dang / sems kyis rtag tu sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar sems pa dang / srid pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / sems
347b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya chen po yongs su bskyed pa dang / sems can mi dge ba rnams la nyes dmigs mang dag par ston pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rab tu spong ba dang / 'dod pa'i
347b2(dkon brtsegs): phan pa yongs su mi tshol ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'chos pa dang / 'phags pa rnams la gus pa bskyed pa dang /
347b3(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po la gnas pa dag la brten cing rim gro byed pa dang / theg pa dman pa dag gi bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag thag ring du spong ba dang / phyir
347b4(dkon brtsegs): rgol ba rnams tshar gcod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa rgya chen po bshams nas khyad par du 'phags pa'i sems kyis 'bul bar byed pa dang / thogs
347b5(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i ye shes thob pa dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dpe sna tshogs kyis yang dag pa chos rab tu ston par byed pa dang / stong pa'i ngo bo nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed
347b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / chos yongs su tshol ba la le lo med pa dang / don zab mo yang dag par ston pa dang / gzungs chen po dang ldan pa dang / chos yang dag par ston par byed kyang mngon par
347b7(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa med pa dang / chos rgya cher spel bar byed pa dang / yongs su 'dren pa la chog shes pa med pa dang / spyod pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gzi brjod chen po dang ldan pa dang /
348a1(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang / mang du thos pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mi dge ba rnams kyi bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang / dge ba'i las yang
348a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par sgrub pa dang / phung po rnams khong du chud pa dang / lta ba rnams rab tu spangs pa dang / rgyu'i ngo bo nyid rab tu rtogs pa dang / spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa
348a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / spyod yul ma yin pa yongs su spangs pa dang / yongs su dang pa bskyed pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam la gnas pa dang / theg pa chen po la rab tu dga' ba dang /
348a4(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid du yongs su sdud par byed pa dang / bdag med pa la mngon par ma chags pa dang / 'khor ba la yongs su skyo ba med pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa yongs
348a5(dkon brtsegs): su tshol ba la mos pa dang / 'dod pa chung ba'i phyir dgon pa na gnas pa dang / rtag tu bsod snyoms slong zhing le lo med par gyur pa dang / ji tsam rnyed pa de nyid kyis chog par
348a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang / ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa spangs pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen par byed pa dang / dge ba'i grogs po dang lhan cig gnas pa dang / bdag gi zla ma
348a7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa rnams rab tu spong ba dang / so so'i skye bo rnams la snying brtse ba dang / sems can gyi spyod pa dang mthun par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas la shin tu dang ba dang / snod ma yin
348b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su spong ba dang / mi mthun pa rnams la tshig sbyin par mi byed pa dang / gsol ba mi 'debs pa dag la yang dag par ston par mi byed pa dang / gsol ba 'debs pa zhig
348b2(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs na ci rigs par ston par byed pa dang / zas la snyoms par gyur pa dang / rtag tu gtong zhing mnyam pa nyid du gtong ba dang / sgo chen po phye nas gtong bar byed pa gang yin
348b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag ni/ gzhon nu/ chos rnam pa brgyad cu zhes bya ste/ 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par grol ba thob par byed do/ /de'i tshe
348b4(dkon brtsegs): zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa chos de lta bu thos pas rab tu dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyar sngar tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mig
348b5(dkon brtsegs): zad mtha' mkhyen pas/ de slad rnam dag ye shes ston mdzad lags/ /rnam dag ye shes ston par mdzad pas na/ /rnam dag 'od zer phun sum tshogs pa la/ /de bzhin gshegs
348b6(dkon brtsegs): pas mig bdag med mkhyen pas/ /de slad rnam dag dbyangs ni ston mdzad lags/ /rnam dag dbyangs ni ston par mdzad pas na/ /tshangs dbyangs mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pa
348b7(dkon brtsegs): lags| |bcom ldan 'das sngon ni sems can phan btags pas/ /de slad rnam dag gsung ni rdzogs pa lags/ /rnam dag gsung ni yongs su rdzogs pas na/ /'jig rten tshad med
349a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la phan 'dogs mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pas mig nyid stong mkhyen pas/ /de slad kun 'dzin mkhyen pa rdzogs pa lags/ /kun 'dzin
349a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa yongs su rdzogs pas na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dpag med ston/ /de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi khyad par mkhyen/ /mig gi khyad par dag kyang mtha'
349a3(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis/ /mkhyen pa'i ming ni dpag tu ma mchis pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dpag med ston/ /sangs rgyas yi ge khyad par sgo mkhyen pas/ /mig stong yi ge
349a4(dkon brtsegs): bral bar rab tu mkhyen/ /mig stong yi ge bral bar mkhyen pas na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dpag med ston/ /gang zhig mig la bdag med rab sems pa/ /sangs
349a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas gsung ni bden pa nyid du rtogs/ /sangs rgyas gsung ni bden par rtogs pas na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer nges par ston/ /bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul mchog ni yongs
349a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pas/ /mig gi 'jig pa dpag med thugs su chud/ /mig gi 'jig pa rab tu mkhyen pas na/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan 'dogs mdzad/ /thugs rje chen po rkang
349a7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /mig gi skye ba dpag med rab tu mkhyen/ /ji ltar bcom ldan mig gi skye mkhyen pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /de bzhin rna ba sna
349b1(dkon brtsegs): dang lca lus yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya dag dang chos/ /'jig rten skye dang sgra dang ming la sogs/ /thams cad la yang de bzhin rab tu mkhyen/ /thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog
349b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa| |sbyin pa'i pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs/ /ji ltar bcom ldan sbyin pa'i pha rol byon/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur
349b3(dkon brtsegs): pa| |tshul khrims rnam dag pha rol byon dang ldan/ /ji ltar bcom ldan tshul khrims pha rol byon/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog
349b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa| |bzod pa'i pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs/ /ji ltar bcom ldan bzod pa'i pha rol byon/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog
349b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa| |brtson 'grus pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs/ /ji ltar bcom ldan brtson 'grus pha rol byon/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /thugs rje chen po rkang
349b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /bsam gtan pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs/ /ji ltar bcom ldan bsam gtan pha rol byon/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /thugs rje
349b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /shes rab pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs/ /ji ltar bcom ldan shes rab pha rol byon pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /thugs rje
350a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /chos sku'i pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs/ /ji ltar bcom ldan chos sku'i pha rol byon/ /bdag kyang ring por
350a2(dkon brtsegs): mi thogs de bzhin shog / thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /rnam dag gzugs ni dpag med phun sum tshogs/ /ji ltar bcom ldan rnam dag gzugs ldan
350a3(dkon brtsegs): pa| |bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog / thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /rnam dag yid ni dpag med phun sum tshogs/ /ji ltar bcom ldan rnam dag
350a4(dkon brtsegs): yid ldan pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /yon tan mchog ni dpag med phun sum tshogs/ /ji ltar bcom ldan
350a5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan mchog ldan pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /gzugs kyi mtshan ni dpag med phun sum tshogs/ /ji ltar
350a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan gzugs kyi mtshan ldan pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin gshog /thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /rnam dag sgra ni dpag med phun sum tshogs//
350a7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bcom ldan rnam dag sgra ldan pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po dpag med phun sum
350b1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs| / ji ltar bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul che ldan pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /sems can 'dul slad srid pa
350b2(dkon brtsegs): gsum na bzhugs/ /ji ltar bcom ldan sems can 'dul mdzad pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /'khor ba'i
350b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dpag med dag las 'das/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'khor ba'i spyod 'das pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /'dod
350b4(dkon brtsegs): chags spyod pa dpag med dag las 'das/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'dod chags spyod 'das pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur
350b5(dkon brtsegs): pa| |zhe sdang spyod pa dpag med dag las 'das/ /ji ltar bcom ldan zhe sdang spyod 'das pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa//
350b6(dkon brtsegs): gti mug spyod pa dpag med dag las 'das/ /ji ltar bcom ldan gti mug spyod 'das pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa//
350b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags zhe sdang spyod pa dpag med 'das/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'dod sdang spyod 'das pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa//
351a1(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang gti mug spyod pa dpag med 'das/ /ji ltar bcom ldan sdang rmongs spyod 'das pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje
351a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /'dod chags gti mug spyod pa dpag med 'das/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'dod rmongs spyod 'das pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin
351a3(dkon brtsegs): shog / thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /cha mnyam spyod pa dpag med yang dag 'das/ /ji ltar bcom ldan cha mnyam spyod 'das pa/ /bdag kyang ring por
351a4(dkon brtsegs): mi thogs de bzhin shog / 'dren pa 'dod chags dag las yongs 'das pas/ /'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan
351a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs pa/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog /'dren pa zhe sdang dag las yongs 'das pas/ /'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad/ /ji ltar bcom
351a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog /'dren pa gti mug spyod las yongs 'das pas/ /'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs
351a7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad| |ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog /'dren pa 'dod chags zhe sdang spyod 'das pas/ /'jig rten kun la
351b1(dkon brtsegs): shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog /'dren pa zhe sdang gti mug spyod 'das pas/ /'jig
351b2(dkon brtsegs): rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog /'dren pa 'dod chags gti mug spyod
351b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das pas/ /'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog /'dren pa chags
351b4(dkon brtsegs): sdang gti mug spyod 'das pas/ /'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par
351b5(dkon brtsegs): shog / de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /lha tshogs mang po thams cad 'dul bar mdzad/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /lha mi'i kha lo
351b6(dkon brtsegs): sgyur pa'i ston par shog / de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /klu tshogs mang po thams cad 'dul bar mdzad/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /
351b7(dkon brtsegs): lha mi'i kha lo sgyur ba'i ston par shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /gnod sbyin mang po thams cad 'dul bar mdzad/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye
352a1(dkon brtsegs): shes grub gyur nas/ /lha mi'i kha lo sgyur ba'i ston par shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /dri za thams cad rab tu 'dul
352a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad cing / /de bzhin grul bum dpag tu ma mchis pa/ /'khor bcas ji snyed rab tu 'dul bar mdzad/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /lha mi'i kha lo
352a3(dkon brtsegs): sgyur ba'i ston par shog / de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /chos rnams yang dag don ni rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /
352a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag don la the tshom ma mchis shog /de bzhin gshegs pas sdug bsngal zad mtha' mkhyen/ /skye rgu thams cad la ni phan 'dogs mdzad/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes
352a5(dkon brtsegs): grub gyur nas/ /sdug bsngal zad la the tshom ma mchis shog /de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu zad mtha' mkhyen pas/ /skye rgu thams cad la ni phan 'dogs mdzad/ /bdag kyang
352a6(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /rgyu zad de la the tshom ma mchis shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /'jig rten spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag
352a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten spyod la the tshom ma mchis shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /'jig rten gnas dang gnas med
352b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /'jig rten las
352b2(dkon brtsegs): dang 'bras bu rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /'jig
352b3(dkon brtsegs): rten rang bzhin sna tshogs rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan
352b4(dkon brtsegs): pas| |thams cad kun tu 'gro ba'i spyod pa mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan
352b5(dkon brtsegs): pas| |'jig rten mos pa sna tshogs rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan
352b6(dkon brtsegs): pas| |dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin thams cad mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa
352b7(dkon brtsegs): mchog ldan pas/ /bsam gtan spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa
353a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /rnam par thar pa'i spyod pa rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid
353a2(dkon brtsegs): shog / de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /cha mnyam spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid
353a3(dkon brtsegs): shog / de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /snyoms 'jug spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan
353a4(dkon brtsegs): bgyid shog / de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor ba rab mkhyen pas/ /'khor ba nyon mongs rgyu las skyes par mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams
353a5(dkon brtsegs): cad la ni phan bgyid shog / de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad rab mkhyen pas/ /'jig rten phan 'dogs dpe zla yong ma mchis/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig
353a6(dkon brtsegs): rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog / de bzhin gshegs pa ting 'dzin rab gnas pas/ /khyad par thabs kyi ye shes skyed par mdzad/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur
353a7(dkon brtsegs): nas| |'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog / de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /sngon gyi gnas kyi spyod pa dpag med mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i
353b1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /'chi 'pho skye ba dpag med rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag kyang
353b2(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /nyon mongs zad pa thams cad rab tu
353b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen| |bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /bla med byang chub yang
353b4(dkon brtsegs): dag mngon sangs rgyas/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /nyon mongs
353b5(dkon brtsegs): bag chags dag ni rab tu spangs/ /bdag yang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /
353b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba nges 'byung chos ni rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pas chos don rab
353b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pas/ /sems can dpag med rnams ni go par mdzad/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs
354a1(dkon brtsegs): pas chos nyid sgyu ma dang / /rmi lam smig sgyu lta bur rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid
354a2(dkon brtsegs): shog / de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten thams cad kyi/ /yi ge dag dang brjod pa rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid
354a3(dkon brtsegs): shog / de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa mchog ldan pas/ /dam chos zab mo dag ni ston par mdzad/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan
354a4(dkon brtsegs): bgyid shog / de bzhin gshegs pas sku gsung thugs dul bas/ /thams cad ye shes rjes su 'brang bar mdzad/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad
354a5(dkon brtsegs): la ni phan bgyid shog / de bzhin gshegs pas dus gsum rab mkhyen pas/ /'dzin dang chags pa mi mnga' thogs mi mnga'/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /
354a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pas tshul khrims ting 'dzin dang / /shes rab bsgrubs pas de las ldog mi 'gyur/ /bdag kyang nge 'dra'i ye
354a7(dkon brtsegs): shes grub gyur nas/ /khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pas rnam grol rab bsgrubs pas/ /rnam grol mkhyen dang gzigs pa ldog mi
354b1(dkon brtsegs): mnga'| |bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pas zhi gnas lhag mthong bsgrubs/ /lha mi'i 'jig
354b2(dkon brtsegs): rten dag na mtshungs ma mchis/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas//
354b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten chos rnams la ni zhen mi mnga'/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen
354b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas/ /'gro ba sna tshogs dag ni gsal bar gzigs/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'gro ba de la the tshom ma mchis shog /de bzhin gshegs pas skye zad mtha'
354b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pas/ /de slad de la rmongs pa yong mi mnga'/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /skye zad nyid la the tshom ma mchis shog /de bzhin gshegs pas rab zhi mtha' mkhyen
354b6(dkon brtsegs): pas| |de slad de la rmongs pa yong mi mnga'/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /rab zhi de la the tshom ma mchis shog /de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor ba'i mtha' mkhyen
354b7(dkon brtsegs): pas| |de slad de la rmongs pa yong mi mnga'/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'khor ba de la the tshom ma mchis shog /de bzhin gshegs pas sngon dang phyi mtha' mkhyen/
355a1(dkon brtsegs): de slad slob dpon ma mchis mkhyen dang ldan/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /snga phyi'i mtha' la the tshom ma mchis shog /de bzhin gshegs
355a2(dkon brtsegs): pas skyon zlog mtha' rab mkhyen/ /de slad slob dpon ma mchis mkhyen dang ldan/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /skyon zlog de la the tshom ma mchis
355a3(dkon brtsegs): shog / de bzhin gshegs pas sngon dang phyi mtha' mkhyen/ /mig gi rtag chad dag la 'dzin mi mnga'/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /snga phyi'i mtha' la
355a4(dkon brtsegs): the tshom ma mchis shog / de bzhin gshegs pas skye zad mtha' mkhyen pas/ /mig gi rtag chad dag la 'dzin mi mnga'/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /
355a5(dkon brtsegs): skye zad nyid la the tshom ma mchis shog /gang zhig sngon dang phyi mtha' ma rtogs pas/ /de ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed/ /de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas/ /
355a6(dkon brtsegs): de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'/ /gang zhig yod med mtha' ni ma rtogs pas/ /des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen bskyed/ /de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas/ /de
355a7(dkon brtsegs): slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'/ /gang zhig zad dang mi zad ma rtogs pa/ /des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed/ /de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas/ /de slad
355b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'/ /gang zhig 'jug dang mi 'jug ma rtogs pa/ /des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed/ /de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas/ /de slad 'dod pa
355b2(dkon brtsegs): dag la zhen mi mnga'/ /zhe sdang gti mug khong khro 'chab pa dang / /g.yo sgyu phrag dog nga rgyal khengs pa dang / /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang / /bsam gtan shes
355b3(dkon brtsegs): rab dag kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad de 'od zer gser gyi kha dog lta bu
355b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bkye'o/ /'od zer des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med dpag tu med pa rnams snang bar byas te 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu phan pa dag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la lan
355b5(dkon brtsegs): gsum bskor ba byas te de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nyid du thim par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'dug pa'i stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa
355b6(dkon brtsegs): g cig la gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon
355b7(dkon brtsegs): par bstod de bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba zhus pa/ 'brug dang seng+ge'i sgra sgrog cing / /ka la ping+ka'i sgra phyung bas/ /chos rnga chen po'i sgra 'byin pa/ /ci yi slad du 'dzum pa mdzad/ /nyi ma stong
356a1(dkon brtsegs): pas khyad par 'phags/ /rnam dag sgra rab dag dang ldan/ /yon tan ngo mtshar rab mnga' ba/ /ci slad 'od zer bkye ba mdzad/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod
356a2(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus/ /bsam gtan shes rab rab brgyan pas/ /thams cad dag ni yongs rdzogs pas/ /ci slad 'od zer bkye ba mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan pas/ /ngag rtsub
356a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni rtag tu spangs/ /sems can nad ni legs gso ba/ /ci slad 'od zer bkye ba mdzad/ /thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis gtso/ /mig ni rtag tu stong dben mkhyen/ /rnam dag tshangs
356a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dbyangs mnga' bas/ /sems can rnams la ston pa mdzad/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /sgra dang ming la sogs pa nas/ /kun 'byung 'gog pa lam dag dang / /ye shes bzod pa'i
356a5(dkon brtsegs): bar de bzhin/ /thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis gtso/ /mig zad skye ba'i mtha' dag dang / /rab zhi dang ni 'khor ba dag /thams cad stong dben nyid du mkhyen/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid//
356a6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/ /thams cad kyang ni de bzhin no/ /gzhan yang rten cing 'brel 'byung chos/ /chad dang rtag pa yongs bral nas/ /
356a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang gzhan gyis byas min pas/ /rkyen mang las byung nyid du gsungs/ /res 'ga' rnam grangs sna tshogs kyis/ /sdug bsngal bzhi ni ston pa mdzad/ /res 'ga' don ni
356b1(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs kyis/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer bsngags par mdzad/ /res 'ga' tshig ni sna tshogs kyis/ /rab dben chos ni ston mdzad cing / /gang zag srog dang bdag med dang / /sems can
356b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa nyid du ston/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med kyang / /bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis/ /tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong gis/ /de 'dra'i chos ni ston par mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs
356b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan chos/ /yang dag nyid ni ston mdzad kyang / /rjod dang brjod bya mi mnga' bas/ /rjod mdzad chos kyang yong mi mnga'/ /bcom ldan yang dag chos gsung zhing / /skye rgu rnams
356b4(dkon brtsegs): ni go mdzad pas/ /lha rnams dang ni gnod sbyin dag /gang thos de dag rtogs par 'gyur/ /lha ma yin ni thams cad kyang / /mos pa dag ni rnam par dag /mi ni mang po tshad med kyang / /the
356b5(dkon brtsegs): tshom dra ba chad par 'gyur/ /'dod chags rang bzhin rab tu rtogs/ /zhe sdang gti mug rnam par bshig /sred dang nga rgyal ma rig dang / /g.yo sgyu phrag dog spros pa nas/ /sdug bsngal
356b6(dkon brtsegs): phung po la sogs par/ /thams cad kyang ni yongs su spangs/ /'di la sogs pa'i tshig gi don/ /mtha' ni kun kyang rnam par dag /de bzhin gshegs pas chos gcig la/ /sna tshogs ming
356b7(dkon brtsegs): ni rab mkhyen pas/ /grangs ni brgya stong mang po rnams/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston/ /sangs rgyas tshad med mang po las/ /de 'dra'i chos ni legs bslab pas/ /chos kyi dngos po
357a1(dkon brtsegs): gcig las kyang / /brjod pa thug pa med pa ston/ /de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams kyi/ /rnam grangs sna tshogs rab mkhyen pas/ /ming
357a2(dkon brtsegs): tshig dang po bar ma dang / /tha ma rnam 'byed rab tu mkhyen/ /tha dad tshig ni sna tshogs dag /thams cad rab tu bslab pas na/ /don mchog dag ni gya nom pa/ /ston pa dag
357a3(dkon brtsegs): ni rab tu mkhyen/ /de 'dra'i dbyangs ni rnam dag pa/ /rgyu rkyen tshogs pa las byung bas/ /lce 'ba' zhig la brten pa nas/ /lus sems bar la brten pa'ang min/ /sa ni rnam
357a4(dkon brtsegs): pa drug tu g.yos/ /phyogs bcu'i 'khor ni yongs 'dus nas/ /thal sbyar bcom ldan zhal blta na/ /the tshom dag ni bsal du gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pas mig
357a5(dkon brtsegs): zad dang / /skye mtha' dang ni rang bzhin gyis/ /rtag tu stong zhing dben pa dang / /'gro 'ong med pa rab tu mkhyen/ /bzhugs dang gnas ni mi mnga' bas/ /yang dag mtha'
357a6(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu bzhugs/ /bcom ldan spyan ni thogs mi mnga'/ /de slad deng bdag zhu ba lags/ /de bzhin gshegs pas mig nyid kyi/ /sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' dag
357a7(dkon brtsegs): dang | |zad dang ma zad 'khor ba ni/ /rang bzhin stong dben rab mkhyen pas/ /chos kyi don rnams rab phye nas/ /'jig rten rnams ni dga' bar mdzad/ /thub pa dbyangs
357b1(dkon brtsegs): snyan rab mnga' bas/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan sngon dang phyi mtha' dang / /mig nyid stong dben rab mkhyen cing / /rnam rtog tshig dang bral lags
357b2(dkon brtsegs): na| |ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan mig ni dpag med dang / /brjod pa sna tshogs rang bzhin gyis/ /rtag tu stong dben mkhyen lags ni/ /ci slad 'dzum pa
357b3(dkon brtsegs): ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan zad dang skye mtha' dang / /mig nyid stong nyid rab mkhyen cing / /nyon mongs rnams ni yongs spangs pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mkhyen pa
357b4(dkon brtsegs): brnyes| |grags pa mchog ni phun tshogs pa/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan yun ring bsgoms bslab pas/ /bsam gyis mi khyab ston par mdzad/ /mig
357b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid stong pa nyid du mkhyen/ /dri bral rtag tu rnam par dag /sems kyi spyod pa tshad med rnams/ /dgongs pa gcig gis thams cad mkhyen/ /'od zer 'jig rten snang
357b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa/ /'di ni gang gi snga rtags lags/ /drang srong chen po mngon sangs rgyas/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo khyad par 'phags/ /nyon mongs dag ni rab gsal bas/ /
357b7(dkon brtsegs): thugs ni rtag tu zhi zhing dben/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen mchog gis/ /mig zad mtha' ni rab tu rtogs/ /rgyu dang rkyen ni gang gi slad/ /deng 'dir 'dzum pa ston
358a1(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi/ /sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/ /thams cad kyang ni de bzhin no/ /
358a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan mig la bdag med mkhyen/ /rna ba mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /sna nyid stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan lce la bdag
358a3(dkon brtsegs): med mkhyen/ /lus kyang mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /sems yid stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan gzugs la bdag med mkhyen//
358a4(dkon brtsegs): sgra yang mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /dri nyid stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan rol bdag med mkhyen/ /reg bya mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /
358a5(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan sa la bdag med mkhyen/ /chu yang mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /me nyid stong par rab
358a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan rlung la bdag med mkhyen/ /ngo bo mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /dngos po nyid stong bar rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad
358a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten bdag med mkhyen/ /sdug bsngal mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /phung po stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston
358b1(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad/ /bcom ldan khams la bdag med mkhyen/ /'jig rten mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /skye nyid stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom
358b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan sgra la bdag med mkhyen/ /ming yang mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /lam nyid stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan ye shes bdag
358b3(dkon brtsegs): med mkhyen/ /rab dben mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /sems can stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan rang bzhin rang bzhin med/ /bdag
358b4(dkon brtsegs): dang bdag med pa yang mkhyen/ /mos pa ston par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /'khor ba bdag med nyid du gzigs/ /rtag dang mi rtag pa yang
358b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen| |mya ngan 'das pa stong mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rnam grol/ /grags pa khams gsum kun tu gang / /brgya
358b6(dkon brtsegs): byin mi yi dbang po dang / /klu rnams la sogs kun gyis mchod/ /de bzhin gshegs pas mig zad dang / /skye mtha' rab dben mkhyen lags na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston
358b7(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad/ /sangs rgyas sras ni tshad med pa/ /'khor 'dir thams cad rab tu 'dus/ /sangs rgyas gsung las skyes pa dang / /chos las sprul te gang byung ba/ /thams cad
359a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan spyan sngar mchis/ /gus pas thal mor sbyar lags/ /'khor 'dus de dag slad du ni/ /'od zer rgya rkyen 'di zhu lags/
359a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas mi gnyid ni/ /stong zhing bdag med mkhyen pas na/ /khyim na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ba/ /thams cad las ni yang dag 'das/ /de bzhin
359a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas chos rnams ni/ /bye brag med cing mnyam mkhyen pas/ /bcom ldan dgongs pa rab mkhyen gyi/ /rdzu 'phrul dag gis gzigs ma yin/ /bcom
359a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan mig la bdag med mkhyen/ /ngo bo nyid stong 'gro 'ong med/ /rnam dag mkhyen pa tshad med mchis/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// //bam
359a5(dkon brtsegs): po gsum pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa skye mtha' rab zad pa/ /thugs rje chen po 'jig rten kun skyob mdzad/ /chos rje mchog gyur mi yi gtsor gyur pa/ /ci slad 'dzum
359a6(dkon brtsegs): pa bstan mdzad ma shad du gsol/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshim ma mchis/ /gzhan yang lha tshogs gzi byin cho ba rnams/ /mkha' la gdugs ni dam pa
359a7(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang thogs/ /sa chen 'di ni rab tu g.yos par gyur/ /gang zhig sngon ni de bzhin gshegs pa las/ /yun ring dge ba'i chos ni gang bsgrubs pa/ /mnyam par
359b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' mdzad thugs rje chen po'i gtso/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /gang zhig sngon ni sangs rgyas rab mchod na/ /chos 'di thos nas dga' ba
359b2(dkon brtsegs): rab bskyed pas/ /'dren pa rab mchog mi yi gtsor gyur pa/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan gsung ni mang po dga' mdzad pas//
359b3(dkon brtsegs): bya rgyal ngang pa bzhin du dbyangs rab snyan/ /sgra snyan tshad med rang gi dang gis 'byung / /ci slad 'od zer 'di bkye bshad du gsol/ /tshigs bcad bye ba tshad ma mchis
359b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yis| |rjes mthun gsung gi bsngags pa brjod gyur cing / /ku tsi ra yi sgra skad mchog ldan pa/ /ci slad 'od zer bkye ba bshad du gsol/ /'brug sgra zab mos
359b5(dkon brtsegs): chos ni bstan pa'i sgras/ /'jig rten brgya stong dpag med grags gyur pa/ /thugs rjes tshig rtsub yang na 'jam ston pa/ /ci slad 'od zer gser gyi kha dog bkye/ /skye
359b6(dkon brtsegs): dang mi skye zad dang mi zad mkhyen/ /mig nyid bral zhing 'gro 'ong med par rtogs/ /'jig rten snang mdzad bdud rtsi'i mchog gyur pa/ /ci slad 'od zer gser gyi kha dog
359b7(dkon brtsegs): bkye| |mig gi byung ba rtag tu stong dben dang / /'gro 'ong ma mchis gnas pa ma mchis dang / /smig rgyu chu bur lta bur rab mkhyen pa/ /rgyu rkyen gang gi slad du 'dzum
360a1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad lags/ /de bzhin rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos rnams nas/ /sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar du
360a2(dkon brtsegs): yang / /thams cad de bzhin du ni rig par bgyi/ /rdo rje rtag pa'i sku dang mi 'jig sku/ /mtshan mchog brgya stong dag ni phun sum tshogs/ /sku la 'khrul 'khor mi
360a3(dkon brtsegs): mnga' g.yo mdzad pa/ /rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol/ /byin pa zlum zhing zhabs kyi rting pa yangs/ /phyal gyi mtshan ma mi gda' seng+ge 'dra/ /
360a4(dkon brtsegs): lte ba shin tu zab cing rked rgyas pa/ /rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol/ /gser sku rnam dag rdul dang dri ma spangs/ /ba spu re re kha dog mthon mthing
360a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan| |g.yas su 'khyil zhing spos kyi ngad ldang ba/ /rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol/ /sku mchog dam pa yongs rdzogs rtag gnas pa/ /dper
360a6(dkon brtsegs): na n+ya gro d+ha yi shing rgyal bzhin/ /yon tan thams cad kyis ni rab tu brgyan/ /gsung dbyangs dag gis 'khor ni dga' bar mdzad/ /dpung pa zlum zhing phrag pa
360a7(dkon brtsegs): sdug la mdzes/ /gtsug tor yongs rdzogs g.yas su 'khyil bar gda'/ /zhing ni brgya stong dpag med rgyu bar mdzad/ /sems can log dang yang dag lam ston
360b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad| |tshems dkar dri mi mnga' bas dung dang 'dra/ /ljags mtshan srid ring zhal ni kun tu khebs/ /'gram pa seng+ge'i 'dra zhing shangs kyang mtho/ /thams cad thabs
360b2(dkon brtsegs): dang rnam dag thugs las skyes/ /ut+pa la yi gsung ni zhal nas 'byung / /tsan+dan dri dag sku ni kun tu khyab/ /sngon ni byams pa rgya cher bsgoms pas na/ /rnam dag
360b3(dkon brtsegs): mos pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs mthil rtag tu mnyam/ /sa la reg kyang rdul ni gos mi 'gyur/ /gom pa seng+ge glang po che 'dra bas/ /
360b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad las ni yang dag 'das/ /'khor lo rtsibs stong mtshan gyis legs par brgyan/ /khyad 'phags 'od zer dag ni rtag tu gsal/ /dge ba
360b5(dkon brtsegs): dag gis skye rgu phan 'dogs pas/ /gang gis mthong ba dang ba rab tu skye/ /sor gcig 'od zer brgya stong rab bkye nas/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni dpag med snang bar mdzad/ /
360b6(dkon brtsegs): sngon ni dge sbyong mang po rab bsgrubs pas/ /mtshan gyi bkod pa sna tshogs 'di brnyes lags/ /gzugs sku yongs rdzogs dpe zla yong ma mchis/ /zhal mtshan rab
360b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzes shin tu khyad par 'phags/ /rdzu 'phrul dag gis 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /byin pa ri dwags e na ya dang
361a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dra| |sku dbyibs mi sgu seng+ge ji lta bzhin/ /'jig rten byung nas 'jig rten snang mdzad pa/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du
361a2(dkon brtsegs): gsol| |cang shes bzhin du mtshan sbas rdul mi mnga'/ /phyag mthil mnyam rgyas phyag ni pus mo 'das/ /mi yi seng+ge ngo mtshar khyad par 'phags/ /ci slad 'dzum
361a3(dkon brtsegs): pa bstan mdzad pa shad du gsol/ /sku la 'od zer dpag med rab 'gyed cing / /kha dog gya nom rab zhi rtag gsal zhing / /rnam dag thugs ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad//
361a4(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde tshad med pa dag ston par mdzad/ /rtag dang chad pa dag la gnas pa yis/ /de 'dra'i chos ni sgrub par 'gyur ma lags/ /gang gis mthar lta rnams ni rab
361a5(dkon brtsegs): spangs na/ /bcom ldan rnam dag sku ni myur thob 'gyur/ /lha rnga 'brug sgra'i gsung ni kun grags shing / /ka lan+da ka'i dbyangs snyan rab tu gsal/ /lha yi glu sgra
361a6(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong mang ldan pa/ /ci slad 'od zer bkye ba bshad du gsol/ /'dren pas gsung gcig tu ni chos bstan pas/ /'chal pa'i tshul khrims can dag rgyun
361a7(dkon brtsegs): yang bcad/ /de bzhin gshegs pas dbyangs rab gang gsung pa/ /de kun zab cing ngo mtshar chos lags so/ /khyu mchog smin mtshams 'od zer rab bkye
361b1(dkon brtsegs): pas| |sangs rgyas zhing ni brgya stong gsal bar mdzad/ /spyan mchog dag ni mthon mthing kha dog 'dra/ /gtsug tor mtshan ni mkha' yi lhas mi mthong / /tshems dkar
361b2(dkon brtsegs): gtams pa bzhi bcu dag dang ldan/ /dper na rin chen chu shel dag dang mtshungs/ /dge ba'i 'phrin las tshad med dag las skyes/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad
361b3(dkon brtsegs): bshad du gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rdzogs pa'i sku/ /kha dog dam pa dpag med phun tshogs shing / /'od zer rnam dag ngo mtshar rab bkye ba/ /
361b4(dkon brtsegs): ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /thugs rje chen po mchog rgyal rkang gnyis gtso/ /sems can yang dag bsam pa thugs su chud/ /thogs pa ma
361b5(dkon brtsegs): mchis spobs pa mchog brnyes pa/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pas pha rol rab byon pas/ /rig pa gsum dang mngon
361b6(dkon brtsegs): shes dug phun tshogs/ /rnam dag 'od zer dpag med ston mdzad pa/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan sngon ni bskal pa dpag med
361b7(dkon brtsegs): snyed| |bcom ldan brgya stong snyed la mchod pa mdzad/ /de 'dra'i rgyu 'bras chab ni mi 'tshal ba/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan
362a1(dkon brtsegs): sngon ni bskal pa dpag med snyed/ /ting 'dzin mchog rnams la ni rab zhugs pas/ /mig gi skye mtha' zad pa'i mtha' mkhyen
362a2(dkon brtsegs): na| |ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs da ltar dus/ /'dren pas de dag kun ni rab tu mkhyen/ /rnam dag mkhyen
362a3(dkon brtsegs): pa thogs med bsam mi khyab/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i mdun du phyag gser gyi
362a4(dkon brtsegs): kha dog lta bu brkyangs te zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bo la bzhag nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ /gzhon nu shin tu legs par nyon/ /ngas
362a5(dkon brtsegs): ni deng 'dir byang chub chos/ /'od zer rab tu ston pa'i mdo/ /khyod la shin tu yongs gtad kyi/ /ma 'ongs tha ma dus ngan tshe/ /chos ni rnam par 'jig pas na/ /
362a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis sems can rnams la ni/ /rab tu phye nas bshad par gyis/ /ngas ni sangs rgyas spyan dag gis/ /ma 'ongs tha ma'i dus kyi tshe/ /shin tu zab cing gya
362a7(dkon brtsegs): nom pa'i/ /mdo sde dam pa 'di dag la/ /gang mos gang ni mi mos pa/ /thams cad kun kyang gzigs shing mkhyen/ /sems can dag ni gang zhig gis/ /byang
362b1(dkon brtsegs): chub lam ni rab tshol ba/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes dran zhing / /mdo sde 'di ni gzung bar gyis/ /gang zhig dad pa rab 'jig cing / /'du 'dzi la ni mos gyur ngang / /nyin
362b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan gnyid la gang dga' ba/ /mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /nga yi bstan pa dag la ni/ /rab tu byung bar gyur nas kyang / /mya ngan 'das pa'i chos dag la/ /
362b3(dkon brtsegs): mos pa dag ni mi skye ba/ /skyes bu blun po de dag ni/ /dad pas byin pa chud zos 'gyur/ /'dus byas rnams ni chos dag la/ /nyes dmigs mang bar thos kyang ni/ /
362b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten dag la mngon zhen nas/ /'jig pa dag ni mi skye ba/ /skyes bu blun po de dag ni/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis smod par 'gyur/ /chos gos dag ni bgos
362b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur kyang / /de la shes rab ci yang med/ /thub pas legs par gsungs pa yi/ /yang dag dka' ni gang yin pa/ /shes pa med pas thos gyur na/ /yid ches
362b6(dkon brtsegs): len par mi 'gyur te/ /skyes bu blun po de dag dang / /lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i chos 'di dag /gal te thos par gyur nas kyang / /rab tu
362b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing mos pa yi/ /sems kyang skye bar mi 'gyur ba/ /de 'dra'i gang zag de dag ni/ /ngas ni rab tu smod par byed/ /ma lus thob par gyur mod kyi/ /de ni
363a1(dkon brtsegs): don med chud zos yin/ /gal te shin tu zab pa'i chos/ /'di dag thos par gyur na ni/ /rab tu dga' zhing mos pa yi/ /sems
363a2(dkon brtsegs): ni rab tu skye 'gyur ba/ /de 'dra'i gang zag de dag ni/ /sngon chad sangs rgyas phrad pas na/ /gdon mi za ba kho nar ni/ /bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /skyes
363a3(dkon brtsegs): bu blun po gang dag cig / lta ba ngan pas rab rmas nas/ /shes rab srog ni gcod byed pa/ /byang chub yongs su spong bar 'gyur/ /de lta bas na mi dge ba'i/ /
363a4(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen dag ni rab spangs nas/ /blo ldan mkhas pa dag la ni/ /brten cing gus pa bskyed par bya/ /'jig rten dag ni thams cad na/ /nyes dmigs
363a5(dkon brtsegs): tshad med gang yod pa/ /sems can ngan song gsum por ni/ /rtag tu byang bar gang byed pa/ /thams cad gti mug rmongs pa yi/ /rgyu dang rkyen las byung bas
363a6(dkon brtsegs): ni| |nyon mongs rjes su 'jug byed cing / /rang dbang dag ni thob mi 'gyur/ /yang dag chos ni spong byed cing / /chos ma yin pa spyod par byed/ /de lta bas na rmongs
363a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yi/ /skyes bu dman pa spang bar bya/ /ji ltar kha lo sgyur ba yi/ /rang gi srog shing bcag pa bzhin/ /mi dge'i las ni byas pas na/ /sems can dmyal
363b1(dkon brtsegs): bar skye bar 'gyur/ /kha nas tshig ngan phyung nas ni/ /rtag tu bdag la gnod byed pa/ /ji ltar sta re rno thogs nas/ /rang gi lus ni gcod byed 'dra/ /chos rnams rgyu dang
363b2(dkon brtsegs): rkyen dag gis/ /byas pa'i las kyi rjes su ni/ /rnam smin myong ba skyabs med par/ /de ltar khong du ma chud pas/ /'jig rten drang srong la brten nas/ /dge ba'i grogs
363b3(dkon brtsegs): po yin snyam sems/ /de nas rang nyid 'di snyam du/ /stong pa nyid ni gang sgom pa/ /'dus ma byas ni rtogs snyam nas/ /chad par lta ba skyed par byed/ /lus ni snod
363b4(dkon brtsegs): chag pa dang 'dra/ /sems kyang rjes su 'gag 'gyur zhes/ /phal cher kyal pa'i tshig dag la/ /mos pa nyid du rab 'gyur zhing / /'di la mngon par zhen pas na/ /phan
363b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don ni ci yang med/ /gal te sprul ni gdug pa yis/ /gnod pa dag ni rab byas kyang / /nam yang skye rgu mang po rnams/ /ngan 'gro dag tu ltung mi byed/ /blun po gang
363b6(dkon brtsegs): zhig chos ston pa/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig byed pas/ /skye rgu mang po tshad med snyed/ /sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed/ /khyed la sogs pa 'khor 'dus pa/ /'di lta
363b7(dkon brtsegs): bur ni blta bar gyis/ /deng 'dir nga yi spyan sngar ni/ /zla 'od gzhon nu gang 'dug pa/ /'dis ni sngon chad 'das pa yi/ /sangs rgyas dag ni bcom ldan 'das/ /tshad med
364a1(dkon brtsegs): gang+gA'i klung bye snyed/ /mchod pa rim gro rab byas shing / /shin tu brtan par yongs bsgoms nas/ /bla med ye shes btsal bas
