364a4(dkon brtsegs): ni ston par byed/ /skyes bu blun po gang yin pa/ /chos 'di slob par mi nus pas/ /rnal 'byor sgom pa dag la ni/ /skyon nyid du yang lta bar byed/ /de lta bas na
364a5(dkon brtsegs): blun po dag / thag ring por ni yongs spangs nas/ /de dag la ni bstan mi bya/ /de yi chos kyang mi bslab bo/ /skyes bu blun po gang yin pa/ /rtsod pa'i smra la mos pas na//
364a6(dkon brtsegs): rtsod smra med pa'i spyod pa la/ /nan tan sgrub par mi nus pas/ /skyes bu de dag rnams la ni/ /tshul bzhin sems ni ci yang med/ /de lta bas na de dag la/ /
364a7(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur mi bya bsngags mi brjod/ /skyes bu blun po gang yin pa/ /le lo snyoms las la gnas pas/ /rtag tu lus dang ngag yid kyi/ /mi dge'i las ni
364b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pas na/ /de la tshul khrims dag pa dang / /shes rab mang thos ci yang med/ /rtag tu 'dod pa'i yul sems shing / /'du 'dzi dag la mos par byed/ /
364b2(dkon brtsegs): khyed kyis 'di ltar blun po de/ /rigs dang rus dang lus kyang ni/ /dman pa yin par rab tu ltos/ /khong khro bka' blo mi bde zhing / /byad bzhin dag ni mi sdug la/ /
364b3(dkon brtsegs): gal te dge ba'i gnas skyes kyang / /lus ni rtag tu ma rabs 'gyur/ /bdag tu 'du shes la zhen pas/ /yang dag don la rmongs par 'gyur/ /blo gros dag dang mi

364b5(dkon brtsegs): po nas 'jig rten pa'i/ /tshig gi spros pa gang yin pa/ /thams cad rab tu spangs pa yin/ /so so'i skye bos 'di dag la/ /shin tu zhen cing chags pas na/ /ji srid
364b6(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho yi bar du yang / /rtogs shing khong du chud mi 'gyur/ /tshul khrims bsngags pa brjod byed kyang / /tshangs par spyod pa sgrub mi byed/ /kha nas chos ni ston byed kyang / /
364b7(dkon brtsegs): lus kyis chos min spyod par byed/ /rang gis 'dul ba ston byed kyang / /rtag tu 'dul min spyod par byed/ /sangs rgyas slob ma dag la ni/ /kha dog bsgyur pa'i
365a1(dkon brtsegs): gos gyon gsungs/ /'chal ba'i tshul khrims can dag gis/ /gos 'di rab tu bgos gyur kyang / /nga rgyal dang ni bag med pa'i/ /sems ni

365a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems ni skyed par byed/ /ston pa chen po mi dran pas/ /ngo tsha dman pa'i sems kyang med/ /mi gtsang dngos po len byed kyang / /yid bzhin nor bu thob pa
365a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin| |shin tu dga' bas 'dzin byed pas/ /sems kyis cung zad gtong mi byed/ /'di lta bu yi ma rabs dag /khyim nas rab tu byung nas ni/ /spyod lam dag kyang

365b2(dkon brtsegs): mi spong zhing / /dge sbyong ma yin pa yi chos/ /log lta rtag tu lhung gyur na/ /rab dben mya ngan 'das pa'i lam/ /de dag rab tu nyams par 'gyur/ /dge sbyong mngon

365b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyu yi phyir/ /dgon pa dag na gnas byed kyi/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i yang dag rgyu/ /bsgrub pa'i phyir ni ma yin no/ /rmugs dang gnyid la rab tu dga'/ /lus ni ji ltar bde

366a1(dkon brtsegs): byas pas/ /gos bzang dag gis lus brgyan pa/ /de la shin tu sred par 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i bde ba rnams la ni/ /rtag tu sred pa skyed par

369a1(dkon brtsegs): zer ston pa'i mdo 'di ni/ /ji skad gsungs bzhin de yi tshe/ /bram ze'i khye'u dang gzhon nu gnyis/ /legs par nyan cing yongs su bzung //
369a2(dkon brtsegs): nga sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ /me tog ut+pal dag gis ni/ /sangs rgyas de la mchod pa byas/ /de tshe khyod kyang der 'dug ste/ /'di skad du ni smon lam btab/ /nga yi
369a3(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa tha ma la/ /mdo sde 'di ni rab bzung nas/ /rgya cher ston par shog ces smras/ /gang gis chos 'di thos gyur nas/ /zhe sdang sems ni mi bskyed par/ /gzung
369a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin klog cing gang 'don pa/ /de ni skyes bu dam pa yin/ /khyod kyis ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe/ /thos dka'i chos 'di rab bzung nas/ /sems can dag la don gyi
369a5(dkon brtsegs): tshul| |rgya cher dbye zhing bstan par bya/ /ngas kyang 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ /yang dag chos ni nub pa na/ /'od zer ston pa'i mdo 'di ni/ /sems can dag la
369a6(dkon brtsegs): rgya cher bstan/ /blun pos nan tan mi sgrub pas/ /'di la skur pa 'debs par byed/ /ngas ni de skad thos gyur nas/ /zhe sdang dag ni skyed mi byed/ /nga ni rtag tu
369a7(dkon brtsegs): bzod bsgoms nas/ /'jig rten rnams la phan 'dogs byed/ /bzod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pas na/ /mtshan dang dpe byad dag gis brgyan/ /gzhon nu khyod kyis
369b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas sku/ /gya nom yongs su rdzogs gyur cig /gser gyi kha dog rnam dag 'phags/ /bzod pa'i stobs las byung bar ltos/ /nga yi zhabs ni sa reg nas/ /zhing
369b2(dkon brtsegs): ni tshad med g.yo byed kyang / /sems can rnams ni mi lhung ba/ /bzod pa'i stobs las thams cad skyed/ /nga yi spu khung gcig nas ni/ /'od zer brgya stong rab bkye nas/ /
369b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad gsal bar gang byed pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /srin po shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /srog chags gzi brjid 'phrog byed pa/ /nga
369b4(dkon brtsegs): la rtag tu gus pa yang / /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /nga yi 'khor ni ji snyed pa/ /sems ni rab tu dul gyur nas/ /de bzhin gshegs la gus pa
369b5(dkon brtsegs): yang / /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /rol mo'i sgra ni brgya stong dag /'khor 'dus chen po'i nang dag tu/ /sangs rgyas yon tan bsngags brjod pa/ /thams

369b7(dkon brtsegs): stobs las byung / /srin po gnod sbyin la sogs pas/ /me tog phreng ba brgya stong thogs/ /'ongs nas nga la mchod byed pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung /
370a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing ni brgya stong tshad med par/ /bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /nga yi yon tan bsngags pa yang / /thams cad bzod mchog

370a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po ni/ /ma na pa ga la sogs pas/ /mu tig dmar pos nga mchod pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /du mu ru dang shi khyi bi/ /brgya stong snyed ni 'dus

371a7(dkon brtsegs): gti mug khong khro dang / /'chab dang phrag dog g.yo sgyu dang / /khengs dang nga rgyal la sogs pa/ /rgya cher bshad pa'ang de bzhin no/ /de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa de
371b1(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i chos khyad par du 'phags pa thos pas rab tu dga' bar gyur nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sang gi gdugs la
371b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor mang po dang bcas par gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren na/ thugs brtse bar dgongs te bdag gis sbyar ba'i gdugs tshod gsol bar ci

371b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rab tu dga' bas rang gi khyim du song ste/ rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lha
371b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lto 'phye la sogs pas rgyal po'i khab grong khyer chen po'i bzhi mdor dar gyi lding khang bres te/ lding khang de yang shin tu
371b7(dkon brtsegs): mtho zhing rgya che la thams cad kun du khyab pa/ gser gyi tsong tsong dra bar bres pa/ nor bu rin po che'i phreng ba dpyangs pa/ seng+ge'i ba dan dang / gser gyi phreng ba lu gu rgyud can
372a1(dkon brtsegs): 'bum phrag brgya stong sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ gzhan yang rin po che'i me tog kha dog khyad par du 'phags pa'i phreng ba'i phung po dag
372a2(dkon brtsegs): gcal du bkram mo/ /me tog tsam+pa ka dang / a ti muk+ta la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phreng ba tshad med grangs med pa yang rin po che'i lding khang gi nang thams
372a3(dkon brtsegs): cad dang 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kun du khyab par dpyangs shing rgyan du bres so/ /gzhan yang de'i nang du khri stan rnams bshams nas rin po che'i spos phyi li
372a4(dkon brtsegs): ka dang / du ma tsa dang / tsan+dan dang / gur gum rnam par dag cing yid dga' bar byed pa sna tshogs bsregs so/ /de bzhin du sbyar spos mchog dam pa sna tshogs kyang

372a6(dkon brtsegs): mo| |de'i tshe lha'i bu mo dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang / sgra gcan 'dzin gyi bu mo grangs med tshad med pa yang rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas byang chub kyi

372b1(dkon brtsegs): khyer de kun du khyab par brgyan zhing yongs su dag pa dang / gdugs tshod la bab par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can

372b3(dkon brtsegs): pa la zhabs bzhag ma thag tu grong khyer chen po de'i sa chen po yang rab tu g.yos par 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med pa yang
372b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu g.yos par gyur te/ de'i tshe long ba dag gis mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur/ sdug bsngal ba rnams ni/ bde ba thob par gyur/ /'on pa rnams ni/ rna bas sgra thos par

372b6(dkon brtsegs): ni| gos thob par gyur/ rin po che med pa rnams ni/ rin po che thob par gyur/ nye bshes med pa rnams ni/ nye bshes dang ldan par gyur/ lus kyi rgyan thams cad kyis phongs pa
372b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni/ lus kyi rgyan thams cad dang ldan par gyur to/ /gzhan yang ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / ne tso dang / rma bya dang / ka ri ka la sogs pa bya'i tshogs mang po rnams de
373a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba mchog dam pa phyung ste/ gang gis sgra de thos pa yang
373a2(dkon brtsegs): yid shin tu bde bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tsam+pa ka'i ljon shing tshad med pa snyed mngon par sprul pas sems can
373a3(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong mang po rnams me tog yongs su dag pa de dag dang / gzhan yang spos mchog dam pa thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te mchod pa byas so/ /gzhan

373a5(dkon brtsegs): to| |lha ma yin mang po dang / gzhan yang lha mang po rnams rin po che'i gdugs gser dang dngul gyis rab tu brgyan pa thogs nas bar snang la 'dug ste/ de bzhin gshegs

375b6(dkon brtsegs): rkang gi gdub 'khor phreng ba dang / /de bzhin rin chen rgyan ni sna tshogs las/ /ma dkrol bar yang rang las sgra snyan byung / /so sor phan tshun dga' ba'i gtam brjod cing //
375b7(dkon brtsegs): skad mthun bkra shis mchog gi bsngags pa brjod/ /'on long dbang po ma tshang dbang po thob/ /thams cad bcom ldan khyad 'phags 'bras bu dbang / /bcom ldan grong khyer

376a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar gyur/ /gzhan yang sems can dran pa nyams pa dang / /smyos 'khrugs rab zhi phan tshun gtam snyan brjod/ /bud med gang sbrum mya ngan 'jigs gyur pa/ /'od
376a3(dkon brtsegs): zer byin gyis bde ba thob par gyur/ /skyes pa bud med ngo tsha khrel bcas la/ /dri ma spangs pa'i chos dag rab bshad pas/ /thams cad dga' nas dag pa'i sems
376a4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed de/ /thub mchog zhabs la spyi btud phyag byas nas/ /kha cig bcom ldan bla med lam mchog tshol/ /kha cig byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos tshol/ /bcom
376a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pas na/ /bcom ldan zhal du blta zhing rang nyid dga'/ /bcom ldan mkhyen pas sa yi spyod rtogs pas/ /'jig rten rjes
376a6(dkon brtsegs): mthun phan pa rab tu mdzad/ /chos kyi nor mchog byang chub sems dpa' byin/ /rin chen mchog ni sems can rnams la btang / /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i
376a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe| |mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad byung / /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yin/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra
376b1(dkon brtsegs): ni 'di skad byung / /gang zhig mig skye mtha' sred pa/ /sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yin/ /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /sangs rgyas yid ches mi 'jigs thob/ /mig zad
376b2(dkon brtsegs): mthar ni lta bas na/ /shin tu dang ba rgyun mi 'chad/ /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /chos la yid ches mi 'jigs thob/ /mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /shin tu dang ba
376b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyun mi 'chad/ /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /dge 'dun yid ches mi 'jigs thob/ /mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /shin tu dang ba rgyun mi 'chad/ /gang zhig mig
376b4(dkon brtsegs): zad mtha' sred pa/ /tshul khrims 'dzin med thob par 'gyur/ /mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /shin tu dang ba rgyun mi 'chad/ /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /ngan 'gro'i
376b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags spong bar 'gyur/ /mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /'dod chags rgyun ni spong bar byed/ /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /ngan 'gro'i zhe sdang spong bar 'gyur//
376b6(dkon brtsegs): mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /zhe sdang rgyun ni spong bar byed/ /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /ngan 'gro'i gti mug spong bar 'gyur/ /mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /
376b7(dkon brtsegs): gti mug rgyun ni spong bar byed/ /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /byang chub ye shes dag la gnas/ /mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /byang chub ye shes rgyun mi 'chad/ /
377a1(dkon brtsegs): mig skye mtha' dang mig gi mtha'/ /'jug pa dang ni rab dben dang / /yod pa nyid du mi 'gyur dang / /mi skye rab tu zhi ba dang / /'di la sogs
377a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgo rnams kyang / /thams cad mig zad 'dra bar bstan/ /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu
377a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig skye mtha' sred pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig
377a4(dkon brtsegs): mig gi mtha' sred pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig gi 'jug sred pa/ /de ni rtag
377a5(dkon brtsegs): tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig dben rab sred pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom
377a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig mi skye sred pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu
377a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig med la sred pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig
377b1(dkon brtsegs): mig zhi la sred pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya
377b2(dkon brtsegs): nas| |sgra dang ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /mig skye dpag med gang bskyed pa/ /ye shes dpag med skyed par byed/ /ye shes dpag tu med pa'i
377b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir| |chos 'di bstan pa'ang de bzhin no/ /mig zad dpag med gang shes pa/ /mig la sgrib pa med par 'gyur/ /de ltar sgrib pa med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen pa thogs
377b4(dkon brtsegs): med thob/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs
377b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe| / sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mkha' las chos bshad sgra thos nas/ /sangs rgyas yon tan the tshom med/ /kha cig 'dod chags sems byung yang / /sangs
377b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ye shes 'jigs mi byed/ /gang zhig 'dod chags sems byung yang / /sangs rgyas yon tan stor ma gyur/ /kha cig 'dod chags sems byung yang / /bla med ye
377b7(dkon brtsegs): shes tshol byed cing / /ma 'dres chos ni sgrub pa dang / /nyan thos theg pa mos mi byed/ /byis pa bsam gtan sgom byed kyang / /bsam gtan bde la mos pas na/ /
378a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab bskyed nas/ /dge sbyong 'bras bu thob snyam sems/ /byis pa gsam gtan sgom byed kyang / /mi zad mtha' yi shes med
378a2(dkon brtsegs): na| |bskal pa brgya stong sgom byed kyang / /de la rnam grol ci yang med/ /skye ba len pa thams cad ni/ /de la zhen chags skyed par byed/ /gal te skye nyid stong rig
378a3(dkon brtsegs): na| |mthong ba rnams ni rnam dag 'gyur/ /gang zhig bsam gtan bzhi bsgrubs kyang / /mig zad mtha' shes med gyur na/ /bskal pa brgya stong lon kyang ni/ /bsam
378a4(dkon brtsegs): gtan yongs su dag mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig nyer bsdogs thob gyur kyang / /zad mtha' shes pa thob mi 'gyur/ /zad pa thob pa ma shes phyir/ /zag pa thob la rtag tu
378a5(dkon brtsegs): spyod| |gang zhig 'du shes zhen byed pa/ /'du shes zad mtha'i shes pa med/ /'du shes zad pa ma shes phyir/ /rtag tu 'du shes zag la spyod/ /gang zhig 'jig rten
378a6(dkon brtsegs): zhen chags pa/ /'jig rten zad mtha' shes pa med/ /'jig rten zad mtha' ma shes phyir/ /rtag tu 'jig rten zag la spyod/ /gang zhig zag bcas sems la gnas/ /
378a7(dkon brtsegs): sems zad mtha' yi shes pa med/ /sems zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /rtag tu sems ni zag la spyod/ /gang zhig zag bcas chos la gnas/ /chos zad mtha' yi shes pa
378b1(dkon brtsegs): med| |chos zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /rtag tu zad bcas chos la spyod/ /sbyangs pa'i chos la gnas gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /
378b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag sbyangs la gnas ma yin/ /kha dog bsgyur gos bgos gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /yang dag chos gos bgos ma yin/ /ya
378b3(dkon brtsegs): rabs rigs su skyes gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /de ni dag pa'i rigs ma yin/ /'khor mang dag ni bdog gyur kyang / /mig zad
378b4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yi shes med na/ /myur du ngan 'gror lhung 'gyur te/ /'khor dag gis ni skyob mi nus/ /sgra yi rig pa mkhas gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /mig zad pa
378b5(dkon brtsegs): ni ma shes phyir/ /sgra yi rig pa rtogs ma yin/ /bzo rnams la ni mkhas gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /de ni bzo la mkhas ma yin//
378b6(dkon brtsegs): dri ba mang la mkhas gyur cing / /yi ge gcig gis rnam 'byed kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /de ni don mthun bshad ma yin/ /mkhas pa'i rjes su slob byed kyang / /
378b7(dkon brtsegs): gsang dang gsang min mi shes shing / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /chos ni rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /brjod pa sna tshogs rgyang pan dang / /chos rnams rab tu shes gyur
379a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang | / mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /'khri shing stug bor lhung ba 'dra/ /sgra yi rig pa mkhas gyur cing / /dge dang mi dge'i rtags ston kyang //
379a2(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'bru yi ge sgra skad dang / /klog dang 'don pa'i mthar thug dang / /mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na/ /de dag rnams ni shes med yin/ /bud med dag gi mtshan ma dang / /
379a3(dkon brtsegs): tshig mkhan rmongs par byed pa dang / lus nyes ngal sos chos rnams dang / /mkhyud dpyad dag la mkhas gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na/ /de dag rnams ni shes med
379a4(dkon brtsegs): yin| |gzhung lugs brgya mang ston byed cing / /yi ge 'bru gcig mi brjed kyang / /mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na/ /bshad pa de ni don med yin/ /de bzhin mig skye mtha'
379a5(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / /mig mtha' dang ni 'jug pa nas/ /rab tu zhi ba'i bar du yang / /de bzhin du ni rig par gyis/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /
379a6(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /sgra yi rig pa klog 'don cing / /de yi don ni rtogs gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na/ /de
379a7(dkon brtsegs): ni nam yang dman pa yin/ /smrang gzhi dag ni 'don byed cing / /gsang sngags dag ni rtogs gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na/ /de ni nam yang dman pa
379b1(dkon brtsegs): yin| |de bzhin mig gi skye mtha' dag / mig gi mtha' dang 'jug pa nas/ /rab tu zhi ba'i bar du yang / /de bzhin nyid du rig par gyis/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs
379b2(dkon brtsegs): sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya'o/ /bam po bzhi pa/ bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /
379b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag ni tshad med snyed/ /mkha' las chos bstan sgra thos pas/ /mig zad mtha' yi shes pa thob/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /sems can dag ni tshad
379b4(dkon brtsegs): med snyed/ /mkha' las chos bstan sgra thos pas/ /mig gi rang bzhin rtogs par 'gyur/ /stong dang bdag med rab rtogs pas/ /thams cad rnam dag mig thob gyur/ /rna ba sna
379b5(dkon brtsegs): lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /'dod sdang gti mug khong khro dang / nga rgyal khengs dang
379b6(dkon brtsegs): g.yo sgyu nas/ /bag med pa yi bar du yang / /de bzhin du ni rig par gyis/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /sems can dag ni tshad med snyed/ /steng gi nam
379b7(dkon brtsegs): mkha' dag las ni/ sangs rgyas mtshan ni sna tshogs thos/ /kha cig 'dod chags 'jigs pa yi/ /dpe zla med pa'i ming yang thos/ /kha cig zhe sdang 'jigs byed
380a1(dkon brtsegs): cing | / 'jig rten phan 'dogs ming dag thos/ /kha cig gti mug rab rtogs shing / /nga rgyal 'dul ba'i ming dag thos/ /kha cig 'jig
380a2(dkon brtsegs): rtan dag la ni/ /rab zhi ston pa'i 'dren ming thos/ /kha cig shes rab dag bstan nas/ /'jig rten phan 'dogs ming dag thos/ /kha cig thabs dag rab bstan nas/ /
380a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can phan 'dogs ming dag thos/ /kha cig bdud ni rab btul kyang / /'khon 'dzin med pa'i ming dag thos/ /kha cig gsung rab chos dag gis/ /rnam grol
380a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i ming dag thos/ /kha cig sems can sdug bsngal ba/ /rgya cher sgrol ba'i ming dag thos/ /kha cig mi yi gtso bo yis/ /'jig rten sgrol ba'i ming dag thos//
380a5(dkon brtsegs): ming ni de dag thos gyur nas/ /thams cad rnam dag ming thob gyur/ /nam mkha' dang ni rgya mtsho'i chu/ /ri rab lhun po'i bar du yang / /thams cad gzhal du rung sred kyi/ /
380a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mkhyen pa thug mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig zad nges pa thob gyur na/ /chos sku mngon par grub pa dka' mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos sku mchog ni grub gyur na//
380a7(dkon brtsegs): kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob/ /des ni mdo sde dpag med go bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig mdo sde dpag med
380b1(dkon brtsegs): go gyur pas/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob pa dka' mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig skye nges pa thob gyur na/ /chos sku mngon par grub pa dka' mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos sku mchog ni
380b2(dkon brtsegs): grub gyur na/ /kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob/ /des ni mdo sde dpag med go bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig mdo sde
380b3(dkon brtsegs): dpag med go gyur pas/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par dka' mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos dag nas/ /sgra rnams dang ni ming
380b4(dkon brtsegs): gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin du ni sbyar ba bya/ /de tshe sa chen dag ni rab tu g.yos/ /rgya mtsho ri rnams kyang ni de bzhin no/ /lha ma yin dang lha ni mang po rnams/ /thams
380b5(dkon brtsegs): cad rab tu dga' ba skyes par gyur/ /bdud dang bdud dpung g.yo sgyu rab bcom nas/ /thams cad sangs rgyas bkod pa sgrub par mos/ /lha rnams so so gzhal med khang zhugs
380b6(dkon brtsegs): nas| |phan tshun dga' ba'i gtam ni 'di skad smras/ /'dren pa deng ni 'jig rten byung bas na/ /lha mi thams cad la ni phan pa mdzad/ /sa bla'i lha 'khor gzhal med khang
380b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas/ /dang ba'i sems kyis dga' nas 'di skad du/ /'dren pa 'jig rten deng byung shin tu legs/ /'jig rten kun bde'i rgyu ni rab tu mdzad/ /mkha' la spyod pa'i lha
381a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams de thos nas/ /thams cad dga' nas rab tu dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /'dren ba byung bas
381a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha ni de thos nas/ /thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /
381a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /sum cu rtsa gsum lha ni de thos nas/ /thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags
381a4(dkon brtsegs): brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /'thab bral lha dag de skad thos nas ni/ /thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan
381a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /bdag cag byang chub sems ni rab bskyed na/ /bcom ldan bla med mkhyen pa nye bar
381a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyi| |lha mi gtso mchog la ni brten nas su/ /sems can thams cad sgrol bar bgyid ces zer/ /dga' ldan lha rnams de skad thos nas kyang / /thams cad dga' nas
381a7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bye bar
381b1(dkon brtsegs): ni| |spyod mchog khyad 'phags dpag med sngon bsgrubs nas/ /sems can sdug bsngal ba la bde lam bstan/ /'khor ba bsgral nas mya ngan 'das la bkod/ /'phrul dga'i
381b2(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams de skad thos nas ni/ /thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad
381b3(dkon brtsegs): zer| |gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha ni de thos nas/ /thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung bas
381b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skye shi 'das pa na/ /bdud dang mu stegs mang po pham par mdzad/ /bla med byang chub dag ni yongs rdzogs nas/ /skye rgu
381b5(dkon brtsegs): drangs nas pha rol 'jog ces zer/ /tshangs ris lha rnams de skad thos nas kyang / /thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags
381b6(dkon brtsegs): brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /de bzhin gcig nas gcig tu sgra thos pas/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams dga' nas 'di skad du/ /'dren pa byung
381b7(dkon brtsegs): bas 'jig rten phan pa mdzad/ /bdud dpung 'jigs skrag mya ngan byed ces zer/ /srid pa'i rtse mo'i lha yi bar du yang / /sangs rgyas byung nas 'jig rten phan mdzad thos/ /
382a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin sgra ni kun du grags pas na/ /lha ma yin dag 'grib cing lha rnams 'phel/ /bdud kyi khang pa dag ni yongs stongs shing / /lha
382a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'khor ni rab tu rgyas par 'gyur/ /mi 'jigs stobs kyis log pa rab btul nas/ /byang chub chen po'i mchog ni myur du brnyes/ /de bzhin skad cig yud tsam
382a3(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams kyis/ /bcom ldan byung nas phan mdzad thos gyur pas/ /'jig rten 'dren par mdzad pa shin tu legs/ /rnam dag ming ni sems can sbyin zhes zer/ /bcom
382a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /'dod pas yongs su gdungs pa rnams/ /mi gtsang sgom pa bshad thos pas/ /'dod chags zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /bcom ldan
382a5(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /zhe sdang dag gis gdungs pa rnams/ /byams pa bstan pa'i chos thos pas/ /zhe sdang zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /bcom ldan grong khyer
382a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i tshe/ /gti mug dag gis gdungs pa rnams/ /shes rab chos ni bstan thos pas/ /gti mug zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs
382a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe| / nga rgyal dag gis gdungs pa rnams/ /nga rgyal spangs pa'i chos thos pas/ /nga rgyal zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /phrag
382b1(dkon brtsegs): dog dag gis gdungs pa rnams/ /phrag dog spangs pa'i chos thos pas/ /phrag dog zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /khong khro dag gis gdungs pa
382b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams| |khong khro spangs pa'i chos thos pas/ /khong khro zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /ser sna dag gis gdungs pa rnams/ /ser sna spangs
382b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos thos pas/ /ser sna zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /gang zhig dul ba'i spyod grub pa/ /dpag med chos ni 'di thos pas/ /mang du thos pa'i mtshor zhugs pas/ /kun 'dzin sgo
382b4(dkon brtsegs): ni sgrub par byed/ /gzhan yang mkha' las sgra thos pas/ /me tog dag gis sangs rgyas mchod/ /yon tan khyad par 'phags sgrub cing / /snying rje chen po'i rdzu 'phrul ston/ /
382b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang mkha' las sgra thos pas/ /bcom ldan sku dang skye gnas dang / /gdung rgyud dang ni gsung sgra rnams/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i bsngags pa brjod/ /sems can
382b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba ji lta bar/ /rdzu 'phrul dag kyang ci rigs bshad/ /mig dang rna ba sna lce lus/ /gzugs dang sgra dri la sogs dang / /bskum pa dang ni brkyang ba dang / /ston par mdzad pa
382b7(dkon brtsegs): khyad par 'phags/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten 'das pa na/ /'jig rten sgron ma rab mdzad cing / /gzugs ni mang po ston pa yang / /thams cad sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul yin/ /
383a1(dkon brtsegs): snod dang snod min de rjes su/ /mi mthun chos ni ston mdzad pas/ /sems can tshe rabs tshad med nas/ /sangs rgyas mchod par ma byas shing //
383a2(dkon brtsegs): dmu rgod gdul bar dka' ba la/ /sems can dmyal ba bshad par mdzad/ /gang zhig las la rmongs gyur cing / /lta la brten nas spros dga' ba/ /bcom ldan de
383a3(dkon brtsegs): dag lta ba dang / /spros pa zhi ba'i sgra thos mdzad/ /gzhan yang mkha' las ngo bo nyid/ /nges pa nyid du stong pa dang / /'gro 'ong med cing mtshan med dang / /ci yang med pa'i
383a4(dkon brtsegs): sgra yang thos/ /gzhan yang sems can brgya stong dag /mkha' las sha dang shes rab spyan/ /de bzhin chos kyi spyan bar du/ /yang dag ston pa'i sgra yang thos/ /bcom
383a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab sgra/ /rnam grol rnam grol mthong ba'i sgra/ /ston pa dag kyang thos par gyur/ /sems can dag ni ji
383a6(dkon brtsegs): snyed la| |de bzhin rdzu 'phrul rab bstan nas/ /ji ltar rjes mthun sgra skad kyis/ /yang dag chos ni bstan par mdzad/ /sems can la la gang zhig gis/ /sbyin dang tshul
383a7(dkon brtsegs): khrims bzod sgrub mos/ /rdzu 'phrul mos pa ji lta bzhin/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod sgra ston/ /bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /sems can dbang po ji lta
383b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin| |rgya cher yang dag 'byed mdzad pas/ /len 'dzin ston la dgod par mdzad/ /bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /phung po khams dang skye mched kyi/ /bcings dang
383b2(dkon brtsegs): grol dang nyi ring dang / /sa yi gnas skabs bye brag gi /mtshan nyid stong pa thos par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang sa dang ye shes kyi/ /'od zer tshad med ston pa dang / /nyon mongs bag
383b3(dkon brtsegs): chags spangs pa dang / /spangs min ston pa thos par gyur/ /bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /lha dang mi yi ngo bo nyid/ /las dang 'bras bu mi mtshungs pas/ /skye len tha
383b4(dkon brtsegs): dad thos par 'gyur/ /res 'ga' bud med mdun dag tu/ /bud med brgyan pa'i lus sprul nas/ /mkha' las skyo ston sgra bsgrags pas/ /gang thos 'dod chags sel bar mdzad//
383b5(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu ni ji lta bzhin/ /shin tu dang ba skyes gyur pa/ /thugs rjes mos pa ji bzhin du/ /bla med chos ni ston par mdzad/ /mau dgal bu dang 'od srung dang / /ka pi na dang kun
383b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' dang / /'od srung chen po dag dang ni/ /kun shes kau di n+ya la sogs/ /de dag mos pa ji bzhin du/ /nyan thos chos ston thos par 'gyur/ /lha rnams dang ni lha ma yin/ /
383b7(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin dag ni mang po dang / /be ro ka ni 'khor dang bcas/ /grul bum dag ni tshad med rnams/ /bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /gzungs sngags sgra ni thos par
384a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur| / i di si/ bi di si/ i ra su/ i ra/ au na si/ ma na si/ u khyi/ a no khyi/ a khi tsa la maM naM ye/ di ra
384a2(dkon brtsegs): ni sh+tha ni mi/ ta ka ni/ i mi man+t+ra/ ni ha ra/ a bu re/ bud+d+he/ ni re/ a khi tsa ra/ bi ya ki ri ya te/ a khi tsar pa ra mi te/ ka lA ba hi ni/ sarba bing+shi nir d+he bau na/ ba ra sha
384a3(dkon brtsegs): sad te| sha sa ta/ pa ra sha sad ta/ ta ra sad ta/ b+hU mi/ Am b+ha ra/ li la b+ha na/ shiny+tsa tsid ta/ bi ba ma ti/ tsid ta a nan+ta/ o be ra ha ba mi ta b+hU mi/ na nam kA ni/ a ka
384a4(dkon brtsegs): ni bi b+hi mid te/ sha ri bi sh+tha/ a ma la ni ma la/ bU li te na ra shi tsa/ ha ha ri/ ma ma lI/ b+ha ra Ni ti sh+tha/ tsak+Shu nir ha ra/ u d+ha ri ta ba tsi/ an+ta ri/ ku ta ri/ ke tu su ke tu su
384a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ra ni| ka ra ni/ ku su ma ni yai/ ka ka ri/ ka kha ri/ u pa laM mU ri/ ti sh+tha da ra ni/ nA ga ni ra ha re/ pa ra lad te/ a te pa ra ya te/ an+ta ra b+han+d+he/ an+ta ra ta b+ha ti shi tsa/
384a6(dkon brtsegs): ha si ri/ ma kha li/ I ni sam+b+ha re/ tish+tha sit+ta ra Ni/ ku b+hu lo tsa te/ gzhan yang rgyal po rnam thos bu/ /yul 'khor srung ni la sogs pas/ /khyad 'phags sgra ni grangs
384a7(dkon brtsegs): med kyis/ /bden pa'i sngags tshig rab tu smras/ /tshad med sgra ni de dag kyang / /bde gshegs rdzu 'phrul dbang gis byung / /rdzu 'phrul dag ni tshad med pas/ /bstan pa
384b1(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang tshad med do/ /res 'ga' sangs rgyas med zhing du/ /rdzu 'phrul rol pa'i stobs dag gis/ /'khor bskor sangs rgyas sku ston pa/ /da ltar mthong ba de bzhin no/ /bsam gyis
384b2(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab zhing dag tu/ /sprul pa tshad med ston mdzad pa/ /bltams nas gom pa bdun gshegs dang / /rgyal srid spangs nas rab byung dang / /byang chub snying por sangs rgyas nas/ /
384b3(dkon brtsegs): brnyes pa'i chos dag rab dgongs te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad dang / /mya ngan 'das pa ston par mdzad/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi ni stobs dag gis/ /sna tshogs chos ni ston mdzad
384b4(dkon brtsegs): pas| |sems can dag ni tshad med rnams/ /khyad 'phags ye shes grub par mdzad/ /de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas/ /byams chos
384b5(dkon brtsegs): sgom pa bshad bstan nas/ /byams pa'i sems ni 'phel bar mdzad/ /de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/ /lha rnams kyis ni yongs bskor nas/ /bsdu ba'i dngos bzhi bshad bstan
384b6(dkon brtsegs): pas| |bsdu ba'i dngos bzhi 'phel bar mdzad/ /de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/ /klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor nas/ /zhe sdang nyes dmigs bshad bstan pas/ /zhe sdang sems
384b7(dkon brtsegs): ni spangs par gyur/ /de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor nas/ /rnam 'tshe'i nyes dmigs bshad bstan pas/ /rnam 'tshe'i sems ni spangs
385a1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur/ /de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/ /lha ma yin gyis yongs bskor nas/ /'thab pa'i nyes dmigs bshad bstan te/ /bzod pa sgom
385a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsngags pa brjod/ /de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/ /nam mkha' lding gis yongs bskor nas/ /'gal byas nyes dmigs bshad bstan te/ /'dum pa'i sems kyi
385a3(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa brjod/ /de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/ /dri za'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas/ /dga' ba'i tshig ni dpag med kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags brjod

385a6(dkon brtsegs): chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mig zad mtha' bstan thos pas na/ /mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul

388a2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi lha/ /gser gyi gzhal med khang pa na/ /gnas pa'i lus kun bstan bsdus nas/ /sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags pa bstan/ /gzhan yang lha yi bu mo dag /sna tshogs
388a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyan gyis lus brgyan zhing / /rgyan ni phan tshun reg pa las/ /sgra snyan dag ni rab byung nas/ /'dus byas rnams kyi chos dag ni/ /'gyur zhing mi brtan yin na yang / /byis pa

388a5(dkon brtsegs): yod pa ma yin te/ /gzugs dang sems kyi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /byis pa rnams ni mi shes pas/ /'di la the tshom skye bar 'gyur/ /rgyan gyi rnam
388a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag las/ /sgra snyan byung ba de yis ni/ /sangs rgyas zhing kun grags pas na/ /sems can tshad med grol bar 'gyur/ /de lta bas na khyed rnams kyis/ /'dren pa
388a7(dkon brtsegs): dang byung ye shes dang / /yon tan dpag med sku dag ni/ /sred pa'i spros las 'das pa dang / /rab dben skyon ni med pa dang / /lta bral sems ni rab sbyangs dang / /mtshan
388b1(dkon brtsegs): dang dpe byad brgyan pa dang / /sku dang thugs ni dag par ltos/ /khyed kyis bcom ldan grong gshegs tshe/ /gom pa dag ni seng+ge 'dra/ /gshegs stangs ngang pa glang chen 'dra/ /sems
388b2(dkon brtsegs): can re ba skong bar mdzad/ /bsod nams khyad 'phags yongs su rdzogs/ /yang dag mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan/ /sems can dag ni thams cad kun/ /blta bas mi ngoms nyid du
388b3(dkon brtsegs): ltos| |khyed kyis rkang gnyis gtso mchog ni/ /thugs rje chen po ldan pas na/ /dngos po chung dus mchod byas kyang / /yon tan tshad med thob mdzad pas/ /sems can dag ni mang
388b4(dkon brtsegs): po rnams/ /bskal pa brgya stong mang por ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa thob bar du/ /rnam smin thug pa med par ltos/ /khyed kyi rkang gnyis gtso mchog ni/ /zag med tshul khrims rdzog
388b5(dkon brtsegs): pas na| |sems can dag ni mang po rnams/ /gus pas spyi bos phyag byed dang / /lha yi 'khor ni mang po rnams/ /so sor gzhal med khang spangs nas/ /rtse ba dag la chags med
388b6(dkon brtsegs): par| |'dren pa la ni rton byed ltos/ /khyed kyis bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor/ /bcom ldan 'das la dad bskyed nas/ /gser gyi rlung yab dag thogs te/ /g.yas g.yon du ni 'khod
388b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / /bdud kyi bu ni lnga brgya yis/ /lha yi me tog yid 'ong bas/ /de bzhin gshegs la mngon gtor nas/ /bla med ye shes tshol la ltos/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
389a1(dkon brtsegs): la ni| |bsngags pa brjod cing mchod pas na/ /deng ni bcom ldan phrad gyur nas/ /so sor dga' bar gyur pa yin/ /spobs pa dag ni tshad med kyis/ /
389a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod/ /de yi tshe na bdud kyi bu/ /sred pa spangs pa zhes bya ba/ /thog mar bcom ldan bsngags brjod nas/ /mig zad mtha' ni shes par
389a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur| |mig gi skye mtha' shes pas na/ /rab zhi'i mtshan nyid bar du rtogs/ /gzhan yang mig la sogs pa yi/ /ming don tshig ni dpag med rtogs/ /des ni tshig mkhas dag
389a4(dkon brtsegs): gis ni| |sems can rnams la yang dag bstan/ /ming dang don rnams la yang ni/ /zhen pa the tshom med pas na/ /'gro 'ong med par rab rtogs shing / /blang dor med pa nyid du
389a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur| |rang bzhin dag ni stong dben pas/ /yi ge rnams ni spangs pa dang / /len dang 'dzin dang klog pa dang / /kha ton 'don cing sgrub med rtogs/ /'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs
389a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams/ /sngon yang rab tu phye ste bstan/ /btags pa'i ming tsam yin pas na/ /yang dag brjod du ci yang med/ /rang bzhin stong pa de dag ni/ /phung po khams dang skye
389a7(dkon brtsegs): mched 'das/ /rdzun pa med cing bden pa'ang med/ /gnas dang gnas pa yod ma yin/ /tshig gi smra ba'i lam chad cing / /sems kyi spyod pa'ang rab tu zhi/ /skye bo mtshan
389b1(dkon brtsegs): ma med pa'i phyir/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs par mthong / /bcom ldan mtshan ma yongs spangs kyang / /byis pa yang dag ma yin rtog /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i
389b2(dkon brtsegs): tshe| |gang zhig dga' ba skye 'gyur ba/ /de ni mtshan mar rtog pa ste/ /mya ngan gdung dang bcas par 'gyur/ /gang gi mtshan ma'i rtog spangs pa/ /grong khyer gshegs pa mthong mi
389b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur| |gshegs shing bskyod pa'i mtshan ma la/ /rnam rtog med pa'i shes rab thob/ /gang gis mtshan mar sangs rgyas mthong / /des ni grong khyer gshegs pa mthong / /skye zhing 'khor
389b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos dag la/ /rnam par rtog pa skyed par byed/ /gang gis sangs rgyas mtshan mar mthong / /dga' ba dang ni skye 'gyur ba/ /de ni bdud kyi spyod la gnas/ /bdud kyi spyod yul
389b5(dkon brtsegs): snang ba yin/ /gang gis mtshan mar sangs rgyas mthod/ /de ni 'gyur ba mthong ba yin/ /de ni mya ngan gdung bcas pas/ /mkhas pas snying brtser bya ba yin/ /chos la thob par
389b6(dkon brtsegs): gang lta ba/ /de la chos stor mya ngan yod/ /sangs rgyas mthong ba skyes pa la/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i sdug bsngal yod/ /bskal pa mang por gang bsgoms pas/ /mtshan ma thams cad
389b7(dkon brtsegs): rtogs nas ni/ /grong khyer gshegs pa mi rtog cing / /mya ngan 'da' ba'i 'du shes med/ /sems kyi mtshan nyid stong rtogs pa/ /sangs rgyas spyod la gnas pas na/ /grong khyer
390a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs par mi rtog cing / /mya ngan 'da' ba'i 'du shes med/ /gang gis de ltar rab shes pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mthong 'gyur zhing / /ngo bo nyid
390a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang stong rtogs pas/ /mthar ni skye 'gag ci yang med/ /bcom ldan bskal pa dpag med nas/ /dka' ba rnams ni rab spyad nas/ /ngo bo nyid ni stong mkhyen na/ /byis pa rnams
390a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis mi rtogs so/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /'khor ni brgya stong mang pos bskor/ /mi dang mi ma yin la sogs/ /dang ba'i sems kyis mchod pa bas/ /gang
390a4(dkon brtsegs): gis skad cig tsam du ni/ /mig zad mthar ni rab sems shing / /mtshan ma rnams ni stong rtogs na/ /'di yi bsod nams de bas 'phags/ /bgrang ba dang ni grangs kyi cha/ /
390a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyu tsam du yang mi bzod do/ /de bzhin mig gi skye mtha' dang / /mig gi mtha' dang 'jug pa nas/ /rab tu zhi ba'i bar du yang / /de bzhin du ni reg par bya/ /rna ba sna lce lus
390a6(dkon brtsegs): dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das/ /grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe//
390a7(dkon brtsegs): zhabs ni sa la reg tsam gyis/ /sa ni kun tu rab tu g.yos/ /ri rnams gang yin de dag kyang / /thams cad bcom ldan 'das la phyogs/ /lha mi dag ni chos kyi phyir/ /thams
390b1(dkon brtsegs): cad 'ong nas gus mchod byas/ /de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das/ /grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/ /lha yi dbang po mi yi rgyal/ /lha ma yin ni mang po dang / /gnod sbyin dag ni mang
390b2(dkon brtsegs): po rnams/ /rang gi grong khyer spangs nas ni/ /bcom ldan spyan sngar 'dus gyur te/ /rab tu dga' bas mchod pa byas/ /de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das/ /grong khyer du ni gshegs
390b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe| |gzhan yang rnam pa tha dad pa'i/ /bya yi tshogs ni tshad med pa/ /ne tso dang ni rma bya dang / /ka la ping+ka bya yi rnams/ /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /yon tan mchog
390b4(dkon brtsegs): ni mthong bas na/ /thams cad nam mkha' dag la ni/ /rab tu dga' bas rnam par rtse/ /thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /sgra snyan dag ni rab tu phyung / /de nas de tshe bcom
390b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ /grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan dang / /rdzu 'phrul gyi ni stobs dag gis/ /sems can tshad med brgya stong snyed/ /long ba
390b6(dkon brtsegs): dag ni mthong bar gyur/ /'on pa rnams ni thos par gyur/ /dbang po ma tshang gang yin pa/ /thams cad dbang po tshang bar gyur/ /sdug bsngal la ni gnas pa dag /thams
390b7(dkon brtsegs): cad bde ba thob par gyur/ /de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das/ /grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/ /nam mkha' bar snang dag las ni/ /'di skad smra ba thos par gyur/ /gang gis
391a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma rnams kyis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rtog byed pa/ /de yis bcom ldan 'das la ni/ /mchod pa byas zhes brjod mi bya/ /mig zad
391a2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yi ngo bo nyid/ /rtogs par yang ni mi 'gyur ro/ /mtshan ma rnams ni gang spangs pa/ /yon tan gzhi ni bsags pas na/ /mig zad mtha' yi ngo bo nyid/ /rab tu
391a3(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par yang 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar mig ni zad pa'i mtha'/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan yang / /rab tu rtogs par khong du chud//
391a4(dkon brtsegs): mig ni zad pa'i mtha' dag la/ /mi 'dzin sbed pa med pa dang / /mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag la/ /brten cing gnas pa med pa dang / /mig ni rab tu dben pa la/ /g.yo ba'i
391a5(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa med gyur pa/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin/ /mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag la/ /rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / /mig gi
391a6(dkon brtsegs): mtha' ni gang yin pa/ /de la yid kyis rtog med dang / /mig ni rnam par 'jig pa la/ /bstan par bya ba med gyur pa/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba
391a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid du 'gyur ba yin/ /mig ni med par gyur pa la/ /mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / /mig ni skye ba med pa la/ /yongs su sdud pa med pa dang / /mig ni rab tu zhi ba la//
391b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dag ni med gyur pa/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/ /mig ni zad pa med pa'i phyir/ /mtshan rnams mngon par sgrub pa dang / /mig gi mtha' ni
391b2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i phyir/ /dbang po dag ni nges gyur dang / /mig ni skye ba shes pa'i phyir/ /dbang po rang dbang thob gyur pa/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du
391b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa yin/ /mig ni med par rtogs gyur nas/ /gzugs ni khong du chud pa dang / /mig ni 'jig par rab shes nas/ /chos la so sor rtog pa da dang / /mig ni skye med shes gyur
391b4(dkon brtsegs): nas| |lam ni sgrub par gang byed pa/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/ /mig zad mtha' ni gang yin pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir//
391b5(dkon brtsegs): las kyi bye brag tha dad pa/ /de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /las kyi bye brag tha dad pa/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid
391b6(dkon brtsegs): du gyur pa yin/ /mig skye mtha' ni gang yin pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/ /sdug bsngal bye brag tha dad pa/ /de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal bye brag
391b7(dkon brtsegs): tha dad pa/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/ /mig gi 'jig pa gang yin pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin

392b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / /tshul khrims rnam dag shes pa dang / /lus kyi sdom pa'i shes pa dang / /rnam dag sgra yi shes pa dang / /ngag gi sdom pa'i shes pa dang / /rnam dag sems kyi shes

393a5(dkon brtsegs): bcu gnyis kyi/ /spyod dang bcas pa'i shes pa dang / /spyod pa med pa'i shes pa dang / /mtshan ma dang bcas mtshan ma med/ /'dus byas dang ni 'dus ma byas/ /rnam par gzhag

393b2(dkon brtsegs): dag de bzhin shes pa yin/ /gzhan yang sems can thams cad kyi/ /mos pa khyad par 'phags pa dang / /rnam dag sems kyi shes pa dang / /las dang rnam smin shes pa dang / /

393b5(dkon brtsegs): don gyi tshul dag ni/ /yang dag ji bzhin shes pas na/ /le lo med pa'i shes pa dang / /'du shes sgrub par byed pa yin/ /gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul stobs dag gis/ /chos rnams rab
393b6(dkon brtsegs): tu 'byed pa dang / /thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dag /yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin/ /gzhan yang rgya chen don dag dang / /tshig gis bstan pa gang yin pa/ /rjes su shes pa'i

396b6(dkon brtsegs): zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /thos par gyur pa de dag ni/ /nga rgyal dag ni gang yin pa/ /thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer/ /da ltar
396b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/ /mi yi seng+ge gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni khong khor gzhom pa dang / /zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /thos par gyur
397a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag ni/ /khong khro dag ni gang yin pa/ /thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer/ /da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/ /mi yi seng+ge gang
397a2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa| |mtshan ni phrag dog gzhom pa dang / /zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /thos par gyur pa de dag ni/ /phrag dog dag ni gang yin
397a3(dkon brtsegs): pa| |thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer/ /da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/ /mi yi seng+ge gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni mi bden gzhom pa dang / /zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes
397a4(dkon brtsegs): bya| |gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /thos par gyur pa de dag ni/ /mi bden dag ni gang yin pa/ /thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer/ /da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa
397a5(dkon brtsegs): yi| |mi yi seng+ge gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni lha rnams gzhom pa dang / /zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /thos par gyur pa de dag ni/ /lta
397a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dag ni gang yin pa/ /thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer/ /da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/ /mi yi seng+ge gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni spros pa gzhom pa dang / /zhi mdzad
397a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/ /gang gi 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /thos par gyur pa de dag ni/ /spros pa dag ni gang yin pa/ /thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer/ /da ltar 'jig rten
397b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs pa yi/ /mi yi seng+ge gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni yang dag pa yi chos/ /rnam dag chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /thos par gyur pa de dag ni/ /rnam
397b2(dkon brtsegs): dag chos ni gang yin pa/ /rab tu rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer/ /da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/ /mi yi seng+ge gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni las rnams rtogs pa yi/ /chos kyi rgyal
397b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba yin/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /thos par gyur pa de dag ni/ /las rnams thams cad gang yin pa/ /rab tu rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer/ /da ltar 'jig rten
397b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs pa yi/ /mi yi seng+ge gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni rdzu 'phrul phun tshogs pa'i/ /chos kyi rgyal zhes bya ba yin/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /thos par gyur pa de dag ni/ /rdzu
397b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul yon tan gang yin pa/ /yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer/ /da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/ /mi yi seng+ge gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni pha rol phyin pa rnams/ /phun
397b6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /thos par gyur pa de dag ni/ /pha rol phyin drug gang yin pa/ /yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer/ /da ltar
397b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/ /mi yi seng+ge gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni 'du byed gang yin pa/ /rab rtogs chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /'dzin par byed pa
398a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni/ /'du byed dag ni thams cad kun/ /rab tu rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer/ /da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/ /mi yi seng+ge gang yin
398a2(dkon brtsegs): pa| |mtshan ni rnam par dag pa yi/ /'od zer kun 'dzin bskyed ces bya/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /thos par gyur pa de dag ni/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i skye len
398a3(dkon brtsegs): dag / yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer/ /da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/ /mi yi seng+ge gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni kha dog dag pa yin/ /'od zer kun 'dzin zhes kyang
398a4(dkon brtsegs): bya| |gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /thos par gyur pa de dag ni/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i gzugs dam pa/ /yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer/ /da ltar 'jig rten
398a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs pa yi/ /mi yi seng+ge gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni sku nyid dam pa yi/ /'od zer kun 'dzin zhes kyang bya/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /thos par gyur pa de dag ni/ /

398a7(dkon brtsegs): ba yi| |'od zer kun 'dzin zhes kyang bya/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /thos par gyur pa de dag ni/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i rus rigs rnams/ /yongs su rdzogs
398b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur zhes zer/ /da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/ /mi yi seng+ge gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni rgya cher grags pa yi/ /'od zer kun 'dzin zhes kyang bya/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi
398b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan| |thos par gyur pa de dag ni/ /rgya cher grags pa'i grags pa rnams/ /yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer/ /da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/ /mi yi seng+ge gang
398b3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa| |mtshan ni sbyin pa gtong ba dang / /tshul khrims can dang bzod bsgoms dang / /brtson 'grus brtsams dang bsam gtan pa/ /shes rab kun 'dzin zhes kyang bya/ /
398b4(dkon brtsegs): gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /thos par gyur pa de dag ni/ /sbyin pa dang ni tshul khrims nas/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa dang / /gzungs kyi sgo ni gang yin pa/ /yongs su
398b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer/ /da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/ /mi yi seng+ge gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni stong nyid rdzogs pa yi/ /chos kyi rje zhes bya ba yin/ /gang gis 'di
398b6(dkon brtsegs): lta bu yi mtshan/ /'dzin par byed pa de dag ni/ /chos rnams stong pa'i don dag kyang / /yang dag ston par 'gyur zhes zer/ /da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/ /mi yi seng+ge
398b7(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni bdag med rdzogs pa yi/ /chos kyi rje zhes bya ba yin/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /'dzin par byed pa de dag ni/ /skye 'gag med don gang
399a1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa| |yang dag ston par 'gyur zhes zer/ /da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/ /mi yi seng+ge gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni spyan nyid dag pa yi/ /
399a2(dkon brtsegs): kun 'dzin chos kyi rje zhes bya/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /'dzin par byed pa de dag ni/ /mig zad mtha' don gang yin pa/ /yang dag ston par 'gyur zhes zer/ /
399a3(dkon brtsegs): rna ba sna lce lus nas ni/ /sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/ /chos ni nyi shu rtsa lnga dang / /me tog phreng ba spos dag dang / /mar me gdugs dang gos rnams kyang / /thams cad
399a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ / //bam po lnga pa ste/ tha ma/ de yi tshe na bcom ldan 'das/ /grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag
399a5(dkon brtsegs): gi / rdzu 'phrul gyi ni stobs rnams kyis/ /nam mkha' bar snang dag las ni/ /sgra brnyan dam pa rab phyung ste/ /gzungs kyi spyod pa sna tshogs dag /yang dag par ni bstan
399a6(dkon brtsegs): pas na| |'khor ni 'dus pa chen po rnams/ /'di lta bu yi tshig thos te/ /gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis/ /mig ni zad mtha' gang yin dang / /skye mtha' dang ni mtha'
399a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / /rab dben dang ni 'jug pa nas/ /nye bar zhi ba'i bar rnams kyi/ /chos rnams gang yin de dag gi /mthar phyin gnas ni gang yin pa/ /thams cad rab tu rtogs
399b1(dkon brtsegs): par byed/ /sbyin pa'i stobs ni gang dag gis/ /mthar ni gang dag sdud pa dang / /tshul khrims stobs ni gang dag gis/ /mthar ni gang dag 'grub pa dang / /bzod pa'i stobs ni
399b2(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gis/ /mthar ni gang dag bkod pa dang / /brtson 'grus stobs ni gang dag gis/ /mthar ni gang dag slong ba dang / /bsam gtan stobs ni gang dag gis/ /mthar ni gang
399b3(dkon brtsegs): dag sgom pa dang / /shes rab stobs ni gang dag gis/ /mthar ni gang dag ston pa dang / /yi ge rnam dag brjod pa dang / /sgra skad rnams ni spangs pa nas/ /gzugs dang sems
399b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi bar du yang / /mthar ni rnam dag nyid du rtogs/ /zag dang bcas dang zag med dang / /don rnams dang ni phan pa dag /thams cad stong zhing dben pa dang / /mthar ni rnam dag
399b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid du rtogs/ /srid pa dag ni thams cad la/ /rten cing gnas par mi byed dang / /gzungs dang ting 'dzin dag la ni/ /rab tu dben par gnas par byed/ /'gro ba med cing 'ong
399b6(dkon brtsegs): med dang / /dge ba ma yin mi dge min/ /lung du mi ston pa yang min/ /bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i/ /de lta bu yi mtshan ma rnams/ /thams cad yongs su dag pas
399b7(dkon brtsegs): na| |dbang phyug yon tan dag la yang / /gnas par yang ni mi byed do/ /nyan thos dang ni skye bo dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos la yang / /gnas par yang ni mi byed do/ /
400a1(dkon brtsegs): mig ni zad pa'i mtha' dag dang / /skye mtha' dang ni mtha' rnams nas/ /nye bar zhi ba'i bar rnams kyi/ /spyod pa dag ni gang yin pa/ /thams cad
400a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su zhi bar byed/ /skye ba dang ni mi skye dang / /sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba dang / /bstod pa dang ni smod pa dag /thams cad yongs su spong zhes zer/ /mthar phyin snang ba gang
400a3(dkon brtsegs): yin dang / /stong pa'i gzungs ni gang yin pa/ /thams cad rab tu gang rtogs pa/ /'di nyid sangs rgyas spyod yul la/ /rab tu gnas par byed pa yin/ /'di nyid sangs rgyas
400a4(dkon brtsegs): rol pa yi/ /gnas la rab tu gnas pa yin/ /'di nyid sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul la/ /rab tu gnas par gyur pa yin/ /'di nyid sangs rgyas mkhyen pa la/ /rab tu gnas
400a5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa yin/ /mig zad mtha' yi stobs dag la/ /de bzhin du ni gnas pa dang / /mig skye mtha' yi stobs dag la/ /de bzhin du ni gnas pa dang / /mig gi mtha'
400a6(dkon brtsegs): yi stobs dag la/ /de bzhin du ni gnas pa nas/ /nye bar zhi ba'i stobs kyi bar/ /de la rab tu gnas pa dang / /rna ba sna lce lus nas ni/ /sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/ /chos
400a7(dkon brtsegs): ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga/ /thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer/ /gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs/ /khyad par 'phags pa gang
400b1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa| |yongs su rdzogs par byed ces zer/ /gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis/ /gzi byin mthu stobs de lta bu/ /yongs su rdzogs par byas nas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
400b2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi| |gnas kun la ni 'jug pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /spyod yul kun la gnas gyur pas/ /'jig rten pa ni thams cad kun/ /lha ma yin gyi tshogs
400b3(dkon brtsegs): dag la| |brtan par 'dzin pa'i sems spangs nas/ /tshangs pa'i spyod la gnas par byed/ /gnod sbyin brgya stong tshad med dang / /grul bum dag ni tshad med rnams/ /de dag
400b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kun kyang ni/ /rab tu dga' ba skyed par byed/ /dri za'i 'khor ni gang yin dang / /srin po'i 'khor ni gang yin pa/ /mtshan med grangs med de dag kyang / /rab tu dul
400b5(dkon brtsegs): la dga' bar byed/ /gal te tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis/ /sgra snyan dag ni dam pa yi/ /tshig dang don ni rjod byed kyang / /yang dag bstan par mi nus te/ /sems las byung
400b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos rnams kyis/ /dpag par bya ba ma yin dang / /sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyis/ /gzung bar bya ba min zhes zer/ /gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag ni/ /mig
400b7(dkon brtsegs): gis dmigs par bya ba min/ /gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag ni/ /lus kyi bar gyis dmigs bya min/ /gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag ni/ /mig gis dmigs par bya ba
401a1(dkon brtsegs): min| |mig gi spyod yul bar gyis kyang / /dmigs par bya ba ma yin te| /rna ba sna lce lus nas ni/ /sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/ /chos ni
401a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa nyi shu lnga/ /thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer/ /gzhan yang mig gi zad mtha' dang / /mig rnams kyi ni skye mtha' dang / /mig gi mtha' dang 'jug pa nas/ /nye bar
401a3(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i bar dag la/ /bdag dang skyes bu med pa dang / /sems dang srog ni med pa dang / /de bzhin gang zag med pa dang / /mtshan ma med cing byed med dang / /'gro ba
401a4(dkon brtsegs): med cing 'ong med dang / /'di lta bu la sogs pa'i mtshan/ /thams cad rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer/ /gzhan yang 'di skad chos nyid kyi/ /mig ni rtogs par 'gyur zhes
401a5(dkon brtsegs): zer| |gzhan yang 'di skad chos rnams las/ /grub pa'i mig ni gang yin dang / /ye shes mig dang shes rab mig /tshangs pa'i mig dang lha yi mig /tshangs par skye
401a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas thob mig dang / /lha yi skye gnas thob mig dang / /tshangs pa'i rnam smin mig dag dang / /lha yi rnam smin mig dag dang / /tshangs pa'i rgyu las skye mig dang / /lha yi
401a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu las skyes pa'i mig / lha yi rdzu 'phrul mig dag dang / /lha yi brtson 'grus dag gi mig /dman par skyes pa'i mig dag dang / /khyad 'phags skyes pa'i mig dag dang / /
401b1(dkon brtsegs): gshin rje'i 'jig rten gang yin pa/ /yongs su spangs pa'i mig dag dang / /klu dang gnod sbyin mig dag dang / /grul bum gyi ni mig dag dang / /yongs su gdung bcas mig dag
401b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / /yongs su gdung min mig dag dang / /rnam par dag pa'i mig dag dang / /rnam par dag min mig dag dang / /mchu ring zheng chung mig dag dang / /nyan thos theg pa'i mig
401b3(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / /bsam gtan pa yi mig dag dang / /ting nge 'dzin gyi mig dag dang / /spyod yul las byung mig dag dang / /'du shes las byung mig dag dang / /'dod chags las byung
401b4(dkon brtsegs): mig dag dang / /'dod chags bral ba'i mig dag dang / /rgyu las byung ba'i mig dag dang / /rgyu min las byung mig dag dang / /mtshungs par ldan pa'i mig dag dang / /mtshungs
401b5(dkon brtsegs): par ldan min mig dag dang / /sgo rten las byung mig dag dang / /sgo las byung min mig dag dang / /rgyu rkyen las byung mig dag dang / /rgyu sgo las skyes mig dag dang / /sha
401b6(dkon brtsegs): las grub min mig dag dang / /ye shes rnam par dag mig dang / /yod pa min pa'i mig dag dang / /dmigs med mig ni gang yin pa/ /thams cad rtogs par byed ces
401b7(dkon brtsegs): zer| |rna ba sna lce lus nas ni/ /sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/ /chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga/ /thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer/ /de yi tshe na bcom ldan 'das/ /nam mkha'
402a1(dkon brtsegs): bar snang dag las ni/ /gzhan yang dpag tu med pa yi/ /sgra snyan dam pa mchog byung nas/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i gzungs kyi chos/ /'di
402a2(dkon brtsegs): skad du ni bka' stsal te/ /'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /rdzu 'phrul dag gis sprul pa yin/ /'di lta ste/ si li/ ma le ma le/ sid+d+hai/ ai ni/ si Ne/ ku lu ni yu/
402a3(dkon brtsegs): ku lu ne yu/ ku le ma le/ ku nu te/ a la shi /a si le/ si si li te/ su si li/ si le si le/ khyi bi li/ a bi li/ /su Te tsa na/ d+ha ni ma ni/ ka ni/ ka la te/ su ka le/ pra ya/
402a4(dkon brtsegs): sha naM ni/ a nu lo si kye/ bi lo me/ su b+ha ni re sh+he/ a shi ri le/ sa ra ma pa ra phun te/ pa ri b+ha he/ d+ha ra Ni/ d+he shu tsi ha/ su d+he/ a tsa na/ b+hu bo ga ga naM/ kung pa no/ b+ha sa b+ha
402a5(dkon brtsegs): naM| pa ra ri d+hu ri ya/ ni pa ri ka no ni/ ma naM b+ha/ su ru tsi Tha/ pa na a tsa ra/ a b+he la bir+ya pra ti sh+tha ha/ d+ha ri ni/ a si Tha/ lo Ni b+hi/ gzungs rnams gang yin 'di dag ni/ /sangs
402a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams kyis rab tu brnyes/ /mthu chen dag ni phun sum tshogs/ /shes rab dag ni tshad kyang med/ /'dzin pa dag ni yongs su spong / /dran pa dag ni dag par byed/ /
402a7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med 'gro dang 'ong ba med/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams yod pa min/ /mtshan ma med cing brjod dang bral/ /spros pa dag las yang dag 'das/ /byang chub sems
402b1(dkon brtsegs): dpas sgrub byed na/ /mthar ni bsil pa thob par 'gyur/ /tshigs su bcad pa bye ba phrag /brgya stong mang po dag gis ni/ /tshig gcig tsam ni rab bstan kyang / /mtha' ni dmigs par
402b2(dkon brtsegs): yong mi nus/ /'phags pa mang pos rab tu bsngags/ /rnam par dag cing zhen pa med/ /'khor 'dus mang po thams cad kyis/ /shin tu gus pa bskyed par gyis/ /gzungs
402b3(dkon brtsegs): ni gang yin 'di dag gi / dge ba'i chos kyi mthu stobs kyis/ /nyon mongs rab bcom nyer zhi nas/ /khyad 'phags phan yon thob par byed/ /yon tan dang ni shes rab dag/
402b4(dkon brtsegs): shin tu rgya che rgya mtsho 'dra/ /bzod pa dag ni sgrub par byed/ /sems ni rab bde g.yo med 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpas rtag tu bsgoms/ /mkhas pa dag gis rab tu
402b5(dkon brtsegs): bsngags/ /dbul phongs dag ni spong byed cing / /nor dang rin chen 'thob par byed/ /gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis/ /yon tan rnams ni 'phel bar byed/ /rtag tu
402b6(dkon brtsegs): stong nyid la sogs pa'i/ /bden tshig dag gis rab tu brgyan/ /yi ge dag ni spangs pas na/ /stong pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya/ /sems dang rnam shes spangs pas na/ /chos kyi ngo
402b7(dkon brtsegs): bo nyid ces bya/ /gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis/ /dri bral rtag tu rnam dag byed/ /yang dag ye shes la gnas nas/ /phan pa sna tshogs ston par byed/ /sems can dag
403a1(dkon brtsegs): ni mang po rnams/ /dga' zhing dang ba skyed par byed/ /gnod sbyin 'khor ni tshad med dang / /grul bum 'khor ni gang yin pa/ /'di la sogs
403a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yi dwags rgyal/ /dga' ba chen po skyed ces zer/ /gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag ni/ /rab tu zhi zhing spros pa med/ /sems can dag la byams pas na/ /kun
403a3(dkon brtsegs): la bde ba sbyin par byed/ /bskal pa mang po brgya stong du/ /'gro ba rnams su rtag gnas shing / /phan pa tshad med rab 'byed kyang / /rnam par dag cing gos pa med/ /
403a4(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong gis/ /bdud rtsi'i chos ni rab bstan nas/ /sems can dag ni tshad med rnams/ /dga' ba chen po skyed par byed/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas
403a5(dkon brtsegs): tshad med rnams/ /shin tu rnam dag mos pa yis/ /gzungs 'di la ni brten nas su/ /rtag tu chos nyid dgongs par mdzad/ /tshangs dang brgya byin lha rnams dang / /klu yi
403a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po lha ma yin/ /gzungs 'di thos par gyur nas kyang / /sems kyi dga' ba skyed ces zer/ /gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag rnams/ /gang du gnas pa'i
403a7(dkon brtsegs): yul der ni/ /rtag tu gnod dang 'khrug pa dang / /nad dang sdug bsngal mya ngan med/ /sems can dag ni thams cad kun/ /so so dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas/ /gzungs
403b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di rtag tu bdag cag gi / sems la gnas par smon lam 'debs/ /gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag ni/ /lus dang sems dang rkan dag dang / /kha mchu dag la gnas
403b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur na| |yon tan dpag med skyed par byed/ /gal te rtag tu 'dzin byed na/ /yon tan tshad med thob gyur nas/ /sems can mang la phan 'dogs shing / /thams cad
403b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba thob ces zer/ /gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag gis/ /sdig pa rnams ni rab spong zhing / /dam chos dag ni ston byed pas/ /thug pa med pa'i spobs pa thob/ /
403b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag ni brgya stong rnams/ /the tshom dag ni rab bsal nas/ /nga rgyal rnams ni rab bcom ste/ /yon tan dpag med thob ces zer/ /shin tu zab cing gsang
403b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos/ /gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag ni/ /mkhas pas rtag tu sems byed cing / /nan tan gyis ni sgrub par byed/ /shes rab go cha rab bgos nas/ /nyon mongs
403b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'joms par byed/ /yon tan sems ni 'phel byed pas/ /rab tu mos shing skyo ba med/ /gzungs sngags gang yin de dag ni/ /grags pa chen po phun tshogs pas//
403b7(dkon brtsegs): zad pa dang ni mi zad dang / /skye dang mi skye mtha' rab rtogs/ /'di 'dra'i shes rab sna tshogs kyis/ /bdag nyid rab tu brgyan pas na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brgya stong rnams/ /
404a1(dkon brtsegs): shin tu gus shing mchod pa mdzad/ /de 'dra'i gzungs ni gang yin pa/ /rig pa dag gis rkang gnyis byed/ /ting 'dzin mchog la rab
404a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas/ /byang chub lam la gzhol bar byed/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong rjes 'brang zhing / /zag med shes rab rtogs par byed/ /rab dang dbang po stobs kyis ni/ /lag
404a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis yongs su sgrub par byed/ /brtson 'grus dang ni bzod pa yis/ /nu ma gnyis ni grub par byed/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pas ni/ /spyi gtsug mtshan nyid rab tu byed//
404a4(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde dag gis skud byas nas/ /so so rig bzhi'i phreng ba brgyus/ /sngon ni mngon par bsgrubs pa yi/ /yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /dpe ni tshad med ji snyed
404a5(dkon brtsegs): pa| |thams cad rab tu rgyan ces zer/ /gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag ni/ /yon tan tshad med phun tshogs pas/ /mig gi sngon dang phyi mtha' dang / /zad dang mi
404a6(dkon brtsegs): zad mtha' dag dang / /skye ba dang ni mi skye dang / /mtha' dang mtha' min gang yin dang / /dben pa dang ni mi dben dang / /'jug pa dang ni 'jug min dang / /ci yang med
404a7(dkon brtsegs): dang mi 'byung dang / /nyer zhi dang ni bdag med dang / /gang zag med dang srog med dang / /sems can med pa'i bar dag dang / /'di la sogs pa'i tshad med sgo/ /thams
404b1(dkon brtsegs): cad rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi/ /'jig rten skye ba'i ming bar du/ /thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer/ /gong du
404b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa brjod pa yi/ /gzungs mchog dam pa gang yin pa/ /rab dben yon tan mchog ldan zhing / /sangs rgyas spyod yul yin pas na/ /gzungs don yang dag gang
404b3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa| |yi ges brjod bya ma yin yang / /'jig rten pa yi rjes su ni/ /btags pa'i ming gis brjod pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang thabs cig tu
404b4(dkon brtsegs): zla 'od gzhon nu'i khyim du byon pa dang / gdan bshams pa la rab tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs
404b5(dkon brtsegs): par rig nas bdag nyid mchod pa'i yo byad mchog dam pa thogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'khor 'dus pa chen po rnams la rab tu phul te/ /mchod pa de yang
404b6(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan dang / /ting nge 'dzin dang / bsam gtan gyi yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthu las mngon par grub pa
404b7(dkon brtsegs): sha stag go / de ltar mchod pa phul ba yang bdag 'ba' zhig gi phyir ma yin gyi/ sems can tshad med pa thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub la gzhol zhing phan pa chen
405a1(dkon brtsegs): po 'thob par bya ba'i phyir mchod cing phul bas na/ mchod pa des kun tu khyab cing thams cad rab tu tshim par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan
405a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das gdugs tshod gsol ba'i 'og tu 'khor 'dus pa mang po'i mdun du zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gzhon nu/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs
405a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo gang la la zhig theg pa chen po la gnas nas sbyin pa'i tshogs mngon par sgrub par byed na/ yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa brgyad cu dang ldan par
405a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yongs su smin par byed cing tshig snyan pas yongs su sdud par byed pa dang / mtshan gya nom pa yongs
405a5(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs pa dang / dbang po rnams ma tshang ba med pa dang / 'khor ba spangs nas mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du byed pa dang / /nyon mongs pa rnams zad nas dbang phyug
405a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog thob pa dang / yon tan phun sum tshogs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu brgyan pa dang / 'khor rnam par dag pa dang / gzi byin chen po dang ldan pa dang / shes
405a7(dkon brtsegs): rab phun sum tshogs pa dang / spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa mchog mngon par sgrub pa dang / spyod pa bla na med cing mtshungs pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / /bag
405b1(dkon brtsegs): chags yang dag par bcom nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa 'phel bar byed pa dang / lus dang ring bsrel 'jig rten thams cad dang / nyan thos
405b2(dkon brtsegs): dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur ba dang / ma rungs pa rnams rab tu btul bas mi'i rgyal po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
405b3(dkon brtsegs): mkha' lding gi rgyal po dang / tshangs pa'i rgyal po rnams yongs su dang ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang / mthu chen po dang ldan pa dang / mdo'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / lung du
405b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa dang / /ched du brjod pa dang / /dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / /gleng gzhi dang / /da ltar byung ba dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang /
405b5(dkon brtsegs): rmad du byung ba dang / gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde'i bar du len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / yang dag par ston par 'gyur ba dang / sems la le lo med pa dang / chos la
405b6(dkon brtsegs): ser sna med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi lam la yang dag par gnas pa dang / 'jig rten na mchog tu 'gyur zhing ming dang gzugs yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi sku
405b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon du byed par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / mu stegs can rnams zil gyis gnon pa dang /
406a1(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa'i chos phun sum tshogs pa dang / sdig pa can gyi spyod pa spong bar 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi rgyu la mngon
406a2(dkon brtsegs): par yid ches pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos sdud par byed pa dang / bdud mang po pham par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i chos bden pa dag la the tshom dang /
406a3(dkon brtsegs): nem nur med pa dang / 'dod pa ngan pa rnams rab tu bcom pa dang / gzi byin chen po dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrubs pas rdzu
406a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul khyad par du 'phags pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / skye shi spong bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / spyod pa dpag tu med pa'i bsngags
406a5(dkon brtsegs): pa brjod pa dang / yon tan rnams yongs su sdud par 'gyur pa dang / sems can rnams la spro ba bskyed pa dang / chos kyi dga' ba la yongs su spyod par 'gyur ba dang /
406a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa gtong ba mngon par sgrub par 'gyur ba dang / ye shes chen po'i sgor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / dro bar gyur pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / rigs nges
406a7(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi bzod pa sgrub par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi lam la bde bar gnas pa gang yin pa'o/ /gzhon nu/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
406b1(dkon brtsegs): la la zhig sbyin pa'i tshogs mngon par sgrub par byed na/ yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa brgyad cu po 'di dag phun sum tshogs shing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
406b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' blo chen gang / /sbyin pa'i tshogs dang ldan pa la/ /phan yon mchog ni brgyad
406b3(dkon brtsegs): cu yod| |ngas mdor bsdus te bstan pa yin/ /gzhan yang dpag med bsam dka' yi/ /yon tan dag ni gang yin pa/ /thams cad sbyin pa las skye ste/ /deng 'dir
406b4(dkon brtsegs): cung zad bstan par bya/ /khyed kyis 'khor 'dus mang po la/ /mnyam pa'i sems kyis gang mchod pa/ /sbyin pa'i tshogs ni de dag la/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis bsgrub par
406b5(dkon brtsegs): bya| |sbyin pa 'di yis bsags pa yi/ /bsod nams phung po bsam mi khyab/ /mtshan dang dpe byad lus brgyan pa/ /thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /skye
406b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang ni rus rigs dang / /yul rnams dang ni khyim dag dang / /grags pa dang ni gzugs dang sems/ /thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur/ /lha rnams rdzu 'phrul
406b7(dkon brtsegs): dngos po dang / /gzhal med khang dang lha mo dang / /rnam dag thogs med spobs pa yang / /sbyin pa las ni byung ba yin/ /sbyin pa'i tshogs mchog gang yin pa/ /sangs rgyas
407a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis 'di skad du/ /'di ni dang por byang chub rnams/ /gnas pa'i gzhi zhes bsngags pa mdzad/ /byang chub sems dpa' brtson
407a2(dkon brtsegs): 'grus can/ /sbyin la the tshom med pa dag /nges pa'i sems la rab gnas nas/ /sbyin pa nan tan sgrub par gyis/ /sbyin pa'i sems ni gang dag gis/ /bsod nams
407a3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs ni rdzogs byed pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrub byed na/ /sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /sbyin pa'i mthu yi stobs kyis ni/ /rdzu 'phrul mchog ni rdzogs
407a4(dkon brtsegs): byed pas/ /zhing ni bye ba bskul byas nas/ /sems can rnams la gnod mi 'gyur/ /sbyin pa btang ba'i dbang gis na/ /rnam dag tshul khrims mang thos dang / /yang
407a5(dkon brtsegs): dag yid ches brtson 'grus dang / /ting 'dzin zag med shes rab 'dren/ /sbyin pa btang ba'i dbang gis na/ /dbang po stobs dang yang dag lam/ /yang dag spong
407a6(dkon brtsegs): dang rdzu 'phrul rkang / /bag chags spong ba 'dren par byed/ /sbyin pa btang ba'i dbang gis na/ /rnam dag sgra snyan dag gis ni/ /zhing ni bye ba brgya phrag tu/ /dpag med
407a7(dkon brtsegs): chos ston 'dren par byed/ /yongs su dang bas sbyin btang bas/ /rdzu 'phrul rnams ni myur du 'thob/ /rdzu 'phrul yongs su rdzogs bya'i phyir/ /nan tan sbyin pa btang
407b1(dkon brtsegs): bar gyis/ /lha ni mang po tshad med rnams/ /lha ma yin dang klu rnams dang / /gnod sbyin brgya stong mang po dang / /'khor rnams kyis ni yongs bskor nas/ /gzhal med
407b2(dkon brtsegs): khang mchog rab zhugs te/ /rang dbang dag gis rtse byed na/ /'di la sogs pa'i rgyal po rnams/ /sbyin la brtson pa mthong gyur na/ /thams cad langs nas bsu nas ni/ /
407b3(dkon brtsegs): stan gding mchod pa dag kyang byed/ /sbyin gtong gang zag gang yin pa/ /gzi byin chen po phun sum tshogs shing / /rdzu 'phrul stobs la dbang thob pas/ /lha rgyal rnams ni
407b4(dkon brtsegs): sdud par byed/ /grul bum dang ni gnod sbyin rnams/ /thams cad skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /dri za 'khor bcas rnams kyis kyang / /rol mo dag gis mchod par byed/ /
407b5(dkon brtsegs): chom rkun dag ni byams sems bskyed/ /ma rungs pa rnams ring du 'gro/ /nor rnams nyams par mi 'gyur te/ /bang mdzod dag ni gang bar 'gyur/ /sbyin pa yongs su
407b6(dkon brtsegs): btang ba'i phyir/ /tshogs mchog dag ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas ye shes thug bar du/ /mu stegs chos ni spyod mi byed/ /da la na ba yong med de/ /gzungs
407b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams yongs su srung bar byed/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i stobs rnams kyang / /sbyin pa las ni byung ba yin/ /de ltar sbyin pa gang gtong ba/ /byang chub lam ni sgrub par
408a1(dkon brtsegs): byed| |mi dge'i bshes gnyen phrad mi 'gyur/ /spyod mthun grogs po thob par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /
408a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa'i tshogs ni gsog byed pas/ /bsam gyis mi khyab gzungs dag dang / /shes rab yongs su rdzogs byed pas/ /tshigs su bcad pa tshad med kyis/ /kun 'dzin
408a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ston par byed/ /thams cad la ni thogs med pas/ /ngo bo nyid don stor mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni rgya che la/ /mos pa'i sems ni brtan par 'gyur/ /
408a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dag pa phun tshogs shing / /bdud kyi las rnams spong bar byed/ /'dod pa lnga la zhen med cing / /rtse gcig yang dag dran pa tshol/ /sems la rtag tu
408a5(dkon brtsegs): rmongs med pas/ /'dod pa dag la sred mi bskyed/ /zhe sdang nyon mongs gang yin pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin rab tu rtogs/ /spyod yul dag ni thams cad la/ /zhen pa
408a6(dkon brtsegs): med cing rmongs pa med/ /gang zag des ni nyon mongs rnams/ /legs pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur/ /rgyu dang rkyen ni 'dus pa las/ /nyes dmigs rnams ni skye ba
408a7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi bar dag gi /rgyu dang rgyu yi rgyu nyid dang / /de bzhin rgyu yi bya ba rnams/ /thams cad rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /des ni mig zad mtha' yi
408b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu| |gang yin rab tu rtogs pas na/ /rmongs pa rnams ni yongs spangs nas/ /mig la mngon par zhen mi 'gyur/ /des ni mig gi skye mtha' dang / /mtha' dang rab tu dben
408b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / /'jug pa dang ni med pa dang / /mi skye ba nas nyer zhi'i bar/ /'di la sogs pa'i rgyu nyid kyang / /rab tu rtogs par gyur pas na/ /rmongs pa rnams ni yongs spangs
408b3(dkon brtsegs): nas| |mig la mngon par zhen mi 'gyur/ /des ni mig gi sngon mtha' yi/ /brjod pa 'jig rten rjes su ni/ /btags pa yin pas de la ni/ /yang dag ci yang med par
408b4(dkon brtsegs): rtogs| |des ni mig gi phyi mtha' yi/ /brjod pa 'jig rten rjes su ni/ /btags pa yin pas de la ni/ /yang dag ci yang med par rtogs/ /des ni mig gi skye mtha'
408b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / /mtha' dang rab dben 'jug pa dang / /ci yang med dang skye med nas/ /nye bar zhi ba'i bar dag dang / /'di la sogs pa'i brjod pa rnams/ /'jig rten rjes su btags
408b6(dkon brtsegs): pas na/ /de la yang dag med par ni/ /rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba yin/ /des ni mig gi sngon mtha' yi/ /brjod pa rgyu rkyen 'dus pa las/ /byung ba nyid du rtogs pas na/ /
408b7(dkon brtsegs): de la zhen pa ci yang med/ /des ni mig gi phyi mtha' yi/ /brjod pa rgyu rkyen 'dus pa las/ /byung ba nyid du rtogs pas na/ /de la zhen pa ci yang med/ /des ni mig gi skye
409a1(dkon brtsegs): mtha' dang / /mtha' dang rab dben 'jug pa dang / /ci yang med dang skye med nas/ /nye bar zhi ba'i bar dag dang / /'di la sogs pa'i
409a2(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa rnams/ /rgyu dang rkyen ni 'dus pa las/ /byung ba nyid du rtogs pas na/ /de la zhen pa ci yang med/ /des ni mig gi sngon mtha' yi/ /brjod pa'i rang bzhin bstan
409a3(dkon brtsegs): med par/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pas na/ /de la zhen pa ci yang med/ /des ni mig gi phyi mtha' yi/ /brjod pa rang bzhin bstan med par/ /rab tu rtogs par
409a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas na/ /de la zhen pa ci yang med/ /des ni mig gi skye mtha' dang / /mtha' dang rab dben 'jug pa dang / /ci yang med dang skye med nas/ /nye bar zhi ba'i bar
409a5(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / /'di la sogs pa'i brjod pa rnams/ /rang bzhin gyis ni bstan med par/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur bas na/ /de la zhen pa ci yang med/ /rna ba sna lce lus
409a6(dkon brtsegs): dang yid/ /yul drug dag ni 'byung chen bzhi/ /'jig rten skye ba'i ming gi bar/ /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /des ni 'dod chags sangs rgyas lam/ /
409a7(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin dbyer med yin par ni/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pas na/ /'dod chags la ni zhen pa med/ /sangs rgyas lam ni thams cad kun/ /nyon mongs las
409b1(dkon brtsegs): ni btsal bar bya/ /rang bzhin dbyer med rab shes na/ /kun 'dzin sgor ni zhugs pa yin/ /'dod chags kun 'dzin yin pa dang / /kun 'dzin 'dod chags yin ston cing / /
409b2(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin dbyer med rab shes na/ /kun 'dzin sgor ni slob pa yin/ /de bzhin 'dod chags gang mchod pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas mchod pa yin/ /sangs rgyas la ni mchod pa'i
409b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir| |kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /des ni zhe sdang sangs rgyas lam/ /rang bzhin dbyer med yin par ni/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pas na/ /zhe sdang la ni zhen pa
409b4(dkon brtsegs): med| |zhe sdang kun 'dzin yin pa dang / /kun 'dzin zhe sdang yin ston cing / /rang bzhin dbyer med rab shes na/ /kun 'dzin sgor ni slob pa yin/ /de bzhin zhe sdang gang
409b5(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas mchod pa yin/ /sangs rgyas la ni mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /des ni gti mug sangs rgyas lam/ /rang bzhin
409b6(dkon brtsegs): dbyer med yin par ni/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pas na/ /gti mug la ni zhen pa med/ /gal te gti mug nyid kyi mtha'/ /yang dag ji bzhin rtogs gyur na/ /de ni sangs
409b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas lam bsgrubs pas/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /gti mug kun 'dzin yin pa dang / /kun 'dzin gti mug yin ston zhing / /rang bzhin dbyar med rab
410a1(dkon brtsegs): shes na| |kun 'dzin sgor ni slob pa yin/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas mchod pa yin/ /sangs rgyas la ni mchod pa'i
410a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir| |kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /de ni chos la mchod pa yin/ /chos la mchod pa byas pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin
410a3(dkon brtsegs): sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /de ni dge 'dun mchod pa yin/ /dge 'dun la ni mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par

410a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /brtson 'grus la ni mchod pa yin/ /brtson 'grus la ni mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin
410a6(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gang mchod pa/ /bsngags pa brjod cing mchod pa yin/ /bsngags pa brjod cing mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin
410a7(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gang mchod pa/ /sangs rgyas chos la mchod pa yin/ /sangs rgyas chos la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti
