410b6(dkon brtsegs): pa| |dpag tu med la mchod pa yin/ /dpag tu med la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /srid pa gsum la mchod
410b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ /srid pa gsum la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /rab dben la ni mchod pa yin/ /rab dben la ni
411a1(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /'khor bar 'jug la mchod pa yin/ /'khor
411a2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'jug la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /'jug pa med la mchod pa yin/ /'jug pa med la mchod pa'i
411a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir| |kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /yod pa min la mchod pa yin/ /yod pa min la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs
411a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /'byung ba med la mchod pa yin/ /'byung ba med la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin
411a5(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gang mchod pa/ /nye bar zhi la mchod pa yin/ /nye bar zhi la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /
411a6(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba med la mchod pa yin/ /'ong ba med la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /'gro ba med la mchod pa
411a7(dkon brtsegs): yin| |'gro ba med la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /'dus byas la ni mchod pa yin/ /'dus byas
411b1(dkon brtsegs): la ni mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /sdug bsngal la sogs mchod pa yin/ /sdug bsngal la sogs
411b2(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /sdug bsngal shes la mchod pa yin/ /sdug bsngal shes la mchod pa'i
411b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir| |kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /kun 'byung shes la mchod pa yin/ /kun 'byung shes la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin
411b4(dkon brtsegs): sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /'gog pa shes la mchod pa yin/ /'gog pa shes la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par
411b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur| |de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /lam shes la ni mchod pa yin/ /lam shes la ni mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin
411b6(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gang mchod pa/ /chos shes la ni mchod pa yin/ /chos shes la ni mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod
411b7(dkon brtsegs): pa| |rjes la shes la mchod pa yin/ /rjes la shes la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /skye med ye
412a1(dkon brtsegs): shes mchod pa yin/ /skye med ye shes mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /zad
412a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes mchod pa yin/ /zad pa'i ye shes mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin yang dag spong ba dang / /dran pa nyer gzhag rdzu
412a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul rkang / /dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang / /byang chub yan lag bdun po dang / /yan lag brgyad pa'i lam dag dang / /zhi gnas lhag mthong la sogs pa//
412a4(dkon brtsegs): chos ni rnam pa dgu po rnams/ /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/
412a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang la la zhig theg pa chen po la gnas nas gong du ji skad bstan pa'i gzungs mngon par sgrub par 'dod pas/ gang zag rnam pa brgyad cu yongs su
412a6(dkon brtsegs): spang bar bya'o/ /rnam pa brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha bsad pa dang / ma bsad pa dang / dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang / gnod sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
412a7(dkon brtsegs): la mtshal byung ba dang / dge 'dun mthun pa bshig pa dang / rkun bur rab tu byung ba dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / dbang po gnyis dang ldan pa dang / log par lta ba
412b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / log par sems pa dang / log par smra ba dang / log pa'i lam can dang / log pas 'tsho ba dang / log par brtson pa dang / log pa'i dran pa can dang / log pa'i
412b2(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa dang / gnas mi shes pa dang / dus ma shes pa dang / tshod mi shes pa dang / /lam mi shes pa dang / tshad mi shes pa dang / bdag dang gzhan mi shes pa
412b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / /sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / bslab pa'i gnas rnams la gus pa med pa dang / bag yod pa dang / spyod yul khyad par du 'phags pa dag la btsun par
412b4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dzin pa dang / chos mi shes pa dang / 'dul ba mi shes pa dang / bslab pa'i gnas mi shes pa dang / kha na ma tho ba lci ba dang yang ba mi shes pa dang / tshul khrims nyams
412b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ral pa mi shes pa dang / gzhan yang spyod pa shin tu phra ba dang rigs mi shes pa dang / las ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba mi shes pa dang / dngos po dman pa rnams
412b6(dkon brtsegs): mi shes pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i bsngags pa brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos la skur pa 'debs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa sgrub par bskul ba dang /
412b7(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa'i lam yang dag pa la skyo zhing spong bar byed pa dang / tshul khrims nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / spyod lam nyams pa dang / lam ma yin pa spyod pa
413a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / bdag yod par smra ba dang / sems can yod par smra ba dang / srog yod par smra ba dang / gang zag yod par smra ba dang / bsam pa
413a2(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dman zhing 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug skyed par byed pa dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / stong zhing rgyu med par lta ba dang /
413a3(dkon brtsegs): yod pa mi mthong ba dang / med pa mi mthong ba dang / las mi mthong ba dang / brtson 'grus mi mthong ba dang / las mi shes pa dang / las kyi rgyu mi shes pa dang / rnam par
413a4(dkon brtsegs): smin pa mi shes pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i rgyu mi shes pa dang / dbang po rnams mi shes pa dang / dbang po rnams kyi rgyu mi shes pa dang / khams mi shes pa dang / khams
413a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyu mi shes pa dang / rnam par grol ba mi shes pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i rgyu mi shes pa dang / lam mi shes pa dang / lam gyi rgyu mi shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa
413a6(dkon brtsegs): mi shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i rgyu mi shes pa dang / gtong ba mi shes pa dang / gtong ba'i rgyu mi shes pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi shes pa dang /
413a7(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi mtha'i rgyu mi shes pa dang / skye shi mi shes pa dang / skye shi'i rgyu mi shes pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa mi shes pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i rgyu
413b1(dkon brtsegs): mi shes pa dang / zad pa dang zad pa ma yin pa mi shes pa dang / yod pa dang yod pa ma yin pa mi shes pa dang / mtha' dang mtha' ma yin pa mi shes pa dang / dben pa dang
413b2(dkon brtsegs): dben pa ma yin pa mi shes pa dang / 'jug pa dang 'jug pa ma yin pa mi shes pa dang / ngo bo nyid dang ngo bo nyid ma yin pa mi shes pa dang / skye ba dang skye ba ma yin pa mi
413b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / 'gag pa dang 'gag pa ma yin pa mi shes pa gang yin pa ste/ gzhon nu/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gong du ji skad bstan pa'i gzungs
413b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sgrub par 'dod pas chos ma yin pa spyod pa'i gang zag brgyad cu po 'di dag yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de
413b5(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig mig gi skye mtha' dang / /zad mtha' dag ni mi rtogs pa/ /de ni kun 'dzin la rmongs pas/ /mkhas pas yongs su spang bar bya/ /gang zhig
413b6(dkon brtsegs): mig la bdag med dang / /sems can med par rtogs gyur pa/ /de ni kun 'dzin la gnas pas/ /mkhas pas yongs su bsten par bya/ /gang zhig mig ni skye zad dang //
413b7(dkon brtsegs): yi ge spangs pa rtogs gyur pa/ /de ni kun 'dzin la gnas pas/ /mkhas pas yongs su bsten par bya/ /gang zhig mig ni dben pa dang / /gnas pa med par rtogs
414a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa| |de ni kun 'dzin la gnas pas/ /mkhas pas yongs su bsten par bya/ /gang zhig mig gi rang bzhin nyid/ /gnas pa med

414a7(dkon brtsegs): bsten par bya/ /de bzhin gzungs kyi ngo bo nyid/ /yi ges brjod bya ma yin pas/ /phyogs kyang yod pa ma yin la/ /sems kyis kyang ni phyin mi 'gyur/ /chos de la ni
414b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba med/ /zhe sdang la yang gnas pa min/ /ri rgyal bzhin du mi g.yo bas/ /rjod par byed kyang dmigs su med/ /kun 'dzin yang dag yod ma yin/ /bdag kyang yod
414b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin te/ /gal te bdag ni rang bzhin stong / /kun 'dzin yang ni yod mi 'gyur/ /kun 'dzin rang bzhin stong yin na/ /byis pas yod par rab tu brtags/ /yang dag
414b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin brtags pas na/ /ma thos par yang mya ngan bskyed/ /gang zhig 'dod dang kun 'dzin dang / /stong pa nyid du rnam rtog pa/ /rtog pa gnyis po de dag kyang / /mthar ni
414b4(dkon brtsegs): gang yang dmigs mi 'gyur/ /gal te stong nyid stong rtogs na/ /kun 'dzin dag kyang yod mi 'gyur/ /byang chub yan lag bar dag dang / /ting 'dzin dag kyang stong pa
414b5(dkon brtsegs): yin| |gang zhig kun 'dzin stong nyid dang / /ting 'dzin dag gi bar dag dang / /rab tu rtogs par gyur na ni/ /mig kyang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig ni zad pa'i
414b6(dkon brtsegs): mtha'| |yang dag ji bzhin rab rtogs na/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa/ /mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed/ /gang zhig mig ni skye ba'i mtha'/ /yang dag ji bzhin rab
414b7(dkon brtsegs): rtogs na/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa/ /mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed/ /gang zhig mig gi mtha' yi rnams/ /yang dag ji bzhin rab rtogs na/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni
415a1(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa/ /mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed/ /gang zhig mig ni rab dben pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin rab rtogs na/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni gang
415a2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa| |mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed/ /gang zhig mig gi 'jug pa dag /yang dag ji bzhin rab rtogs na/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa/ /mthar ni

415b4(dkon brtsegs): dag bzhin rtogs na/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa/ /mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi/ /'jig rten

416a6(dkon brtsegs): chen bzhi/ /'jig rten skye ba'i ming gi bar/ /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /'dod sdang gti mug nga rgyal che/ /phrag dog g.yo sgyu ser sna dang / /nyes dmigs dri ma
416a7(dkon brtsegs): zug rngu dang / /chu bo dkar nag las rnams dang / /skye ba med dang 'gog med dang / /'gro ba med dang 'ong med dang / /mi g.yo tha dad mi 'gyur dang / /byas min spyod pa ma yin
416b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / /snang min mun pa ma yin dang / /'jug min chu bo spangs pa dang / /zag pa med dang gnas med dang / /'gro min mi 'gro ma yin dang / /yi ge ma yin dmigs min dang / /'byung
416b2(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin 'jug min dang / /yang dag ma yin rnam rtog sogs/ /sgo ni drug cu rtsa gnyis rnams/ /so so'i don dang ci rigs par/ /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /gang zhig

417a2(dkon brtsegs): dang rnam rtog med gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin/ /gang zhig mig ni nyer zhi ba'i/ /rab dang tha ma'i bar shes shing / /len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa/ /kun

417b1(dkon brtsegs): sa la smon med 'du shes shing / /len dang rnam rtog med par ni/ /de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed/ /sa la gnas med 'du shes shing / /'gro
417b2(dkon brtsegs): ba med dang 'ong med dang / /mtha' med dang ni zad med dang / /mtshungs par ldan dang mtshungs mi ldan/ /ming dang yi ge brtags bral dang / /so sor brtags dang 'jug pa dang //
417b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyen po mi mthun phyogs med dang / /brjod du med cing bstan med dang / /rab dben gnas pa med pa dang / /dran pa nyer gzhag yang dag spong / /rdzu 'phrul rkang dang dbang po stobs/ /
417b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub yan lag mi 'jigs lam/ /de ltar sa yi chos rnams la/ /len dang rnam rtog med par ni/ /de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed/ /gal
417b5(dkon brtsegs): te bdag la 'jug med pas/ /len dang rnam rtog med par ni/ /de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed/ /gal te bdag la 'byung med pas/ /len dang
417b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam rtog med par ni/ /de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed/ /gal te bdag la mtshan med pas/ /len dang rnam rtog med par ni/ /de ltar gang
417b7(dkon brtsegs): zhig rtogs gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed/ /gal te bdag la smon med pas/ /len dang rnam rtog med par ni/ /de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni
418a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byed/ /gal te bdag la gnas med pas/ /len dang rnam rtog med par ni/ /de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par
418a2(dkon brtsegs): byed| |gal te bdag la skye med pas/ /len dang rnam rtog med par ni/ /de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed/ /gal te bdag la 'gag med
418a3(dkon brtsegs): pas| |len dang rnam rtog med par ni/ /de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed/ /gal te bdag la yig med pas/ /len dang rnam rtog med par ni//
418a4(dkon brtsegs): de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed/ /gal te bdag ni yig bral bas/ /len dang rnam rtog med par ni/ /de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa//
418a5(dkon brtsegs): kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed/ /mig gi sngon dang phyi mtha' dang / /rtag chad dag ni spangs pa dang / /rgyu rkyen rang bzhin stong par ni/ /'dren pas thabs kyis bstan rig byos//
418a6(dkon brtsegs): gal te chos ni ston pa'i tshe/ /mig gi mtshan nyid rtogs byed na/ /de ni mi bden rtogs yin pas/ /yang dag chos bstan zhes mi bya/ /gal te chos ni sems pa'i tshe/ /
418a7(dkon brtsegs): mig gi mtshan nyid rtogs byed na/ /de ni mi bden rtogs yin pas/ /chos sems pa zhes mi bya'o/ /gal te chos ni sgom pa'i tshe/ /mig gi mtshan nyid rtogs byed na/ /de ni
418b1(dkon brtsegs): mi bden rtogs yin pas/ /chos sgom pa zhes mi bya'o/ /gang zhig mig gi stong nyid rtogs/ /byang chub gzhol bar mi byed na/ /sangs rgyas gang zag de dag la/ /rtag tu mngon
418b2(dkon brtsegs): sum chos ston mdzad/ /gal te mig ni ma rtogs na/ /gzugs kyang rtogs par mi 'gyur la/ /gal te mig ni rtogs gyur na/ /gzugs kyang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /gal
418b3(dkon brtsegs): te mig ni rtogs gyur na/ /gzugs kyang rab tu rtogs 'gyur la/ /gal te gzugs ni rtogs gyur na/ /mig kyang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /yul
418b4(dkon brtsegs): drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi/ /'jig rten skye ba'i ming gi bar/ /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /gal te chos ni ston pa'i tshe/ /rgyu yi mtshan nyid rtog byed na/ /de ni mi bden rtog
418b5(dkon brtsegs): yin pas/ /chos ston pa zhes mi bya'o/ /gal te chos ni ston pa'i tshe/ /'bras bu'i mtshan nyid rtog byed na/ /de ni mi bden rtogs yin pas/ /chos ston pa zhes mi bya'o/ /gal
418b6(dkon brtsegs): te chos ni ston pa'i tshe/ /lam gyi mtshan nyid rtog byed na/ /de ni mi bden rtog yin pas/ /chos ston pa zhes mi bya'o/ /gal te chos ni ston pa'i tshe/ /stong pa'i mtshan nyid
418b7(dkon brtsegs): rtog byed na/ /de ni mi bden rtog yin pas/ /chos ston pa zhes mi bya'o/ /gal te chos ni ston pa'i tshe/ /bsags pa dag tu rtog byed na/ /de ni mi bden rtog yin pas/ /chos
419a1(dkon brtsegs): ston pa zhes mi bya'o/ /gal te chos ni ston pa'i tshe/ /rdzas kyi dngos por rtog byed na/ /de ni mi bden rtog yin pas/ /chos ston pa zhes mi bya'o/ /gal
419a2(dkon brtsegs): te chos ni ston pa'i tshe/ /mig gi 'dzin par rtog byed na/ /de ni mi bden rtog yin pas/ /chos ston pa zhes mi bya'o/ /mig ni shes par ma gyur na/ /'dod chags dag ni
419a3(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'gyur/ /gal te mig ni shes gyur na/ /'dod chags dag ni skye mi 'gyur/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi/ /'jig rten skye ba'i ming gi
419a4(dkon brtsegs): bar| |thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /gal te chos ni ston pa'i tshe/ /khams ni sna tshogs rtog byed na/ /de ni mi bden rtog yin pas/ /chos ston pa zhes mi bya'o/ /
419a5(dkon brtsegs): yi dam dag ni mi nyams shing / /ngo bo nyid stong rtog pa dang / /ting 'dzin sgo rnams thob gyur pa/ /de ni chos legs ston par 'gyur/ /yi dam dag ni mi nyams shing / /mig
419a6(dkon brtsegs): la rtog pa spangs pa ni/ /rnam rtog med par gyur pa'i phyir/ /des ni chos legs ston par 'gyur/ /mig nyid stong par ma shes na/ /mig gi rang bzhin dag la rmongs/ /'di ltar
419a7(dkon brtsegs): khong du ma chud phyir/ /des ni chos rnams bstan mi bya/ /gal te mig nyid stong shes na/ /mig gi rang bzhin shes par 'gyur/ /'di ltar rab tu shes pa'i phyir/ /de ni chos
419b1(dkon brtsegs): rab bstan par bya/ /mig nyid stong par ma shes na/ /mig gi rang bzhin dag la rmongs/ /'di ltar khong du ma chud phyir/ /de ni chos rnams bstan mi bya/ /gal te mig nyid stong shes na//
419b2(dkon brtsegs): tshig gi rang bzhin shes par 'gyur/ /'di ltar rab tu shes pa'i phyir/ /des ni chos rab bstan par bya/ /mig nyid stong par ma shes na/ /yi ge'i rang bzhin dag la rmongs/ /'di ltar
419b3(dkon brtsegs): khong du ma chud phyir/ /des ni chos rnams bstan mi bya/ /gal te mig nyid stong shes na/ /yi ge'i rang bzhin shes par 'gyur/ /de ltar rab tu shes pa'i phyir/ /de ni chos rab bstan
419b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya| |mig nyid stong par ma shes na/ /mig gi rang bzhin dag la rmongs/ /'di ltar khong du ma chud phyir/ /des ni chos rnams bstan mi bya/ /gal te mig nyid stong shes na/ /
419b5(dkon brtsegs): mig gi rang bzhin shes par 'gyur/ /'di ltar rab tu shes pa'i phyir/ /des ni chos rab bstan par bya/ /mig nyid stong par ma shes na/ /gzugs kyi rang bzhin dag la rmongs/ /'di
419b6(dkon brtsegs): ltar khong du ma chud phyir/ /des ni chos rnams bstan mi bya/ /gal te mig nyid stong shes na/ /gzugs kyi rang bzhin shes par 'gyur/ /'di ltar rab tu shes pa'i phyir/ /de ni chos
419b7(dkon brtsegs): rab bstan par bya/ /mig nyid stong par ma shes na/ /'jig rten mtshan gnas rtogs byed pas/ /rjes su mthun pa kho nar ni/ /sems can rnams ni gdul mi nus/ /mig gi yod
420a1(dkon brtsegs): med ma rtogs par/ /'khor gyi nang du chos ston pa/ /de ni rnyed la gdu bas na/ /thams cad yid ches len mi byed/ /mig gi yod med rtogs gyur na/ /
420a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi nang du chos ston pas/ /des ni mngon zhen med pas na/ /thams cad yid ches len par byed/ /mig ni stong par ma rtogs par/ /chos kyi stan la 'dug nas ni/ /dpe mang
420a3(dkon brtsegs): dag gis rab bstan kyang / /thams cad yid ches len mi byed/ /gal te mig nyid stong shes na/ /chos kyi stan la 'dug nas ni/ /dpe rnams kyis ni ston byed na/ /thams cad
420a4(dkon brtsegs): yid ches len par byed/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi/ /'jig rten skye ba'i ming gi bar/ /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /bcom ldan
420a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams
420a6(dkon brtsegs): cad yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u
420a7(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag brgya pa las/ /'od zer kun tu bskye ba'i le'u ste/ bcu gcig pa rdzogs so//
